Freedom of conscience and free profession, practice and PROPAGATION of religion<br />\n(1) Subject to public order, morality and health and to the other provisions of this Part, all persons are equally entitled to freedom of conscience and the right freely to profess, practise and PROPAGATE religion<br />\n<br />\n########################################<br />\n<br />\nNO JUDGE SHOULD BE ALLOWED TO QUOTE ANY OTHER JUDGEMENT MADE BY A PAST JUDGE WITHOUT CONTEXT..<br />\n<br />\nOUR CONSTITUTION STANDS ALONE -- IT DOES NOT NEED A LANGOT OF PAST JUDGEMENTS SANS CONTEXT OF STUPID JUDGES , TO USE AS AN APPENDIX..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN THE MISSIONARY GRAHAM STAINED WAS MURDERED SOME JUDGES IN THE PAYROLL OF THE DEEP STATE HAD MADE DELIBERATE ERRONEOUS JUDGMENTS ..<br />\n<br />\nGRAHAM STAINES WAS A DEEP STATE AGENT , ENGAGED IN SLIMY COVERT \"PROSELYTISATION. THIS DEEP STATE AGENT IN THE GARB OF A MISSIONARY CREATED THE RED CORRIDOR IN ORISSA AND ALSO ACTED AS AN EVIL PHARMA AGENT FOR TESTING VACCINES ON TRIBALS WHO NEVER NEEDED THESE VACCINES..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/09/bauxite-mining-naxalite-menace-joshua.html</span><br />\n<br />\nPROSELYTISATION INVOLVES PERSUASION ..<br />\n<br />\nPROPAGATE IS A DIFFERENT KETTLE OF FISH.. A RUMOR IS PROPAGATED .. THERE IS NO PERSUATION HERE ..<br />\n<br />\nA WEBSITE OR TV CHANNEL ( LIKE ZAKIR NAIK ) CAN PROPAGATE ISLAM ..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE IS NO CONVERSION HERE.. EVEN A HALFWIT KNOWS THE DIFFERENCE..<br />\n<br />\nAN IDEA THAT THE RED SEA PARTED FOR JEWS ( CHOSEN PEOPLE OF THE PROMISED LAND ) CAN BE PROPAGATED..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/god-code-by-timothy-paul-smith-damning.html</span><br />\n<br />\nPROSELYTISATION BY A MISSIONARY INCLUDES HIJACKING OF HUMAN CONSCIENCE AND EXPLOITING VULNERABILITY -- BOTH ARE NOT ALLOWED BY OUR CONSTITUTION..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN A CHRISTIAN CHURCHs AGENT STANDS OUTSIDE A KIDNEY DIALYSIS HOSPITAL OFFERING FREE DIALYSIS IF THE ENTIRE FAMILY CONVERTS TO CHRISTIANITY-- WHAT IS THIS ? THIS IS NOW HAPPENING IN CHRISTIAN ENGLISH MEDIUM PRIMARY ( LKG/ UKG ) CLASS SCHOOLS DURING ADMISSION TIME . ..<br />\n<br />\nRIGHT TO PROPAGATE RELIGION IS NOT A LICENCE TO PROSELYTISE.. 100% .. CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL SAYS SO.. DOES ANYBODY DARE TO QUESTION MY INTELLECT ?..<br />\n<br />\nHISTORICALLY ISLAM HAS USED COERCION BY FEAR ( SWORD ) CHRISTIANITY HAS USED INDUCEMENT OF VULNERABLE PEOPLE BY SOPS.<br />\n<br />\nIf people should propagate their religion, let them do so. But WE THE PEOPLE will not allow article 25 ( 1 ) of the constitution to be used as a fundamental right to encourage a missionary to proselytise ..<br />\n<br />\nA Christian Missionary starts by decrying the ancestral culture and religion of the would-be convert Hindu to make him self loathing.. And imagine Jesus Christ never existed.<br />\n<br />\nJesus was modelled after a Kerala Hindu sage named Apllonius of Tyana in 325 AD at the First Council of Nicea where the Bible was cooked up..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/helena-mother-of-roman-emperor.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWE THE PEOPLE WILL TURN OUR CORRUPT / IGNORANT JUDICIARY ON ITS HEAD..<br />\n<br />\nREAD THE UNFINISHED POST BELOW ( ONLY 8% COMPLETE ) \u2014<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/justice-be-damned-enforce-law-not-any.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..&nbsp;</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c7399745244376261510-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c9020005667109344470\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_11.html?showComment=1547384318727#c6179114250550492380\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 13, 2019 at 6:28 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nA PERSON LIKE ROHINGTON NARIMAN ( AN ORDAINED PARSI PRIEST ) WOULD HAVE BEEN EXCLUDED 100% FROM THE JURY , IN A CASE LIKE SABARIMALA..<br />\n<br />\nBUT HEY, IN INDIA THIS FELLOW NAY MELORD WAS DELIBERATELY INCLUDED IN THE BENCH..<br />\n<br />\nBUT HEY, ROHINGTON NARIMAN DOES NOT KNOW THAT AHURA MAZDA ( MENTOR OF ASURAS ) IS SHUKRACHARYA..<br />\n<br />\nMAZDA MEANS WIDSOM PROVIDER. AHURA MEANS ASURA ( DANAVA )..<br />\n<br />\nI AM A DANAVA.<br />\n<br />\nDANAVA CIVILIZATION PRECEEDED VEDIC CIVILIAZATION BY SEVERAL MILLINIUMS.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/06/shukracharya-is-ahura-mazda-god-of.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/09/why-kerala-does-not-celebrate-diwali-or.html</span><br />\n<br />\nMALABAR ( NORTH KERALA ) WAS THE FOUNTAIN HEAD OF THE ANEICNT DANAVA CIVILIZATION. KING MAHABALIs FATHER VIROCHANA RULED THE WHOE PLANET.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\nSRI YANTRA, SWASTIKA ( SYMBOL OF ARYAN NAMBOODIRI ELDEST BROTHER ) , SIX POINTED STAR ( SYMBOL OF SEMITE , YOUNGER BROTHER OF NAMBODIRIS ) WERE DANAVA SYMBOLS.<br />\n<br />\nARYANS WERE SANSKRIT , ASTRONOMY, MATH AND ORAL VEDAS KNOWING CREAM OF THIYYAS.<br />\n<br />\nSEMITES COULD NOT MARRY, NOR THEY COULD OWN LAND.. LEFT ANED DISGRACED SEMITES CREATED JUDAISM AND RIGHT TO LEFT HEBREW ..<br />\n<br />\nMOHAMMAD THE PROPHET WAS A SEMITE.. HIS FATHER WAS THE YOUNGER BROTHER OF AN ARYAN NAMBOODIRI WHO WAS THE PRIEST OF THE SHIVA TEMPLE AT MECCA OASIS OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING ( MY HOMETOWN ) ..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE WAS A TIME WHEN THE WHOLE WORLD WAS DIVIDED INTO WORSHIPPERS OR EITHER BRIHASPATI OR SHUKRACHARYA WHO WERE CLASSMATES IN THE GURUKUL OF BRIHASPATIs FATHER MAHARISHI ANGIRASA.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/05/thor-zeus-marduk-brihaspati-and-jupiter.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/02/madain-saleh-destruction-of-ancient.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/03515649322352795115\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">abcindiagogo</a></cite><span class=\"icon user \" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_11.html?showComment=1547384572457#c6045278258563834083\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 13, 2019 at 6:32 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCaptain, have you watched \"Star-Wars\" movies ? They depict machines which are very close to Vimanas, although the engines are portrayed more like traditional rocket-boosters. The concept of travelling between entire systems &amp; entering/exiting different planets is liberally used here. These spacecraft depicted can operate in atmosphere's of multiple-planets and even space. They use this concept of \"Hyperspace\" where the spacecraft increases it's thrust and enters a wormhole-type-thing which facilitates interstellar travel. This concept of \"Hyperspace\" is described as \"a notional space\u2013time continuum in which it is possible to travel faster than light.\"........but the working seems to be similar to \"Impansion\" (opposite-of-expansion, a concept which you mentioned in a comment on a vimana-related-blog of yours) where the spacecraft appears to get sucked into this wormhole/continum.<br />\n<br />\nIt sounds crazy and I'm not very good at technical stuff, so I might have misunderstood. But do watch those movies Captain, who knows they might have ripped-off the concept of Vimanas &amp; Interstellar-travel.</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c6045278258563834083-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c6045278258563834083-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c8270753839746570022\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6VOqqm-hCbM/XCa06XjAUxI/AAAAAAABfL4/E3K2A6jHNG0XTf7_mZb9kjj9WxD3GwmzQCK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS MEANS SUN ( APPARENT MOTION ) TRAVELS CONTINUOUSLY UP AND DOWN FROM TROPIC OF CANCER AND TROPIC OF CAPRICON..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE LATITUDE OF THE SUN IS CALLED DECLINATION..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IF YOU LIVE NORTH OF TROPIC OF CANCER ( OR SOUTH OF TROPIC OF CAPRICON ) YOU WILL HAVE ONE COLDEST DAY AND ONE HOTTEST DAY ( JUNE 21ST AND DEC 21ST ).</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BUT IF YOU LIVE BETWEEN TROPIC OF CANCER AND TROPIC OF CAPRICON ( LIKE CALICUT ) YOU WILL HAVE TWO HOTTEST DAYS AND THOSE DAYS SUN WILL BE OVERHEAD AND A STICK ON THE GROUND WILL SHOW NO SHADOW ( ONE WHEN SUN IF GOING NORTHWARDS AND ONE WHEN SUN IS TRAVELING SOUTHWARDS ) AND ONE COLDEST DAY ( DEC 21 )</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; FOR BASAVA ( WHO NEVER EXISTED LIKE JESUS CHRIST ) SAID \"GODS HERE , GODS THERE---NO SPACE FOR OUR FEET\"..<br />\n<br />\nSHIVA IS TO BASAVA WHAT KRISHNA IS TO MEERA..( MEERA OF BHAKTI MOVEMENT NEVER EXISTED ) .. DO YOU REALLY THINK MODI AND AMIT SHAH ARE HINDUS ?<br />\n<br />\nGAURI LANKESH AND MM KALBURGI WHO HATED HINDUS WAS A LINGAYATH.. Basava took this seed home, and his sister without Basava\u2019s knowledge swallowed it, and became pregnant. The child was called Channabasava, or the beautiful Basava, and assisted his uncle in spreading the new doctrines.<br />\n<br />\nIMMACULATE CONCEPTION HAI BHAIYYA-- LIKE JESUS !<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD DROVE AWAY KERALA NAMBOODIRI PONTIFFS FROM BADRINATH MUTT AND TOOK IN CRYPTO JEW LINGAYATHS .. THEY ELABORATELY DRESS UP AND GO TO TEMPLES TO SHOW THAT THEY ARE AVAILABLE FOR SEX.\u201d..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS BASTARDs BOOK WAS THEN PUBLISHED BY DC BOOKS.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS WAS EXTREME BLASPHEMY.<br />\n<br />\nALL HINDUS GOT ANGRY AND UPSET.<br />\n<br />\nWHAT DID THE MELORDS WHO REVEL IN CULTURAL TERRORISM DECIDE?<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS \u201cFREEDOM OF SPEECH\u201d<br />\n<br />\nMATHRUBHUMI NEWS MEDIA IS BASED IN CALICUT PRINTED THIS FOUL BOOK AS A SERIAL .<br />\n<br />\nTHE NEWSPAPER HAS A CIRCULATION OF 15 LAKHS PER DAY. ITS OWNER IS A MULTI-MILLIONAIRE RUNNING THE KTC GROUP..WHICH OWNS MORE THAN 1000 TRUCKS AND 100 BUSES..<br />\n<br />\nTHE BASTARD AUTHOR S HAREESH IS SPONSORED BY THE DEEP STATE<br />\n<br />\nHE WAS AWARDED THE KERALA SAHITYA AKADEMI AWARD FOR THE BEST STORY WRITER IN 2018.<br />\n<br />\nSO WHAT ELSE IS NEW--ANYBODY WHO THROWS SHIT ON SANATANA DHARMA ARE GREAT WRITERS.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nTHE IRONY IS THAT ITS COMPETITOR MALAYALA MANORAMA ( CHRISTIAN OWNED ) IS WORSE .. IT IS THE 5TH MOST CIRCULATED NEWSPAPER ON THE PLANET.. THIS NEWSPAPER WAS FOUNDED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD IN 1888 USING AN ALBION PRESS -- WITH A KERALA KERALA CHRISTIAN FRONT ..<br />\n<br />\nUR ANANTHAMURTHY PISSED ON A VISHNU IDOL AND BOASTED \u201c THE IDOL COULD NOT HIT BACK \u201c<br />\n<br />\nWHY DID HE NOT TRY IT WITH THE KORAN OR THE STATUE OF JESUS OR BUDDHA ?<br />\n<br />\nUR ANANTHAMURTHY WAS PRAISED BY THE JUDGES FOR \u201cBEING BOLD WITH HIS FREEDOM OF EXPRESSION\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nUR ANANTAMURTHY DID NOT DARE TO PISS ON A SHIVA STATUE AS THE DEEP STATE SPONSORED LINGAYATHS WOULD HAVE KILLED HIM WITHIN AN HOUR..<br />\n<br />\nTHE LINGAYATHS ( WHOSE GOD BASAVA WAS COOKED UP BY JEW ROTHSCHILD AND BACKDATED ) WORSHIP SHIVA BUT THEY HATE VISHNU..<br />\n<br />\nLINGAYATHS BURY THEIR DEAD BODIES AND ARE NOT HINDUS ANYMORE- DIVIDE AND RULE AT ITS BEST.<br />\n<br />\nA LAWYER NAMED VIJAY HANSARIA REPRESENTING PINARI VIJAYAN DELIBERATELY LIED TO THE SUPREME COURT THAT 5 MILLION WOMEN LINED UP ( NAVODHANAM OF ATHEIST COMMIE PINARAYI VIJAYAN ) AS A HUMAN WALL ON 1ST JAN 2019 TO INDICATE THAT THEY WANT MENSTRUATING WOMEN TO ENTER SABARIMALA ..<br />\n<br />\nIN REALITY THERE WAS LESS THAN HALF A MILLION WOMEN , WITH THE THIN WALL HAVING GAPS OF 56% .<br />\n<br />\nSUPREME COURT JUDGES KNEW THE TRUTH BUT TOOK THIS AS SOLID EVIDENCE ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE PETITION DEMANDED THAT SUPREME COURT ORDER THE TANTRI NOT TO DO TEMPLE PURIFICATION AFTER A MENSTRAUTING WOMAN ENTERS THE SANNIDHANAM..<br />\n<br />\nTHE JNU COMMIE SYSTEM HAS INJECTED ANTI-WATAN ANTI-HINDU COMMIES AS BABUS ALL OVER INDIAN BUREAUCRACY..<br />\n<br />\nRead all 5 parts-<br />\nhttps://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/justice-be-damned-enforce-law-not-any.html<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\"><a class=\"comment-reply\" data-comment-id=\"5523417790244852416\" href=\"https://www.blogger.com/null\" style=\"color: #888888; He introduced Europe to the sequence of Fibonacci numbers, which he used as an example in Liber Abaci..<br />\n<br />\nThe book De divina proportione (On the Divine Proportion) on mathematics written by Luca Pacioli and illustrated by Leonardo da Vinci, is 100% lifted from Vedas -- Brahmanas and Aranyakas --<br />\n<br />\nIt related to the golden mean of 1.618 !.<br />\n<br />\nHOW DID LEONARD DA VINCI GET THE GOLDEN MEAN OF 1.618 FOR MONA LISAs FACE ?..<br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">1.618 IS THE FOUNDATION OF THE ANCIENT SRI YANTRA WHICH CONTAINS THE THEORY OF EVERYHING!..</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9nHcGHmUrK4<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIn De divina, he explores its relation to the five regular (or Platonic) solids: the cube, tetrahedron and octahedron (used by the Pythagoras who studied in Kodungallur University)...<br />\n<br />\nThe Pythagoreans had assigned each figure to an element: the cube to earth; the tetrahedron to fire; the octahedron to air; the icosahedron to water; and the dodecahedron to heavenly ether. ( VAASTU stuff lifted and fudged ).<br />\n<br />\nTHIEF Pacioli says he\u2019s included in his book all the material forms of geometric bodies which have \u2018hitherto been unknown to the living\u2019.<br />\n<br />\n\"The geometric expression of divine proportion involves three lengths and God also contains three (The Holy Trinity of Father, Son and Holy Ghost)\"<br />\n-- LIFTED FROM THE INDIAN TRINITY.<br />\n<br />\nTHIEF Pacioli proposes a fifth, esoteric, quality shared by the divine proportion and the Christian God, which he derives from Plato: -<br />\n<br />\n- \u2018As God has conferred being to heavenly virtue as a fifth substance, and by means of this fifth substance has extended being to the other four simple bodies or four elements (earth, water, air and fire) and through these to every other thing in nature, so in our divine proportion, following the ancient Plato in his Timaeus, we give formal being to Heaven itself by creating for it the body called the dodecahedron or the body of twelve pentagons.\u2019<br />\n<br />\nBRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAYYYY !<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"font-size: 16px; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 27, 2019 at 2:45 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n#############################<br />\namol shende<br />\nOctober 20, 2015 at 3:48 PM<br />\nguruji<br />\npranam<br />\ncan u speak on jhansi ki rani laxmibai.?<br />\nand how she was related to the so called revolt of 1857?<br />\n######################################<br />\n<br />\nHi as,<br />\n<br />\nDON\u2019T YOU WANT ANY INDIAN HEROINES -- EVEN IF THEY HAVE BEEN GIVEN TO US BY JEW ROTHSCHILD ?<br />\n<br />\nRothschild historians glorified Jhansi Ki Rani as the Indian Joan or Arc and the Indian Jezebel--and dollops of her and Tantia tope was given in our Social Studies NCERT books, so that we can feel that we gave Rothschild a fight for his money in 1857<br />\n<br />\nActually Rothschild triggered the war ( by CULTURAL terrorism ) , he fanned the war and he easily terminated the war on his turf and timetable.<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD THEN SHED ALL PRETENCES OF BEING A PEPPER TRADER AND TOOK OVER INDIA AS THE RULER.<br />\n<br />\nWe learnt of Jhansi Ki Rani\u2019s exploits only from British accounts.<br />\n<br />\nHERE IS THE ROTHSCHILD HISTORIANS COCK AND BULL STORY.<br />\n<br />\nIn the report of the battle for Gwalior, General Sir Hugh Rose commented that the rani \"remarkable for her beauty, cleverness and perseverance\" had been \"the most dangerous of all the rebel leaders\".<br />\n<br />\nIndians must know that Sikhs, the Mahars ( dalit clan of BR ambedkar ) and Scindias sided with the British in 1857, in the sepoy mutiny --or first war of independence.<br />\n<br />\nIn British troops arrived under Sir Hugh Rose and laid siege to Jhansi on 23rd March 1858. Rani Jhansi with her faithful warriors decided not to surrender.<br />\n<br />\nAn army of 20,000, headed by the rebel leader Tatya Tope, was sent to relieve Jhansi and to take Lakshmi Bai to freedom. However, the British, though numbering only 1,540 in the field killed all them mangy Indians.<br />\n<br />\nSee the white man is better in fighting. Does NOT matter even if the whole of India in millions rebel a few thousand white men superior in brawn and brain , can easily subdue them.<br />\n<br />\nLakshmi Bai\u2019s forces could not hold out and the British were able to breach the city walls and capture the city. Yet Lakshmi Bai escaped over the wall at night and fled from her city.<br />\n<br />\nAlong with the young Damodar Rao, the Rani decamped to Kalpi along with her forces where she joined other rebel forces, including those of Tatya Tope.<br />\n<br />\nThe Rani and Tatya Tope moved on to Gwalior, where the combined rebel forces defeated the army of the Maharaja of Gwalior after his armies deserted to the rebel forces.<br />\n<br />\nThey then occupied the strategic fort at Gwalior. However on the second day of fighting, on 18 June 1858, the Rani died.<br />\n<br />\nTHE CATCH IS THERE WAS NO DEAD BODY OF A QUEEN .<br />\n<br />\nEVEN EMPEROR ASOKA NEVER HAD A DEAD BODY.<br />\n<br />\nBecause of her bravery, courage, and wisdom, and her progressive views on WOMENs EMPOWERMENT she became an icon .<br />\n<br />\nWOMENS EMPOWERMENT MAAGTHA HAI BHAIYYA- EVEN AKKAL KA DUSHMAN KNOWS IT-- BAARAH CYLINDER KE SAATH.<br />\n<br />\nTHODA WOMENs EMPOWERMENT KAL KELIYE BHI RAKHO YAAR !<br />\n<br />\nTEE HEEEEEEEEEEEE !<br />\n<br />\nThe Rani was memorialized in bronze statues at both Jhansi and Gwalior, both of which portray her on horseback.<br />\n<br />\nRani Lakshmi Bai became a national heroine and was seen as the epitome of female bravery in India. When the Indian National Army created its first female unit, it was named after her.<br />\n<br />\nGANDHI IS THE FATHER OF OUR NATION.<br />\nKALIDASA IS OUR NATIONAL POET.<br />\nASHOKA IS OUR NATIONAL EMBLEM.<br />\n<br />\nIn my social studies book, i learnt the white invader's version of how Tantia Tope was hanged April 1859 --making him a great freedom fighter.<br />\n<br />\nTANTIA TOPE WAS NOT HANGED -- HE LIVED TO A RIPE OLD AGE.<br />\n<br />\nTo save the RED British face , stooge Scindia offered another man to be hanged in another place ( usually hanging is done in the hometown for identification )<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c2874174932325310892-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c2874174932325310892-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c3296054341498481740\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6VOqqm-hCbM/XCa06XjAUxI/AAAAAAABfL4/E3K2A6jHNG0XTf7_mZb9kjj9WxD3GwmzQCK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Tantya Tope was a close friend of Nana and both worked against the British.<br />\n<br />\nOtherwise Chitpavan JEW nay Brahmin Peshwas did what JEW Rothschild wanted them to.<br />\n<br />\nThe photograph in Wikipedia of a handcuffed man at the gallows of Sipri military camp on 1859 April 18th, is NOT Tantia Tope<br />\n<br />\nYoung Tantia Tope's father was a member of the court of Chitpavan Jew nay Brahmin Peshwa Baji Rao II.<br />\n<br />\nThat was how he became the best friend of Nanasaheb ( Nana Dhondu Pant)<br />\n<br />\nCapt Ajit Vadakayil<br />\n<br />\n..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c3296054341498481740-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c6179620069638296423\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6VOqqm-hCbM/XCa06XjAUxI/AAAAAAABfL4/E3K2A6jHNG0XTf7_mZb9kjj9WxD3GwmzQCK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. THE ONLY WAY TODAY TO RETARD BRAIN DEGRADATION IS TO CONSUME HALF A TEASPOON OF FRESH GOMUTRA ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE DUNG OF HUMPED COW HAS BEEN USED FOR MILLINIUMS TO KEEP AWAY NEGATIVE ENERGIES AND HAS BEEN USED AS A SUBSTITUTE FOR HOLY GANGES WATER WHICH CONTAIN NANO SILVER COLLOIDS AND BACTERIOPHAGES .. Then only it can be lasting faith. Then only it can be perfect, unshakeable faith.<br />\n<br />\nNo spiritual progress is possible without shraddha.<br />\n<br />\nFrom shraddha comes nistha or one-pointed devotion and from nistha comes self-realization. Shraddha is a Sanskrit Malayalam word -- an unshakable conviction in our journey ..Shraddha should not be translated as a \u201csimple\u201d faith / trust, --it also conveys mental and intellectual firmness..<br />\n<br />\nWe build our \u201cshraddha\u201d by pushing through fear and trusting implicitly in our feelings and conscience<br />\n<br />\nSINGING BHAJANS LIKE ASSHOLES ( BHAKTI MOVEMENT OF JEW ROTHSCHILD ) BEATING DHOLAKS AND SHAKING ASS , HAS NEVER BEEN PART OF HINDUISM.<br />\n<br />\nBHAJANS IN VERNACULAR ARE NOT MANTRAS IN SANSKRIT<br />\n<br />\nBlind devotion ( BHAKTI ) and belief takes a back seat in Sanatana Dharma which does not allow dogma. Everything is thrashed out in grace , harmony and transparency..Shraddha, is surrender to the Pramana so that the Pramana can operate.<br />\n<br />\nPramana literally means \"proof\" and \"means of knowledge\". It refers to epistemology in Indian philosophies, and is one of the key, much debated fields of study in Hinduism..<br />\n<br />\nShraddha, trust / faith, must arise in its own way. It must be discovered. It cannot be commanded. This reverence for scripture cannot be thrust upon anybody.Just as we cannot make ourselves love someone, we cannot make ourselves have Shraddha.<br />\n<br />\nLove has to manifest itself. Similarly, Shraddha is not something that we can command; IT HAS TO HAPPEN..<br />\n<br />\nIn having Shraddha, there is trust, faith, reverence, devotion, openness, and freedom. Normal matter is around 4 % of the universe.</span></div>\n<br />\nPurusha sukta is hymn 10.90 of the Rigveda, dedicated to the Purusha, the \"Cosmic Being\".<br />\n<br />\nIt gives a description of the spiritual unity of the universe. It presents the nature of Purusha, or the cosmic being, as both immanent in the manifested world and yet transcendent to it..<br />\n<br />\nFrom this being, the original creative will ( Hiranyagarbha) proceeds which causes the projection of the universe in space and time. All manifestations, in past, present and future, is held to be the Purusha alone..<br />\n<br />\nPurusha transcends his creation. Creation is described to have started with the origination of Virat, or the cosmic body from the Purusha. In Virat, omnipresent intelligence manifests itself which causes the appearance of diversity.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: small;\">Rigveda 10.90.3 - All that is born is just his one fourth, the other 3/4th cannot born or die.<br />Rigveda 10.90.4 - 3/4th of him ( Purusha ) is beyond and only 1/4th of him is born again and again.</span><br />\n<br />\nRIGVEDA 10.90.11 IS POISON INJECTED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD. ( AND THIS MADE KANCHA ILAIH CRY AND HAVE WHITE SPITTLE AT HIS BLACK LIP CORNERS .. )<br />\n<br />\n11 When they divided Puru\u1e63a how many portions did they make?<br />\nWhat do they call his mouth, his arms? What do they call his thighs and feet?<br />\n<br />\nRIGVEDA 10.90.12 IS POISON INJECTED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD.<br />\n12 The Brahman was his mouth, of both his arms was the R\u0101janya made.<br />\nHis thighs became the Vai\u015bya, from his feet the \u015a\u016bdra was produced.<br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<b style=\"font-size: xx-large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">IDIOTS OF DHARMA WIKI CALLS THIS \u201c</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">FACT</span><span style=\"color: red;\">\u201d .</span></b></div>\n<br />\nThe Purusha Sukta holds that the world is created by and out of a Yajna or sacrifice of the Purusha.<br />\n<br />\nPurusha Sukta states that the moon takes birth from the Purusha's mind and the sun from his eyes. Indra and Agni descend from his mouth and from his vital breath, air is born. The firmament comes from his navel, the heavens from his head, the earth from his feet and quarters of space from his ears.<br />\n<br />\nThrough this creation, underlying unity of human, cosmic and divine realities is espoused, for all are seen arising out of same original reality, the Purusha.<br />\n<br />\nAll forms of existence are held to be grounded in this primordial yajna.<br />\n<br />\nIn the seventeenth verse, the concept of Yajna itself is held to have arisen out of this original sacrifice. In the final verses, yajna is extolled as the primordial energy ground for all existence.<br />\n<br />\nGods, sacrificing, sacrificed the victim these were the earliest holy ordinances.<br />\n<br />\nThe Mighty Ones attained the height of heaven, there where the S\u0101dhyas, Gods of old, are dwelling.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c5001950370070900322-ce\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\"></span><br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c3382287517660466696\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1546867040748#c6457707837779312556\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 7, 2019 at 6:47 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/god-code-by-timothy-paul-smith-damning.html<br />\n<br />\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME--<br />\n<br />\nHOW HAVE CUNNING JEWS PUSHED THE GOD CODE AGENDA FOR SO LONG WITHOUT BEING SPAT AT..<br />\n<br />\nWELL JEWS ARE GOOD IN HIJACKING STATISTICS, CHERRY PICKING , MASKING CONTEXT AND LOADED STATEMENTS..<br />\n<br />\nLET ME EXPLAIN IN DETAIL--<br />\n<br />\nNumbers themselves \u2013 unless purposefully falsified \u2013 cannot lie, but they can be used to misrepresent.. When you read a statistic, of any kind, be sure to ask how \u2013 and more importantly, why \u2013 the statistic was generated, whom it benefits, and whether it can be trusted.<br />\n<br />\nWithout critical and educated evaluation of statistics, the public could be misled by information that\u2019s misused, incomplete, or manipulated. Unfortunately, it seems that manipulation of statistics to further an agenda is becoming more common throughout society. Bad information propagated by government agencies especially is affecting policy decisions and harming the public when news outlets report it with insufficient examination.<br />\n<br />\nStatistics are supposed to make something easier to understand but when used in a misleading fashion can trick the casual observer into believing something other than what the data shows. That is, a misuse of statistics occurs when a statistical argument asserts a falsehood. In some cases, the misuse may be accidental. In others, it is purposeful and for the gain of the perpetrator. The false statistics trap can be quite damaging for the quest for knowledge.<br />\n<br />\nMisuses can be easy to fall into. Professional scientists, even mathematicians and professional statisticians, can be fooled by even some simple methods, even if they are careful to check everything. Scientists have been known to fool themselves with statistics due to lack of knowledge of probability theory and lack of standardization of their tests.<br />\n<br />\nCherry picking, suppressing evidence, or the fallacy of incomplete evidence is the act of pointing to individual cases or data that seem to confirm a particular position while ignoring a significant portion of related cases or data that may contradict that position. It is a kind of fallacy of selective attention, the most common example of which is the confirmation bias.<br />\n<br />\nCherry picking is done by cunning conmen intentionally. Cherry picking has a negative connotation as the practice neglects, overlooks or directly suppresses evidence that could lead to a complete picture. Cherry picking can be found in many logical fallacies. For example, the \"fallacy of anecdotal evidence\" tends to overlook large amounts of data in favor of that known personally, \"selective use of evidence\" rejects material unfavorable to an argument, while a false dichotomy picks only two options when more are available.<br />\n<br />\nCherry picking can refer to the selection of data or data sets so a study or survey will give desired, predictable results which may be misleading or even completely contrary to reality.<br />\n<br />\nSTUPID JUDGES WHO CANT THINK BEYOND THE OBJECTIVE, FALL PREY TO CHERRY PICKING AND LOGICAL FALLACIES.. BOTTOM OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRA BARREL JUDGES FALL PREY TO LOADED QUESTION FROM A CLEVER LAWYER TO A WITNESS.<br />\n<br />\nWHEN A CASE IS DELAYED BY TWO DECADES ( LIKE IN INDIA ) THE CONTEXT IF FORGOTTEN. THE JUDGE HAS DIED. THE ORIGINAL DEFENDANT AND HIS LAWYER HAS DIED.<br />\n<br />\nON MY SHIP I HOLD MANAGEMENT COMMITTEE MEETINGS EVERY WEEK. IT WAS ABOUT A TASK AT HAND AND ITS CONTEXT.<br />\n<br />\nCONTEXT MAKES A TASK EXCITING. THIS IS ONE OF MY LEADERSHIP SECRETS.. OOPS \u2013GAVE IT AWAY.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c6457707837779312556-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c6457707837779312556-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c8394502912339871424\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1546867158474#c8394502912339871424\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 7, 2019 at 6:49 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED FROM 1--</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">IN THE DAYS OF KERALA SAGE APOLLONIUS OF TYANA ( ON WHOM JESUS WHO NEVER EXISTED WAS MODELLED IN 325 AD ) THE ROMAN HINDU GODDESS OF JUSTICE HELD A MIRROR AND A BALANCE WITH A KING COBRA AT HER FEET. MIRROR SIGNIFIED CONSCIOUS AND SUBJECTIVE JUSTICE..</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS WAS CHANGED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD TO A BLINDFOLDED WOMAN WITH A BALANCE AND A SWORD. JUSTICE NOW BECAME OBJECTIVE SANS CONTEXT.</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/objective-arguments-but-subjective.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTEXTOMY MUST BE PUNISHABLE IN A COURT OF LAW.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">'Contextomy' refers to the selective excerpting of words from their original linguistic context in a way that distorts the source's intended meaning, a practice commonly referred to as 'quoting out of context'.</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The act of quoting a person out of context, is with the aim of winning an argument , by making an ass of the not so bright judge \u2013by deliberate obfuscation of the quote's actual meaning.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A contextomized quotation not only prompts audiences to form a false impression of the source\u2019s intentions, but can contaminate subsequent interpretation of the quote when it is restored to its original context</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Cherry picking is the act of pointing at individual cases or data that seem to confirm a particular position, while ignoring a significant portion of related cases or data that may contradict that position..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Loaded statements are like icebergs: There's a little portion that you see, and a much larger portion that lurks below the surface.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">They typically carry associated meaning that's tied to issues of larger importance, but because they're delivered in an instant, the true import of such statements can sometimes be overlooked.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">You say something that will enflame passions in people, either positive or negative, and could also have a double meaning or a hidden meaning.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A loaded question or complex question fallacy is a question that contains a controversial or unjustified assumption (e.g., a presumption of guilt)</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The fallacy of sweeping generalization is at work when a statistical average is applied to specific people. A sweeping generalization is when someone assumes something where it does not apply.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When referring to a generalization made from a single example it has been called the fallacy of the lonely fact or the proof by example fallacy. When evidence is intentionally excluded to bias the result, it is sometimes termed the fallacy of exclusion and is a form of selection bias.</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THERE IS NOT A SINGLE JUDGE IN INDIA WHO HAS THE BRAINS TO FIGURE OUT WHAT I WROTE ABOVE</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I WILL BE PENNING A FRESH POST ON THE SHIT QUALITY OF OUR JUDICIAL SYSTEM..</span></span></b><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Data mining find its application across various industries such as market analysis, business management, fraud inspection, corporate analysis and risk management, among others.<br />\n<br />\nThe most damaging sources of misleading statistics is sampling bias<br />\n<br />\nON CHEMICAL TANKERS I HAD CREATED A FOOD PROOF SYSTEM FOR SAMPLING.. INITIALLY ROGUE SHIPPERS GOT VERY UPSET.. NOW IT IS THE NORM\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/sampling-procedures-chemical-tankers.html</span><br />\n<br />\nMANY SHIPS SANK BECAUSE THE CAPTAIN COULD NOT DO PROPER SAMPLING ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/naive-sailor-transportable-moisture.html</span><br />\n<br />\nDATA MINING BIAS WAS USED TO PUSH HPV VACCINATIONS AND FLU VACCINATIONS IN INDIA..OF COURSE EVIL PHARMA DEPOSITED KICKBACKS IN SWISS ACCOUNTS.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/03/say-no-to-hpv-vaccination-for-indian.html</span><br />\n<br />\nI KNOW OF A NEW BORN BABY WHERE THE DOCTORS SAID THAT FLU VACCINATION IS COMPULSORY.. I AM SURE KOSHER EVIL PHARMA DARLINGS JP NADDA , MODI KNOW ABOUT ALL THIS.<br />\n<br />\nRead All 4 parts of the post below--<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/flue-shots-pneumococcal-vaccines-capt.html</span></div>\n<div>\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">DURING SABARIMALA SEASON PAMPA RIVER SAMPLES ARE TAKEN FROM SELECTED SPOTS WHERE WATER QUALITY SHOWS THE BEST..&nbsp; &nbsp;SO EVEN IF PROPER SAMPLING PROCEDURES ARE FOLLOWED\u2014THERE IS A MORE DAMAGING \u201cSELECTION BIAS\u201d..</span></b></div>\n<br />\nSelection bias is the bias introduced by the selection of data for analysis in such a way that proper randomization is not achieved, thereby ensuring that the sample obtained is not representative of whatever has to be analyzed..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE MUST BE STRICT PUNISHMENT FOR DELIBERATE SELECTION BIAS. GODs CODE ABOUNDED WITH SELECTION BIAS..<br />\n<br />\nSAMPLING BIAS MADE POL POT THE MODT EVIL MAN ON PLANET EARTH.. THIS DECEPTION WAS USED TO HIDE THE HUMONGOUS WAR CRIMES OF THE WHITE MAN.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/11/pol-pot-of-khmer-rouge-great-cambodian.html</span><br />\n<br />\nHere\u2019s a pithy example stated as a KOSHER newspaper headline:<br />\n<br />\n\u201cA statistical analysis of fish caught in the Pacific Ocean concluded that there are no fish smaller than the holes in the net\u201d.<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />SUBJECTIVE COMMONSENSE MUST NOT BE SURRENDERED TO OBJECTIVE STATISTICS ..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6VOqqm-hCbM/XCa06XjAUxI/AAAAAAABfL4/E3K2A6jHNG0XTf7_mZb9kjj9WxD3GwmzQCK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. THE FUTURE OF THE STATE DEPENDS ON POSITIVE AND TIMELY ACTION ..<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE NO TIME OR INCLINATION TO ENFORCE THE SUPREME COURT VERDICT ON MENSTRUATING WOMEN BEING PART OF A PILGRIMAGE , AGAINST LONG ESTABLISHED CULTURE..AT THE PRESENT MOMENT..<br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS HAPPENING NOW?<br />\n<br />\nATHEIST COMMIE PINARAYI VIJAYAN IN HIS HASTE TO SCREW THE HINDUS, HAS SHIFTED HIS FOCUS..<br />\n<br />\nHOW DID THE FLOODS TAKE PLACE..<br />\n<br />\nA SECOND STANDARD FAIL POWER MINISTER MM MANI WAS ALLOWED TO APPLY HIS MIND , ON CRITICAL DECISION OF OPENING DAM SHUTTERS, WITH LONG TERM RAINS FORECAST ( EL NINO ), RISING LEVELS OF SEA ( COMING SPRING TIDES ) AND LONG FETCH SEA BUILDUP DUE TO SEA TO SHORE WINDS FROM A NEW PRESSURE SYSTEM IN THE ARABIAN SEA..<br />\n<br />\nMM MANI CAUSED 527 DEATHS AND 32,000 CRORES OF DAMAGES, MOST IRREVERSIBLE ..OUR HOLY TOP SOIL HAS BEEN SCOURED AWAY. .<br />\n<br />\nMM MANI HAS TO BE PUNISHED FOR THIS CRIME.. IT IS A QUESTION OF AN ADVENTURE AND LIVES..<br />\n<br />\nI WOULD TELL THE SUPREME COURT--<br />\n<br />\nMY STATE HAS JUST BEEN THOUGH A DEADLY EMERGENCY -- AND WE ARE IN THE PROCESS OF RECOVERY.. THE FUTURE OF THE STATE DEPENDS ON POSITIVE AND TIMELY ACTION ..<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE NO TIME OR INCLINATION TO ENFORCE THE SUPREME COURT VERDICT ON MENSTRUATING WOMEN BEING PART OF A PILGRIMAGE , AGAINST LONG ESTABLISHED CULTURE..AT THE PRESENT MOMENT..<br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS HAPPENING NOW?<br />\n<br />\nATHEIST COMMIE PINARAYI VIJAYAN IN HIS HASTE TO SCREW THE HINDUS, HAS SHIFTED HIS FOCUS..<br />\n<br />\nIMAGINE --AFTER THE FLOODS THE WHOLE STATE HAD RALLIED BEHIND PINARAYI VIJAYAN.. BUT THIS COMMIE SELF DESTRUCTED ..<br />\n<br />\nHOW DID THE FLOODS TAKE PLACE..<br />\n<br />\nA SECOND STANDARD FAIL POWER MINISTER MM MANI WAS ALLOWED TO APPLY HIS MIND , ON CRITICAL DECISION OF OPENING DAM SHUTTERS, WITH LONG TERM RAINS FORECAST ( EL NINO ), RISING LEVELS OF SEA ( COMING SPRING TIDES ) AND LONG FETCH SEA BUILDUP DUE TO SEA TO SHORE WINDS FROM A NEW PRESSURE SYSTEM IN THE ARABIAN SEA..<br />\n<br />\nMM MANI CAUSED 527 DEATHS AND 32,000 CRORES OF DAMAGES, MOST IRREVERSIBLE ..OUR HOLY TOP SOIL HAS BEEN SCOURED AWAY. .<br />\n<br />\nMM MANI HAS TO BE PUNISHED FOR THIS CRIME.. HE WAS CARRIED AWAY BY THE PUBLICITY THE FAALTHU MEDIA GAVE HIM AND WAS PLAYING TO THE GALLERY ON TV..PRETENDING TO BE A GENIUS..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS WHAT HAPPENS WHO YOU PACK YOUR MINISTRIES WITH ATTIMARI GANG/ ANGANWAADI WORKER QUALITY PEOPLE..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">IN ORDER TO SAY YES TO YOUR OWN PRIORITIES, YOU HAVE TO SAY NO TO SOMEONE ELSEs VESTED PRIORITIES..<br /><br />YOUR DECISIONS REVEAL YOUR PRIORITIES..<br /><br />YOUR PRIORITIES REVEAL YOUR CHARACTER.. PINARAYI VIJAYAN HAS FALLEN PHUTT ON HIS ATHEIST COMMIE FACE HERE .. HISTORY WILL NOT BE KIND TO HIM.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nI AM A BLUE OCEAN LEADER.. , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MODI MADE WAVES AS SOON AS HE SAT ON THE PM CHAIR \"NA KHAAUNGA NA KHAANE DOONGA \".</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HAVING MADE WAVES WITH THIS HUGE STATEMENT--HE DID NOTHING..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SO I HAD TO WRITE A 33 PART BLOG SERIES ON SHELL COMPANIES..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">STILL NOTHING HAPPENED..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THEN I HAD TO WRITE THAT THE CEO OF ENRON REBECCA MARK CAME TO INDIA IN MICRO MINI SKIRT SANS PANTIE AND SHE FLASHED HER HAIRY TWAT AT MARATHA MANOOS POLITICIANS .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THEN OUR INTELLIGENCE AGENCIES WOKE UP..THEIR BEAKS BECAME WET..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AJIT DOVAL, ARE OUR AGENCIES NOT TRAINED ?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">RECENTLY A TOP KERALA CONGRESS POLITICIAN STAYED IN A 5 STAR HOTEL.. HIS BILL WAS PAID BY A KERALA BILLIONAIRE BUSINESS MAN. MIND YOU, THE SAME FELLOW HAS BEEN PAYING THE BILL OF TOP KERALA COMMIE POLITICIANS TOO.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN KERALA POWER SWUNG BETWEEN LDF AND UDF LIKE A PENDULUM..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THERE WAS QUID PRO-QUO .. YOU DONT EXPOSE US, WE DONT EXPOSE YOU..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SECURITY AGENTS CAN BE TRAINED BY GOOD MOVIES OR EVEN GOOD NOVELS ...A COLLECTION MUST BE BUILT UP..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CIA HAD A DEPT PICKING UP NUSKES FROM CRIME NOVELS ..JUST TO TRAIN THEIR PEOPLE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ARABIKATHA SHOWS THE INNER WORKINGS OF KERALA COMMUNISM..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arabikkatha</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN DUBAI, THE COMMIE HERO PLAYED BY SREEVIVASAN HAD THE COMMIE BIBLE \"DAS KAPITAL\" ( MOOLADHANAM ) WITH HIM..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MANY MALAYALIS STAYED IN CRAMPED DORMITORIES SWITCHING BEDS DURING DAY/ NIGHT SHIFTS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHEN PRAYER SESSION CAME MUSLIMS GOT ON ALL FOURS, CHRISTIANS KNEELED , HINDUS STOOD AND PRAYED-- OUR COMMIE HERO LAY ON THE BED AND READ DAS KAPITAL..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HE WOULD NOT UNDERSTAND A SENTENCE OF IT.. WHEN CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL CANNOT, HOW CAN A ILLITERATE MAN UNDERSTAND ?..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE MOVIE SHOWS HOW CORRUPT KERALA COMMUNIST POLITICIANS INVEST THEIR KICK BACK MONEY WITH RICH BUSINESSMEN FRONTS IN GULF..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">RECENTLY A KERALA BILLIONAIRE MARRIED OFF HIS DAUGHTER.. THE CROWN PRINCE OF BAHRAIN CAME WITH HIS HAREM AND STAYED FOR TEN DAYS IN KERALA.&nbsp;</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold;\">YOU SHOULD HAVE SEEN A TOP KERALA COMMIE POLITICIANs SON RUNNING AROUND LIKE A SLAVE TO MAKE THE WEDDING A SUCCESS.. MY INFORMANT WAS ALSO RUNNING AROUND SAME WAY ..</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold;\">\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN ARABIKATHA SREENIVASAN FALLS IN LOVE WITH A CHINESE GIRL THINKING SHE IS A COMMIE.. IN REALITY SHE WAS A DISSIDENT WHO FLED CHINA..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SREENIVASAN TELLS HER \" IN INDIA CHINA WAR, WE KERALA COMMUNISTS SUPPORTED CHINA\"..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NEHRU HAD PUT ALL TOP KERALA COMMIES LIKE AK GOPALAN IN JAIL..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">VS ACHUTHANANDAN WANTED TO DONATE BLOOD TO INDIAN JAWANS WHILE IN JAIL AND THE COMMIE COMRADES NEARLY KILLED HIM BY BEATING HIM UP BADLY..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THERE IS A KERALA COMMIE MLA ( WITH A STRANGE NON-COMMIE NAME ) WHO LOOKS EXACTLY LIKE AK GOPALAN WHEN HE WAS OF HIS AGE..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NOT MANY PEOPLE KNOW THAT WHITE JEWS SPONSOR KERALA COMMUNISM.. AFTER ALL JEW ROTHSCHILD CREATED COMMUNISM..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN 1942 QUIT INDIA MOVEMENT INDIAN COMMIES SUPPORTED THE WHITE INVADER.. font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most readers of Das\nKapital only pretended to understand the contents--so that they can cry APUN\nBHI INTELLECTUAL..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karl Marx saw history\nas the story of class struggles, in which the oppressed fight against their\noppressors. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">MARX KNEW DAMN WELL\nTHAT ROTHSCHILD CONTROLLED BOTH CAPITALISTS AND LABOUR UNIONS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">KARL MAX STOLE ALMOST\nALL HIS IDEAS .. THEY WERE GIVEN TO HIM BY JEW ROTHSCHILD TO MAKE A KITCHIDI...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Example?...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The \u201ctheory of surplus\nvalue\u201d was already espoused by Pierre-Joseph Proudhon..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The theory of the\n\u201cimmiseration of the proletariat\u201d was espoused by Louis Blanc\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED TO 2--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED FROM 1--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The theory of the\n\u201cwithering away of the State\u201d and the \u2018governing of men giving way to the\nadministration of things\u2019 was espoused by Henri de Saint-Simon\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The theory that a\nrelatively small vanguard should conspire to take over the State and usher in\nthe dictatorship of the proletariat is lifted from works of Louis Auguste\nBlanqui\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karl Marx injected\nmindless Hegelian religious nonsense into his socialism. Marx clung so dearly\nto Hegel that he ended up espousing a sort of \u201cCalvinism without God,\u201d turning\nMarxism into a quasi-religious ideology..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">His Hegelian ideology\nled him to espouse a most unscientific socialism. Marx called his theory\n\u201cscientific socialism,\u201d not because he followed the scientific method, but\nmerely because it was dialectical and materialist. ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dialectics is not\nscientific as much as practical. Materialism is a metaphysical creed, not\nscience\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Marx baby lifted from\nthe works of Carl Menger and Murray Rothbard\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Marx does not condemn\nthe capitalist. Instead, he dissects the structural constraints inherent in the\ndominance of capital\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">JEW Karl Marx , a\nfellow of INFERIOR INTELLECT gets overly caught up in economistic drivel and\npedantic UNREADABLE nonsense, so as to sound like the intelligensia. ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">To an intelligent man\nMarx sounds like a IDIOT..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL\nDARES ROMILA THAPAR, SUNEET VARMA, DANIEL RAJA , SITARAM YECHURY, BRINDA KARAT\n, PRAKASH KARAT ETC TO DEBATE ON DAS CAPITAL LIVE ON TV...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_8.html?showComment=1547121703927#c9221098634391331837\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 10, 2019 at 5:31 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/god-code-by-timothy-paul-smith-damning.html<br />\n<br />\nSOMEBODY CALLED ME AND SAID-- YOU HAVE WRITTEN A BOOK BY THE ABOVE POST , AND STILL YOU SAY THAT YOU HAVE REVEALED ONLY 2%.<br />\n<br />\nCAN YOU KINDLY MAKE IT 2.01 %..<br />\n<br />\nWOKAY !<br />\n<br />\n###############################<br />\nHindu Jeroboam son of Nebat ( died 901 BC ) ruled North Israel for 22 years.. The Hindu wife Ano of Jeroboam is a character in the Hebrew Bible . She is mentioned in 1 Kings 14.<br />\n<br />\nSolomon tried to kill Jeroboam a Hindu Ephraimite, as he was more popular than his own son Rehoboam..<br />\n<br />\nJeroboam met the prophet Ahijah, the Shilonite who forecast that he would become the King of the northern ten of the tribes of Israel. Solomon heard of this prophesy and \" sought to kill \"<br />\n<br />\nJeroboam who was forced to flee to Egypt to the household of the Egyptian Hindu King, Shishak. There he remained until the death of Solomon. I Kings 11:26-41.<br />\n<br />\nThe relationship between Jeroboam and Shishak was a close one and they became not only allies, but Shishak gave in marriage to Jeroboam, Ano, the eldest sister of his own wife Thelkemina. Septuagint: Reges III, 12-24e.<br />\n<br />\nJew Rehoboam reigned in Jerusalem for seventeen years, but \u201che did evil because he had not set his heart on seeking the Lord\u201d (2 Chronicles 12:14).<br />\n<br />\nRehoboam and Jeroboam were both kings reigning in Israel\u2019s divided kingdom.<br />\n<br />\nRehoboam was one of Solomon\u2019s sons and king of Judah in the south (1 Kings 11:43). JEW Rehoboam\u2019s mother ( wife of Solomon ) , Naamah was a Hindu.. The Bible does not mention any other sons or daughters of Solomon<br />\nJeroboam was one of Solomon\u2019s former officials, an Ephraimite, and king of Israel in the north (1 Kings 11:26).<br />\n1 Kings 11: 29 \u2013 39 The prophet Abijah tell Jeroboam that he will be the king of Israel.<br />\n1 Kings 11: 40 Jeroboam escapes to Egypt to save his life from King Solomon.<br />\n1 Kings 12: 15 \u2013 16 Jeroboam returns to Israel after King Solomon dies.<br />\n<br />\nJeroboam reigned over the ten tribes of Israel for twenty-two years and was succeeded by his Hindu son Nadab. But then Nadab was murdered after two years on the throne, and the assassin killed all of Jeroboam\u2019s family, fulfilling Ahijah\u2019s prophecy (1 Kings 15:25\u201330).<br />\n<br />\nThe schism that occurred during the days of JEW Rehoboam and HINDU Jeroboam was the end of a united Israel. This division continued during their reigns: \u201cThere was continual warfare between Rehoboam and Jeroboam\u201d (2 Chronicles 12:15) and for centuries afterward.<br />\n<br />\nRehobaum had built a system of great fortifications and had wanted to attack Jeroboam in the north but the prophet Shemaiah warned against it. It was at this point that Shishak the ally of Jeroboam, attacked from the south with a massive army consisting of 1,200 chariots, 60,000 horsemen, and\" people without number that came with him out of Egypt: the Lubim, the Sukkiim, and the Ethiopians.\" II Chron. 12:2-3.<br />\n<br />\nIT IS A LIE THAT HINDUS OF PALESTINE SACRIFICED RAMS OR BULLS..<br />\n<br />\n1 Kings 12: 25 \u2013 33 Jeroboam starts the Golden Calf Cult . THIS IS A LIE..<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS SOLOMONs SON REHOBOAM WHO RE-STARTED GOLDEN CALF CULT TO GRAB POWER..<br />\n<br />\nGolden Calf was nothing but NANDI.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/01/nandi-bull-vahana-and-gatekeeper-of.html<br />\n<br />\nJEW REHOBOAM DESPITE BEING SOLOMONs SON WAS HATED BY JEWS. HE WAS ALL THE TIME WORRIED THAT JEWISH PEOPLE WOULD SHIFT LOYALTIES TO HINDU JEROBOAM.<br />\n<br />\nSO THE CLEVER JEWS DID A SLIMY EXCHANGE . HOW CAN JEWS LOVE A HINDU ( PAGAN ) KING ?<br />\n<br />\nKOSHER LIE NAILED: Once established in the northern kingdom, King Jeroboam feared that, if the people traveled to the temple in Jerusalem to worship, they would return to Rehoboam. So he set up centers of worship in Bethel and Dan, building golden calves and telling the people, \u201cIt is too much for you to go up to Jerusalem. Here are your gods, Israel, who brought you up out of Egypt\u201d (1 Kings 12:28).<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c9221098634391331837-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c9221098634391331837-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c2778975519675082238\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. The Israelites feared that he would not return and demanded that Aaron make them \"gods\" to go before them (Exodus 32:1). Aaron gathered up the Israelites' golden earrings and ornaments, constructed a \"molten calf\" and they declared: \"These [be] thy gods, O Israel, which brought thee up out of the land of Egypt.\" (Exodus 32:4)</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Aaron built an altar before the calf and proclaimed the next day to be a feast to the LORD. So they rose up early the next day and \"offered burnt-offerings, and brought peace-offerings; and the people sat down to eat and to drink, and rose up to play.\" (Exodus 32:6) God told Moses what the Israelites were up to back in camp, that they had turned aside quickly out of the way which God commanded them and he was going to destroy them and start a new people from Moses. Moses besought and pleaded that they should be spared (Exodus 32:11-14), and God \"repented of the evil which He said He would do unto His people.\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Moses went down from the mountain, but upon seeing the calf, he became angry and threw down the two Tablets of Stone, breaking them. Moses burnt the golden calf in a fire, ground it to powder, scattered it on water, and forced the Israelites to drink it. When Moses asked him, Aaron admitted collecting the gold, and throwing it into the fire, and said it came out as a calf (Exodus 32:21-24).UNQUOTE</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Rehobaum had built a system of great fortifications and had wanted to attack Jeroboam in the north but the prophet Shemaiah warned against it. It was at this point that Shishak the ally of Jeroboam, attacked from the south with a massive army consisting of 1,200 chariots, 60,000 horsemen, and\" people without number that came with him out of Egypt: the Lubim, the Sukkiim, and the Ethiopians.\" II Chron. 12:2-3.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">DAVIS IS REFERRED TO BY ZIONIST JEWS AS AN EPITOME AND EXAMPLE OF RIGHTEOUSNESS \u2013WHEN IN REALITY HE WAS A MEAN SON OF A BITCH..&nbsp;</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">JEW DAVID GOT HINDU URAIH HIS BEST FRIEND MURDERED\u2014THE MAN WHO MADE HIM KING.. THE WHOLE IDEA WAS TO STEAL URAIHs WIFE THE BEAUTIFUL KERALA HINDU NAMBOODIRI WOMAN BATH SHEBA, WHO HE SAW NAKED ..WHEN URAIH WAS STILL ALIVE ( SENT AWAY BY DAVID TO A FAR OFF LAND )&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: bold;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: bold;\">DAVID HAD RAPED A DRUGGED BATH SHEBA AND MADE HER PREGNANT. LATER DAVID FORCED BATH SHEBA TO MARRY HIM.</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: bold;\">\n</span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: bold;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: bold;\">DAVID THE MAN OF POOR CHARACTER USURPED THE STORY OF KILLING OF GOLIATH TO HIS OWN ADVANTAGE. AND DAVID LIED THAT HE KILLED GOLIATH WHILE IN REALITY A HINDU ELHANAN KILLED GOLIATH.</div>\n</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Second Samuel 1:10 relates than an agent of David killed Saul. (2 Samuel 1:6\u201310).</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2--</span><br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c2778975519675082238-ce\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c3571172516512285698\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt.
