For David had said to him, \u2018Your blood be on your own head. Your own mouth testified against you when you said, \u2018I killed the Lord\u2019s anointed\u2019\u201d (2 Samuel 1:15\u201316).<br />\n<br />\nHINDU SAUL WAS CREMATED \u2013NOT BURIED.<br />\n<br />\nMen of Jabesh Gilead travel overnight and take Saul\u2019s body and those of his sons and burn them at Jabesh (1 Samuel 31:11\u201312).<br />\n<br />\nKOSHER LIE: David becomes king and honors the brave men who buried Saul\u2019s body (2 Samuel 2:4\u20137).<br />\n<br />\nEvery passage in Samuel referring to David has him killing various people- like the the guy who put Saul out of his misery at Saul\u2019s own request. When I hear that David was a man after God\u2019s own heart that scares the heck out of me.<br />\n<br />\nAhijah the oracle predicted that all of Jeroboam\u2019s HINDU posterity would be slain and none would receive a proper CREMATION l except his son \u201cbecause in him there is found some good thing toward the Lord\u201d (1 Kings 14:13).<br />\n<br />\nAmong early nations it was the custom to erect altars on hilltops (Gen. 12:7\u20138; 22:2\u20134; 31:54).<br />\n<br />\nThere were many Ayyappa temples in Palestine.<br />\n<br />\nAfter the settlement in Canaan heathen altars were found set up on various hills and were ordered to be destroyed (Num. 33:52; Deut. 12:2\u20133). Altars to Jehovah were built at several high places (Judg. 6:25\u201326; 1 Sam. 9:12\u201325; 10:5, 13; 1 Chr. 21:26; 1 Kgs. 3:2\u20134; 18:30). Such altars became local centers of the worship of Jehovah.<br />\n<br />\nHindu Shishak ( a mentor of intellectuals ) was the king of Egypt who founded Egypt\u2019s XXIInd Dynasty as the Pharaoh Sheshong I. He reigned for 21 years c. 945\u2013924 B.C. He harboured Jeroboam as a fugitive from Solomon, after Ahijah\u2019s prophecy of Jeroboam\u2019s future kingship [see 1 Kings 11:29\u201340].<br />\n<br />\nALL EGYPTIAN PHAROAHs HAD KERALA HINDU THIYYA BLOODLINE.<br />\n<br />\nShishak invaded Palestine in the fifth year of Rehoboam, 925 B.C. He subdued Judah, taking the treasures of Jerusalem as tribute [see 1 Kings 14:25\u201326; 2 Chronicles 12:2\u201312]<br />\n<br />\nBASSSSS ?<br />\n<br />\nPAAAPI PETH BHARR GAYA ?<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6VOqqm-hCbM/XCa06XjAUxI/AAAAAAABfL4/E3K2A6jHNG0XTf7_mZb9kjj9WxD3GwmzQCK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. THIS ADMIRAL HAD A SQUADRON OF WARSHIPS INSIDE THE HARBOR WITH GUNS AIMED AT GRIFFIN WHARF..<br />\n<br />\nMontagu baby also could hear the oaths administered to the ship's officers that chests contained only tea ( not opium ) ..<br />\n<br />\nWhen all was through, the \u201cMohawks\u201d marched from the wharf, hatchets and axes resting on their shoulders.<br />\n<br />\nA fife played as they paraded past the home where British Admiral Montague had been spying on their work. He had ignored to put off the bedroom lights and his profile could be seen by all.<br />\n<br />\nMontague baby when he saw that the Mohawks were waving at him, opened the window and yelled \u201cWell boys, you have had a fine, pleasant evening for your Indian caper, haven\u2019t you? But mind, you have got to pay the fiddler yet!\u201d<br />\n<br />\nRothschild agent JEW John Adams wrote in his diary, \u201cThis is the most magnificent movement of all. There is a dignity, a majesty, a sublimity in this last effort of the patriots that I greatly admire. This destruction of the tea is so bold, so daring, so firm, intrepid, and inflexible, and it must have so important consequences and so lasting, that I cannot but consider it as an Epocha in History.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nThe KOSHER QUAKER Rotchs, were the riches in Nantucket.. The patriarch of the Rotch family dynasty was JEW Joseph Rotch, a mere agent of Jew Rothschil.. The Rotch family controlled and handled every aspect of the whaling industry. They owned their own fleet of ships, hired captains and crews, scheduled voyages, did their own accounting, assessed monetary exchange rates, graded whale oil, and determined when the most profitable times were to ship whale oil and bone to markets<br />\n<br />\nJEW Benjamin Franklin was a Quaker. When asked to what Pennsylvania owed it\u2019s prosperity he replied. \u201cThat is simple. In the Colonies we issue our own money. It is called Colonial Script. We issue it in proper proportion to the demands of trade and industry to make the products pass easily from the producers to the consumers. In this manner, creating for ourselves our own paper money, we control its purchasing power, and we have no interest to pay to no one.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nNot surprisingly, it did not take long for the big Bank of England to take exception to this and soon the Currency Act\u201d was enacted that made Colonial Script against the law. This was the true root of the Revolutionary War.<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD PLAYS THE PANDAVA AND KAURAVA TUNE ..HE MILKS BOTH SIDES IN EVERY WAR..<br />\n<br />\nRothschild agent Quaker JEW William Penn was the first to introduce JURY NULLIFICATION .. I will write in great detail in my next post about Indian judiciary..<br />\n<br />\nRothschild sent William Penn to USA to do the spade work. Today Pennsylvania is named after him ..<br />\n<br />\nSo so so , Penn went to King Charles II and asked for a charter so that he could establish an American colony..King Charles II owed Penn\u2019s deceased father, Admiral Penn, payment for a debt ( Rothschilds money ) , so, in 1681 the king granted a large area of land to Penn.<br />\n<br />\nPenn has brought many CRYPTO JEWS to Pennsylvania through advertising in Europe. His colony has become a haven for people from Germany, Holland, Scandinavia, and Great Britain ..<br />\n<br />\nWhen Quaker Jews got caught for crimes , Penn used his diplomatic skills and Rothschild connections to get large numbers of Quakers out of jail.<br />\n<br />\nDespite the remarkable clarity of Penn\u2019s vision for liberty ( which Rothschild media did propaganda ) , he had a curious blind spot about slavery.<br />\n<br />\nALMOST ALL QUAKERS OWNED SLAVES AND THEY WERE AGENTS FOR IMPORTED SLAVES..<br />\n<br />\nWILLIAM PENN HIMSELF OWNED MORE THAN THREE DOZEN SLAVES WHO SLAVED ON HIS ESTATE PENNSBURY UNDER A KOSHER OVERSEER.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/05/black-african-slave-trade-and-jews-capt.html</span><br />\nSlave ownership was written into the first Frame of Government of the Province of Pennsylvania. Quakers dealt directly in trading slaves. James Claypool a Quaker and member of the Free Society of Traders had a joint business with other Quakers to buy slaves from his brother in Barbados.<br />\n<br />\nPenn\u2019s agent, Philip Lehnmain, used a ship, The Isabella\u2019, to trade for slaves. In 1683 Penn himself was actively dealing in slaves, buying a number from Captain Nathaniel Allen. Penn was also selling slaves for massive profits .<br />\n<br />\nQuakers were known for their use of thee as an ordinary pronoun, refusal to FIGHT in war ( they only fnanced both sides ) , plain dress, refusal to swear oaths, opposition to slavery ( TEE HEEE ) , and teetotalism.<br />\n<br />\nQUAKER BANKERS WERE MERE BENAMI FRONTS FOR JEW ROTHSCHILD..<br />\n<br />\nIn 1947, the Quakers ( most were Freemasons ), represented by the British Friends Service Council and the American Friends Service Committee, were awarded the Nobel Peace Prize by Jew Rothschild.<br />\n<br />\nFAMOUS QUAKER BANKS ARE BARKLAYs BANK, LLOYDS BANK, GURNEYs BANK, BACKHOUSEs BANK, FRIENDS PROVIDENT ETC<br />\n<br />\nCrypto Jew Quaker George Fox ( died 1691) was a founder of the Religious Society of Friends, commonly known as the Quakers or Friends. he was viewed with respect by the Quaker JEW William Penn and the Lord Protector, JEW Oliver Cromwell.<br />\n<br />\nCrypto Jew Quaker Warder Cresson ( died 1860) was the first U.S. Consul to Jerusalem. He was appointed in 1844 by Jew Rothschild.<br />\n<br />\nHe wrote up his charges in pamphlets and articles that he signed with the pseudonym \u201cMichael Boaz Israel.\u201d he began writing the book \u201cThe Key of David: David the True Messiah,\u201d in 1848.<br />\n<br />\nFollowing his death, Cresson was buried on the Mount of Olives.<br />\n<br />\nIn 1759 James Backhouse secured the agency of the Royal Exchange Assurance Company , as a front for Rothschild.<br />\n<br />\nBASSSS , AAJ KELIYA ITNA COFFEE -- NAY-- KAAFEE HAI !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c2336823907758715682\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6VOqqm-hCbM/XCa06XjAUxI/AAAAAAABfL4/E3K2A6jHNG0XTf7_mZb9kjj9WxD3GwmzQCK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Freedom of conscience and free profession, practice and PROPAGATION of religion<br />\n(1) Subject to public order, morality and health and to the other provisions of this Part, all persons are equally entitled to freedom of conscience and the right freely to profess, practise and PROPAGATE religion<br />\n<br />\n########################################<br />\n<br />\nNO JUDGE SHOULD BE ALLOWED TO QUOTE ANY OTHER JUDGEMENT MADE BY A PAST JUDGE WITHOUT CONTEXT..<br />\n<br />\nOUR CONSTITUTION STANDS ALONE -- IT DOES NOT NEED A LANGOT OF PAST JUDGEMENTS SANS CONTEXT OF STUPID JUDGES , TO USE AS AN APPENDIX..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN THE MISSIONARY GRAHAM STAINED WAS MURDERED SOME JUDGES IN THE PAYROLL OF THE DEEP STATE HAD MADE DELIBERATE ERRONEOUS JUDGMENTS ..<br />\n<br />\nGRAHAM STAINES WAS A DEEP STATE AGENT , ENGAGED IN SLIMY COVERT \"PROSELYTISATION. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nJanuary 5, 2019 at 11:47 PM<br />\n<br />\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME<br />\n<br />\nWHY IS MATA AMRITANADAMAYI SITTING ON THE FENCE REGARDING SABARIMALA ISSUE.. WHAT IS HER CONNECTION WITH PINARAYI VIJAYAN..<br />\n<br />\nWELL , THE LATE CAPT KRISHNAN NAIR WHO OWNS LEELA HOTEL CHAIN IS FROM KANNUR..<br />\n<br />\nCAPT KRISHNAN NAIR WAS MY WIFEs GRANDFATHERs SUB-CONTRACTOR IN KANNUR BEFORE HE MADE IT BIG IN THE TEXTILE HANDLOOM EXPORT BUSINESS. HE HITCHED UP WITH GLORIA VANDERBILT --WITH A BRAND LEELA LACE..<br />\n<br />\nLEELA IS CAPT KRISHNAN NAIRs WIFE -- SHE ATTENDED MY WIFEs WEDDING EVE CELEBRATIONS..<br />\n<br />\nMY WIFEs GRANDFATHER HAD THE FIRST CAR AND TELEPHONE IN KANNUR , EVEN BEFORE THE KING.. GIVING COMPETITION TO ROTHSCHILDs COMMONWEALTH TRUST LTD IN CALICUT WHERE MY PARENTS WORKED ..<br />\n<br />\nANYWAYS CAPT KRISHNAN NAIR WAS ASKED BY PINARAYI VIJAYAN VIA A CONDUIT TO TELL MATA AMRITANANDA MAYI TO PROVIDE A SEAT FOR PINARAYI VIJAYANs DAUGHTER VEENA ( WHO HAS FINISHED PLUS TWO ) IN THE IT STRAIN.<br />\n<br />\nCAPT KRISHNAN NAIR WAS A MAJOR DONOR TO MATA AMRITANANDAMAYI AND SHE COULD NOT SAY NO.<br />\n<br />\nTHE MAN FRIDAY WHO MADE ALL THIS HAPPEN FOR CAPT KRISHNAN NAIR TOLD ME ALL THIS SEVERAL YEARS AGO .. EVERY JUICY DETAIL..<br />\n<br />\nSO YOU THOUGHT MATA AMRITANANDA MAYI IS A SAINT ?<br />\n<br />\nVEENA NOW IS IN BANGALORE--ALL KNOW WHO SHE IS IN THE IT FIELD..<br />\n<br />\nI CAN GIVE A BLOW BY BLOW ACCOUNT HOW VEENA GOT INTO THE COIMBATORE COLLEGE WITHOUT DONATION AND WITHOUT ADMISSION TEST.. WHO WAS HER UBER RICH LOCAL GUARDIAN ETC ..<br />\n<br />\nTODAY KERALA COMMIES GET EASY JOBS IN THE URALUNGAL CONTRACTORS--WHO GET JUICY CONTRACTS FROM THE COMMIE KERALA GOVT.. THEIR BLOOD RELATIVES ALL HAVE JOBS IN THIS CONSTRUCTION UNIT..<br />\n<br />\nI MUST TELL A TRUTH-- URALUNGAL DOES A GOOD JOB , THEIR ROADS LAST LONGER .. NEVER MIND THAT THEY GIVE JOBS TO COMMIE BIGWIGS..<br />\n<br />\nI AM JUST TELLING 1%..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n#####################################################<br />\n<br />\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME --<br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS PINARAYI VIJAYANs DAUGHTER T VEENA DOING IN BANGALORE ??..<br />\n<br />\nPINARAYI VIJAYANs DAUGHTER IS MD OF EXALOGIC SOLUTIONS, BANGALORE..<br />\n<br />\nBEFORE THAT SHE WAS CEO OF RP SOFT IN TRIVANDRUM ( 2012 TO 2014 ) -- A COMPANY OWNED BY KERALA BILIONAIRE RAVI PILLAI..<br />\n<br />\nFOR RAVI PILLAIs DAUGHTERs WEDDING , CROWN PRINCE OF BAHRAIN CAME WITH HIS HAREM TO KERALA-- THEY STAYED FOR TEN DAYS..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.thenewsminute.com/keralas/369</span><br />\n<br />\nVEENA T WRITE IN HER RESUME THAT SHE WAS EDUCATED AT BHARATHIAR UNIVERSITY COIMBATORE ( 2000 TO 2004 ) ..WHICH IS NOT AMARITANANADA MAYIs COLLEGE<br />\n<br />\nCOMRADE PINARAYI VIJAYANs DAUGHTER VEENA T ( WHO PREACHES HONESTLY AND NON-CORRUPTION , TO HIS POOR COMMIE SAGHAAAVs ) THUS RUNS AN IT COMPANY IN BANGALORE..<br />\n<br />\nOUR SECURITY AGENCIES KNOW THE INSIDE STORIES ..<br />\n<br />\nPINARAYI VIJAYAN CAN HAVE HIS STAY OF A GOOD WICKET AS LONG AS HE IS IN POWER..<br />\n<br />\nONCE HE LOSES POWER MANY COMMIE MINISTERS AND THEIR FRONTS ( BENAMI MONEY INVESTORS IN GULF ) WILL BE IN TIHAR JAIL, LIKE LALU PRASAD YADAV..<br />\n<br />\nTHESE BENAMI FRONTS WERE ALL BORN IN POVERTY.. So may Indians including many in my family. My mom was diagnosed gestational diabetes during my brother delivery and stayed diabetic throughout her life.<br />\n<br />\nShe took metformin for years and finally switched over to insulin. Her insulin based diabetes was ok yet during sleep the sugar was fluctuating a lot. Ok remember many hypoglycemia episodes. I remember everyone in our house was diabetic specialist as we saw her suffering with fluctuating numbers. Doctors kept switching between metformin and insulin and types of insulin like mixtard, rapid, short acting etc..<br />\n<br />\nFinally we used rapid acting insulin with food 3 times and long acting insulin before going to bed which kept her insulin levels under 100.<br />\n<br />\nIt took us life time to come to that stable numbers but was too late in mom case. Most times they asked her to go back metformin leaving insulin. Which affects kidneys and liver.her eyes were affected too..<br />\n<br />\nDiabetes is 3-4 billion $ business. Other than you giving life changing tips, remedies, dos and don't no one else is capable of helping common man. I shared breifly my mom journey. But request you to guide everyone so no one else loose their love ones for this diabetes \ud83d\ude4f\ud83d\ude4f\ud83d\ude4f</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin blog-admin pid-19647900\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c2613312002097328707-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c2796960936704260688\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6VOqqm-hCbM/XCa06XjAUxI/AAAAAAABfL4/E3K2A6jHNG0XTf7_mZb9kjj9WxD3GwmzQCK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1546787039146#c2796960936704260688\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 6, 2019 at 8:33 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nNOT 3 BILLION-- 305 BILLION USD !<br />\n<br />\nThere are no generic insulins.<br />\n<br />\nOver the past twenty years, prices for the most commonly prescribed \u201canalog\u201d insulins have risen from about $20 per vial to well over $280 per 10 mL vial, an over 750% increase after accounting for inflation.<br />\n<br />\nIn contrast, insulin today costs roughly five dollars per vial to produce. With deductibles far outpacing wages, insulin has become unaffordable even for well-off Americans.<br />\n<br />\nThe reasons for this price increase are as complicated as the American healthcare system. Carefully negotiated rebate systems have driven enormous increases in the list price for insulin, leading patients to pay far more than insurers for their treatment.<br />\n<br />\nHigh-deductible plans, designed using oversimplified microeconomics to encourage patients to shop for better prices, instead have driven people to decline potentially lifesaving tests and adopt dangerous practices like rationing.<br />\n<br />\nIn a market where pricing is mind-bogglingly complex, where different entities pay different amounts for the same treatments, and where drugs are of life-saving importance, the American healthcare system has forced some diabetics to choose between death and financial ruin.<br />\n<br />\nOn a shoestring budget at the University of Toronto, several young scientists began investigating a possible treatment in 1921\u2014they found that by grinding up and purifying animal pancreases, and then regularly injecting the material, they could treat Type 1 diabetes in dogs.<br />\n<br />\nBy 1923, the scientists had won the Nobel prize and the treatment had entered mass production in collaboration with Eli Lilly and Company and the Swedish organization Nordisk.<br />\n<br />\nThe scientists patented the drug and sold it to the University of Toronto for three dollars (one dollar for each researcher), thinking that this was the best way to ensure that affordable treatment would be available to everyone who needed it.<br />\n<br />\nToday, treatment is more advanced than the original animal pancreas slurry. Fast-acting \u201canalog\u201d insulins were pioneered with Lilly\u2019s Humalog in 1996, making use of a modified chemical structure that absorbs faster in the bloodstream.<br />\n<br />\nBut when Novo Nordisk entered the market four years later with its own analog insulin, NovoLog, prices did not decrease due to competition. Instead, Lilly and Nordisk followed each other closely in an exponential price increase.<br />\n<br />\nWhen Humalog was first introduced, it cost $21. At the time of writing, HumaLog costs $ 300 per vial and NovoLog costs same<br />\n.<br />\nThere hasn\u2019t been a molecule changed in them. There hasn\u2019t been a bit of change in terms of their synthesis, their manufacturing, and yet the costs have gone up extraordinarily.<br />\n<br />\nMoney is diffused between KOSHER PBMs, insurers, and pharmaceutical companies. Only one group doesn\u2019t benefit from this scheme: patients.<br />\n<br />\nA pharmacy benefit manager (PBM) is a company that administers, or handles, the drug benefit program for your employer or health plan.<br />\n<br />\nIn general, PBMs contract with KOSHER insurers and third-party payers (Plan Sponsors) \u2013 Medicare Advantage plans, Medicare free-standing prescription drug plans (PDPs), and with Federal Medicaid programs \u2013 to administer their pharmacy benefit. The latter is exceptionally complex and requires sophisticated data warehouse and claims-processing capabilities.<br />\n<br />\nPBMs can promote or suppress the sales of drugs within highly competitive drug \u201cclasses.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nIn return for advancing the market utilization of its drug, the manufacturer is required to pay the KOSHER PBM a \u201crebate\u201d, which until recently has been a pure profit for the PBM.<br />\n<br />\nCurrently, the five largest PBMs cover more 56% of the United States population with pharmacy benefits.<br />\n<br />\nThe largest PBMs are Express Scripts, Inc.; CVS Caremark; Health Information Designs, Inc.; Medco Health Solutions, Inc.; ICORE Healthcare; Argus Health Systems, Inc.; and OptumRx (formerly Prescription Solutions).<br />\n<br />\nJEW DARLING MODIs HEALTH INSURANCE IS HEADING THE SAME WAY !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6VOqqm-hCbM/XCa06XjAUxI/AAAAAAABfL4/E3K2A6jHNG0XTf7_mZb9kjj9WxD3GwmzQCK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. The first is to continue borrowing and paying interest indefinitely. The second is to repudiate the debt. The third is to pay it off.<br />\n<br />\nThe national debt will only become worse and far more destructive with time. It cannot be paid off. It cannot continue indefinitely.<br />\n<br />\nPaying off is a pipe dream. The debt is simply too massive..<br />\n<br />\nContinue borrowing and paying interest indefinitely is a PONZI SCHEME.. To pay off existing investors, the government needs to bring in an ever-increasing flood of taxpayers at the base. It is now so desperate for taxpayers that it is looting future generations by burdening them with crushing debt.<br />\n<br />\nRepudiation is the BEST best chances to reestablish a free and healthy US economy.<br />\n<br />\nGiven current tax and spending trends, by 2020 the U.S. government's accrued debt will exceed $25.3 trillion and 55% of all tax revenues will go toward interest on that debt.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://www.usdebtclock.org/<br />\n<br />\nThe more of US tax dollars consumed by interest, the fewer dollars available for discretionary spending.<br />\n<br />\nRepudiation involves disputing the validity of a contract and refusing to honor its terms..<br />\n<br />\nFED will cry that repudiation of the federal debt would be fundamentally immoral.<br />\n<br />\nSome 71% of the national debt is owned by domestic government, institutions investors and the Federal Reserve.<br />\n<br />\nHilly Billy Yanks dont know that the Social Security Trust Fund, aka their retirement money, owns most of the national debt.<br />\n<br />\nThe Federal Reserve owned $2.4 trillion in debt, but it trimmed its holdings by $86 billion since June 2017.<br />\n<br />\nYou will be MAD to repudiate foreign debt-- China holds 1.2 trillion .<br />\n<br />\nRussia has slashed its Treasury holdings to a mere $14 billion from a peak of $154 billion in mid-2013 ..<br />\n<br />\nBITE THE BULLET OR BARE THE BLOW !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; IN 1947 THIS POST WAS ABOLISHED..<br />\n<br />\nLAHORE RESOLUTION WAS SIGNED BY THE PUNJAB CM.. AT THIS CONFERENCE IN MARCH 1940 JEW JINNAH ROOTED FOR PAKISTAN..<br />\n<br />\nThe statement declared:<br />\n<br />\nNo constitutional plan would be workable or acceptable to the Muslims unless geographical contiguous units are demarcated into regions which should be so constituted with such territorial readjustments as may be necessary.<br />\n<br />\n23 March (Pakistan Day) is a national holiday in Pakistan to commemorate Lahore Resolution (1940)-- the country became the first Islamic Republic in the world</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c4990349183078337878\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6VOqqm-hCbM/XCa06XjAUxI/AAAAAAABfL4/E3K2A6jHNG0XTf7_mZb9kjj9WxD3GwmzQCK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://draft.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. BOTH IGNORED EACH OTHER<br />\n<br />\nVS WAS PINARAYI VIJAYANs MENTOR..<br />\n<br />\nALL WOMEN HAD TO RAISE THEIR HANDS AND SWEAR A SOLEMN OATH \" WE WILL NOT ALLOW KERALA TO BECOME A BHRANTHALAYAM (MADHOUSE ) \" ]<br />\n<br />\nTHIS MADHOUSE THINGY WAS LIFTED FROM MY BLOGPOST BELOW-- AS TOLD BY SWAMI VIVEKANANDA WHEN HE VISITED KERALA..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/10/worst-racists-on-planet-earth-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nSWAMI VIVEKANANDA GAVE PROPAGANDA THAT HE WAS ON HIS WAY TO VIVEKANANDA ROCK TO PRAY FOR WORLD PEACE..<br />\n<br />\nBALLS , FREEMASON VIVEKANANDA WENT THERE TO PRAY FOR WORLD PEACE..<br />\n<br />\nHE WENT TO KOTTACKAL ARYA VAIDYASALA FOR RELIEF FROM 33 MAJOR ALIMENTS HE HAD .. HE WAS UNABLE TO SPEAK DUE TO SEVERE ASTHMA..<br />\n<br />\nKOTTACKAL ARYA VAIDYASALA SEND A PHYSICIAN WITH HIM TO VIVEKANANDA ROCK WHERE HE WAS PUT ON A SPECIAL DIET , DO SWARA YOGA AND TOLD TO BREATHE IN SALT SPRAY..<br />\n<br />\nRothschild send Swami Vivekananda on his ship to represent Hinduism at the Parliament of Religions at Chicago on September 11th, 1893. Rothschild gave Narendra his new name Swami Vivekananda just before he boarded his ship in May 1893.<br />\n<br />\nVIVEKANANDA IS GUILTY OF ALLOWING HINDUISM TO BE BRANDED AS FULL OF SUPERSTITION \u2014 WHEN THERE IS ABSOLUTELY NO SUPERSTITION , OTHER THAN WHAT HIS MASTER ROTHSCHILD INJECTED- USING HIS FAKE CREATIONS AND FAKE MUTTS<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILDs MEDIA PROPPED HIM UP<br />\n<br />\nVIVEKANANDA HAD VERY LITTLE PRANA WITHIN AND SUFFERED FROM 33 MAJOR ILLNESSES. SO BALLS TO HIS BULLSHIT BRAHMACHARYA / OJAS THEORY.<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD SEND HIS FREEMASON AGENT VIVEKANANDA TO CHICAGO.<br />\n<br />\nAS SOON AS HE SPOKE FIRST 3 WORDS ( BROTHERS AND SISTERS OF AMERICA ) A PAID AUDIENCE WAS KEPT TO CLAP LIKE THERE IS NO TOMORROW , AND ROTHSCHILDs MEDIA COVERED IT - -AND MADE ALL CURIOUS.<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD MAKE NIKOLA TESLA MEET VIVEKANANDA AT JEWESS SARAH BENDHARTS PARTY.<br />\n<br />\nVIVEKANANDA DID EXTENSIVE MEDICAL TESTS IN USA.<br />\n<br />\nVIVEKANANDA USED TO GIVE BULL TO ALL AND SUNDRY THAT HE PRESERVED HIS SEMEN FOR 12 YEARS --AND THAT IS WHY HE IS SO BRAINY AND HEALTHY..</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Brahmacharya is about harnessing the energy or power of our senses and directing that instead to greater personal understanding- not withholding semen.The technical meaning of Brahmacharya is self-restraint, particularly mastery of perfect control over the senses- not the PRICK ..Brahmacharya is the virtue of celibacy when unmarried and fidelity when married..Brahmacharya is a means, not an end. It usually includes cleanliness, ahimsa, simple living, studies, meditation, and voluntary restraints on certain foods, intoxicants, and behaviors-(including sexual behavior).</span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br />VIVEKANANDA NEVER UNDERSTOOD SANATANA DHARMA.. HINDUISM IS THE ONLY RELIGION WITHOUT HEAVEN/ HELL CONCEPT. THESE ARE BASICS..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nI HAVE READ THE WORKS OF VIVEKANDANDA\u2014<br />\n<br />\nVIVEKANANDA SUPPORTED THE HEAVEN- HELL THEORY, PROPPED UP ALL FAKE DASAS/ RADHA / RAM KICKING PREGNANT SITA TO THE FOREST / 16000 GOPIKA LOVERS/ BHAKTI MOVEMENT/ ANIMAL SACRIFICE IN TEMPLES/ DEVADASI TEMPLE WHORES/ SATI/ AGHORIS / BIGOT MANU LIES/ KAMASUTRA SEX/ BRAHMACHARYA SEMEN/ ASHWAMEDHA HORSE SACRIFICE/ FAKE EMPEROR ASHOKA/ FAKE ROTHSCHILDs MUTTS/ ISLAMIC CONVERSION OF HINDU MONUMENTS LIKE QUTAB MINAR-TAJ MAHAL- BABRI MASJID ETC.<br />\n<br />\nVIVEKANANDA DID NOT KNOW THAT HINDU GODS ( EXCEPT VISHNU MORTAL AVATARS PARASHURAMA/ RAMA/ KRISHNA/ AYYAPPA ) ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES .<br />\n<br />\nI want my readers to know that Vivekananda was part of the Brahmo Samaj which-<br />\n<br />\nRejected the Vedas<br />\nRejected Vishnu avatars Krishna and Rama<br />\nRejected temple worship of Shiva, Vishnu and Devi<br />\nRejected Karma , be-birth and Moksha theory.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"font-size: 16px; />\nCLOSET COMMIE ARNAB GOSWMI<br />\nRAJDEEP SARDESAI<br />\nBARKHA DUTT<br />\nNAVIKA KUMAR<br />\nZAKKA JACOB<br />\nANAND NARASIMHAN<br />\nFAYE DSOUZA<br />\nSHEKHAR GUPTA<br />\nRAMCHANDRA GUHA<br />\n<br />\nWEBSITES OF DESH BHAKTS<br />\nSPREAD ON SOCIAL MEDIA</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c6457707837779312556\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6VOqqm-hCbM/XCa06XjAUxI/AAAAAAABfL4/E3K2A6jHNG0XTf7_mZb9kjj9WxD3GwmzQCK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1546867040748#c6457707837779312556\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 7, 2019 at 6:47 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/god-code-by-timothy-paul-smith-damning.html<br />\n<br />\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME--<br />\n<br />\nHOW HAVE CUNNING JEWS PUSHED THE GOD CODE AGENDA FOR SO LONG WITHOUT BEING SPAT AT..<br />\n<br />\nWELL JEWS ARE GOOD IN HIJACKING STATISTICS, CHERRY PICKING , MASKING CONTEXT AND LOADED STATEMENTS..<br />\n<br />\nLET ME EXPLAIN IN DETAIL--<br />\n<br />\nNumbers themselves \u2013 unless purposefully falsified \u2013 cannot lie, but they can be used to misrepresent.. When you read a statistic, of any kind, be sure to ask how \u2013 and more importantly, why \u2013 the statistic was generated, whom it benefits, and whether it can be trusted.<br />\n<br />\nWithout critical and educated evaluation of statistics, the public could be misled by information that\u2019s misused, incomplete, or manipulated. Unfortunately, it seems that manipulation of statistics to further an agenda is becoming more common throughout society. Bad information propagated by government agencies especially is affecting policy decisions and harming the public when news outlets report it with insufficient examination.<br />\n<br />\nStatistics are supposed to make something easier to understand but when used in a misleading fashion can trick the casual observer into believing something other than what the data shows. That is, a misuse of statistics occurs when a statistical argument asserts a falsehood. In some cases, the misuse may be accidental. In others, it is purposeful and for the gain of the perpetrator. The false statistics trap can be quite damaging for the quest for knowledge.<br />\n<br />\nMisuses can be easy to fall into. Professional scientists, even mathematicians and professional statisticians, can be fooled by even some simple methods, even if they are careful to check everything. Scientists have been known to fool themselves with statistics due to lack of knowledge of probability theory and lack of standardization of their tests.<br />\n<br />\nCherry picking, suppressing evidence, or the fallacy of incomplete evidence is the act of pointing to individual cases or data that seem to confirm a particular position while ignoring a significant portion of related cases or data that may contradict that position. It is a kind of fallacy of selective attention, the most common example of which is the confirmation bias.<br />\n<br />\nCherry picking is done by cunning conmen intentionally. Cherry picking has a negative connotation as the practice neglects, overlooks or directly suppresses evidence that could lead to a complete picture. Cherry picking can be found in many logical fallacies. For example, the \"fallacy of anecdotal evidence\" tends to overlook large amounts of data in favor of that known personally, \"selective use of evidence\" rejects material unfavorable to an argument, while a false dichotomy picks only two options when more are available.<br />\n<br />\nCherry picking can refer to the selection of data or data sets so a study or survey will give desired, predictable results which may be misleading or even completely contrary to reality.<br />\n<br />\nSTUPID JUDGES WHO CANT THINK BEYOND THE OBJECTIVE, FALL PREY TO CHERRY PICKING AND LOGICAL FALLACIES.. BOTTOM OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRA BARREL JUDGES FALL PREY TO LOADED QUESTION FROM A CLEVER LAWYER TO A WITNESS.<br />\n<br />\nWHEN A CASE IS DELAYED BY TWO DECADES ( LIKE IN INDIA ) THE CONTEXT IF FORGOTTEN. THE JUDGE HAS DIED. THE ORIGINAL DEFENDANT AND HIS LAWYER HAS DIED.<br />\n<br />\nON MY SHIP I HOLD MANAGEMENT COMMITTEE MEETINGS EVERY WEEK. IT WAS ABOUT A TASK AT HAND AND ITS CONTEXT.<br />\n<br />\nCONTEXT MAKES A TASK EXCITING. THIS IS ONE OF MY LEADERSHIP SECRETS.. OOPS \u2013GAVE IT AWAY.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c6457707837779312556-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c6457707837779312556-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c8394502912339871424\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1546867158474#c8394502912339871424\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 7, 2019 at 6:49 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED FROM 1--</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">IN THE DAYS OF KERALA SAGE APOLLONIUS OF TYANA ( ON WHOM JESUS WHO NEVER EXISTED WAS MODELLED IN 325 AD ) THE ROMAN HINDU GODDESS OF JUSTICE HELD A MIRROR AND A BALANCE WITH A KING COBRA AT HER FEET. MIRROR SIGNIFIED CONSCIOUS AND SUBJECTIVE JUSTICE..</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS WAS CHANGED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD TO A BLINDFOLDED WOMAN WITH A BALANCE AND A SWORD. JUSTICE NOW BECAME OBJECTIVE SANS CONTEXT.</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/objective-arguments-but-subjective.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTEXTOMY MUST BE PUNISHABLE IN A COURT OF LAW.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">'Contextomy' refers to the selective excerpting of words from their original linguistic context in a way that distorts the source's intended meaning, a practice commonly referred to as 'quoting out of context'.</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The act of quoting a person out of context, is with the aim of winning an argument , by making an ass of the not so bright judge \u2013by deliberate obfuscation of the quote's actual meaning.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A contextomized quotation not only prompts audiences to form a false impression of the source\u2019s intentions, but can contaminate subsequent interpretation of the quote when it is restored to its original context</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Cherry picking is the act of pointing at individual cases or data that seem to confirm a particular position, while ignoring a significant portion of related cases or data that may contradict that position..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Loaded statements are like icebergs: There's a little portion that you see, and a much larger portion that lurks below the surface.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">They typically carry associated meaning that's tied to issues of larger importance, but because they're delivered in an instant, the true import of such statements can sometimes be overlooked.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">You say something that will enflame passions in people, either positive or negative, and could also have a double meaning or a hidden meaning.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A loaded question or complex question fallacy is a question that contains a controversial or unjustified assumption (e.g., a presumption of guilt)</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The fallacy of sweeping generalization is at work when a statistical average is applied to specific people. A sweeping generalization is when someone assumes something where it does not apply.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When referring to a generalization made from a single example it has been called the fallacy of the lonely fact or the proof by example fallacy. When evidence is intentionally excluded to bias the result, it is sometimes termed the fallacy of exclusion and is a form of selection bias.</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THERE IS NOT A SINGLE JUDGE IN INDIA WHO HAS THE BRAINS TO FIGURE OUT WHAT I WROTE ABOVE</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I WILL BE PENNING A FRESH POST ON THE SHIT QUALITY OF OUR JUDICIAL SYSTEM..</span></span></b><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6VOqqm-hCbM/XCa06XjAUxI/AAAAAAABfL4/E3K2A6jHNG0XTf7_mZb9kjj9WxD3GwmzQCK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Data mining find its application across various industries such as market analysis, business management, fraud inspection, corporate analysis and risk management, among others.<br />\n<br />\nThe most damaging sources of misleading statistics is sampling bias<br />\n<br />\nON CHEMICAL TANKERS I HAD CREATED A FOOD PROOF SYSTEM FOR SAMPLING.. I AM SURE KOSHER EVIL PHARMA DARLINGS JP NADDA , MODI KNOW ABOUT ALL THIS.<br />\n<br />\nRead All 4 parts of the post below--<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/flue-shots-pneumococcal-vaccines-capt.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">DURING SABARIMALA SEASON PAMPA RIVER SAMPLES ARE TAKEN FROM SELECTED SPOTS WHERE WATER QUALITY SHOWS THE BEST..&nbsp; &nbsp;SO EVEN IF PROPER SAMPLING PROCEDURES ARE FOLLOWED\u2014THERE IS A MORE DAMAGING \u201cSELECTION BIAS\u201d..</span></b></div>\n<br />\nSelection bias is the bias introduced by the selection of data for analysis in such a way that proper randomization is not achieved, thereby ensuring that the sample obtained is not representative of whatever has to be analyzed..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE MUST BE STRICT PUNISHMENT FOR DELIBERATE SELECTION BIAS. text-decoration-line: none;\">January 1, 2019 at 6:14 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY CALLED ME AND SAID--<br />\n<br />\nTHE GOD CODE OF TIMOTHY PAUL SMITH IS ABOUT A WILD GOOSE CHASE FOR THE MISSING ARK OF THE COVENANT..<br />\n<br />\nHE ASKED ME IF I KNOW WHERE IT IS..<br />\n<br />\nOF COURSE I KNOW..<br />\n<br />\nI WILL GIVE A HINT TO THESE STUPID CHRISTIAN AND JEWISH HISTORIANS ..</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">THIS WILL BE THE GREATEST REVELATION OF THIS MILLENNIUM ..</span></span></div>\n<br />\nTHE MOTHER OF KING SOLOMON BATH SHEBA WAS A NAMBOODIRI WOMAN FROM THE LAND OF SHEBA , WHICH IS NORTH KERALA ( MALABAR/ PUNT/ OPHIR )..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE WIFE OF KING SOLOMON WAS ALSO A WOMAN FROM SHEBA --CALLED QUEEN OF SHEBA , NAMED MAKEDA..<br />\n<br />\nSOLOMONs SHIPS WERE MADE IN BEYPORE , CALICUT ( MY HOMETOWN ) OF TEAK..<br />\n<br />\nSOLOMONs SEAL WAS IN MALAYALAM , MY LANGUAGE..<br />\n<br />\nSOLOMON AND QUEEN OF SHEBA ( MAKEDA ) HAD A SON MENELIK , WHOM MAKEDA DELIVERED IN CALICUT AS WAS THE HINDU CUSTOM..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN MENELIK GREW UP AND BECAME A MAN HE WENT TO VISIT SOLOMON AT JERUSALEM..<br />\n<br />\nSOLOMON GAVE HIM THE ARK OF THE COVENANT TO KEEP IN THE SAFETY OF THE KINGDOM OF SHEBA ( MALABAR )..<br />\n<br />\nNOW HERE IS THE TWIST..<br />\n<br />\nTO BRING THE ARK OF THE COVENANT IT HAS TO BE TRANSPORTED BY OVERLAND ROUTE TO THE KINGDOM OF DHOFAR WHICH WAS OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING..<br />\n<br />\nTODAY DHOFAR IS SOUTH OF OMAN/ NORTH OF YEMEN , WITH A NATURAL HARBOUR AT SALALAH..<br />\n<br />\nDHOFAR IS ALSO CALLED SABA OR SHEBA -- AFTER ALL IT WAS PART OF THE KINGDOM OF SHEBA ( PUNT/ OPHIR/ MALABAR ) IN MAINLAND INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nMIND YOU --JEW ROTHSCHILD CEMENTED A KOSHER LIE THAT SHEBA IS ETHIOPIA.. NONSENSE !<br />\n<br />\nThe Queen of Sheba is the only female character who appears in all three holy books of the Abrahamic faiths \u2013 the Torah of the JEWS , the Koran of the MUSLIMS and the Bible (Kings 1:10 and Chronicles 2:9) of the CHRISTIANS.<br />\n<br />\nThe Jew histrians of Talmud have an inkling that Solomon hid the Ark of the Covenant at Aksum north of the Himyarite Kingdom..<br />\n<br />\nWell , Aksum is nothing but the Kingdom of Dhofar, owned and ruled by the Calicut king .. the Oasis of Mecca was owned by the Calicut king..<br />\n<br />\nToday Jewish and Christian historians agree that the Kingdom of Saba is nothing but the Kingdom of Sheba.. They are right-- Saba / overseas part of Sheba / Dhofar is the same.<br />\n<br />\nThe younger brothers of Kerala Namboodiris ( semites with six pointed star of Shiva / Shakti merge as their symbol ) were spice overland route overseers of the Calicut king.<br />\n<br />\nMohammad the prophet was one such SEMITE . His father\u2019s elder brother Namboodiri ( ARYAN ) was a priest at the Shiva Temple at Mecca Oasis.<br />\n<br />\nARYANS ADOPTED SWASTIKA , SEMITES ADOPTED SIX POINTED STAR..<br />\n<br />\nDhofar grew no spices. Dhofar had a spice depot at Salalah where the King of Calicut ( my hometown ) stocked his spices..<br />\n<br />\nMecca Oasis was a spice customs outpost .. Spices grew wild in mainland Sheba ( North Kerala// Malabar / Punt / Sheba/ Ophir )<br />\n<br />\nMY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO 59.33 %<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-bsACwXJlDXk/XCzKcrB4emI/AAAAAAABfOc/EWNZ2Tyzn0IDquB_rRPFSXA6nlJ6aWZ3gCLcBGAs/s1600/tfffhe-ark-of-the-covenant-and-freemasonry.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"427\" data-original-width=\"900\" height=\"302\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-bsACwXJlDXk/XCzKcrB4emI/AAAAAAABfOc/EWNZ2Tyzn0IDquB_rRPFSXA6nlJ6aWZ3gCLcBGAs/s640/tfffhe-ark-of-the-covenant-and-freemasonry.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c4888565367137268079\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6VOqqm-hCbM/XCa06XjAUxI/AAAAAAABfL4/E3K2A6jHNG0XTf7_mZb9kjj9WxD3GwmzQCK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/happy-new-year-2019-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html?showComment=1546438840140#c4888565367137268079\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 2, 2019 at 7:50 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Such is the importance of the Ark of the Covenant, that according to many scholars, King Solomon\u2019s Temple was itself built with the singular aim of holding the Ark of the Covenant and its contents beneath the temple in an underground chamber.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">This is what History Channel TV and Timothy Paul Smith was trying to prove\u2014with an added innuendo that Freemasons ( read as Jew Rothschild ) know where it is.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Ark of the Covenant is displayed prominently on the Coat of Arm of the United Grand Lodge of England.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">It also finds mention in several other Masonic rites across various jurisdictions. Freemasons consider it to represent God\u2019s promise to King David and to the wider humanity.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">In Masonic circles, a Masonic lodge is considered the modern-day equivalent of Solomon\u2019s Temple.</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN REALITY ALL INITIAL FREEMASON LODGES WERE SECRET SOCIETIES OF GOONS OF ROTHSCHILD..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE FRENCH REVOLUTION WAS TRIGGERED AND CONDUCTED BY FREEMASONS..</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/11/the-french-revolution-conceived-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JEW Napoleon was a Freemason. He suffered from Chrons disease and had more than one purulent asshole.. After Napoleon came to power he gave official status to Freemasons.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/napoleon-unknown-side-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NAPOLEONs OLDER BROTHER JOSEPH BONAPARTE WAS A GRANDMARSHALL OF THE FREEMASON LODGE .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Joseph Bonaparte was the older brother of Napoleon Bonaparte , who made him king of Spain. He served as Spain's king from 1808 to 1813. Joseph was made king of Naples and Sicily (1806\u201308), and then king of Spain (1808\u201313). In August of 1808, after being king for only three months, he was driven out of the Spanish capital.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">After Napoleon's defeat, Joseph moved to the United States ( protected by the Boston Brahmins ) , but he died in Italy in 1844.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/dirty-secrets-of-boston-tea-party-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Napoleon\u2019s younger brother Louis Napol\u00e9on Bonaparte ( died 1846) was also a Freemason.. He was a King of Holland from 1806 to 1810..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ALL THE INITIAL DRUG RUNNERS OF INDIA WERE FREEMASONS AND AGENTS OF JEW ROTHSCHILD..</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/drug-runners-of-india-capt-ajit.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/08/freemason-lodge-of-calicut-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">BR AMBEDKARs GRANDFATHER WAS A FREEMASON.. SO WAS GANDHI, NEHRU, PATEL , TAGORE , VIVEKANANDA etc</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/10/the-only-dalit-freemason-of-india-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LORD AYYAPPA WAS DELETED AS THE NINTH AVATAR OF VISHNU AND IMHOTEP WAS MADE THE PATRON SAINT OF FREEMASONS.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/08/imhotep-patron-saint-of-freemasons-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BALLS TO THE FREEMASONS !</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SOMEBODY ASKED ME ,\nWHAT THE HELL IS MANNA WHICH WAS KEPT IN A GOLDEN POT INSIDE THE ARK OF THE\nCOVENANT ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Hebrew Bible,\nmanna is described twice: once in Exodus 16:1\u201336 with the full narrative\nsurrounding it, and once again in Numbers 11:1\u20139 as a part of a separate\nnarrative.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manna was&nbsp; an edible substance which, according to the\nBible and the Quran which God provided for the Israelites during their travels\nin the desert during the forty-year period following the Exodus and prior to\nthe conquest of Canaan.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The God-sent manna fell\nonly six days in the week (not on the Sabbath \u2014 Exodus 16:22).Moreover, twice\nas much fell on Friday (to accommodate the Sabbath).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Israelites were\ninstructed to eat only the manna they had gathered for each day. Stored manna\n\"bred worms and stank\"-&nbsp; the\nexception being that stored the day before the Sabbath (Preparation Day), when\ntwice the amount of manna was gathered. This manna did not spoil overnight.\nExodus 16:23\u201324 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is what the Lord\ncommanded: \"Tomorrow is to be a day of rest, a holy Sabbath to the Lord.\nSo bake what you want to bake and boil what you want to boil. Save whatever is\nleft and keep it until morning.\" So they saved it until morning, as Moses\ncommanded, and it did not stink or get maggots in it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The word mana appears\nthree times in the Qur\u02be\u0101n, in Quran 2:57, 7:160 and 20:80.nn It is narrated in\nthe hadith collection Sahih Muslim that the Prophet Muhammad said\n\"Truffles are part of the 'manna' which Allah sent to the people of Israel\nthrough Moses, and its juice is a medicine for the eye.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The heavenly manna was\ngranular in nature, hence could be ground up, etc. (Numbers 11:8).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Numbers 11:8 says that\nthey ground it on millstones or beat it in the mortar, cooked it in pans, and\nmade cakes of it; and its taste was like the taste of pastry prepared with oil.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then Moses said, \u201cThis\nis the thing which the LORD has commanded: \u2018Fill an omer with it, to be kept\nfor your generations, that they may see the bread with which I fed you in the\nwilderness, when I brought you out of the land of Egypt.\u2019\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And Moses said to\nAaron, \u201cTake a pot and put an omer of manna in it, and lay it up before the\nLORD, to be kept for your generations.\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As the LORD commanded\nMoses, so Aaron laid it up before the Testimony, to be kept. And the children\nof Israel ate manna forty years, until they came to an inhabited land; they ate\nmanna until they came to the border of the land of Canaan.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The manna of the\nHebrews is nothing other than a thallophyte known botanically as Canona\nesculenta and lichen esculentus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thallophytes include\nlichens, algae, fungus, bacteria and slime moulds and bryophytes. The lichen\ndoes not attach to any foreign object, but appears to have been thrown onto the\nsand.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The nomads of the\nSahara and South Algeria deserts call it Ousseh-el-Ard. This lichen does not\ncling to any foreign body, but lies on the sand sometimes in a layer nearly two\ninches thick, and can be collected easily.&nbsp;\nWhenever there is a light rain or a heavy dew, they never fail to go\nlooking for this beneficial manna (and light laxative)..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It has a starchy taste\nand a slight but pleasant sweetness. All herbivores, camels in particular, are\nvery fond of it. The Arabs boil it in water and obtain a gelatinous paste,\nwhich the desert gourmets use in various ways. To conserve it they let it dry\nin the shade, where they wrap it, either with camel bladders or with sheepskin,\nonce it has been reduced to a paste. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have tasted it in\nBejaya Algeria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manna is short-lived\nand must be collected in the morning right after it appears, since it dries out\nunder the burning rays of the sun, merges with the colour of the sand and\ndisappears. By contrast, once prepared it keeps perfectly in a closed\ncontainer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Lord commanded\nMoses to fill a gold vessel (pot) with Manna and keep it as a memorial to\nfuture generations of how God fed them in the wilderness (Exodus 16:32-33).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jesus Christ ( who never existed ) frequently\nreferred to himself as bread: \"the true Bread from heaven\" (John\n6:32), \"the Bread of God\" (John 6:33), \"the Bread of life\"\n(John 6:35, 48), and John 6:51:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"I am the living\nbread that came down from heaven. If anyone eats of this bread, he will live\nforever. This bread is my flesh, which I will give for the life of the\nworld.\" (NIV)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today, most Christian\nchurches celebrate a communion service or Lord's Supper, in which the\nparticipants eat some form of bread, as Jesus commanded his followers to do at\nthe Last Supper (Matthew 26:26).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The final mention of\nmanna occurs in Revelation 2:17, \"To him who overcomes I will give some of\nthe hidden manna...\"&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 22pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">THE WHITE HISTORIAN WHO\nSPECIALIZES IN JERUSALEM HAS A POOR OPINION OF PAGANS ( HINDUS).&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 22pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On October 25th 2017,\nthe Vatican released a document that had remained in its secret archives for\nseven hundred years.&nbsp; It is the report of\nthe official Church investigation into the activities of the Knights Templar in\nthe early fourteenth century.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In October\n1306, these crusader knights were found guilty of idolatry, blasphemy, and\nheresy, and their order was dissolved. Some were burned at the stake, others\nimprisoned, and most were stripped of their assets.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Astonishingly, this\nextraordinary document reveals how the Vatican enquiry found no evidence of\nwrongdoing. It was the Pope himself, Clement V, who directly intervened and\ndeclared the Templars heretics on reports that they were worshipping the devil\n( Lord Narasimha ). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The Jews wheeled and dealed and BRIBED -- to cut the military arm of the pope - the extremely wealthy, powerful and popular Templar Knights , who were now their rivals in the banking business .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The Templar banks were trustworthy and they did NOT exploit vulnerability like the Jews. The Jews were losing banking business , by which they controlled Kings and Queens.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">For shedding Jew blood during the crusades in Jerusalem, they got the entire surviving Templar Knights&nbsp; mostly old men ) burnt alive. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Below : Jacques de Molay, the last Grand Master of the Knights Templar being burned at the stake in 1314.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , serif; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">They used the knowledge that the Templar Knights were all vegetarians and were worshiping&nbsp; a \u201cstrange deity with the head of a lion and the body of a man\u201d ( <b><span style=\"color: red;\">Narasimha Vishnu avatar</span></b> ).&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Tn4vv2zLXyM/XC3LzQDDWQI/AAAAAAABfQE/dxbJtplHv60_i6U097aHUeW4E_YWR5dmQCLcBGAs/s1600/lordSSnarasimhakillingdeomnhiranyakashipustorypicture.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-gDEX0oxZpYs/VQZayzEKg4I/AAAAAAAA2Tg/m0zsQ3tX6cU/s1600/maxresdefauglt.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888;
