, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The templars had abandoned their Christian faith , in their retired life. In their old age the Jews did propaganda that they were engaged in sodomy and spitting on the cross , daily.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The slimy Jews planned well in advance .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">They waited till the King of France Philip 4 ( below ) was crowned . This king was heavily in debt to the banks of the Templar Knights.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-hT_1_oME33Q/VQZYZhzfytI/AAAAAAAA2S4/ukFJZ2kI6DA/s1600/imagdges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-hT_1_oME33Q/VQZYZhzfytI/AAAAAAAA2S4/ukFJZ2kI6DA/s1600/imagdges.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"261\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">First they had to made Vatican a whorehouse.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The Jews manipulated by bribes , Pope Honorius IV ( Giacomo Savelli,) who was Pope from 2 April 1285 to his death in 1287. His election was one of the speediest in the history of the papacy- his election was NOT even a papal conclave.&nbsp; Such was the power of Jewish bribes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">During his pontificate Pope Honorius IV ( below ) he assumed a strange pro-French political policy .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Md2inXJpKPM/VQZZKSEeXMI/AAAAAAAA2TE/CJH1wT-foZM/s1600/Carmine-Altarpieyfce-Pope-Honorius-IV-Consigning-The-New-Habit.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"516\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Md2inXJpKPM/VQZZKSEeXMI/AAAAAAAA2TE/CJH1wT-foZM/s1600/Carmine-Altarpieyfce-Pope-Honorius-IV-Consigning-The-New-Habit.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The rot had set in.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The Avignon Papacy was the period from 1309 to 1377, during which seven successive popes resided in Avignon, in France, rather than in Rome-something unimaginable .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">On the same day Pope Honorius IV &nbsp;was elected, he was consecrated bishop and crowned Pope in the Basilica of St. Peter-throwing long standing papal traditions into the garbage bin.&nbsp; &nbsp;This Pope could NOT think properly or even walk \u2013his Jew doctor made sure. &nbsp;While he did first mass as Pope his hands had to be raised by a crafty mechanical contrivance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Frenchman Pope Clement V was in the payroll of the Jews. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In 1309, Clement V moved his court to the papal enclave at Avignon France, where it remained for the next 67 years. This shocking absence from Rome and the St Peter\u2019s cathedral is referred to as the \"Babylonian Captivity of the Papacy\".&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Finally, Pope Gregory XI abandoned Avignon and moved his court to Rome (arriving on January 17, 1377), officially ending the disgraceful Avignon Papacy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Pope Clement V ( Frenchman &nbsp;Raymond Bertrand de Got &nbsp;) was Pope from 5 June 1305 to his death in 1314.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">He is infamous for suppressing the order of the Knights Templar and allowing the execution , and roasting alive of many of its members.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-DpxNRa983Us/VQZWKenSmtI/AAAAAAAA2SQ/0l6ulTh6kww/s1600/crusadv6ers.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Imagine a Pope cutting his own feet?</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-hWH8rWejkL0/VQZanqfsxEI/AAAAAAAA2TY/auMPEuCuQy4/s1600/569375-825cde105-ad72-11e3-9d7e-f018f46e0213.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-K0raQgJyqrY/VQZWyk-9eII/AAAAAAAA2SY/Wxrc7g0sCVU/s1600/Arngv-1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">On Friday, 13 October 1307, hundreds of the Knights Templar were arrested in France supported &nbsp;by King Philip IV of France and his stooge Pope Clement V . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">King Philip IV was totally controlled by crypto JEW Guillaume de Nogaret ( below ) set up by banker Jews.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-kvtOrnubs2Y/VQZXwwFM_EI/AAAAAAAA2So/KwBkbfdIq4M/s1600/nogryyaret-2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>King Philip IV \u2018s wife Joan\nI of Navarre was fat and ugly and he did not love her .. She was the daughter\nof king Henry I of Navarre and Blanche of Artois.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>JEW Guillaume de\nNogaret provided Joan I with much need sex.&nbsp;\nKing Philip IV had his wife killed &nbsp;in 1305.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><i>\n\n\n\n</i></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Philip IV had three\nsons, Louis, Philip and Charles. &nbsp;In\n1314, the daughters-in-law of Philip IV, Margaret of Burgundy (wife of Louis X)\nand Blanche of Burgundy (wife of Charles IV) Joan II, Countess of Burgundy\n(wife of Philip V), were charged of adultery&nbsp;\nby the daughter of King Philip IV , Isabella..&nbsp;</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/god-code-by-timothy-paul-smith-damning.html?showComment=1546543249908#c4369728768085733674\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 4, 2019 at 12:50 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME-<br />\n<br />\nWHO WAS KING OF ISRAEL AFTER KING SOLOMON..<br />\n<br />\nWELL --<br />\n<br />\nSAUL WAS THE FIRST KING OF ISRAEL AND JUDAH..<br />\n<br />\nSAUL'S SON ISH-BOSHETH WAS MURDERED BY SON-IN -LAW DAVID WHO BECAME SECOND KING OF ISRAEL.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px; text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">DAVIDs BEST FRIEND WAS URAIH WITH A BEAUTIFUL</span><span style=\"color: red;\"> HINDU NAMBOODIRI WIFE NAME BATH SHEBA</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">.. URAIH MADE DAVID KING-- BUT UNGRATEFUL DAVID HAD URAIH MURDERED TO USURP HIS WIFE ..</span></b></div>\n<br />\nDAVID HAD A SON WITH BATH SHEBA AND HIS NAME IS SOLOMON, THE THIRD KING OF ISRAEL..<br />\n<br />\nJESSE WAS THE FATHER OF DAVID..<br />\n<br />\nOBED ( SON OF BOAZ AND RUTH ) WAS THE FATHER OF JESSE .<br />\n<br />\nObed is named as one of Jesus' ( who never existed ) ancestors in the genealogies recorded in the Gospel of Matthew and the Gospel of Luke ..<br />\n<br />\nSOLOMONs SON MENELIK WITH HINDU QUEEN OF SHEBA- MAKEDA WENT ONCE TO JERUSALEM TO SEE HIS FATHER AT THE AGE OF 20 AND CAME BACK TO CALICUT WITH THE ARK OF THE COVENANT.<br />\n<br />\nRehoboam was the fourth king of Israel according to the Hebrew Bible. He was a son of and the successor to Solomon, and a grandson of David.<br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Rehoboam's mother was like Makeda , a </span><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>HINDU Kerala Namboodiri woman Naamah</b></span><span style=\"color: purple;\">..both 1 Kings 14:21-31, and 2 Chronicles 12:13 in the Hebrew Bible mention Rehoboam and his foreign mother Namaah. Naamah is praised in Bava Kamma 38b for her righteousness.</span></span></div>\n<br />\nShishak, the Egyptian king ransacked Solomon\u2019s Temple in the fifth year of Rehoboam\u2019s reign.<br />\n<br />\nKing David conquered Jerusalem in 993 BC, and his son Solomon, built a temple to his God, between 958-951 BC.<br />\n<br />\nAbijah of Judah was the son of Rehoboam and grandson of Solomon ..<br />\n<br />\nAsa of Judah suceeded Abijah as king of Judah.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\">SOMEBODY ASKED ME<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHY DO YOU SAY THAT THE\nALEPPO CODEX CANNOT BE PARTLY BURNT.. IT IS POSSIBLE THAT BOOKS CAN BE HALF\nBURNT..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\">OK--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\">NOW YOU FORCE ME TO &nbsp;TELL THE TRUTH AND SCREW THE LYING JEWS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\">THERE WERE NO BURN\nMARKS ON THE ALEPPO CODE AT ALL.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; line-height: 200%;\">THE DARK MARKS ARE FUNGUS..&nbsp; NOT ONE SINGLE&nbsp; SURVIVED PAGES SHOW ANY VESTIGE OF BURN MARKS..&nbsp; JEWS MUST STOP LYING..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE RIOTS HAPPENED ON\n2ND DEC 1947..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 18.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">THERE IS NO RECORD OF\nWHO FOUND THE ALEPPO CODEX ..</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 18.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">PAGE OF THE ALEPPO\nCODEX WERE STRATEGICALLY TORN OUT, MOST FROM THE BEGINNING AND THEN CRITICAL\nPAGES IN BETWEEN.. THIS WHOLE FOUL STRATEGY WAS TO FUDGE THE BOOK AND ITS\nCONTENTS LATER ..</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\">WE ALL KNOW HOW JEWS\nFUDGED THE HINDU ESSENE DEAD SEA SCROLLS TO MAKE IT JEWISH !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 18.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">ESSENE DEAD SEA SCROLLS\nHAVE ZILCH - ZERO- NOTHING TO DO WITH JEWS..</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE PAGES CONTAINING\nTHE MASORA , AND THE GRAMMAR OF THE MASORA AT THE BEGINNING OF THE ALEPPO CODEX\nBOOK WERE TORN OFF.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 18.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">ALMOST ALL THE PAGES OF\nTHE FIVE BOOKS OF MOSES ( PENTATEUCH ) - WERE MISSING.. THE LAST BOOKS OF THE WRITINGS WERE\nMISSING.. SOME PAGES FROM THE PROPHETS WERE TORN OFF..&nbsp; ALMOST ALL OF&nbsp;</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 18.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">THE ELEVEN FINAL PAGES\nOF DEUTERONOMY WERE INTACT ... </span></b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 18.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">MY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO <span style=\"color: red;\">59.34 %</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 18.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Aharon Be</span><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">n Asher added\nthe vowels, the cantillation marks, and the Masoretic commentary in the Aleppo\nCodex..<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\">Together with the\nLeningrad Codex, it contains the Ben-Asher masoretic tradition, but the Aleppo\nCodex lacks ALMOST ALL THE TORAH SECTION ( why? ) and many other parts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\">In 1375 AD&nbsp; one of Maimonides' descendants brought it to\nAleppo, Syria, leading to its present name.&nbsp;\nThe Codex remained in Syria for five centuries.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Aleppo Codex is considered the oldest copy of\nthe Hebrew Old Testament..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Codex disappeared\nin 1947, then reemerged ( it was NOT lost ) in 1958, when it was smuggled into\nIsrael by Syrian Jew Murad Faham, and presented to the president of the state,\nYitzhak Ben-Zvi..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Aleppo Codex was\nentrusted to the Ben-Zvi Institute and Hebrew University of Jerusalem. It is\ncurrently on display in the Israel Museum ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Aleppo Codex was\nsubmitted by Israel for inclusion in UNESCO's Memory of the World Register and\nwas included in 2015..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Masoretic Text\ndefines the Jewish canon and its precise letter-text, with its vocalization and\naccentuation known as the Masorah.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Masoretic Text is\nthe version held as authoritative and used liturgically in most synagogues\ntoday. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\">A scribe, Shlomo\nBen-Buya\u2019a, from the town of Tiberias on the Sea of Galilee, used iron gall ink\nto write the Bible\u2019s more than 300,000 Hebrew words one by one. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\">Its completion around\n930 A.D. after years of work represented the final condensation of the Hebrew\nBible .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\">The codex is meant to\nbe the perfect version of the 24 books that made up the Bible..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-H0Gd0wlJyLs/XC8T_r6aEcI/AAAAAAABfQQ/llt5WEQ9Rpc6Pv9hHTOfLqlyDuAlwQDAwCLcBGAs/s1600/dWWownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"234\" data-original-width=\"216\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-H0Gd0wlJyLs/XC8T_r6aEcI/AAAAAAABfQQ/llt5WEQ9Rpc6Pv9hHTOfLqlyDuAlwQDAwCLcBGAs/s1600/dWWownload.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">SO SO SO<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">A 487 PAGE DICTIONARY\nGOT PARTIALLY BURNT<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">BUT PRAISE THE KOSHER LORD \u2014\nHALLELUJAAAH <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">ONLY 193 PAGES WERE\nBURNT ( SIC ) , &nbsp;SOME WERE FROM THE BEGINNING, &nbsp;MANY PAGES SELECTIVELY FROM IN BETWEEN AND\nSOME IN THE END ..<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS IS A REAL MIRACLE\n!<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 18.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">BRAAAAYYYYYYYYYYYYY !</span></b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 18.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 18.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">AND HEY, ONE BURNT PAGE TURNED UP IN 1982 AND ANOTHER IN 2007..&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;REAL MIRACLE THIS !</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 18.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 18.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">SHLOMO ZALMAN SHRAGAI ,&nbsp; ( JERUSAEMs FIRST ELECTED MAYOR ) TOLD 11 YEARS AFTER THE CODEX WAS BURNT ( SIC )-- THAT THE BOOK WAS INTACT, WHEN GIVEN TO THE BEN ZVI INSTITUTE..</span></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 18.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">In 1958, the Jewish\ncommunity of Aleppo sued the Ben-Zvi Institute for the return of the Aleppo Codex,\nbut the court ruled against them and suppressed publication of the proceedings\u2014why\n?</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-aIcuQZGtGmY/XC8TvzN1WAI/AAAAAAABfQM/pli_El5KlcEKDqHKIufCO_179gvI8f4kQCLcBGAs/s1600/doSSwnload.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"255\" data-original-width=\"198\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-aIcuQZGtGmY/XC8TvzN1WAI/AAAAAAABfQM/pli_El5KlcEKDqHKIufCO_179gvI8f4kQCLcBGAs/s320/doSSwnload.png\" width=\"248\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">DIGRESSION:&nbsp;</span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">I WENT TO TAKE DELIVERY OF A BRAND NEW\nCHEMICAL TANKER FROM A EUROPEAN SHIPYARD.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">ALREADY EIGHT SISTER SHIPS WERE DELIVERED AND\nWERE SAILING COMMANDED BY WHITE CAPTAINS.. AND SEVEN MORE WERE IN LINE TO BE\nMADE..<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">ON MY SHIP &nbsp;, BEFORE DELIVERY I FOUND THAN 900 MAJOR DEFICIENCIES.\n<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">ON THIS SHIP ALL MY OFFICERS WERE WHITE.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">THE YARD / MAKERS WERE NONPLUSSED .. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">THEY WOULD OPEN A COMPARTMENT AND ENTER ALONG\nWITH ME\u2014 AND I WOULD FIND THE DEFICIENCIES AT THE SNAP OF A FINGER<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">THEY WANTED TO KNOW HOW I DID IT..<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">I SAID \u201c YOU &nbsp;LOOK , &nbsp;I SEE \u201c</span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/naive-sailor-ship-construction-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/naive-sailor-ship-construction-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">A rabbi named Umberto\nCassuto was involved in fudging the Aleppo Codex in 1943..&nbsp; He corrected the spelling of many words, and\nmade very many corrections to the vowel points and musical notes</span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the colophon of the\nAleppo codex it states, \u201cthis codex was written by the scribe Shlomo Ben Boya\u2019a\nand vocalized and transmitted by Aaron Ben Asher in the year 929 CE.\u201d&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aaron ben Moshe\nBen-Asher was the proofreader and Mesorah authority according to whose\ninstructions the Aleppo Codex (named for the city in Syria where it was kept\nfor many years) was written in the 10th century.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today it is known as the Keter\n(\"Crown\") Aram Tzova. This copy of the Hebrew Bible is the text which\nMaimonides used when he wrote Hilkhot Sefer Torah (\"the Laws of the Torah\nScroll\") in his book Mishneh Torah (\"The book of Jewish law\"),\nand thus gave the Aleppo Codex the seal of supreme and absolute authority.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maimonides wrote,\n\"The codex which we used in these works is the codex known in Egypt, which\nincludes 24 books, which was in Jerusalem ... and was used for editing the\nbooks (of the Bible), and everyone relies on it, because it was edited by\nBen-Asher, who studied it carefully for many years and edited it many times ...\nand I relied on it in the Torah Scroll which I wrote according to it.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Codex was purchased\nby Yisrael Ben Simcha of Basra, and then donated to the Karaite Synagogue in\nJerusalem&nbsp; in approximately 1064 AD.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maimonides had written\nthat song of Moses, with a space in the middle of each line such as that used\nfor a closed section. He also specifies which word should begin each line.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Crowns version of Deuteronomy\n32 which has survived has only 67 lines and the first words of the lines are different\nfrom what Maimonides specified.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you check the copy\nof the Code prepared by Maimonides himself &nbsp;which has survived, the text reads 67 lines! &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If we go on to check\nother ancient manuscripts of the Code we see how \u201ccorrectors\u201d crossed out 67\nand wrote 70 and then changed some of the catch words so as to fit the number.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why do printed versions\nof the Mishneh Torah mandate that the song of Moses must be written in 70 lines\nnot 67?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How did the printed\nversions of Maimonides\u2019 words, according to which the poem is to be written in 70\nlines, come into being?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rabbi Mordechai Breuer\nwas one of the forgers involved with the missing pages of the Aleppo codex.&nbsp; Today, Breuer's version is used authoritatively\nfor the reconstruction of the missing portions of the Aleppo Codex.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Leningrad Codex is the oldest\ncomplete manuscript of the Hebrew Bible in Hebrew, using the Masoretic Text and\nTiberian vocalization.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;It is dated 1008 AD according to its colophon.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nAleppo Codex, against which the Leningrad Codex was corrected, is several\ndecades older, but parts of it have been missing since 1947, making the\nLeningrad Codex the oldest complete codex of the Tiberian mesorah that has\nsurvived intact to this day.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Leningrad Codex (a codex is a\nhandwritten book as opposed to a scroll) is so named because it has been housed\nat the National Library of Russia in Saint Petersburg since 1863.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">AFTER THE BOLSHEVIK\nREVOLUTION THIS CODEX WAS REMOVED FROM RUSSIA FOR A FEW YEARS.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/07/exhuming-dirty-secrets-of-holodomor.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/07/exhuming-dirty-secrets-of-holodomor.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The official propaganda\nis that in 1990, under JEW Gorbachov's glasnost, and after much \u201cdelicate\u201d\nnegotiations , the library permitted foreign photographers to come and\nphotograph this rare document for the<span style=\"background-color: white; color: red;\"> first time.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">They kept repeating the FIRST\nTIME bit.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"></span><br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c7206994839757105565\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-K21mAFisaQ4/XCuD9eWggeI/AAAAAAAAAxk/QFqiPUpjzDAO89d0GcQx651OdcY-nRWYwCK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal;
