THIS IS WHY THEY TEACH SANSKRIT AND MALAYALAM IN GERMANY..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/12/hermann-gundert-hermann-hesse-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIN KANNUR , COMMIES ARE PRAYING TO HERMANN GUNDERT WHO TOOK AWAY OUR SANSKRIT AND MALAYALAM LIBRARIES BY THE SHIPLOAD..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/02/we-hindu-indians-are-proudest-people-on.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE MAN LEFT BEHIND THE SRUTIS ( PART ONE OF VEDAS ) BECAUSE HE THOUGH THEY ARE SHPEHERDS VERSES.. THE POWER OF SRUTIS IS IN THE SOUND..<br />\n<br />\nVEDANTA ( PART FOUR OF VEDAS ) WAS CONVERTED TO WESTERN PHILOSOPHY WITH HALF BAKED KNOWLEDGE.. ONCE THEY STOLE, THE BASTARDS DESTROYED THE ORIGINALS WHICH ARE LOST FOREVER..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Leningrad\ncodex&nbsp; is inextricably bound up with the\nAleppo Codex, which is about a century older but undated. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Leningrad Codex is\nthe oldest complete manuscript of the Tanakh, the 39 books of the Bible<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Leningrad Codex is\na fully vocalized biblical text, assuring correct pronunciation of each word.\nMoreover, it contains all the accent marks (te'amim) above and below the\nletters.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">These accent marks serve three disparate functions: a) they are notes\nfor cantillation of the word; b) they show the part of the word that should be\nstressed or accented; c) they serve as marks for phrasing and punctuation. It\nshould be noted that the handwritten Torah scroll has only the letters of the\nwords and no vowels points or other marks, for no vocalization of the text or\ntrop are permitted on the Torah parchment. Hence, the importance of a fully\nvocalized manuscript like the Leningrad Codex,..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">By virtue of its existence,\nthen, this Codex is the guide for all future handwritten Torahs and printed\neditions of the Bible. This facsimile edition, photographed with great care,\ncontains more than a 1,000 pages<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Codex was acquired\nby a conman named Abraham Firkovich (who offered no details in his letters or\nin his autobiography as to where he got it) and then sold it to the then St.\nPetersburg Imperial Library.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">According to its\ncolophon, the codex was copied in Cairo &nbsp;from manuscripts written by Aaron ben Moses\nben Asher. Unusual for a masoretic codex, the same man (Samuel ben Jacob) wrote\nthe consonants, the vowels and the Masoretic notes.).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Its letter-text\ncontradicts its own masoretic apparatus in many hundreds of places&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">There are numerous alterations and erasures.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This Hebrew Bible Biblia\nHebraica Stuttgartensia is a copy ( 1977 AD ) of the Masoretic Text as recorded\nin the Leningrad Codex.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">For minute masoretic\ndetails, however, Israeli and Jewish scholars have shown a marked preference\nfor modern Hebrew editions based upon the Aleppo Codex. These editions use the\nLeningrad Codex as the most important source (but not the only one) for the\nreconstruction of parts of the Aleppo Codex that have been missing since 1947.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>The Leningrad codex is\nwritten on parchment and bound in leather<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: large;\"><b>The Leningrad Codex, in\nextraordinarily pristine condition after a millennium defying the laws of oxidation.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Although in 1991, after\nthe dissolution of the Soviet Union, the city's original name was restored to\nSt Petersburg, the National Library of Russia requested that\n\"Leningrad\" be retained in the name of the codex.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">AFTER ALL LENIN WAS A\nJEW<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>SOMEBODY ASKED ME \u2013IS THE\nLENINGRAD CODEX FORGED ?<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>INDEED IT IS !<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">FIRST OF ALL AFTER THE\nBOLSHEVIK REVOLUTION THE LENINGRAD CODEX DISAPPEARED FOR A WHILE FROM RUSSIA.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The codex is now\npreserved in the National Library of Russia, accessioned as \"Firkovich B\n19 A\".&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Its former owner, the Crimean Karaite\ncollector JEW Abraham Firkovich, left no indication in his writings where he\nhad acquired the codex, which was taken to Odessa in 1838 and later transferred\nto the Imperial Library in St Petersburg.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Firkovich was a liar and\nforger of the first order as per Abraham Harkavy who was&nbsp; head of the Oriental Division in the Imperial\nPublic Library, Russia.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c555703686534717760\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6VOqqm-hCbM/XCa06XjAUxI/AAAAAAABfL4/E3K2A6jHNG0XTf7_mZb9kjj9WxD3GwmzQCK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/god-code-by-timothy-paul-smith-damning.html?showComment=1546626441588#c555703686534717760\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 4, 2019 at 11:57 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nQUOTE: The Leningrad Codex, in extraordinarily pristine condition after a millennium defying the laws of oxidation : UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/god-code-by-timothy-paul-smith-damning.html</span><br />\n<br />\nSOMEBODY ASKED TO EXPOUND ON THIS OXIDATION PART.<br />\n<br />\nNOWADATS EDIBLE FOOD IN PACKAGES ARE PRESERVED BY DANGEROUS , TOXIC AND CARCINOGENIC CHEMICALS<br />\n<br />\nFOOD GETS SPOILT BY OXIDATION\u2014THAT IS WHY THERE IS A EXPIRY DATE<br />\n<br />\nOxidative rancidity is a major cause of food quality deterioration, leading to the formation of undesirable off-flavours as well as unhealthful compounds.<br />\n<br />\nVirgin coconut oil gets racid very fast.. To prevent that reduce the contact of oil with atmospheric air, by storing full in narrow neck bottles , with sufficient room for expansion while freezing.<br />\n<br />\nOn Chemical tankers we carry vegetable oils like olive / corn oil which get spoilt fast by oxidation .. We pad the stainless steel tank with nitrogen..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/06/nitrogen-on-chemical-tankers-capt-ajit.html<br /><br />https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/08/nitrogen-padding-from-ashore-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWHEN WE CARRY RED AND WHITE WINE N CHEMICAL TANKERS WE OVERFILL THE TANK WITHOUT THE MANDATORY 2% FOR EXPANSION..<br />\n<br />\nIf fats oxidize, they produce \u201coff\u201d odors and flavors (stale, rancid odors). Often, if fats oxidize, vitamins also oxidize and lose their activity. If pigments oxidize, they can change color completely. For example, red meat turns gray when the myoglobin pigment oxidizes..<br />\nVacuum sealing provides food an air-tight environment, preventing the crystals that cause freezer burn from forming on your food. Vacuum sealing keeps the moisture in your food for an extended period of time, allowing you to enjoy food that tastes fresh months after you have stored it..<br />\n<br />\nVacuum sealers preserve food by preventing the growth of mold or bacteria. Vacuum sealing deprives your food of oxygen. Mold and bacteria cannot grow without oxygen.<br />\n<br />\nThe shelf life of your food is greatly extended when you vacuum seal it. Vacuum sealing food preserves it 5 times longer than food stored in plastic containers or bags. Vacuum sealing holds in the moisture, juices, and flavor of the food. You\u2019ll notice the difference in taste.<br />\n<br />\nVacuum-packing is commonly used for storing nuts to reduce the loss of flavor from oxidation.<br />\n<br />\nI always but vacuum sealed peanuts and cashew nuts.<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE SENT THE OZONE BLOGPOST BELOW TO PMO AND JP NADDA AT LEAST 30 TIMES..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/06/unsung-ozone-for-instant-prevention-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWHO CARES.<br />\n<br />\nMODIs MINISTERS EXIST TO GIVE HIM EGO MASSAGE<br />\n<br />\nMODI EXISTS TO ENSURE HE WILL GET RE-ELECTED IN 2019 , AND HE CONCENTRATES ON NURTURING HIS VOTE BANK.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-JGosXVtN4z0/XDBW-czH8nI/AAAAAAABfQ0/iVCldcfBhPk5EzECniFINMIWf0MPaZnQQCLcBGAs/s1600/AraEbiJc-Dialects-Map.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"1292\" data-original-width=\"1600\" height=\"516\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-JGosXVtN4z0/XDBW-czH8nI/AAAAAAABfQ0/iVCldcfBhPk5EzECniFINMIWf0MPaZnQQCLcBGAs/s640/AraEbiJc-Dialects-Map.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c3238357218321332677\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6VOqqm-hCbM/XCa06XjAUxI/AAAAAAABfL4/E3K2A6jHNG0XTf7_mZb9kjj9WxD3GwmzQCK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/god-code-by-timothy-paul-smith-damning.html?showComment=1546649872426#c3238357218321332677\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 5, 2019 at 6:27 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME\u2026<br />\n<br />\nNOBODY HAS BEEN ABLE TO FIGURE OUT THAT THE KINGDOM OF DHOFAR ( SOUTH OF OMAN /NORTH OF YEMEN ) WAS OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING FOR MILLENNIUMS AS PART OF THE DANAVA CIVILIZATION.<br />\n<br />\nHOW DID I FIGURE IT OUT?<br />\n<br />\nJERUSALEM/ CONSTANTINOPLE/ CAIRO/ ALEXANDRIA/ ROME / ATHENS ALL WERE CONTROLLED FROM MALABAR , THE RICHEST AND MOST LITERATE PART OF THE PLANET IN ANCIENT TIMES..<br />\n<br />\nI KNOW JEW ROTHSCHILDs SIGNATURE.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS WHY I AM ABLE TO EXHUME LONG BURIED HISTORY.<br />\n<br />\nTHE \" AD TRIBE \" MENTIONED 25 TIMES IN THE KORAN ARE MALAYALI BLOOD OF THE KINGDOM OF DHOFAR OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING.<br />\n<br />\nTHE MEHRI TRIBE ARE STILL HINDUS..<br />\n<br />\nPORTS OF SALALAH ( OMAN ), GWADAR (PAKISTAN ) AND MORI ( SOCOTRA ) BELONGED TO THE CALICUT KING...<br />\nMECCA OASIS WAS OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING WHERE HE HAD A SHIVA TEMPLE , DOUBLING UP AS A CUSTOMS OUTPOST FOR SPICES COMING OUT OF SALALAH TO PALESTINE/ SYRIA..<br />\n<br />\nMORI WAS USED DURING SW MONSOON AS A TRANSHIPMENT PORT...<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD SEND A SAYYID MESSIAH ( FAKE CRYPTO JEW DESCENDANT OF MOHAMMAD ) TO NORTH MALABAR TO DRIVE A WEDGE BETWEEN MAPPILA MUSLIMS AND HINDUS..<br />\n<br />\nSAYYID ALAVI THANGAL WAS AN AL KATHIRI MUSLIM CONVERT-- WHO WAS RABIDLY ANTI-HINDU . ..HIS DARGAH AT MAMBARAM IS NOW A PILGRIMAGE CENTRE FOR MUSLIMS..<br />\n<br />\nTHE AL KATHIRI TRIBE ( BANU HAMDAN TRIBE OF YEMEN ) WERE MAINLY MAPPILA HINDUS BEFORE ISLAM WAS BORN.--WHO TRANSPORTED SPICES OVERLAND BY CAMEL VIA MECCA OASIS ..<br />\n<br />\nSAYYID FAZAL POOKOYA THANGAL , THE SON OF YEMENI MUSLIM SAYYID ALAVI THANGAL WAS MADE THE RULER OF DHOFAR BY JEW ROTHSCHILD.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS FELLOW KILLED CALICUT BRITISH COLLECTOR HV CONOLLY. HE WAS DRIVEN AWAY WITHIN A FEW MONTHS BY OMANI PEOPLE.. LATER, I WILL DEDICATE A FULL POST TO HV CONOLLY WHO WAS THE BRITISH COLLECTOR AT CALICUT ( MY HOMETOWN ).<br />\nA MUSLIM BEING MADE KING OF DHOFAR --BY JEW ROTHSCHILD ? THIS WAS A REWARD FOR DRIVING A WEDGE BETWEEN MUSLIM CONVERT KERALA MAPPILAS AND KERALA HINDUS.<br />\n<br />\nTHE STATE OF DHOFAR WAS INHABITED AND CONTROLLED BY MAPPILAS --BEFORE ISLAM WAS BORN<br />\n<br />\nTHE MAPPILAS WERE HALF BREEDS -- HINDU KERALA MOTHER AND HINDU ARAB FATHER.. THE CURRENT SULTAN OF OMAN IS OF MAPPILA DESCENT..<br />\n<br />\nEVEN TODAY THE SURROUNDING OF SLALAH LOOK LIKE KERALA.. HOLY FERTILE TOP SOIL WAS EXPORTED FROM KERALA TO MAKE THIS AREA A MINI KERALA ( OUTSIDE INDIA).. DHOFAR IN OMAN WAS ALSO KNOWN AS SHEBA IN ANCIENT TIME, BECAUSE IT WAS PART OF THE MAINLAND KINGDOM OF SHEBA ( MALABAR/ NORTH KERALA )..<br />\n<br />\nTHE MAPPILAS WERE IN CHARGE OF THE SPICE CAMEL CARAVAN OVERLAND FOR TRANSPORTING SPICES FROM SALALAH TO THE WEST COAST OF PALESTINE/ SYRIA .<br />\n<br />\nFROM PALESTINE / SYRIA SPICES WENT TO EUROPE BY SHIP.<br />\n<br />\nON THIS OVERLAND ROUTE WAS THE WATERING MECCA OASIS FOR CAMELS TO DRINK WATER.<br />\nTHE BLACK STONE OF KAABA ON SE PART 5 FEET ABOVE THE GROUND WAS THE SHIVA LINGAM UPROOTED FROM THIS SHIVA TEMPLE --BY MOHAMMAD THE PROPHET. HIS FATHER ( SEMITE ) WAS THE YOUNGER BROTHER OF THE NAMBOODIRI PRIEST ( ARYAN ) OF MECCA SHIVA TEMPLE.<br />\n<br />\nIT HAPPENED DURING A FLOOD AND THE SHIVA LINGAM ( BLACK METERORITE STONE ) WAS SUBMERGED BY WATER.. IN SANATANA DHARMA UPROOTING A SHIVA LINGAM FROM ITS SPOT IS BLASPHEMY. MOHAMMAD UPROOTED THE BACK STONE AND INSTALLED IT HORIZONTALLY ABOVE WATER KICK STARTING A NEW RELIGION..<br />\n<br />\nIN BAHUBALI MOVIE YOU CAN SEE THE HERO UPROOTING THE SHIVA LINGAM AND CARRYING IT ON HIS SHOULDERS SO THAT HIS MOTHER DOES NOT HAVE TO WALK TOO FAR TO WORSHIP.. THIS IS NOT ALLOWED. IN SANATANA DHARMA WE BUILD A TEMPLE OVER THE STONE ..<br />\n<br />\nWE DON\u2019T BUILD A SHIVA TEMPLE AND INSTALL A STONE INSIDE.. THE SPOT IS PARAMOUNT. THAT IS WHY YOU SEE SHIVA TEMPLES IN GODFORSAKEN FAR AWAY PLACES.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/06/6000-year-old-kedarnath-temple-highest.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE DHOFAR KINGDOM ALSO INCLUDED THE PORT OF GWADAR ( BALOCHISTAN ) -WHERE THERE WAS A SHAKTIPEETH DEVI TEMPLE WITH ETERNAL FIRE.. LIKE BAKU, THERE WAS A TEMPLE AT GWADAR WITH ETERNAL FLAME ( SATIs HEAD FELL HERE) .. THIS TEMPLE WAS SWALLOWED UP BY AN UPHEAVAL..<br />\n<br />\nWHY DID THE CALICUT KING HAVE TO HAVE A SPICE OUTLET POST AT GWADAR BALOCHISTAN ?<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c3238357218321332677-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c3238357218321332677-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c5217587460192209094\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/god-code-by-timothy-paul-smith-damning.html?showComment=1546649944809#c5217587460192209094\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 5, 2019 at 6:29 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN INDIA COULD NOT BE APPROACHED FROM THE WEST UNLESS IT WAS BY SEA ROUTE OR BY \" TRAVERSING THROUGH TWO SECRET NARROW PASSES BOLAN AND KHYBER OF THE HINDU KUSH MOUNTAIN RANGE \"<br />\n<br />\nIN CERTAIN AREAS OF THE 54 KM KHYBER PASS ONLY ONE HORSE COULD PASS.<br />\n<br />\nIN BOLAN PASS , CERTAIN AREAS HAD TO BE SWUM --EVEN HORSES SWAM..<br />\n<br />\nGWADAR WAS A EASIER OVERLAND SPICE ROUTE TO BLACK SEA ..CIRCUMVENTING THE DEADLY HINDU KUSH MOUNTAIN RANGE..<br />\n<br />\nMECCA / PETRA / MADEIN SALEH / DAMASACUS / JERULALEM / SALALAH / MALINDI / MORI ( SOCOTRA ) / BATUMI (GEORGIA )WERE ALL SPICE OUTPOSTS OF THE CALICUT KING<br />\n<br />\nFROM GWADAR SPICES WENT BY OVERLAND ROUTE TO BATUMI ( GEORGIA ) AND THEN CONSTANTINOPLE.. CONSTANTINOPLE WAS CREATED AND NAMED AFTER CONSTANTINE THE GREAT WHO COOKED UP JESUS CHRIST IN 325 AD AT THE FIRST COUNCIL OF NICEA..<br />\n<br />\nFROM THE SEA PORTS OF PALESTINE WHITE JEWS TOOK OVER THE SPICES TO BE TAKEN IN SHIPS TO EUROPE.. THESE SHIPS WERE OWNED FIRST BY THE FAMILY OF PORTUGUESE JEWESS GRACIA MENDES NASI AND GERMAN JEW ROTHSCHILD..<br />\n<br />\nSHIPS OF JEWESS GRACIA MENDES NASI FAMILY LOADED SPICES FROM CONSTANTINOPLE ( TURKEY ) FOR SALE IN EUROPE<br />\n<br />\nTHESE PORTS IN ISRAEL/ TURKEY / GEORGIA PROSPERED AS SPICES WERE MORE VALUABLE THAN GOLD THOSE DAYS --WHEN THERE WAS NO REFRIGERATION AND MEAT BECAME PUTRID..<br />\n<br />\nTHE CALICUT KING OWNED THE FERTILE PART OF SOCOTRA S ISLAND IN ANCIENT TIMES FOR HIS ALOE VERA/ FRANKINCENSE CULTIVATION -- AND FOR CHANGING/ RESTING HIS RELAY PIGEONS ( FAX )...<br />\n<br />\nALEXANDER HE GREAT WAS ASKED BY PORUS TO COLLECT ALOE VERA FOR HIS INTERNAL WOUNDS AT SOCOTRA ON THE WAY BACK FROM INDIA TO GREECE.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/05/alexander-great-and-king-porus-hidden.html</span><br />\n<br />\nSOCOTRA WAS PART OF HIS DHOFAR KINGOM.. THE KING HAS NOT CEDED AWAY HIS RIGHTS AND HENCE THIS ISLAND BELONGS TO INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nTHE \" AD TRIBE \" OF SOCOTRA IS MENTIONED 25 TIMES IN THE KORAN ARE MALAYALI BLOOD OF THE KINGDOM OF DHOFAR OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING. THE MEHRI TRIBE ARE STILL HINDUS..<br />\n<br />\nSAYYID FAZAL POOKOYA THANGALs FATHER SAYYID ALAVI THANGAL ( A KORAN EXPERT AT AGE 8 \u2013 AND WHO WAS FLUENT IN MALAYALAM ) FROM DHOFAR , WAS FIRST INTRODUCED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD AT THE AGE OF 17 AS A 30TH DESCENDANT OF MOHAMMAD THE PROPHET .<br />\n<br />\nHE WAS MADE TO MARRY A LOCAL MALAYALI GIRL FATIMA THE DAUGHTER OF THE QAZI OF TIRUR. ALL THIS WAS KNOWS WELL IN ADVANCE TO ALL MUSLIMS OF MALABAR \u2013 AS A DIVINE PREDICTION. ROTHSCHILDs MEDIA ALSO DID THEIR PROPAGANDA \u201cTHE MESSIAHIS COMING \u201c<br />\n<br />\nAFTER FATIMA 1 DIED HE MARRIED ANOTHER MALAYALI GIRL FATIMA 2 , THE DAUGHTER OF SAYYID ABOOBACKER MADANI FROM CHEMANCHERI -QUILANDY ( MY FATHERs VILAGE \u2013 JUST 24 KM FROM CALICUT).<br />\n<br />\nLIKE HOW WE ALL IN INDIA KNEW HOW MESSIAH GANDHI WOULD COME FROM SOUTH AFRICA SIX MONTHS BEFOREHAND \u2013 WE IN KERALA KNEW ABOUT A ISLAMIC MESSIAH A REVERED DESCENDANT OF COMING FROM DHOFAR A YEAR BEFORE HE ARRIVED AT CALICUT ( MY HOMETOWN )\u2014ALL THANKS TO JEW ROTHSCHILD..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nHIS UNCLES HASAN JIFRI AND SHEIKH JIFRI WENT ON FOOT EDUCATING ALL HALF BREED MAPPILAS THAT A MESSIAH , THE DESCENDANT OF MOHAMMAD WOULD SOON ARRIVE AT CALICUT FRO MECCA AFTER A YEAR<br />\n<br />\nTODAY JEW KING OF SAUDI ARABIA , ( THE AL SAUD DYNASTY) AND ALL OIL RICH KINGS OF THE GULG KINGDOMS -- ALL CLAIM TO BE DESCENDANTS OF PROPHET MOHAMMAD \u2013THEY HAVE JEW ROTHSCHIDs PERMISSION TO TELL SO.<br />\n<br />\nRead all 5 parts of the post below\u2014<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/04/lawrence-of-arabia-truth-exhumed-capt.html<br />\n<br />\nFAROOQ ABDULLAHs MOTHER AKBAR JEHAN WAS THE WIFE OF JEW LAWRENCE . HER FATHER WAS AN ANEGNT OF FRENCH ROTHSCHILD \u2013A JEW HOTELIER NAMED MICHAEL HARRY NEDOU . OMAR ABDULLAHs MOTHER IS A BRITISH JEWESS NURSE NAMED MOLLY.<br />\n<br />\nMAJJA HAI\u2014KISSI KOH KUCHCH NAHIN PATHA. SHEIKH ABDULLAR AND NEHRU LOOKED SAME SAME IN THEIR YOUNG AGE .<br />\n<br />\nAS PREDICTED THE 17 YEAR OLD HANDSOME YOUTH ALAVI THANGAL ARRIVED , AND DAZZLED ALL WITH HIS EXPERT KNOWLEDGE ON KORAN. HE WAS SORT OF ZAKIR NAIK MULTIPLIED BY MILLION .<br />\n<br />\nHE SETTLED DOWN WITH HIS WIFE FATIMA 1 AT MAMBARAM<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c5217587460192209094-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c4618661250349139556\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/god-code-by-timothy-paul-smith-damning.html?showComment=1546649990404#c4618661250349139556\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 5, 2019 at 6:29 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\nMAMBARAM JAMA MASJID IS NOW THE LARGEST ISLAMIC PILRIMAGE CENTRE FOR INDIAN MUSLIMS. AFTER FATIMA 2 DIED SAYYID ALAVI THANGAL MARRIED ANOTHER LOCAL MALAYALI GIRL NAMED AYIDHA.<br />\n<br />\nSAYYID FAZAL POOKOYA THANGALWAS BORN TO FATIMA 2 . AFTER AYIDHA DIED SAYYID ALAVI THANGAL TOOK A MALAYALI WIFE SWALAIHA FROM INDONESIA.<br />\n<br />\nThe following are major mophla outrages under the inspiration of Sayyid Alavi Thangal ( under instructions from Jew Rothschild )<br />\nEranad riot in November 20, 1836<br />\nEranad riot in April 15, 1837<br />\nParuthan riot in April 19<br />\n<br />\nIn 1848 when son Fazal Pookoya Thangal returned from Mecca, there was massive bloodshed at Manjeri where Hindus lost their ancestral lands to half breed Arab Mappilas.. The Kollathoor revolt ( land grabbing from Hindus ) broke out on 22 August 1851. In this rebellion seven major landowners were killed by Mappilas.<br />\n<br />\nThen came the Mattanur revolt\u2014again land grabbing. Rothschild said enough and send Fazal Pookoya Thangal as King of Dhofar.<br />\n<br />\nBefore the advent of Islam all Mappillas of Dhofar were Hindus . Dhofar was owned by the Calicut king Even today this place looks exactly like North Kerala. These Hindu Mappilas ran the overland camel caravans from Aden port and Salalah port to Mecca, Petra, Madein Saleh, Jeruselam etc for thousands of years<br />\n<br />\nCalicut collector HV Conolly wrote that father Mamburam Alavi Thangal Thangal was the spearhead of land grabbing in Kerala and rebellions from 1849-1852 and son Fazal Pookoya Thangal led the bloody revolts against Hindus from 1849 1852 .<br />\n<br />\nCollector HV Conolly was asked by Jew Rothschild to release Fazal Pookoya Thangal from jail \u2013and that he would be deported on Rothschild\u2019s ship.<br />\n<br />\nFazal Thangal was allowed to transfer his personal grabbed landed property of Mamburam to his sister's husband, Sayyid Alavi Jifri.<br />\n<br />\nOn the night of 19 March 1852 he left Calicut with 61 of his family and servants on Rothschild\u2019s ship to Salalah ( kingdowm of Dhofar ).<br />\n<br />\nFazal Thangal left instructions that Collector of Calicut HV Conolly should be murdered .<br />\n<br />\nIt was a bloody gruesome murder where white Englishman Conolly ( who made the Kanoli canal of Calicut ) was hacked to death in the presence of his wife when he was relaxing with a post dinner brandy and cigar with his wife.<br />\n<br />\nOnce If took my wife to see the grave of HV Conolly at English Church Nadakavvu Calicut ( where we park our car when we buy fish )..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD INTRODUCED HUNDREDS OF FAKE CRYPTO JEW SAYYIDS ALL OVER THE MIDDLE EAST AND INDIA .. SAYYIDS ARE MEANT TO BE&nbsp;DESCENDANTS OF MOHAMMAD AND WIELD ENORMOUS POWER BY VIRTUE OF THIS FAKE BLOODLINE.<br />\n<br />\nLATER ANOTHER FAKE SAYYID NAMED MOHAMMAD ALI JAUHAR ( CRYPTO JEW ) WOULD COME TO KERALA WITH GANDHI TO KICK START ANOTHER REIGN OF TERROR BY MUSLIMS AGAINST HINDUS ( MOPLAH REVOLT ) \u2026<br />\n<br />\nMOHAMMAD ALI ROAD IN MUMBAI IS NAMED AFTER THIS JEW.. I HAVE SEEN HIS KOSHER GRAVE IN JERUSALEM..<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">THE STAR OF DAVID ( SIX\nPOINTED STAR ) WAS AN </span><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px;\">ANCIENT</span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;HINDU SYMBOL ,&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px;\">MILLENNIUMS</span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;BEFORE THE TIMES OF\nMOSES / DAVID AND SOLOMON.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><br /></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>When the insentient\nPrakriti ( triangle) comes in contact with the sentient Purusha ( inverted\ntriangle ) &nbsp;, the universe evolves. &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>Purusha is also termed Shiva , while Prakriti\nis also termed Shakti. &nbsp;Purusha\nsymbolizes consciousness, the masculine principle. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><br /></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Prakriti symbolizes the\nfeminine principle, the activating energy. &nbsp;The cosmos in all its manifestations, as an\nact of love. &nbsp;</b></span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>The union of Shakti (\nprakriti ) with Shiva ( purusha ) by Kundalini rise&nbsp; is the liberation of seeker from the cycle of\nendless birth and death</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><b>.</b><o:p></o:p></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>THE WHITE JEW WILL NOT\nBE ABLE TO UNDERSTAND IT\u2014 AS HIS MIND IS SHALLOW.</b></span></span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>COME ON WHITE JEWS-- TAKE THIS AS A CEREBRAL CHALLENGE&nbsp;</b></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_14.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_14.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_20.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_20.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>ABOVE THREE POSTS HAVE\nBEEN PENNED FOR THE LCD &nbsp;( LOWEST COMMON\nDENOMINATOR HALF-WITS ) <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><br /></b></div>\n<b><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>WHEN I SAY THAT ALL\nRELIGIONS OF THE PLANET COMBINED TOGETHER IS A DROP OF DIRTY STAGNANT WATER, &nbsp;&nbsp;WHILE SANATANA DHARMA ( PAGANISM/ HINDUISM )\nIS THE ENDLESS PRISTINE MIGHTY OCEAN, I MEAN WHAT I SAY..</b></span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ZIONISTS HAVE TRIED TO\nMAKE JUDEANS SYNONYMOUS WITH JEWS .. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT WONT WORK.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TO MAKE IT WORK FAKE\nARTIFACTS WERE PLANTED BY JEWS ALL OVER PALETINE AND NEIGHBORING NATIONS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ANCIENT JUDEANS WERE\nHINDUS ( PAGANS ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THEY CONVERTED JACOBs\nFOURTH SON TO BE JUDAH..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Below is the bull --<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE: Judah (Hebrew:Standard\nY\u0259huda Tiberian Yehu\u1e0f\u0101) was, according to the Book of Genesis, the fourth son\nof Jacob and Leah, the founder of the Israelite Tribe of Judah. By extension,\nhe is indirectly eponymous of the Kingdom of Judah, the land of Judea and the\nword \"Jew\". : UNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cAnd she conceived\nagain, and bare a son: and she said, Now will I praise the Lord: therefore she\ncalled his name Judah\u201d (Genesis 29:35).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The phrase the King\nJames Bible renders \u201cwill I praise\u201d is o-DEH, which really means \u201cwill I\nthank\u201d.&nbsp; &nbsp;If the name is a concatenation of yehu, an\nabbreviated form of the divine name, and udah, the verb \u201cthank,\u201d which would\nmean the name means \u201cThank God.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The oldest English use\nof \u201cJew\u201d on record, according to the Oxford English Dictionary is from roughly\n1275: \u201cPilates hym onswerede, am ich Gyv enne?\u201d It is a translation taken from\nthe New Testament: \"Pilate answered, Am I a Jew?\" (John 18:35).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eventually, in the 17th\ncentury, the letter J appeared in English as a way to distinguish between i\npronounced as we do, which comes from Germanic sources (e.g., island) and those\nof French origin, pronounced like a soft G. Since \"Jew\" fell into\nthis latter category, it began to be spelled with a J.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THERE WAS NO LETTER J\nTILL THE 17<sup>TH</sup> CENTURY<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Christian Bible,\na Jew, or Judean, is not defined as someone \u201cin the tribe of Judah\u201d.&nbsp; &nbsp;A\nJudean was one who was born in the ancient independent and separate kingdom of\nJudea, a person loyal to the king of Judea, an inhabitant of the kingdom of\nJudea, and/or one having citizenship rights in the kingdom of Judea.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The title, that Pilate\nwrote, which was put on the cross, and which was written in Latin, stated\n\u201cIesus Nazarenus rex Iudaeorum\u201d&nbsp; (John\n19:19, Latin Vulgate).&nbsp; This translates\ninto English as \u201cJesus the Nazarene King of the Judeans\u201d. Jesus never existed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2 Kings 16:5-7\nindicates that the northern kingdom of Israel was at war with the southern kingdom\nof Judea before 732 B.C.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hebrew term Yehudi &nbsp;occurs 74 times in the Masoretic text of the\nHebrew Bible.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindu king Herod the\nGreat ( 74 BC to 4 BC ) was a Roman client king of Judea.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-9gF2jZbVa4o/XDAgZUsm3BI/AAAAAAABfQk/LnuaLlNtG1YhoRgVSvMjPgsvdhIudP0gwCLcBGAs/s1600/dowfffffnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"283\" data-original-width=\"178\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-9gF2jZbVa4o/XDAgZUsm3BI/AAAAAAABfQk/LnuaLlNtG1YhoRgVSvMjPgsvdhIudP0gwCLcBGAs/s400/dowfffffnload.jpg\" width=\"251\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>ATMA becomes ADAM</b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>JIVA becomes EVE<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>TEE HEEEEEEE&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Tree of Jiva and\nAtman appears in the Vedic srutis ( 400 centuries old on oral route ) scriptures, as a\nmetaphysical metaphor concerning the soul.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The Rig Veda samhita 1.164.20-22,\nMundaka Upanishad 3.1.1-2, and Svetasvatara Upanisad 4.6-7, speak of two birds,\none perched on the branch of the tree, which signifies the body, and eating its\nfruit, the other merely watching.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nfirst bird represents a Jiva, or individual self, or soul. She has a female\nnature, being a shakti, an energy of God. When the jiva becomes distracted by\nthe fruits (signifying sensual pleasure), she momentarily forgets her lord and\nlover and tries to enjoy the fruit independently of him.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This separating\nforgetfulness is maha-maya, or enthrallment, spiritual death, and constitutes\nthe fall of the jiva into the world of material birth, death, disease and old\nage.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The second bird is the\nParamatman, an aspect of God who accompanies every living being in the heart\nwhile she remains in the material world. He is the support of all beings and is\nbeyond sensual pleasure.&nbsp; This concept of\nAtman and Jiva have been personified and taken into the Bible as Adam and Eve\nand the fall of man.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0928\u093e\u092f\u092e\u093e\u0924\u094d\u092e\u093e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092a\u094d\u0930\u0935\u091a\u0928\u0947\u0928</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0932\u092d\u094d\u092f\u094b</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0928</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092e\u0947\u0927\u092f\u093e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0928</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092c\u0939\u0941\u0928\u093e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0936\u094d\u0930\u0941\u0924\u0947\u0928\u0964</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092f\u092e\u0947\u0935\u0948\u0937</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0935\u0943\u0923\u0941\u0924\u0947</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0924\u0947\u0928</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0932\u092d\u094d\u092f\u0938\u094d\u0924\u0938\u094d\u092f\u0948\u0937</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0906\u0924\u094d\u092e\u093e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0935\u093f\u0935\u0943\u0923\u0941\u0924\u0947</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0924\u0928\u0942\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0938\u094d\u0935\u093e\u092e\u094d\u0964</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0964</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3.2.3</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0964\u0964</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>&nbsp; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the second century\nA.D., after crushing the last Jewish revolt, the Romans first applied the name\nPalaestina to Judea (the southern portion of what is now called the West Bank)\nin an attempt to minimize Jewish identification with the land of Israel. The\nArabic word \"Filastin\" is derived from this Latin name.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; In\none chapter he writes:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Our Noah- is thus\nNH (pr NOE) which the Jews since pronounced NUH, and even Mnuh! Exactly the\nsame name as given him by the Hindus! And all meaning repose, with many\ncollateral meanings, lawgiver, collecting people, assembly humanity &amp; c.\nThe laws of MANU are preserved by the Hindus : to him is also ascribed the\nsubstance of the Vedas, and the whole Mosaic history till near his own death.\nBut the Hindus have many- M'nus ; Adam and Seth were such, by the names of\nAdimo and Satya.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Is the soul immortal?\nThe Bible says no.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THERE IS NO RIDICULOUS\nNOAHs ARC CARRYING MALE AND FEMALE CREATURES IN HINDUISM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE HAVE DNA SEED FROM\nSHIVA LINGAM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/nasa-dna-building-blocks-in-meteorite.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/nasa-dna-building-blocks-in-meteorite.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Flavius Philostratus\nhad written clearly that Apollonius is the real messiah and Damisa was the real\nPaul \u2013in the cooked up broth of The First Council of Nicea of 325 AD .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Damius was pretty\nshallow minded and never seemed to comprehend the deeper mysteries that\nApollonius of Tyana taught.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Damisa wrote that most\nmortals greet a newcomer by asking questions about his life, but the priests of\nIndia greet him instead by telling him about his life. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The notebooks of Damisa\nsuggest the psychic and spiritual powers of the Indian sages -they could tell\nthe past and future, see events at a distance, and read the past lives of men.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Nero expelled the\nphilosophers from Rome in 66 AD (the year of St Peter' s martyrdom), Apollonius\nleft and traveled to COROBA Spain. By the 4th century, however, the view of\nApollonius as a worker of miracles became a matter of acrimonious debate. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Christianity had become\nan established religion and the Church Fathers had begun to accord Jesus status\nas \"the only Son of God\". Neither Karma or immortality of the soul or\nreincarnation nor the miracles of Apollonius had any place in their philosophy.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All mortals\nautomatically were sinners and only the grace of the Catholic church could save\nthem and give them THE MORTAL SOUL a passage to heaven.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The initial crusaders had\nit in their mission to seek out the book of Philostratus about Apollonius and\ndestroy it. The book had been secretly carried to the Near East for safety; and\nfor over a thousand years it was preserved among the Arabians, in spite of all\nefforts of the Crusaders - in the interest of the Papacy - to destroy it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cSo well did the\nVatican succeed that, though while after the appearance of Blount's first\nEnglish translation of Philostratus' biography of Apollonius at the\ncommencement of the Nineteenth Century, his name was on every cultured\nEnglishman's tongue; today, over a century later, he is almost completely\nunknown, even in academic circles, mention of him having been omitted from\nhistorical works and from the educational curricula - so that, paradoxical\nthough it may seem, the greatest man of the western world during the past two\nthousand years has been completely removed from the pages of history\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Apollonius\u2019s power can\nbe seen from the fact that he has predicted in writing the date , and hour\nEmperor Domitian would die and that Nerva would be the next Emperor. Nerva was\nproclaimed Emperor solely on the initiative of the Pagan Roman Senate, within a\nhour after the assassination. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Following the accession\nof Nerva as emperor, the Senate passed damnatio memoriae on Domitian: his coins\nand statues were melted, his arches were torn down and his name was erased from\nall public records. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The huge palace which\nDomitian had erected on the Palatine Hill, known as the Flavian Palace, was\nrenamed the \"House of the People\" .&nbsp;\nNerva publicly swore that no senators would be put to death as long as\nhe remained in office.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indian intellectual\nPalamedes was stoned to death by Odysseus and he did NOT find a place in\nHomer's Iliad. Odysseus held Palamedes responsible for sending him to the\nTrojan War.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kerala Hindu sage Palamedes\nwas one of the heroes before Troy, who invented the Greek letters. Palamedes\nhad a reputation for sagacity, and the ancients attributed a number of\ninventions to him, including the alphabet, numbers, weights and measures,\ncoinage, board games, and the practice of eating at regular intervals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capt. font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Siloam Inscription,\ndiscovered in 1880, is written on the wall of Hezekiah's tunnel, which connects\nGihon spring to the Pool of Siloam in East Jerusalem.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; see 2 Kings 20:20; 2 Chron 32:20)\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; It connects\nthe Gihon Spring\u2014Jerusalem\u2019s fresh water supply\u2014with the Siloam Pool.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">According to 2\nChronicles 32:2\u20134 and 2 Kings 20:20, this tunnel was dug during the reign of\nKing Hezekiah of Judah to prepare Jerusalem for the imminent attack of the\nAssyrian king, Sennacherib<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; This was too much of a kosher LIE to\nsupport !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The FAKE &nbsp;Jehoash Tablet, also known as the \u201cBedek\nHabayit\u201d inscription, is back in the hands of con-man &nbsp;Tel Aviv collector Oded Golan<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Jehoash tablet is a\nblack stone about 12 inches long, 10 inches wide and just over 3 inches thick,\nchiseled with 15 lines of ancient Hebrew script similar to a passage from the\nSecond Book of Kings, Chapter 12, recording repairs made to the Temple in\nJerusalem by King Jehoash around 800 BCE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-aYcEIXQOci4/XDGpFSfqzwI/AAAAAAABfSE/opVaU0lXFLcz1_Sw1RYQRqgM9e9UxLbRQCLcBGAs/s1600/bsba290SS503900l.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"600\" data-original-width=\"514\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-aYcEIXQOci4/XDGpFSfqzwI/AAAAAAABfSE/opVaU0lXFLcz1_Sw1RYQRqgM9e9UxLbRQCLcBGAs/s640/bsba290SS503900l.jpg\" width=\"548\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The stone tablet that\npurports to have been commissioned by Jehoash, the ninth-century B.C.E. king of\nJudah, raised questions from the start. The first line of the inscription is\nmissing, including the name Jehoash; the top of the plaque is broken off.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nfirst letter of Ahaziah (Ahazyahu in Hebrew) with which the inscription now\nbegins is also missing. Since Ahaziah was the father of Jehoash, however, this\nis enough for scholars to reconstruct the missing first line of the inscription\nto read \u201cI am Jehoash son of A-.\u201d And therefore the plaque has become known as\nthe Jehoash inscription.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The desire of Jews and\nChristians to work the FAKE bible backwards and prove Jesus the JEW existed &nbsp;is a bit too much.. They are willing to go to\nany ridiculous extent.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A great deal of money\ncan accrue to the dealer who provides an \u201cauthenticated\u201d piece of physical\nevidence which shows that &nbsp;Jesus Christ\nactually existed\u2014and his mother has IMMACULATE CONCEPTION.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">According to the BBC,\nwhen the police took JEW Oded Golan into custody and searched his apartment\nthey discovered a workshop with a range of tools, materials, and half finished\n\u2018antiquities\u2019. This was evidence for an operation of a scale far greater than\nthey had suspected. Investigators have established that collectors around the\nworld have paid hundreds of thousands of dollars for artefacts that came through\nOded Golan\u2019s associates. Dozens of these items were examined. Police then\nsuspect that artefacts made by the same team of forgers have found their way\ninto leading museums around the world. ( WIKIPEDIA ) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oded_Golan\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oded_Golan</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In March 2008, the\nAmerican TV newsmagazine 60 Minutes broadcast an undercover video interview\nwith an Egyptian craftsman\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u2026 in Cairo named Marco\nSamah Shoukri Ghatas (identified as Marko Sammech by 60 MINUTES), who stated\nthat he did work for Golan over a period of fifteen years. When shown a\nphotograph of the Jehoash Tablet, Ghatas said\u2014on camera\u2014that he had \u201cinscribed\nseveral stone slabs that were just like this for [Oded] Golan\u2026 Golan brought me\nthe text and I carved it onto the tablet.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">According to a\nfollow-up story in HA\u2019ARETZ in April 2008, Ghatas confessed\u2014both to Egyptian\nauthorities and to Amir Ganor, head of the IAA\u2019s Theft Prevention Unit\u2014that he\nhad \u201cpersonally forged the Jehoash inscription, on the basis of the sketches\nbrought to him by Oded Golan\u201d and had manufactured numerous other items\n\u201caccording to specifications received from Golan.\u201d According to Ganor\u2019s\ntestimony, Ghatas also admitted to \u201crinsing and smearing\u201d the James Ossuary,\napparently with an artificial patina. (E. Cline, BIBLICAL ARCHAEOLOGY, 2009, p.\n128)<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">BELOW: 22 HEBREW ALPHABETS&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
