, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The FAKE &nbsp;\u201cCaesarea inscription\u201d has been\nconsidered\u2014since its discovery in 1962\u2014as one of the most telling pieces of\nevidence for the existence of the settlement of Nazareth during Roman times.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The FAKE Pilate stone\nis a damaged block (82 cm x 65 cm) of carved limestone with a partially intact\ninscription attributed to, and mentioning, Pontius Pilate, a prefect of the\nRoman province of Judaea from AD 26 to 36. It was discovered at the\narchaeological site of Caesarea Maritima in 1961. The Pilate stone is currently\nlocated at the Israel Museum in Jerusalem..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-N431XzK2x6I/XDGtc1mg-9I/AAAAAAABfSM/uG41Nf3FzXMvlynf0x5flHfDu2RHn4iPACLcBGAs/s1600/pirlate_recon.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"720\" data-original-width=\"960\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-N431XzK2x6I/XDGtc1mg-9I/AAAAAAABfSM/uG41Nf3FzXMvlynf0x5flHfDu2RHn4iPACLcBGAs/s640/pirlate_recon.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Until 1961, there was\nno concrete archaeological evidence that Pontius Pilate, the fifth governor of\nJudaea, ever existed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u201cPontius Pilate\u201d and\nhe\u2019s identified as the \u201cprefect of Judea.\u201d Here, at last, after nineteen\ncenturies, was \u201chard evidence\u201d that Pontius Pilate who jacked Jesus ( who never\nexisted ) really existed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; NONSENSE !!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">UNTIL RECENTLY our\nknowledge of Pontius Pilate, \"governor\" &nbsp;of Judea, during whose prefecture Jesus of\nNazareth was crucified, was drawn on the writings of the Christian evangelists,\nMatthew, Mark, Luke, and John, the Christian apostle Paul.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Babylonian\nTalmud (Sanhedrin 43a) \"Mattai\" is one of five disciples of\n\"Yeshu\".&nbsp; &nbsp;In Malayalam we call Mathew as Mathai and\nJesus as Yeshu.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All persecuted Hindus\ncame running back to Kerala by ship after Christianity was born in 325 AD.&nbsp; . There is NO other way as the Bolan and\nKhyber passes were impenetrable.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Gospel of Matthew\nis anonymous: the author is not named within the text, and the superscription\n\"according to Matthew\" was added some time in&nbsp; 326 AD.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jesus and his 12\ndisciples never existed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Koran speaks of\nJesus' disciples but does not mention their names, instead referring to them as\n\"helpers to the work of God\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Who are Matthew, Mark,\nLuke, and John?&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PRAY ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PRITHEE ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">None of them existed ..\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A doctor, a fisherman,\na tax collector, and another who was just a teenager when he heard Jesus ( who\nnever existed )&nbsp; speak, they wrote some\nof the most famous books in existence. Their names are attached to the first\nfour books of the New Testament.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And most important of\nall, their writings are almost all we have describing the mortal life of Jesus\nChrist and the things.. The first four books of the New Testament are called\nthe Gospels. It\u2019s easy to imagine why these books were written and why they\nhave always been so important.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Matthew and John were\ntwo of the original Twelve Apostles.&nbsp;\nThey were with Jesus ( who never existed )&nbsp; often as he&nbsp;\ntaught.&nbsp;&nbsp; But who were Mark and\nLuke, and how did they come to write about the Messiah\u2019s&nbsp; life and ministry? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In his book, Matthew\noften stresses that Jesus Christ is the Messiah and came to fulfill the Old\nTestament prophecies. Matthew wrote specifically to the Jews, who were familiar\nwith those prophecies. His account of the Resurrection tells that those\nassigned to guard the Savior\u2019s tomb saw two angels roll back the stone that\ncovered the door of the tomb. &nbsp;BAAAP RE !</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;They told their superiors what had happened,\nso the soldiers were offered large sums of money to say that the Lord\u2019s\nfollowers had crept in and carried His body away. This lie was then spread\namong the Jews. (See Matthew 28:2\u201315.)&nbsp;&nbsp;\nMatthew baby must have been informed about the bribery.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The book of Matthew\nis the only place this interesting bit of information is told.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mark ( who never\nexisted )&nbsp; was much younger than the\nother writers. His mother was a prominent follower of Jesus Christ. Acts 12:12\ntells us that her house in Jerusalem was used as a meeting place for other\ndisciples. From this verse we also learn that her son\u2019s full name is John Mark.\nAfter the Resurrection, as the Savior\u2019s message was beginning to be spread,\nMark traveled with the Apostle Paul.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mark baby then accompanied the Apostle Peter to\nRome and stayed by him while he was in prison. Mark is known as Peter\u2019s\ninterpreter, both in speech and in writing. As a fisherman from Galilee, Peter\nmay not have spoken Greek fluently, so Mark interpreted for him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Luke ( who never\nexisted ) is an interesting writer because he did not know Jesus Christ\npersonally. He became a follower after the messiah\u2019s s death, when Paul taught\nhim the gospel. One of the most amazing stories Luke wrote about was the birth\nof the Savior. Paul mentions that about 500 people saw the Savior after His\nResurrection and that most of them were still alive when he was writing to the\nCorinthians (see 1 Corinthians 15:6). John, or John the Beloved as he was\nknown, served as one of the Apostles.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Luke baby's book was probably written last, as\nJohn seems to have already read the other Gospels before he wrote his own book.\nOften, instead of telling his version of an event or parable the others had\nalready written about, he writes about things the other writers did not include.\nAlso, John\u2019s Gospel includes the testimony of John the Baptist. It seems likely\nthat he had some of the writings of John the Baptist.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JOHN THE BAPTIST WAS A\nHINDU KERALA SAGE WHO EXISTED..&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;John ( who never existed ) &nbsp;was writing to members of the Church, who\nalready knew something of the Lord. &nbsp;&nbsp;John\nemphasizes Jesus\u2019s divine nature as the Son of God.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the last five verses\nof his book, we find out what happened to John baby . Referring to himself as\n\u201cthe disciple whom Jesus loved,\u201d John tells us that he would not die but would\nremain on earth until the Second Coming (see John 21:20\u201323; D&amp;C 7).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Right after the\nJesus\u2019s&nbsp; death and Resurrection and for\nmany years afterward, each of the books written by Matthew, Mark, Luke, and\nJohn was a separate item, written on a separate scroll and copied over and\nover. The individual books weren\u2019t put together into the New Testament until\nseveral hundred years after they were written. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This explains John\u2019s\nwarning in Revelation 22:18: \u201cIf any man shall add unto these things, God shall\nadd unto him the plagues that are written in this book Eventually the four\nGospels were joined with other valuable writings such as the letters that Paul\nand others wrote.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Other original Apostles\nalso wrote things that were copied repeatedly. Remnants of these writings\nsurvive, but it is difficult to determine which are authentic. When the New\nTestament was gathered into a single book, these writings were not included.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the four Gospels,\nthe book of Acts records the events following the Ascension of the Savior. Most\nscholars agree that Luke wrote the Acts of the Apostles. Nearly all the rest of\nthe books in the New Testament are letters, or epistles. Paul wrote most of\nthese, but also included are letters written by James, Peter, John, and Jude.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The book of Revelation,\nwritten by John, concludes the collection we now call the New Testament. The\nHarmony of the Gospels is a chart that tells where in each book a teaching or\nan incident in the life of Jesus Christ ( who never existed ) is told. Jesus\u2019s\nappearance to Thomas, for instance, is found only in John..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;John has the most\nunique material in his book. About 90 percent of the information in the book of\nJohn is not in the other three Gospels. Mark\u2019s book has the least unique\nmaterial: only 7 percent.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">99%&nbsp; of the&nbsp;\nnarratives in the Pentateuch (Genesis, Exodus, Leviticus, Numbers and\nDeuteronomy) or Joshua are FICTION .<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For Christians, the\nPool of Siloam has additional special significance: it is mentioned in the\nGospel of John as the location to which Jesus sent \"a man blind from\nbirth\" in order to complete the healing of the man.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The pool of Siloam ( discovered in 2005 ) is\nlocated in the lower part of the southern side ( reverse engineering ) of\nJerusalem's Mount Ophel, out of the walls of the old city, and it was feed by\nthe water of the Gihon source..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Until the 19th century,\nthere was no evidence outside of John\u2019s Gospel&nbsp;\n(John 9:1\u201311) for the existence of this pool of Siloam. John baby never\nexisted.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The pool of Bethesda (\nreverse engineered ) , where Jesus ( who never existed ) healed the paralytic\nlying in his bed for 38 years, is located north of the old Hebrew Temple and\nopposite to the pool of Siloam in the holy city of Jerusalem.&nbsp; (John 5:1-15).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c Therefore, the\naccounts about Jesus at the pools of Bethesda and Siloam in the Gospel of John\nare consistent with both the archaeological and historical record, and should\nbe regarded as historical accounts rather than religious propaganda or myth.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BAAYE GAAD ! <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AIYOOOO TOBAH TOAAHBBAAHH\n!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">BELOW:&nbsp; &nbsp;YEH POOL SE DARIYOOO&nbsp; .. MAIN POOL MEIN GIR JAOONGEEE ..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/KfTC5cJpmwA/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/KfTC5cJpmwA?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Luke ( who never\nexisted ) &nbsp;ONLY interviews the\neyewitnesses (Luke 1:1-4), but John ( who never existed ) actually claims to\nhave been an eyewitness to the miracles of Jesus (John 1:14; 19:35; 21:24-25).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jesus mixed his saliva\nwith mud, applied the mixture to the blind man\u2019s eyes and told him to bathe in\nthe Pool of Siloam. When the man did so, he was healed (John 9:6\u20137).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the &nbsp;Pool of Bethesda, the watch word was FIRST\nCOME FIRST SERVED.&nbsp; An angel would stir\nup the waters of the pool and whoever would enter the water first would be\ncured. The cripple cried to Jesus &nbsp;\u201cSomeone else steps down ahead of me.\u201d &nbsp;So the crippled man cannot get to the curative\nwaters in time. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But Jesus simply\ndeclares to the man \u201cStand up, take up your mat, and walk.\u201d &nbsp;The text goes on: \u201cAnd at once the man was\nmade well, and he took up his mat and began to walk\u201d (John 5:2\u20139). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HALLELUJAAH !</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Praise the lord !!<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">BELOW: BOTH POOLS BELONGED TO HINDU TEMPLES A MILLENNIUM BEFORE JUDAISM WAS BORN</b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-DHv9h9JJDeo/XDHHA_2uSEI/AAAAAAABfSU/B_dKwRlJlmcNszcUf4twokeB_cF1Gi2lgCLcBGAs/s1600/pWEEol-of-siloam8.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"612\" data-original-width=\"723\" height=\"540\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-DHv9h9JJDeo/XDHHA_2uSEI/AAAAAAABfSU/B_dKwRlJlmcNszcUf4twokeB_cF1Gi2lgCLcBGAs/s640/pWEEol-of-siloam8.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Bethesda Pool, was\nexcavated in the late 19th century, but it has taken more than 100 years for\narchaeologists to do REVERSE ENGINEERING and identify/ interpret the site.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-T-tK7Pdv6wM/XDHHjZTWNcI/AAAAAAABfSc/HNRyottm0toWXHjefN_tqLlMKENcF1sUACLcBGAs/s1600/531e3680a2f6e8S9719a66e0f9b5d7d02.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"400\" data-original-width=\"350\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-T-tK7Pdv6wM/XDHHjZTWNcI/AAAAAAABfSc/HNRyottm0toWXHjefN_tqLlMKENcF1sUACLcBGAs/s640/531e3680a2f6e8S9719a66e0f9b5d7d02.jpg\" width=\"560\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nBELOW: ARTISTS RECONSTRUCTION OF THE POOL OF SILOAM..&nbsp; &nbsp;ONLY 3 SIDES HAS STEPS.. THE ANCIENT HINDU TEMPLE WAS AT THE SITE OF THE MISSING STEPS..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fWR_i_Z2hXQ/XDIGVZS94fI/AAAAAAABfSk/Maiecg6fUBMSSe0eq_ON13CNsoextDvWwCLcBGAs/s1600/City_of_davidDSCN4616.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"330\" data-original-width=\"440\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fWR_i_Z2hXQ/XDIGVZS94fI/AAAAAAABfSk/Maiecg6fUBMSSe0eq_ON13CNsoextDvWwCLcBGAs/s640/City_of_davidDSCN4616.JPG\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pool of Siloam&nbsp; is at the site of the Hindu Shrine of the\nFour Nymphs renovated&nbsp; by Hadrian in 135\nAD. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Pool of Siloam is a\nrock-cut pool on the southern slope of the City of David, the original site of\nJerusalem, located outside the walls of the Old City to the southeast. The 225\nfeet wide pool was fed by the waters of the Gihon Spring, carried there by two\naqueducts. The pool was fed by the newly constructed Siloam tunnel. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The pool is stepped as\nfound in every major Hindu temple. There are three sets of five steps, two\nleading to a platform, before the bottom is reached, and it obvious that the\nsteps were designed to accommodate various water levels.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a freshwater\nreservoir, the pool was a major gathering place for ancient Hindu pilgrims,\nmore than a millennium before Judaism was born.&nbsp;\nThis pool is too large to be a ritual Mikvah bath. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FAKE Coins from the\nreign of Alexander Jannaeus were found embedded in the plaster lining of the\npool.. TEE HEE. &nbsp;&nbsp;Alexander Jannaeus &nbsp;was the second Hasmonean king of Judaea from\n103 to 76 BC.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\">The Siloam pool has\nsteps on three sides. . On the fourth side was The Shrine of the Four Nymphs\n(Tetranymphon), a nymphaeum renovated&nbsp; by\nHadrian in 135 AD ... . </span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jews derive a lot of\npride from the Hasmonean dynasty, the ruling dynasty of Judea \u2014the only hitch\nis that the Kings were Hindus and NOT Jews.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hasmonean Dynasty\nwas founded by a resolution, adopted in 141 BCE, at a large assembly \"of\nthe priests and the people and of the elders of the land, to the effect that Hindu\nSimon Thassi should be their leader and high priest forever, until there should\narise a faithful prophet\".(1 Macc. 14:41 )..&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Recognition of the new dynasty by the Roman\nRepublic was accorded by the Hindu Senate about 139 BC, when the delegation of Simon\nwas in Rome.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Simon Thassi the founder\nof the Hasmonean dynasty was NOT a JEW that he &nbsp;\u201c laid siege to the old and powerful pagan city\nof Gazara and captured it, after which he expelled the pagan inhabitants,\nremoved the idols from the houses, purified the city, and \"placed such men\nthere as would keep the Law\" (I Macc. xiii. 43-48; comp. xiv. 34;\n\"Ant.\" xiii. 6, \u00a7 7; Strabo, p. 759)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The name Maccabee is\noften used as a synonym for the entire Hasmonean dynasty.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This Maccabee is just a\nterm for Machbena , ( 1 Chronicles 2:49) , was the son of Hindu Shiva , &nbsp;the son of Caleb.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JEWS love to praise\nSimon Thassi as the first JEWISH prince of the Hebrew Hasmonean Dynasty who reigned\nfrom 142 to 135 BCE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Doron Witztum, Eliyahu\nRips, and Yoav Rosenberg (1994) published their findings under the title\nof&nbsp; \"On Equidistant Letter Sequences\nin the Book of Genesis.\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/7WeJ9NQ9DTM/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/7WeJ9NQ9DTM?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Two conmen authors,\nboth professors of mathematics, demonstrate that Equidistant Letter Sequences\n(ELSs) exactly like those claimed by the foremost proponents of the Torah code\nWitztum, Rips, and Rosenberg to be found exclusively in the Torah, are in fact\nvery common in any sufficiently long text, in this case exemplified by the\nHebrew translation of the famous Leo Tolstoy\u2019s novel \u201cWar and Peace.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The audience sits\nspellbound in the darkened room, all eyes focused on the slide projected on the\nglowing screen in the front. The presenter, a cryptologist and former National\nSecurity&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Administration codebreaker, explains that the grid of Hebrew letters\nbeing displayed is a portion of the Torah, the first five books of the Bible.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Several of the letters,\nrunning in a vertical row down the grid, are circled--the presenter explains\nthat these spell the Hebrew word for \"Hitler.\" The next slide shows\nthe same grid, this time with another group of letters marked with squares.\nThese letters form the Hebrew for \"Nazi.\" The next slide shows the\nadditional coded message, \"slaughter,\" buried in the same Hebrew\ntext. Ajit Vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">November 14, 2017 at\n3:08 AM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">hi j,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Astrologers when they\nuse modern astronomical calculations to determine the position of celestial\nbodies, they need to take into account the difference caused by the different\nreference point used in specifying the longitude, and this they call the\nayanamsa. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">As earth\u2019s precession\nchanges every year, the difference between the tropical zodiac and the sidereal\nzodiac changes. This difference is called \u201cayanamsa\u201d (sidereal difference)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">MAYA DANAVA WROTE IN\n4000 BC IN HIS ASTRONOMICAL TREATISE THAT AYANAMSHA WILL BE ZERO IN 499 AD\n(Mesha Samkranti). THANK GOD THE WHITE BASTARDS DID NOT SAY THAT MAYA DANAVA\nWAS BORN IN 499 AD .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">MAYA DANAVA FROM KERALA\nMADE THE HALL OF ILLUSIONS AT INDRAPRASTA FOR THE PANDAVAS 6000 YEARS AGO . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN KERALA WE USED\nSIDERIAL SYSTEM WHICH IS ACCURATE-- NOT INACCURATE TROPICAL WHICH WAS USED BY\nTHE WHITE MAN 4000 YEARS LATER<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">While classical\ntropical astrology is based on the orientation of the Earth relative to the Sun\nand planets of the solar system, sidereal astrology deals with the position of\nthe Earth relative to both of these as well as the stars of the celestial sphere.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN 325 AD, AT THE FIRST\nCOUNCIL OF NICEA WHERE ROMAN EMPEROR CONSTANTINE THE GREAT COOKED UP A GOD NAMED\nJESUS CHRIST THE POPE WITH NO KNOWLEDGE OF ASTRONOMY FUCKED IT UP. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">21 March 325 AD is the\nday allocated to it in the Easter table of the Julian calendar<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">AT THIS COUNCIL THERE\nWAS AN ASTRONOMER FROM KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY WHO LOUDLY WARNED THE ROMAN\nEMPEROR NOT TO ALLOW THE ILLITERATE POPE SUCH SCIENTIFIC LIBERTIES --&nbsp; THAT\nSIDERIAL ZODIAC WILL DRIFT AWAY FROM TROPICAL ZODIAC AND CAUSE TERRIBLE\nCONFUSION LATER IN TIME </span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; OR-- Ayanamsa\nis around 24 degrees today. The ayanamsha describes the increasing gap between\nthe tropical and sidereal zodiacs. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">VARAHAMIHIRA ( MIHIRA\nMUNI ) WAS A DISCIPLE OF ARYABHATTA . BOTH WERE EMINENT ASTRONOMERS FROM\nKERALA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/mihira-muni-great-astrologer-cum.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/mihira-muni-great-astrologer-cum.html</a><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">MIHIRA MUNI ALSO WROTE\nTHAT THE ZERO ANAYAMSHA YEAR WAS IN 499 AD<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aryabhatta of 2700 BC,\nfrom my hometown of Calicut was the first to propound the HELIOCENTRIC model of\nthe cosmos, the Siderial day length, and that the earth rotates on its own axis,\nall the while moving in space -- in writing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ARYABHATTA WROTE\nARYABHATITA IN 2700 BC. NOT 500 AD, AS WRITTEN BY THE BASTARD WHITE MAN SO THAT\nTHEY COULD STEAL ALL INDIAN ASTRONOMY AND PATENT IT IN THEIR PATHETIC NAMES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2700 BC , Aryabhatta\n, a astronomer professor , who went from Kodungallur University to Nalanda to\nteach as a visiting professor pinged the value for the length of the sidereal\nyear at 365 days 6 hours 12 minutes 30 seconds is only 3 minutes 20 seconds\nlonger than the modern scientific value of 365 days 6 hours 9 minutes 10\nseconds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ReplyDelete<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIEF Ptolemy came to\nIndia in 155 AD, and he stole from the astronomical data from Surya Siddhanta\nfrom Kodungallur University ...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Aryabhatiya it is\nclearly written that the Precession of the Equinoxes will be Zero in 499 A.D.\nThe white bastards have used this date to say Aryabhatta was born at this time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE WHITE BASTARDS\nCOOKED UP A FAKE VERSE ( IT IS SO EASY TO CATCH THEIR FOUL LIES )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0924\u094d\u0930\u094d\u092f\u0927\u093f\u0915\u093e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;
