, &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHEN I WAS PENNING THE POST ABOVE 8 YEARS AGO, MY WIFE WARNED ME..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">DESH DROHI ATHEIST COMMIES AND FOREIGN PAYROLL DALIT ACTIVISTS OF BR AMBEKAR / EVR PERIYAR WILL CHERRY PICK AND TAKE UNDUE ADVANTAGE. ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS IS WHAT EXACTLY HAPPENED A FEW HOURS AGO , ON 1ST JAN 2018 EVENING ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">EVERY SPEECH BY ATHEIST COMMIE PINARAYI VIJAYAN AND HIS GANG , WAS CHERRY PICKED FROM MY POST ABOVE ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">EVERY VESTIGE OF THEIR SPEECHES ABOUT \" BRAHMANICAL PATRIARCHY \" , VIVEKANANDA CALLING KERALA A MADHOUSE ( BRANTHALAYAM ) , AYYANKALI ETC WERE LIFTED FROM MY POST...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THEY WILL NOT GET ANY INFORMATION IN BOOKS OR INTERNET UNLESS IT IS LIFTED FROM MY BLOGSITE ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MY NAIR AND NAMBOODIRI FRIENDS FRETTED AND SULKED WHEN THEY MET ME AFTER PENNING THIS POST, FOR NEARLY A YEAR.. THEY FELT THAT I HAVE LET THEM DOWN..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CHERRY PICKING WITH THEIR BACKS TO THE TREES IS WHAT HAPPENED YESTERDAY EVENING TO SUSTAIN A FOUL FOREIGN SPONSORED POLITICAL AGENDA..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WANNA KNOW THE REAL TREE ?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE DANAVA CIVILIZATION ( OF THIYYA KING MAHABALI ) FLOURISHED SEVERAL MILLENNIUMS BEFORE THE VEDIC CIVILIZATION..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIYYAS WERE RULERS OF KERALA , WHO PROVIDED SAGES , KINGS , AYURVEDA PHYSICIANS , ARCHITECTS , ASTRONOMERS , KALARI FIGHTING , OCEAN NAVIGATION ETC FOR THE WHOLE PLANET..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE THIYYA BLOODLINE RAN IN DYNASTIES OF EGYPTIAN PHARAOHS, ROMAN EMPERORS , MAYAN/ AZTEC/ INCA KINGS , JEWISH KINGS AFTER SOLOMON ETC ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">DNA TESTS DON\u2019T LIE .. USE MY DNA..</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/eight-sided-pyramid-of-giza-egypt.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">KING MAHABALIs FATHER VIROCHANA RULED THE WHOLE WORLD.. MAHABALI WAS BANISHED BY VISHNU AVATAR VAMANA TO PATALA ( PERU ) WHICH WAS PART OF HIS OWN KINGDOM..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE SANSKRIT , ASTRONOMY AND MATH KNOWING CREAM OF THIYYAS WERE KERALA NAMBOODIRIS..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">KERALA NAMBOODIRIS PROPAGATED THE VEDAS ORALLY FOR 330 CENTURIES ( THE GREATEST FEAT OF MAN ) BEFORE THEY WERE PENNED DOWN 70 CENTURIES AGO AT THE BANKS OF THE SARASWATI RIVER..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">KERALA NAMBOODIRIS ( ELDEST BROTHERS ) ARE THE ARYANS WITH SWASTIKA SYMBOL </span></b>AND SPECIAL HAIRDO..&nbsp; CHANAKYA , ADI SHANKARACHARYA , ARYABHATTA , VARARUCHI , APOLLONIUS OF TYANA ( ON WHOM JESUS CHRIST WAS MODELED ), JETHRO ( ON WHOM MOSES WAS MODLLED ) ETC WERE KERALA NAMBOODIRIS..</div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE </span><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">YOUNGER BROTHERS OF KERALA NAMBOODIRIS WERE THE SEMITES WITH SIX POINTED STAR AS SYMBOL</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">.. MOHAMMAD THE PROPHET, WAS A SEMITE WHOSE FATHERs ELDER BROTHER WAS THE NAMBOODIRI PRIEST OF THE SHIVA TEMPLE AT MECCA OASIS. THE DISGRACES LEFT HANDED SEMITES CREATED JUDAISM AND RIGHT TO LEFT HEBREW..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AFTER GERMAN JEW ROTHSCHILD STARTED RULING INDIA, THIYYAS WERE DEMOTED AND CONVERTED TO TODDY TAPPING MONKEYS ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BE VERY VERY VERY CLEAR-- THIYYAS ( THIRAYYARS ) ARE NOT BLUNT FACED EZHAVAS (MALAYYAR TRIBALS ) WHICH WHOM THEY HAVE BEEN CLUBBED TODAY BY THE WHITE INVADER..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NO THIYYA WILL EVER GIVE HIS DAUGHTER / SON TO AN EZHAVA ( SOUTH OF THRISSUR ) FOR MARRIAGE, THOUGH MARRIAGE BUREAUS CLUB THEM IN THE SAME BASKET....&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE GLORY OF DANAVA CIVILIZATION WAS SUNK BY THE WHITE MAN AND WE WERE PAINTED AS SAVAGES..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">WHY DID VISHNU AVATAR PARASHURAMA GIVE KERALA NAMBOODIRIS SPECIAL POWERS ?..&nbsp;</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold;\">MAIN REASON WAS ORAL TRANSMISSION OF VEDAS MUST CONTINUE, THERE MUST BE NO SUBDIVISION AND FRAGMENTATION OF FERTILE LAND ( ONLY ELDEST BROTHER OF KERALA NAMBOODIRIS COULD OWN LAND ) TO PRODUCE GOLDEN MEAN HOLY TOPSOIL FOOD AND AYURVEDIC HERBS..</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold;\">\n</span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/07/king-cobra-and-snake-temples-of-kerala.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NAMBOODIRIS GOT DRUNK WITH POWER AND THEY STARTED ILL TREATING THIYYA KINGS ( WHO MUST KEEP 6 FEET AWAY ) ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ADI SHANKARACHARYA A KERALA NAMBOODIRI GOT EXASPERATED AND DISTRIBUTED THE 4 VEDAS TO THE 4 CORNERS OF INDIA, 4000 YEARS AGO, BUT WITH A FIAT THAT ALL THE 4 MUTTS MUST BE HEADED BY A KERALA NAMBOODIRI..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2--</span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 1, 2019 at 6:14 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY CALLED ME AND SAID--<br />\n<br />\nTHE GOD CODE OF TIMOTHY PAUL SMITH IS ABOUT A WILD GOOSE CHASE FOR THE MISSING ARK OF THE COVENANT..<br />\n<br />\nHE ASKED ME IF I KNOW WHERE IT IS..<br />\n<br />\nOF COURSE I KNOW..<br />\n<br />\nI WILL GIVE A HINT TO THESE STUPID CHRISTIAN AND JEWISH HISTORIANS ..</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">THIS WILL BE THE GREATEST REVELATION OF THIS MILLENNIUM ..</span></span></div>\n<br />\nTHE MOTHER OF KING SOLOMON BATH SHEBA WAS A NAMBOODIRI WOMAN FROM THE LAND OF SHEBA , WHICH IS NORTH KERALA ( MALABAR/ PUNT/ OPHIR )..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE WIFE OF KING SOLOMON WAS ALSO A WOMAN FROM SHEBA --CALLED QUEEN OF SHEBA , NAMED MAKEDA..<br />\n<br />\nSOLOMONs SHIPS WERE MADE IN BEYPORE , CALICUT ( MY HOMETOWN ) OF TEAK..<br />\n<br />\nSOLOMONs SEAL WAS IN MALAYALAM , MY LANGUAGE..<br />\n<br />\nSOLOMON AND QUEEN OF SHEBA ( MAKEDA ) HAD A SON MENELIK , WHOM MAKEDA DELIVERED IN CALICUT AS WAS THE HINDU CUSTOM..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN MENELIK GREW UP AND BECAME A MAN HE WENT TO VISIT SOLOMON AT JERUSALEM..<br />\n<br />\nSOLOMON GAVE HIM THE ARK OF THE COVENANT TO KEEP IN THE SAFETY OF THE KINGDOM OF SHEBA ( MALABAR )..<br />\n<br />\nNOW HERE IS THE TWIST..<br />\n<br />\nTO BRING THE ARK OF THE COVENANT IT HAS TO BE TRANSPORTED BY OVERLAND ROUTE TO THE KINGDOM OF DHOFAR WHICH WAS OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING..<br />\n<br />\nTODAY DHOFAR IS SOUTH OF OMAN/ NORTH OF YEMEN , WITH A NATURAL HARBOUR AT SALALAH..<br />\n<br />\nDHOFAR IS ALSO CALLED SABA OR SHEBA -- AFTER ALL IT WAS PART OF THE KINGDOM OF SHEBA ( PUNT/ OPHIR/ MALABAR ) IN MAINLAND INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nMIND YOU --JEW ROTHSCHILD CEMENTED A KOSHER LIE THAT SHEBA IS ETHIOPIA.. NONSENSE !<br />\n<br />\nThe Queen of Sheba is the only female character who appears in all three holy books of the Abrahamic faiths \u2013 the Torah of the JEWS , the Koran of the MUSLIMS and the Bible (Kings 1:10 and Chronicles 2:9) of the CHRISTIANS.<br />\n<br />\nThe Jew histrians of Talmud have an inkling that Solomon hid the Ark of the Covenant at Aksum north of the Himyarite Kingdom..<br />\n<br />\nWell , Aksum is nothing but the Kingdom of Dhofar, owned and ruled by the Calicut king .. the Oasis of Mecca was owned by the Calicut king..<br />\n<br />\nToday Jewish and Christian historians agree that the Kingdom of Saba is nothing but the Kingdom of Sheba.. They are right-- Saba / overseas part of Sheba / Dhofar is the same.<br />\n<br />\nThe younger brothers of Kerala Namboodiris ( semites with six pointed star of Shiva / Shakti merge as their symbol ) were spice overland route overseers of the Calicut king.<br />\n<br />\nMohammad the prophet was one such SEMITE . His father\u2019s elder brother Namboodiri ( ARYAN ) was a priest at the Shiva Temple at Mecca Oasis.<br />\n<br />\nARYANS ADOPTED SWASTIKA , SEMITES ADOPTED SIX POINTED STAR..<br />\n<br />\nDhofar grew no spices. Dhofar had a spice depot at Salalah where the King of Calicut ( my hometown ) stocked his spices..<br />\n<br />\nMecca Oasis was a spice customs outpost .. Spices grew wild in mainland Sheba ( North Kerala// Malabar / Punt / Sheba/ Ophir )<br />\n<br />\nMY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO 59.33 %<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c4844840677074646878\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6VOqqm-hCbM/XCa06XjAUxI/AAAAAAABfL4/E3K2A6jHNG0XTf7_mZb9kjj9WxD3GwmzQCK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/happy-new-year-2019-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html?showComment=1546403078017#c4844840677074646878\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 2, 2019 at 9:54 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME<br />\n<br />\nWHY DID HISTORY TV CHANNEL AIR \"GOD CODE\" USING TIMOTHY PAUL SMITH ON CHRISTMAS EVE NIGHT?<br />\n<br />\nWHAT WAS THE AGENDA..<br />\n<br />\nWELL--<br />\n<br />\nTIMOTHY PAUL SMITH WADED THROUGH THE GIHON SPRING WATER TUNNEL, AND PALPITATED WHILE DECLARING THAT HE HAS FOUND THE EXACT SPOT WHERE THE ARK OF THE COVENANT WAS HIDDEN BY KING SOLOMON-- AND HENCE THAT IS THE PLACE OF THE TEMPLE OF SOLOMON..<br />\n<br />\nAS HE LOOKS AT THE CAME DOUBLED DOWN, THE AZAN CALL OF THE MOSQUE ABOVE PLAYS REAL LOUD.. WE ALL ARE SUPPOSED TO BELIEVE THAT THERE MUST AN UNDERGROUND TUNNEL FROM THE BASEMENT OF THE AL-AQSA MOSQUE TO THE SPOT WHERE THE ARK OF THE COVENENT WAS STORED BY KING SOLOMON..<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHOLE IDEA IS TO CREATE PUBLIC OPINION THAT THE MOSQUE STANDS ON LAND WHICH IS RIGHTFULLY BELONGING TO JEWS..<br />\n<br />\nMUST BEFORE JUDAISM , ISLAM, ROMAN CHRISTIANITY, EASTERN ORTHODOX CHRISTIANITY WAS BORN-- HINDUS ( PAGANS ) STAYED IN JERUSALEM FOR MILLENNIUMS..<br />\n<br />\nNO AMOUNT OF FOUL PROPAGANDA BY JEWS/ CHRISTIANS AND MUSLIMS CAN HIDE THIS TRUTH..<br />\n<br />\nAS LATE AS 7000 BC THE DANAVA KINGS OF KERALA RULED FROM PALESTINE TO URALS TO VIETNAM..<br />\n<br />\nBEFORE THAT THE DANAVA KINGS RULED THE WHOLE PLANET.. KING MAHABALI WAS ONE..<br />\n<br />\nAnd David and all Israel went to Jerusalem, that is, Jebus, where the Jebusites were, the inhabitants of the land. The inhabitants of Jebus said to David, \u201cYou will not come in here.\u201d Nevertheless, David took the stronghold of Zion, that is, the city of David\u2014\u20091 Chronicles 11:4-5.<br />\n<br />\nThe Jebusites dwelt in the hill country, with Jerusalem as one of their key cities (Numbers 13:29; Judges 19:10\u201311).<br />\n<br />\nA HINDU SHIVA TEMPLE STOOD AT THE EXACT SPOT OF THE TEMPLE OF SOLOMON BEFORE.. IT WAS CALLED JEBUSITE SHRINE..<br />\n<br />\nThe conventional dates of Solomon's reign are circa 970 BC to 931 BC.<br />\n<br />\nThe Siege of Jebus is a siege described in biblical passages as having occurred when Israelites under King David of Israel ( Solomon's father ) besieged the Jebusite city of Jerusalem, then known as Jebus.<br />\n<br />\nSolomon's mother was Kerala Namboodiri woman named Bath Sheba.<br />\n<br />\nThe capture of Hindu kingdom Jebus is mentioned in 2 Samuel 5 and 1 Chronicles 11<br />\n<br />\nWhen God promised to give Abraham a land for his descendants, it was described as being inhabited by many tribes, including the Jebusites (Genesis 15:18\u201321).<br />\n<br />\nAccording to the Table of Nations in Genesis 10, the Jebusites were descended from Noah\u2019s son Ham, through his son Canaan. They were one of the Amorite tribes who were placed under judgment by God for their wickedness (Genesis 15:16). God described their pagan worship as abominable practices (Deuteronomy 20:18)<br />\n<br />\nAs a result of that judgment, God told the Israelites to exterminate all of the Amorite tribes when they came into the land. The Israelites were also forbidden to intermarry with them, so the Jebusites would not pass on their pagan practices.<br />\n<br />\nAdonizedek ( Lord of the city of righteousness ) was, according to the Book of Joshua, HINDU king of Jerusalem at the time of the Israelite invasion of Canaan.<br />\n<br />\nDuring the time of the judges, some Israelites began to intermarry with the Jebusites, causing God to bring judgment on the nation (Judges 3:5).<br />\n<br />\nWhen David became king of Israel, he attacked the Jebusites of Jerusalem (2 Samuel 5:6) and conquered the city, which then became known as the City of David.<br />\n<br />\nAccording to the Hebrew Bible, there were a Canaanite tribe who inhabited Jerusalem prior to its conquest by Joshua (11:3 and 12:10) or King David (2 Samuel 5:6-10).<br />\n<br />\nOn the issue of intermarriage with Jebusites and others (Ezra 9:1). Ezra commanded the men of Israel to confess their sins and put away (kill ) their pagan wives so that God would take away His wrath.<br />\n<br />\nAfter this, the HINDU Jebusites disappear from history..<br />\n<br />\nIn Syria tablets mention Jerusalem as Yabusiim ( centuries before Judaism and David was born )..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c4844840677074646878-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c4844840677074646878-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c2914935917020944086\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/happy-new-year-2019-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html?showComment=1546403163943#c2914935917020944086\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 2, 2019 at 9:56 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nJEWS / CHRISTIANS AND MUSLIMS HAVE FORGOTTEN THAT THEY ARE FIGHTING OVER HINDU LAND..<br />\n<br />\nPALESTINIANS HAVE FORGOTTEN THAT THEY WERE HINDUS BEFORE THEY WERE MUSLIMS ( LIKE THE KASHMIRI MUSLIMS ).. SEE HOW SHORT MEMORIES ARE..<br />\n<br />\nJEW CRY AT THE WESTERN WALL. JEWS WANT TO USURP WHAT IS BEYOND THE WALL..<br />\n<br />\nThe Western Wall was never part of the Temple Mount, where the ancient holy places of worship for Jews stood. It is just a remnant of the retaining wall that supported the esplanade built by King Herod in the first century BC., holding up his reconstruction of the Second Temple.<br />\n<br />\nIn 1967, Israel captured the Old City \u2013 and the Wall \u2013 by deceit , during the Six-Day War.<br />\n<br />\nToday every tourist coming to Israel visits the WESTERN WALL (wailing wall ) Israeli army units swear their allegiance in front of it.<br />\n<br />\nAs soon as the Western Wall was captured, the houses in front of it were demolished and the Western Wall Plaza was created to accommodate the flood of Jewish worshipers<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE JEW OF ISRAEL DOES NOT LOOK LIKE ANYBODY OR NEIGHBORING NATIONS SURROUNDING ISRAEL FOR THOUSANDS OF MILES. THEY DON\u2019T HAVE THE SAME DNA..<br />\n<br />\nThe first HINDU settlement was established near Gihon Spring after 4000 BC<br />\n<br />\nTHE TEMPLE MOUNT WAS CALLED MOUNT <b><span style=\"color: red;\">MORIAH</span></b> -- BEFORE ENTERING THE HINDU SHIVA TEMPLE DEVOTEES <b><span style=\"color: red;\">TOOK AT DIP IN WATER </span></b>( GIHON SPRING ).. LATER JEWS AND MUSLIMS ( WHEN MOHAMMAD WAS ALIVE ) FACED THIS TEMPLE DURING PRAYERS ..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">GANAPATI BAPPA MORIAH MEANS -- LET IS IMMERSE THE IDOL OF LORD GANESHA..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD COOKED UP A FAKE FELLOW NAMED MORYA GOSAVI.. HE MADE A MORYA GOSAWI TOMB AT CHINCHWAD , WHICH IS NOW A PLACE OF PILGRIMAGE .. THE PESHWA RULERS AND CHITPAVAN JEWS NAY BRAHMINS DID PROPAGANDA.<br />\n<br />\nThe \"land of Moriah\" (\u02beere\u1e63 ham-M\u00f4riyy\u0101h) is the name given by Genesis to the location of Abraham's binding of Isaac .<br />\n<br />\nAccording to the Bible, David wanted to construct a temple there, but this was left to his son Solomon, who completed the task in 950 BC with the construction of the First Temple..<br />\n<br />\nAccording to Jewish tradition and scripture, the First Temple was built by King Solomon the son of King David in 957 BC and destroyed by the Babylonians in 586 BC..<br />\n<br />\nAccording to the Book of Samuel, Mount Zion was the site of the ancient Hindu Jebusite temple.<br />\n<br />\nThe Knights Templar, who believed the Dome of the Rock was the site of the Solomon's Temple, gave it the name \"Templum Domini\" and set up their headquarters in the Al-Aqsa Mosque adjacent to the Dome for much of the 12th century. In Christian art, the circumcision of JEW Jesus ( who never existed ) was conventionally depicted as taking place at the Temple..<br />\n<br />\nKNIGHTS OF THE TEMPLAR CONVERTED THEMSELVES INTO HINDUISM.. LATER THEY WERE BURNT AT THE STAKE FOR WORSHIPING THE DEVIL ( LORD NARASIMHA )..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/08/secret-excavations-at-jerusalem-by.html</span><br />\n<br />\nSeveral passages in the Hebrew Bible indicate that during the time when they were written, the Temple Mount was identified as Mount Zion.<br />\n<br />\nThe Mount Zion mentioned in the later parts of the Book of Isaiah (Isaiah 60:14), in the Book of Psalms, and the First Book of Maccabees (c. 2nd century BCE) refers to the Hindu temple on top of the hill, generally known as the Temple Mount.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nAlmost immediately after the Muslim conquest of Jerusalem in 638 CE, Caliph 'Omar ibn al Khatab, disgusted by the filth covering the site, had it thoroughly cleaned, and granted Jews access to the site. Among Sunni Muslims, the Mount is widely considered the third holiest site in Islam.<br />\nUmayyad Caliphs commissioned the construction of the al-Aqsa Mosque and Dome of the Rock on the site. The Dome was completed in 692 CE, making it one of the oldest extant Islamic structures in the world. The Al Aqsa Mosque rests on the far southern side of the Mount, facing Mecca.<br />\n<br />\nThe Dome of the Rock currently sits in the middle, occupying or close to the area where the Holy HINDU Temple previously stood.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c2914935917020944086-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c549297588985934243\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/happy-new-year-2019-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html?showComment=1546403224034#c549297588985934243\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 2, 2019 at 9:57 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED FROM 2--</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The site is also important as being the site of the \"Farthest Mosque\" (mentioned in the Quran as the location of Muhammad's miraculous Night Journey) to heaven.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Inside the wall was the place where Muhammad tethered his miraculous winged steed, al-Buraq.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Exalted is He who took His Servant by night from al-Masjid al-Haram (the Sacred Mosque) to al-Masjid al-Aqsa (the Further Mosque), whose surroundings We have blessed, to show him of Our signs. Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Seeing.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\u2014\u2009Quran 17:1</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Western Wall ( wailing wall ) is the holiest place where Jews are permitted to pray, though the holiest site in the Jewish faith lies behind it.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">On June 10, 1967, when Israel gained control of the site following the Six-Day War. Three days after establishing control over the Western Wall site the Moroccan Quarter was bulldozed by Israeli authorities to create space for what is now the Western Wall plaza</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A few hours after the Temple Mount came under Israeli control during the Six-Day War, a message from the Chief Rabbis of Israel, Isser Yehuda Unterman and Yitzhak Nissim was broadcast, warning that Jews were not permitted to enter the site.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">This warning was reiterated by the Council of the Chief Rabbinate a few days later, which issued an explanation written by Rabbi Bezalel Jolti (Zolti) that \"Since the sanctity of the site has never ended, it is forbidden to enter the Temple Mount until the Temple is built.\" The signatures of more than 300 prominent rabbis were later obtained.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JEWS WILL NOT REST TILL THEY PROVE BY DECEIT THAT ARK OF THE COVENANT WAS STORED UNDER THE AL AQSA MOSQUE -- AND SCREW THE MUSLIMS .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">During its long history, Jerusalem has been attacked 52 times, captured and recaptured 44 times, besieged 23 times, and destroyed twice.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In 1980, the Knesset passed the Jerusalem Law, which declared that \"Jerusalem, complete and united, is the capital of Israel\", which is commonly called an act of annexation.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">This declaration was determined to be \"null and void\" by United Nations Security Council Resolution 478.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">On 27\u201328 June 1967, East Jerusalem was integrated into Jerusalem by extension of its municipal borders and was placed under the law, jurisdiction and administration of the State of Israel.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In a unanimous General Assembly resolution, the UN declared the measures trying to change the status of the city invalid.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">THE FIRST CRUSADE BY POPE URBAN II USING HIS AGENT PETER THE HERMIT, WAS TO SACRIFICE 43,000 PEASANTS ( INCLUDING WOMEN AND CHILDREN ) TO MUSLIM TURKS IN A PRE-ARRANGED AMBUSH..</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If he predicted his own\ndeath in Presage 141, he missed it by a year \u2014 so some editions show a version\nof that Presage posthumously edited by his secretary to match the correct date\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nostradamus was reputed\nto be a plague doctor\u2014he knew SHIT about plague..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD GAVE\nBULL THAT NOSTRADAMUS WAS BURIED UPRIGHT LIKE HINDU JIVAN MUKTS .. IN REALITY\nHE WAS BURIED IN LYING POSITION<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The RIDICULOUS tale\nabout Nostradamus is that he was buried standing up so that nobody would step\non his grave; and when his body was later disinterred during the French\nRevolution to be relocated, he was wearing a FORGED medallion on which the\nexact date of the disinterment was engraved\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have two editions of\nhis book Les Propheties\u2014both are different to accommodate LIES converted to\ntruths ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Various versions were\npublished during his lifetime, and there is no one authoritative collection<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Over 200 different\ntranslations and interpreted versions have been published since his death, so\nthe folly of hoping to find Nostradamus' original text is IMPOSSIBLE..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Nobody has ever used Nostradamus' writings\nto predict a future event in specific terms which later came true.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nostradamus' writings\nare exploited in a number of fallacious ways. Ambiguous and wrong translations,\n\"creative\" interpretations, hoax writings, fictional accounts, and\nthe breaking of non-existent codes within his quatrains all contribute to a\nvast body of BULLSHIT work, all of it wrong, and many times the size of\neverything Nostradamus ever actually wrote\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild\u2019s historians\ngave HAJAAAAR bull that fear of prosecution by POPE for heresy compelled\nNostradamus to write only vaguely, but there is no historical evidence for\nthis\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cheetham's books were\nfull of historical events into which she shoehorned Nostradamus' quatrains,\nwith word, name and number substitutions whenever convenient, and she called\nthem \"amazingly accurate predictions\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Occasionally she went\nout on a limb and made future predictions, and when those years came and went\nwith none of her predictions coming true, she'd issue updated editions of her\nbooks with new names and dates and make the same tired old predictions again.\nFirst she interpreted references to Moammar Qaddafi, and later changed them to\nthe Ayatollah Khomeini, and later changed them again to Saddam Hussein..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Arabs could not\nunderstand it and they sold it to the white man as middle-men. &nbsp;This is how Arabs suddenly became an\nintelligent race. When their gold ran out, their knowledge too dried up..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All this gold was stolen\nby German Jew Rothschild who ruled India. font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">A period of 19 years is exactly equal to 235 synodic months and, rounded to full days, counts 6,939 days.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">19 tropical years = 6,939.602 days (12 \u00d7 354-day years + 7 \u00d7 384-day years + 3.6 days).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">235 synodic months (lunar phases) = 6,939.688 days (Metonic period by definition).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">254 sidereal months (lunar orbits) = 6,939.702 days (19 + 235 = 254).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">255 draconic months (lunar nodes) = 6,939.1161 days.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">365.2425 days (1 solar year) x 19 years = 6939.6075 days.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">235 lunar months x 29.53059 days (1 lunar month) = 6939.68865 days<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; Kerala astrologers used.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Apollo visited the Hyperboreans once every 19 years, at the high point of the cycle.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The \"abjad\" value of the word \"wahd\" meaning \"one\" is 19.&nbsp; It is used 19 times together with the name \"Allah.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The first verse (1:1), known as \u201cBasmalah,\u201d consists of 19 letters (</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">&nbsp;Surat an-Nasr ).</span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">In the Koran the word \"atee\" (obey) appears 19 times<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-WjsnrLKt3mY/WqFn2cHGMRI/AAAAAAABZLU/NhPQLoJspOQG4tWqwDB7RMgFT3ilQxXiACEwYBhgL/s1600/12XV9W-year-flower-template.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"1143\" data-original-width=\"1600\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-WjsnrLKt3mY/WqFn2cHGMRI/AAAAAAABZLU/NhPQLoJspOQG4tWqwDB7RMgFT3ilQxXiACEwYBhgL/s1600/12XV9W-year-flower-template.jpg\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The first Sura to be revealed (Sura 96) is the 19th from the end. The first verses of the Qur'an to be revealed are the first five verses of Sura 96 and the total number of words in these verses is 19. The first Sura to be revealed, Surat al-'Alaq, consists of 19 verses and 285 (19 x 15) letters.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Surat an-Nasr, the final Sura to be revealed, consists of a total of 19 words.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Lt3oyE3_qbc/WqFoQxpFSeI/AAAAAAABZLY/uwaefU9K9Mo3gwicSzaIQD2w9DyewfAXQCLcBGAs/s1600/kraDka-4.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"361\" data-original-width=\"640\" height=\"361\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Lt3oyE3_qbc/WqFoQxpFSeI/AAAAAAABZLY/uwaefU9K9Mo3gwicSzaIQD2w9DyewfAXQCLcBGAs/s640/kraDka-4.png\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The lunar nodes are the orbital nodes of the Moon, that is, the two points at which the orbit of the Moon crosses the ecliptic. The ascending (or north) node is where the Moon moves into the northern ecliptic hemisphere, while the descending (or south) node is where the Moon enters the southern ecliptic hemisphere.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Eclipses involving the Moon occur only near the lunar nodes. A solar eclipse occurs when the passage of the Moon through a node coincides with the new moon, while a lunar eclipse occurs when the passage coincides with the full moon.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Since the orbital plane of the Moon precesses in space, the lunar nodes also precess around the ecliptic, completing one revolution (r nodal period) in 19 years . &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Once during the 19 year nodal period (when the ascending node of the Moon's orbit coincides with the vernal equinox), the Moon's declination reaches a maximum and minimum (northern and southern extremes): about 28.6\u00b0 from the celestial equator..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The precession of the lunar nodes has a small effect on Earth's tides. The U.S. National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) determines mean lower low water (MLLW) at a location by averaging the height of the lowest tide recorded at that location each day during a 19-year recording period, known as the National Tidal Datum Epoch..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The North ( Rahu ) and South Nodes ( &nbsp;Ketu ) indicate our karma.. The lunar nodes trace out the point in the moon's orbit that crosses the Sun's orbit, the ecliptic. These invisible calculated points, which are 180\u00b0 apart, move in retrograde motion through the sky..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The nodes pass through each zodical sign in just under 19 months.. Rahu is linked to the lunar perigee, or the point in the lunar orbit when the Moon is closest to the earth, Ketu is related to the lunar apogee when the Moon is farthest away from the Earth.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">When the Moon is near the Perigee it is more than one tenth times as large in the sky as it is when it is at the apogee point. Eclipses occur when the Sun or Moon pass over the nodal axis. At those time, the Sun and Moon line up in relation to the earth, increasing the gravitational pull which historically has been associated with tidal and geoseizmic events.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Additionally, the full Moon is often linked to emotional imbalances. The human body is &nbsp;70% water it is also influenced by the extremes of gravitational forces, affecting also the mind..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Rahu is personified as a diplomat and a shadowy planet and a legendary deceptor when disposed beneficially. Rahu is related to crisis due to manipulation. Ketu is dry and fiery in nature. Ketu can bring about sudden, explosive events. In mundane astrology, it is related to spiritual people and people that become isolated from others, for a number of reasons. This last element seems to resonate with Ketu being linked to the apogee and thus being associated with the Moon when it is furthest from the Earth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">FOR MORE ON RAHU AND KETU READ THE POST BELOW\u2014HOW ROTHSCHILD FOOLED HINDUS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">ROTHSCHILD ALSO FOOLED HINDUS INTO FASTING ON WRONG DATES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 8, 2018 at 10:55 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_6MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n19 years syncing of sun and moon cycle - absolutely true. My 19th birthday and pirannal was on same day. Same thing happens with everyone. Readers can check this in any birthstar calculator (eg https://www.drikpanchang.com/utilities/horoscope/hindu-birthstar-calculator.html) First calculate your birthstar giving birthday details. Then add 19 to year, you will get same star. again add 19 , you will get same star.</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_6BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_5T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_5TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_6b+seedrt5D\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_5B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c278605142303275433\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_5M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/fatawa-e-alamgiri-kosher-document-of_8.html?showComment=1520532606115#c278605142303275433\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 8, 2018 at 11:40 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_5MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nMeton of Athens and Callippus were visiting professor from Kodungallur University, owned by the Calicut king ( my hometown ). 2450 years ago, only India knew astronomy.<br />\n<br />\nThe world's oldest known astronomical calculator, the Antikythera Mechanism (2nd century BC), performs calculations based on both the Metonic and Callipic calendar cycles, with separate dials for each<br />\n<br />\nThe Callippic cycle of 76 years was used in the PERPETUAL MOTION Antikythera mechanism ( astrology ). found off Crete . It had NO use for Uranus/ Neptune and Pluto like Kerala astrology and instead used Rahu, Ketu and moon. The Mechanism has a dial for the Callippic cycle and the 76 years<br />\n<br />\nMetonic cycle, in chronology, a period of 19 years in which there are 235 lunations, or synodic months, after which the Moon\u2019s phases recur on the same days of the solar year, or year of the seasons. 235 lunations are 6,939 days, 16.5 hours; and 19 solar years, 6,939 days, 14.5 hours.<br />\n<br />\nThe cycle in which 19 years equals 235 lunations. If we assume a year is about 365 1\u20444 days, 19 years total about 6940 days, which exceeds 235 lunations by almost a third of a day, and 19 tropical years by four tenths of a day. It implicitly gave the solar year a duration of 6940\u204419 = 365 + 5\u204419 = 365 + 1\u20444 + 1\u204476 days = 365 d 6 h 18 min 56 s..<br />\n<br />\nA period of 19 solar years is almost exactly 235 lunar months, and rounded to full days counts 6940 days. The error is only 2 hours between 19 years and 235 months. This rounded day count defines the length of the year to be 365 + 1/4 + 1/76 days (the unrounded cycle is much more accurate).<br />\n<br />\nThe Metonic cycle has 19 tropical years and 235 synodic months in 6940 days. The Callippic cycle synchronizes days per orbit and rotations per orbit within the Metonic cycle, noting the difference of one after 4 Metonic cycles, a duration of 76 years. Distinguishing rotations and days infers knowledge of the precession cycle. 19 tropical years = 6939.602 days\u2026235 synodic months = 6939.688 days<br />\n<br />\nGolden number, in chronology, the position of a solar, or calendar, year within the 19-year Metonic cycle after which the phases of the Moon recur on the same dates. The sequence of golden numbers, used in fixing the date of Easter, begins at one at each year in which the New Moon occurs on January 1.<br />\n<br />\nThe Callippic cycle. This was a more accurate approximation, obtained by taking one day away from every fourth of Meton's cycles, so creating a 76-year cycle with a mean year of exactly 365.25 days.<br />\n<br />\nLater the solar Julian calendar was designed to have a year of this length by using leap days. The Julian calendar, proposed by Julius Caesar in 46 BC was designed by Kodungallur University.. a visting professor , Sosigenes of Alexandria<br />\n<br />\nThe Julian year is, therefore, on average 365.25 days long. It was intended to approximate the tropical (solar) year.<br />\n<br />\nJulius Caesar\u2019s sword ( PATTA / Wootz / Damascus ) was made in Kerala.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/11/urumi-invincible-kalari-sword-wootz.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/12/the-rotating-statue-on-nemi-ship-on.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_5B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-size: 17.6px;\" />\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; clear: both; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-9p2Jz9YApak/WqHppue1kpI/AAAAAAABZNQ/RGDgWxQt4UgXPi4YKOC5Bj2pesYgW7psACLcBGAs/s1600/200px-Ludnar_libration_with_phase_Oct_2007_450px.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"color: #888888; margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em; text-decoration-line: none;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"200\" data-original-width=\"200\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-9p2Jz9YApak/WqHppue1kpI/AAAAAAABZNQ/RGDgWxQt4UgXPi4YKOC5Bj2pesYgW7psACLcBGAs/s640/200px-Ludnar_libration_with_phase_Oct_2007_450px.gif\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The Moon orbits Earth in the prograde direction and completes one revolution relative to the stars in about 27.322 days (a sidereal month) and one revolution relative to the Sun in about 29.530 days (a synodic month).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The orientation of the orbit is not fixed in space, but rotates over time. This orbital precession is also called apsidal precession and is the rotation of the Moon's orbit within the orbital plane, i.e. the axes of the ellipse change direction.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The Moon's major axis \u2013 the longest diameter of the orbit, joining its nearest and farthest points, the perigee and apogee, respectively \u2013 makes one complete revolution every 8.85 Earth years, or 3,232.6054 days, as it rotates slowly in the same direction as the Moon itself (direct motion). The Moon's apsidal precession is distinct from the nodal precession of its orbital plane and axial precession of moon itself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">For the moon to make a complete rotation on its axis takes approximately 27.3 days. It takes the moon about this same time to orbit the earth; this is why we always see the same side of the moon<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The nodes are points at which the Moon's orbit crosses the ecliptic. The Moon crosses the same node every 27.2122 days, an interval called the draconic or draconitic month.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The line of nodes, the intersection between the two respective planes, has a retrograde motion: for an observer on Earth, it rotates westward along the ecliptic with a period of 18.60 years ( ROUNDED OFF AS 19 YEARS ) &nbsp;or 19.3549\u00b0 per year.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">When viewed from the celestial north, the nodes move clockwise around Earth, opposite to Earth's own spin and its revolution around the Sun. Lunar and solar eclipses can occur when the nodes align with the Sun, roughly every 173.3 days..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Every 18.6 years, the angle between the Moon's orbit and Earth's equator reaches a maximum of 28\u00b036\u2032, the sum of Earth's equatorial tilt (23\u00b027\u2032) and the Moon's orbital inclination (5\u00b009\u2032) to the ecliptic. This is called major lunar standstill. &nbsp;&nbsp;The nodes of the Moon's orbit precesses 360\u00b0 in about 6,798 days (18.6 years).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: medium;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">A NODICAL month &nbsp;(</span><span style=\"color: red;\">&nbsp;RAHU / KETU</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;) is shorter than a sidereal month because the nodes precess in the opposite direction to that in which the Moon is orbiting Earth, one rotation every 18.6 years.&nbsp;</span></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Therefore, the Moon returns to the same node slightly earlier than it returns to the same star.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">When viewed from the north celestial pole (i.e., from the approximate direction of the star Polaris) the Moon orbits Earth anticlockwise and Earth orbits the Sun anticlockwise, and the Moon and Earth rotate on their own axes anticlockwise.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">WE GAVE COSMIC\nALLEGORIES TO THE BIBLE AT THE FIRST COUNCIL OF NICEA IN 325 AD&nbsp; ..&nbsp; IT IS THERE IN THE \"HELENA BABY\" POST BELOW--</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">WE GAVE THE GOD CODE TO THE HEBREW JEW.</span></b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; THE CALICUT KING SENT HIS SPICES ACCOUNTING MESSAGES BY LONG RANGE PIGEONS&nbsp; TO SALALAH,&nbsp; GWADAR, MECCA, PETRA, MADEIN SALEH , ALEXANDRIA , DAMASCUS ,&nbsp; CAIRO,&nbsp; JERUSALEM,&nbsp; BATUMI, CONSTANTINOPLE,&nbsp; ( STOP OVER PIGEON RELAY AT SOCOTRA ) -- BY CODE&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/-yFZGF8FHSg/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/-yFZGF8FHSg?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Below:&nbsp; Scytale is a very\nsimple transposition cipher which ancient Greeks learnt from Kodungallur\nUniversity .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">A band is wrapped\naround a rod, a message is written, and when the band is unrolled\u2014VOILA -</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">a cipher text appears.</span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-sCU9CHa8Png/XCMpBqvSKPI/AAAAAAABfJk/M2d8nGwAIUoekUm73jXG5dRaKNgqVV9agCLcBGAs/s1600/199px-Skeytale.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"114\" data-original-width=\"199\" height=\"228\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-sCU9CHa8Png/XCMpBqvSKPI/AAAAAAABfJk/M2d8nGwAIUoekUm73jXG5dRaKNgqVV9agCLcBGAs/s400/199px-Skeytale.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Scytale Encryption uses\na cylinder and a band characterized by its number of turns L of the band around\nthe cylinder. The message is written along the cylinder, one letter per band,\nand when the end is reached, go to a new line. The ciphered message is the band\nunrolled, (i.e the message read by column). Scytale Decryption requires to know\nthe number N of letters by turn of the band (the size of the cylinder), or L\nthe number of turns around the cylinder.. Write the message on the band and\nwraps the band around the cylinder (of correct size) and the plain text should\nappear.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">The &nbsp;transposition cipher, consisting of a cylinder\nwith a strip of parchment wound around it on which is written a message The\nrecipient uses a rod of the same diameter on which the parchment is wrapped to\nread the message. It has the advantage of being fast and not prone to mistakes\nwith numerical accounting ..</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">Bahya ben Asher ibn\nHalawa</span>, ( died \u2013 1255), was a rabbi and scholar of Judaism. He was a\ncommentator on the Hebrew Bible.&nbsp; Nachmanides\n( died 1270 ) was his mentor.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jimihndrxguitar<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">October 28, 2017 at\n1:59 PM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Captain can you please\ngive your insight about ongoing 'Catalonia crisis' in Spain? Ajit Vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">October 28, 2017 at\n5:55 PM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The people of Catalonia\nspeak Catalan.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Catalonia is one of the\nnorthern provinces of Spain, bounded by the Mediterranean Sea and the Andorra\nMountains. Barcelona, Gerona and Besalu are all cities in Catalonia where the\nJewish populations that left a deep mark on the nationality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JEWS WANT CATALONIA <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is an old\nsynagogue in Barcelona\u2014I have seen it<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CRYPTO Jews are careful\nnot to go there.. But you could make them out as they were all SHYLOCK type\nmoneylenders who would not spare their own mothers . The men are all\ncircumcised. They spoke Jud\u00e6o-Catalan.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Catalan Jews defined\nthemselves Catalan. The Jewish community \u2013 the Aljama \u2013 revolved its life\naround the synagogue<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1492 when Jews left\nSpain due to the Expulsion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Spanish Jews who\nchose to leave Spain instead of converting dispersed throughout the region of\nNorth Africa known as the Maghreb. In those regions, they often intermingled\nwith the already existing Mizrahi Arabic or Berber speaking communities,\nbecoming the ancestors of the Moroccan, Algerian, Tunisian and Libyan Jewish\ncommunities.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Moses ben Nahman, or\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Nachmanides</span>, also known as the Ramban, was born in Gerona in 1194. The Ramban\nwas Rabbi of Gerona and later Grand Rabbi of Catalonia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have seen the Ramban\nSynagogue in Jerusalem<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ramban died in\nPalestine he died in 1269.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1415, Pope Benedict\nXIII prohibited the listening to, reading or teaching the Talmud.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Catalonia is wealthy,\ncontributing a quarter of Spain\u2019s exports and a fifth of its gross domestic\nproduct.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1924, the regime of\nRothschild\u2019s agent Primo de Rivera granted Spanish citizenship to the entire\nSephardic Jewish diaspora. In 2014, the government of Spain again on being arm\ntwisted by Rothschild passed a law allowing dual citizenship to Jewish\ndescendants who apply, in order to \"compensate for shameful events in the\ncountry's past\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE WILL NOT ALLOW JEWS\nTO HIJACK THE GLORY OF HINDU PAGAN CORBOBA.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nTHE CORDOBA TEMPLE HAD THE SHIVA / SHAKTI&nbsp; MERGE&nbsp;\nSIX POINTED STAR \u2013 JANUS/ ARDHANISHWARA . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
