, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Virtually all the media\nmoguls who founded Hollywood and the big three TV networks were immigrants, or\ntheir children, from predominantly orthodox Jewish communities in Eastern\nEurope.&nbsp; Most were pedophiles like Harry Weinstein\nand Roman Polanski.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most European Jews ,\nwhite Jews now living in Irael were a people of the book. But their book wasn\u2019t\nthe Bible. It was the Babylonian Talmud. To this day, the Talmud remains\nJudaism\u2019s highest moral, ethical and legal authority.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HITLER WAS A JEW..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/10/if-zionist-jews-created-isis-who.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/10/if-zionist-jews-created-isis-who.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Talmud is the sleazy\nsubstrata of a religious system gone terribly astray.. Shockingly, Judaism\u2019s\nmost revered authority actually endorses such sins as lying, oath-breaking, and\nindirect murder. And it even sanctions one of the greatest sins of all: child\nmolestation. Second century Rabbi Simeon ben Yohai, one of Judaism\u2019s very\ngreatest rabbis and a creator of Kabbalah, sanctioned pedophilia\u2014permitting\nmolestation of baby girls even younger than three! He proclaimed, \u201cA proselyte\nwho is under the age of three years and a day is permitted to marry a priest.\u201d\nToday, in ben Yohai\u2019s hometown of Meron, Israel, tens of thousands of orthodox\nand ultra-orthodox Jews gather annually for days and nights of singing and\ndancing in his memory. References to pedophilia abound in the Talmud. They\noccupy considerable sections of Treatises Kethuboth and Yebamoth and are\nenthusiastically endorsed by the Talmud\u2019s definitive legal work, Treatise\nSanhedrin.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The rabbis of the Talmud are notorious for their ENDLESS&nbsp; legal\nhairsplitting, and quibbling debates. But they share rare agreement about their\nright to molest three year old girls. In contrast to many hotly debated issues,\nhardly a hint of dissent rises against the prevailing opinion (expressed in\nmany clear passages) that pedophilia is not only normal but scriptural as well!\nIt\u2019s as if the rabbis have found an exalted truth whose majesty silences\ndebate. Because the Talmudic authorities who sanction pedophilia are so\nrenowned, and because pedophilia as \u201chalakah\u201d is so explicitly emphasized, not\neven the translators of the Soncino edition of the Talmud (1936) dared insert a\nfootnote suggesting the slightest criticism. They only comment: \u201cMarriage, of\ncourse, was then at a far earlier age than now. In fact, footnote 5 to\nSanhedrin 60b rejects the right of a Talmudic rabbi to disagree with ben\nYohai's endorsement of pedophilia: \"How could they [the rabbis], contrary\nto the opinion of R. Simeon ben Yohai, which has scriptural support, forbid the\nmarriage of the young proselyte?\" Babylonian priests said a man's\nreligious duty included regular sex with temple prostitutes. Bestiality was\nwidely tolerated. So Babylonians hardly cared whether a rabbi married a three\nyear old girl.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN JEW ROTHSCHILD\nRULED INDIA HE CREATED TEMPLE PROSTITUTION FOR HIS JEWISH OFFICERS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/02/devadasi-system-immoral-lie-of-temple.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/02/devadasi-system-immoral-lie-of-temple.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TO MAKE THE HINDU SELF\nLOATHING HE INJECTED POISON INTO KAMASUTRA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/07/kamasutra-by-vatsayana-immoral-sexual.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/07/kamasutra-by-vatsayana-immoral-sexual.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ONE OF THE REASONS WHY\nJEWS WERE KICKED OUT OF ALL&nbsp; NATIONS IS\nDUE TO THEIR PENCHANT FOR PEDOPHILE AND ANAL RAPE OF SMALL BOYS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If Jews want to revere\nthe transcendent wisdom and moral guidance of the Pharisees and their Talmud,\nthey must accept the right of their greatest ancient sages to violate children.\nTo this hour, no synod of Judaism has repudiated their vile practice.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Talmud_Unmasked\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Talmud_Unmasked</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What exactly did these\nsages say?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Pharisees justified\nchild rape by explaining that a boy of nine years was not a \u201cman\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thus they exempted him\nfrom God\u2019s Mosaic Law: \u201cYou shall not lie with a male as one lies with a\nfemale; it is an abomination\u201d (Lev. 18:22) One passage in the Talmud gives\npermission for a woman who molested her young son to marry a high priest. It\nconcludes, \u201cAll agree that the connection of a boy aged nine years and a day is\na real connection; whilst that of one less than eight years is not.\" &nbsp;Because a boy under 9 is sexually immature, he\ncan't \"throw guilt\" on the active offender, morally or legally.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A woman could molest a\nyoung boy without questions of morality even being raised: \"\u2026the\nintercourse of a small boy is not regarded as a sexual act.\" The Talmud\nalso says, \"A male aged nine years and a day who cohabits with his\ndeceased brother's wife acquires her (as wife).\" &nbsp;Clearly, the Talmud teaches that a woman is\npermitted to marry and have sex with a nine year old boy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In contrast to Simeon\nben Yohai's dictum that sex with a little girl is permitted under the age of\nthree years, the general teaching of the Talmud is that the rabbi must wait\nuntil a day after her third birthday. She could be taken in marriage simply by\nthe act of rape.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">R. Joseph said: Come\nand hear! A maiden aged three years and a day may be acquired in marriage by\ncoition and if her deceased husband\u2019s brother cohabits with her, she becomes\nhis. (Sanh. 55b)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A girl who is three\nyears of age and one day may be betrothed by cohabitation. . . .(Yeb. 57b)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A maiden aged three\nyears and a day may be acquired in marriage by coition, and if her deceased\nhusband\u2019s brother cohabited with her she becomes his. (Sanh. 69a, 69b, also\ndiscussed in Yeb. 60b)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was taught: R.\nSimeon b. Yohai stated: A proselyte who is under the age of three years and one\nday is permitted to marry a priest, for it is said, But all the women children\nthat have not known man by lying with him, keep alive for yourselves, and Phineas\n(who was priest, the footnote says) surely was with them. (Yeb. 60b)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">[The Talmud says such\nthree year and a day old girls are] . . . fit for cohabitation. . . But all\nwomen children, that have not known man by lying with him, it must be concluded\nthat Scripture speaks of one who is fit for cohabitation. (Footnote to Yeb.\n60b)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The example of Phineas,\na priest, himself marrying an underage virgin of three years is considered by\nthe Talmud as proof that such infants are \"fit for cohabitation.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">MOST OF THE 32 RABBIS OF\nTHE ELP EXPERIMENT&nbsp; WERE PEDOPHILES.. THEY WERE GIVEN GODs BLESSINGS OF\nIMMORTALITY.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In their now famous \"famous rabbis\"\nexperiment, mathematician Eliyahu Rips, physicist Doron Witztum, and computer\nprogrammer Yoav Rosenberg took the names of thirty-two well-known Jewish rabbis\n(selected randomly from a Jewish encyclopedia), along with their dates of birth\nand dates of death. Israelis&nbsp; They then\nsearched for the ELSs of these groupings in the Hebrew text of Genesis, and\ncompared the results with the results from searching for randomized groupings\nof the names and dates. The result, the Israelis claim, was that the ELSs for\nthe correctly grouped names and dates were much \"closer\" to each\nother than those for the randomized sets. The effect that Witztum et al report\nwas so strong that the set of names and dates that were correctly matched up\nbeat out all but 3 of 10 million random combinations! The implication, they\nclaim, is that the 32 rabbis ( MOST OF WHOM WERE PEDOPHILES ) and their dates\nof birth and death are encoded in the book of Genesis.. See God is so fond of\nthem!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Talmud teaches that\nan adult woman\u2019s molestation of a nine year old boy is \"not a sexual\nact\" and cannot \"throw guilt\" upon her because the little boy is\nnot truly a \"man.\u201d &nbsp;But they use\nopposite logic to sanction rape of little girls aged three years and one day:\nSuch infants they count as \u201cwomen,\" sexually mature and fully responsible\nto comply with the requirements of marriage.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Talmud footnotes 3\nand 4 to Sanhedrin 55a clearly tell us when the rabbis considered a boy and\ngirl sexually mature and thus ready for marriage. \"At nine years a male\nattains sexual matureness\u2026 The sexual matureness of woman is reached at the age\nof three.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/08/homosexuality-pedophilia-deviant-porn.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/08/homosexuality-pedophilia-deviant-porn.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Pharisees were\nhardly ignorant of the trauma felt by molested children. To complicate redress,\nthe Talmud says a rape victim must wait until she was of age before there would\nbe any possibility of restitution. She must prove that she lived and would live\nas a devoted Jewess, and she must protest the loss of her virginity on the very\nhour she comes of age. \u201cAs soon as she was of age one hour and did not protest\nshe cannot protest any more.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Talmud defends\nthese strict measures as necessary to forestall the possibility of a Gentile\nchild bride rebelling against Judaism and spending the damages awarded to her\nas a heathen - an unthinkable blasphemy! But the rights of the little girl were\nreally of no great consequence, for, \"When a grown-up man has intercourse\nwith a little girl it is nothing, for when the girl is less than this (three\nyears and a day) it is as if one put the finger into the eye.\" The\nfootnote says that as \u201ctears come to the eye again and again, so does virginity\ncome back to the little girl under three years.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In most cases, the\nTalmud affirms the innocence of male and female victims of pedophilia.\nDefenders of the Talmud claim this proves the Talmud's amazing moral\nadvancement and benevolence toward children; they say it contrasts favorably\nwith \"primitive\" societies where the child would have been stoned\nalong with the adult perpetrator.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Actually, the rabbis,\nfrom self-protection, were intent on proving the innocence of both parties\ninvolved in pedophilia: the child, but more importantly, the pedophile. They\nstripped a little boy of his right to \"throw guilt\" on his assailant\nand demanded complicity in sex from a little girl. By thus providing no\nsignificant moral or legal recourse for the child, the Talmud clearly reveals\nwhose side it is on: the raping rabbi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Child rape was\npracticed in the highest circles of Judaism. This is illustrated from Yeb. 60b:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There was a certain\ntown in the land of Israel the legitimacy of whose inhabitants was disputed,\nand Rabbi sent R. Romanos who conducted an inquiry and found in it the daughter\nof a proselyte who was under the age of three years and one day, and Rabbi\ndeclared her eligible to live with a priest.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The footnote says that\nshe was \u201cmarried to a priest\u201d and the rabbi simply permitted her to live with\nher husband, thus upholding \u201chalakah\u201d as well as the dictum of Simeon ben\nYohai, \u201cA proselyte who is under the age of three years and one day is\npermitted to marry a priest.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">ROMAN EMPEROR HADRIAN\nMASSACRED THE JEWS FOR THEIR PENCHANT TO SUCH THE PENIS OF SMALL BABIES.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/bar-kokhba-in-fight-to-finish-over.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/bar-kokhba-in-fight-to-finish-over.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These child brides were\nexpected to submit willingly to sex. Yeb. 12b confirms that under eleven years\nand one day a little girl is not permitted to use a contraceptive but \u201cmust\ncarry on her marital intercourse in the usual manner.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Sanhedrin 76b a\nblessing is given to the man who marries off his children before they reach the\nage of puberty, with a contrasting curse on anyone who waits longer. In fact,\nfailure to have married off one\u2019s daughter by the time she is 12-1/2, the\nTalmud says, is as bad as one who \u201creturns a lost article to a Cuthean\u201d\n(Gentile) - a deed for which \u201cthe Lord will not spare him.\u201d &nbsp;This passage says: \u201c\u2026 it is meritorious to\nmarry off one\u2019s children whilst minors.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Perusing the Talmud,\none is overwhelmed with the recurrent preoccupation with sex, especially by the\nmost eminent rabbis. Dozens of illustrations could be presented to illustrate\nthe delight of the Pharisees to discuss sex and quibble over its minutest\ndetails.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The rabbis endorsing\nchild sex undoubtedly practiced what they preached. Yet to this hour, their\nwords are revered. Simeon ben Yohai is honored by Orthodox Jews as one of the\nvery greatest sages and spiritual lights the world has ever known. A member of\nthe earliest \"Tannaim,\" rabbis most influential in creating the Talmud,\nhe carries more authority to observant Jews than Moses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today, the Talmud\u2019s\noutspoken pedophiles and child-rape advocates would doubtlessly spend hard time\nin prison for child molestation. Yet here is what the eminent Jewish scholar,\nDagobert Runes (who is fully aware of all these passages), says about such\n\u201cdirty old men\u201d and their perverted teachings:--</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is no truth\nwhatever in Christian and other strictures against the Pharisees, who\nrepresented the finest traditions of their people and of human morals.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">RABINDRANATH TAGOREs\nGRANDFATHER DWARAKNATH TAGORE RAN THE BIGGEST WHOREHOUSE ON THE PLANET (\nSONAGACHI CALCUTTA ).. &nbsp;THIS BROTHEL\nCATERED TO HOMOSEXUALITY AND PEDOPHILIA..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/08/opium-drug-running-tagore-family-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/08/opium-drug-running-tagore-family-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">ANTI-HINDU KERALA CM\nPINARAYI VIJAYAN WILL ENFORCE SUPREME COURTs ORDER ON MENSTRUATING WOMEN\nENTERING SABARIMALA..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">BUT WHEN IT COMES TO\nCHRISTIAN VOTES HE WILL GO AGAINST THE SUPREME COURT VERDICT ...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">In 1912, the Malankara\nChurch split into the Malankara Orthodox Church and the Jacobite Syrian Church\non the question of the supreme head..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Atheist commie CM\nPinarayi Vijayan is supporting Bishop Joseph Mor Gregorios of The Jacobite\nSyrian Christian Church for votes..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Also known as the\nMalankara Jacobite Syrian Christian Church or the Jacobite Syrian Christain\nChurch of India, is an autonomous Oriental Orthodox Church based in Kerala, and\nis an integral branch of the Syriac Orthodox Church of Antioch..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The church lost its\nlegal status as the Malankara church and thereby the ownership of several\nchurches, in a historic verdict of the Supreme court of India which put an end\nto decades of litigations and disputes that surrounded the Jacobite Syrian\nChurch and Malankara Orthodox Syrian Church \u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">This fellow is is a\nSyriac Orthodox bishop, and the Secretary to the Holy Episcopal Synod in\nMalankara Kerala..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The word Malankara is\nderived from the island of Maliankara, where SAINT THOMAS WHO NEVER EXISTED\nfirst landed in India..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Mar Thoma, as Thomas\ncame to be known here, was ordained the first head or metropolitan of the\nMalankara Church. The patriarch of Antioch was the spiritual head of the\nMalankara Church, but he had no control over the parish churches and\nproperties..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">In 1912, the Malankara\nChurch split into the Malankara Orthodox Church and the Jacobite Syrian Church\non the question of the supreme head..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Malankara Orthodox\nChurch considers the Malankara metropolitan its head while the Jacobite Syrian\nChurch recognises the patriarch of Antioch as its spiritual head. Both factions\ntrace their origin to Saint Thomas..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Amid growing rift\nwithin the Jacobite Syrian Church, Joseph Mor Gregorios on Friday resigned from\nthe post of secretary, Synod. He will, however, continue as Metropolitan of the\nKochi Diocese..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">In July 2018, the\nSupreme Court had held that the Orthodox faction has the right to conduct\nprayers and run the affairs at the Jacobite churches, as per the 1934\nconstitution of the Malankara church. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Supreme Court\u2019s two\nearlier verdicts in 1958 and 1995, had also gone against the Jacobite faction,\nwhich has among its ranks nearly 1.3 million followers. The Orthodox faction\ncounts around 2.6 million members. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">According to the Book\nof Genesis, Jacob was the third Hebrew progenitor with whom God made a\ncovenant. He is the son of Isaac and Rebecca, the grandson of Abraham, Sarah\nand Bethuel, the nephew of Ishmael, and the younger twin brother of Esau. Jacob\nhad twelve sons and at least one daughter, by his two wives, Leah and Rachel,\nand by their handmaidens Bilhah and Zilpah\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Jacob's twelve sons,\nnamed in Genesis, were Reuben, Simeon, Levi, Judah, Dan, Naphtali, Gad, Asher,\nIssachar, Zebulun, Joseph, and Benjamin. His only daughter mentioned in Genesis\nis Dinah. The twelve sons became the progenitors of the \"Tribes of\nIsrael\"..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">KNANAYA KERALA\nCHRISTIANS HAVE BEEN MISLED BY WIKIPEDIA AND JEW ROTHSCHILD TO THINK THAT YOU\nARE CHRISTIANS / JEWS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">JUST LIKE THE NASRANIS\nYOU TOO CAME RUNNING TO KERALA BECAUSE YOUR ANCESTORS WERE BEING BURNT ALIVE (\nAFTER CHRISTIANITY RELIGION WAS BORN IN 325 AD )..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">YOUR ANCESTORS CAME\nRUNNING TO MIZIRIS BY SHIP , ALONG WITH THOMAS OF CANA IN 345 AD..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">THOSE DAYS ESSENES OF\nCANAAN WERE BEING BURNT ALIVE FOR WORSHIPING KALI ( ASHERAH/ ASHTORETH /\nASTHARTE )-&nbsp; ASHTA MEANS EIGHT ARMED KALI\n, THE GODDESS OF WAR..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">AZTECS OF MEXICO\nWORSHIPED THE SAME GODDESS.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; IN KERALA\nSHE IS KNOWS AS BHAGAWATI \u2013OF THE KODUNGALLUR TEMPLE..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">CHRISTINITY CAME TO\nCANAAN AREA IN PALESTINE VERY LATE..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">You shall tear down\ntheir altars and smash their sacred pillars and burn their Ashterim with fire,\nand you shall cut down the engraved images of their gods and obliterate their\nname from that place. (Deuteronomy 12:3)..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Israelites also\nworshiped Asherah from as early as the time immediately following the death of\nJoshua (Judges 2:13)..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Like how they got rid\nof Apollonius of Tyana , the Kerala sage after whom Jesus Christ ( who never\nexisted ) was modeled , the Christians and the Jews combined forces ( later\njoined by Muslims ) and destroyed every MULTI ARMED GOD IDOL in that entire\narea..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Let me quote Wikipedia\n\u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">QUOTE :&nbsp; Herodotus wrote that the religious community\nof Aphrodite originated in Phoenicia and came to Greeks from there. He also\nwrote about the world's largest temple of Aphrodite, in one of the Phoenician\ncities. Her name is the second name in an energy chant sometimes used in Wicca:\n\"Isis, Astarte, Diana, Hecate, Demeter, Kali, Inanna.\"[14]&nbsp;&nbsp; UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The term Knanaya\nderives from the name of Thomas of Cana ( Knai Thoma). He was NOT a Christian\nbishop norwas he a Jew . He was a Hindu merchant. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The story that there\nwas a Christian by name Uraha Mar Yousef ( Mor Joseph of Urfa)&nbsp; on the ship is BULL.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; These Hindu people were running away from CRUEL\nChristians ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;
