IT BELONGS TO HINDU ESSENES\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Kerala NASRANIS even\ntoday call themselves MARGAVASIS ( same in Malayalam and Sanskrit for FOLLOWERS\nOF THE WAY )..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">These Qumran sect/\nEssenes / Nazrenes referred themselves as the \u201cfollowers of The Way\u201d..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Moses was NOT a\nJew\u2014&nbsp; he was Hindu Essene .. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">John the Baptist a\nKerala sage was Hindu Essene. John the Baptist was a vegan and was\nuncircumcised . .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Moses preserved the\nEssene teachings for the Children of Light (the Essenes became known as the\n\"Children of Light\")<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"And Moses hid the\ninvisible Law within his breast, and kept it for a sign for the Children of\nLight.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">When modern scholars\nassert that the Essenes of Qumran were founded about 200 years before the time\nof Jesus, they are correct in regard to that one Essene group at Qumran; but\nthe overall Essene movement is thousands of years more ancient..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Dead Sea Scrolls,\nwonderful as they are, were written by Essenes who were prayerfully preparing\nfor the coming of the Universal Messiah KALKI..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">In 325 AD, they\nborrowed Essene ( HINDU ) philosophy heavily .&nbsp;\nWe read in The Gospel of the Holy Twelve:&nbsp; \"The soul is purified through many\nre-births and experiences.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">In another passage of\nthe same manuscript, Jesus states:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;\"So through many re-births will ye soul\nbe made perfect.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"As all creatures\ncome from the unseen into this world, so they return to the unseen, and so will\nthey come again till they be purified.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"... and to them\nwill be given space to consider, and amend their lives....\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"The body that ye\nlay in the grave, or that is consumed by fire, is not the body that shall be,\nbut they who come again shall receive other bodies, and as they have sown in\none life, so shall they reap in another.\" ( ESSENE \u2013 HINDU LAW OF KARMA )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"Blessed are they\nwho suffer many experiences, for they shall be made perfect through suffering:\nthey shall be as the angels of God in heaven and die no more, neither shall\nthey be born anymore, for death and birth have no more dominion over\nthem.\" ( after elevation of soul to seventh astral layer or Vaikunta /\nMOKSHA\u2014no more re-birth on earth )..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">ALL THIS HEAVEN/ HELL\nBULL IN BIBLE WAS INSERTED BY VATICAN TO GRAB POWER\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">IN HINDUISM AND ESSENE/\nNAZARENE PHILOSOPHY THERE IS NO HEAVEN/ HELL\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">KERALA SAGES PROFICIENT\nIN ASTRONOMY ATTENDED THE FIRST COUNCIL OF NICEA IN 325 AD CALLED BY HINDU\nROMAN EMPEROR CONSTANTINE THE GREAT.. TO COOK UP THE COSMIC ALLEGORY PART OF\nTHE BIBLE..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">ALL ROMAN EMPERORS WITH\nTHE DEATH OF CONSTANTINE THE GREAT WERE HINDUS.. ALL ROMAN SENATORS WERE\nHINDUS..THE GLORY OF ROME IS HINDU..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Jesus said :<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"Verily I say unto\nyou, they who partake of benefits which are gotten by wronging one of God's\ncreatures, cannot be righteous; nor can they understand holy things, or teach\nthe mysteries of the kingdom, whose hands are stained with blood, or whose\nmouths are defiled with flesh.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"God giveth the\ngrains and the fruits of the earth for food; and for righteous man truly there\nis no other lawful sustenance for the body....\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"Wherefore I say\nunto all who desire to be my disciples, keep your hands from bloodshed and let\nno flesh meat enter your mouths; for God is just and bountiful, who ordaineth\nthat man shall live by the fruits and seeds of the earth alone.\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">In another verse of the\nsame manuscript, Jesus declares:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"I am come to end\nthe sacrifices and feasts of blood, and if ye cease not offering and eating of\nflesh and blood, the wrath of God shall not cease from you, even as it came to\nyour fathers in the wilderness, who lusted for flesh, and they ate to their\ncontent, and were filled with rottenness, and the plague consumed them\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"And I say unto\nyou, though ye be gathered together in my bosom, if ye keep not my commandments\nI will cast you forth; for, if ye keep not the lesser mysteries, who shall give\nyou the greater?\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"He that is\nfaithful in that which is least is faithful also in much: and he that is unjust\nin the least is unjust also in much.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Jesus said:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"For of the fruits\nof the trees and the seeds of the herbs alone do I partake, and these are\nchanged by the Spirit into my flesh and my blood. Of these alone and their like\nshall ye eat who believe in me, and are my disciples, for of these in the\nSpirit, come life and health and healing unto man.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">( THIS IS SAME AS\nESSENE/ NAZARENE/ HINDU WAY )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">FROM MEAT EATING THE\nWHITE CHRISTIAN METAMORPHOSED TO CANNIBALISM. .&nbsp;\nTHE POPE ENCOURAGED ABSOLUTE GENOCIDE AND CRIMINAL BEHAVIOR TO CONVERT\nALL TO CHRISTIANITY\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/st-patrick-genocide-of-druids-pope-leo_30.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/st-patrick-genocide-of-druids-pope-leo_30.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">In \"Holy\nTwelve\", Jesus makes that point very clear:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"God is both male\nand female, not divided, but the Two in One.... In God the masculine is not\nwithout the feminine, nor is the feminine without the masculine: Love is not\nwithout knowledge, Justice is not without Mercy, the Head is not without the\nHeart. In God, the masculine powers and feminine powers are perfectly united as\nONE.\" ( SHIVA-SHAKTI ARDHANISHAVARA CONCEPT )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">In his book titled, The\nDead Sea Scrolls: The Essenian Forerunners of Christ, Theodore Heline writes:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"From the\nrecovered portions of the Manual of Discipline we learn that an applicant for\nEssene membership was placed on a one year's probation. If his conduct proved\nworthy, two more years of study and testing followed. Then if favorably passed\nupon by the priest and the majority of the members he was admitted to full membership....\nOn attaining full membership, but not until then, individuals surrendered\nwithout reservation all personal possessions to the common store.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">In The Gospel of the\nHoly Twelve, in regard to the 'Last Supper':--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"And at evening\nthe Master cometh into the house, and there are gathered with him the\nTwelve....And they were all clad in garments of white linen....\u201d ( HINDU\nESSENES AND HINDU NAZARENES WORE ONLY WHITE LINEN )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Edmond Szekely, in From\nEnoch to the Dead Sea Scrolls, writes:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"The Essenes lived\non the shores of lakes and rivers, away from cities and towns, and practiced a\ncommunal way of life, sharing equally in everything. They were mainly\nagriculturists and arboriculturists, having a vast knowledge of crops, soil and\nclimatic conditions which enabled them to grow a great variety of fruits and\nvegetables in comparatively desert areas and with a minimum of labor.\"..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"The Essenes had\ngreat agricultural proficiency... producing a large variety of fruits and vegetables\nof the highest quality and in such abundance they periodically had a surplus to\ndistribute to the needy.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">In his book The\nMystical Christ, Manly Hall writes:-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"There was no\nidleness among the Essenes.... The group was not... financed by the State; it\nwas supported entirely by its own members, whose gain from lawful enterprise\nwas kept in the common purse. The term 'lawful enterprise' was interpreted as\nhonest and honorable work. No activity was considered superior to another. Each\nof those who came bestowed his talents and abilities, but practiced them only\naccording to the convictions of conscience. As many who sought refuge in the\nsettlement had no inclination to continue their previous occupations, they had\nno special skill suitable to their new way of living. These farmed the\nsurrounding area and performed such labor as might be required for the common\ngood. Some apprenticed themselves to craftsmen and learned new trades.\"..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"It is a mistake\nto assume that the Essenes were simply agriculturists and craftsmen. Some had\nbeen scholars or wealthy merchants or successful tradesmen. Each in his own way\nhad found it impossible to continue practices which offended his soul. He had,\ntherefore, divided his goods, bestowed his properties, terminated his worldly\ncareer, and returned to the natural faith of his fathers.\" ( HINDU SANYAS\n)..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u201cThat the intellectual\nlevel of the community was high can be gathered from the historical accounts of\nthe sect. Essenes were selected as teachers of the young and Roman officials\nresiding in Palestine selected these mystics, preferring them to scholars of\nother Jewish sects or tutors sent from Rome. Under the gentle guidance of these\ngodly men, children received not only learning, but also grace and\nenlightenment.\"..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"Some of the\nEssenes practiced herbal medicine and healed the sick .... They were especially\nmindful of the poor, who could not afford to engage physicians. When the\nEssenian doctor attended a patient, he would not only prescribe a remedy, but\nwould also clean the house, do the mending and washing and any other task which\nsickness had interrupted. If some gift was forced upon him by one of the\ngrateful, it was placed in the general storehouse of the sect.\"..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Robert Chaney, writes\nabout healer Essenes in his book, The Essenes and their Ancient Mysteries:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"The Therapeutae,\nconsisted of those Essenes who engaged in the healing art.&nbsp; The word \"Essenes\" in the nearest\nAramaic equivalent means 'healers'....&nbsp;&nbsp;\nOne branch of the Essenes located near famed Lake Mareotis in Egypt, was\nknown far and wide for its accomplishments in the field of healing\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">For millenniums&nbsp; Essenes&nbsp;\npracticed \"holistic medicine.\" of AYURVEDA.&nbsp; Writes Daniel Maziarz, in his The Angelic Way\nto Love:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"Curiously enough,\nthe health practices of the ancient Essenes are making a huge comeback today\nunder the names of holistic health, naturopathy, preventive medicine, Ayurveda,\nand others.... Increasing numbers of people today are adopting the following\nnatural means of empowering their health that were also employed by the ancient\nEssenes:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">nutrition, especially\nthe powerful effect of specific natural foods to prevent and to heal disease<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">deep breathing\nexercises<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">physical yoga culture\nof all forms<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">ayurvedic herbs<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">fasting<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">massage ( lymph )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">suntherapy ( ATAPA\nSNANA and SURYA NAMASKAR)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">watertherapy\n(hydrotherapy)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">gardening<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">the use of precious and\nsemi-precious stones. ( divining )\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"Three basic\nprinciples were followed by The Essenes in their healing... First, it was\nbelieved that Divinity was expressed in the plant kingdom as an antidote for\nthe illnesses of the human kingdom, that for every illness there existed a\npalliative in a root, leaf or bark of a tree or plant. The Essenes therefore\nwere herbalists in the highest sense of the word\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"A second method\nof healing was to make use of 'healing stones' -- bits of various kinds of rock\nor hardened clay earth.... The power of such stones in influencing magnetic\nfields under the direction of one who is versed in this type of therapy became\ncommon knowledge at a later period. The Essenes also created salves from\nnatural sources. The clay and spittle Jesus used in Bible prescribed for the\nblind man may very well have originated from this source.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"The third method\nof healing in which the Essenes were extremely well versed drew upon the\nhealing powers of the invisible worlds around them. They acquired an\nunparalleled mastery in manipulating these healing powers of the superior\nspheres....\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"The Essenes held\nchildren in special regard.... They trained these young people and were\nattentive to natural abilities and inclinations. When these children reached\nmaturity, they were in no way required to accept the teachings of the sect or\nto become members. They might choose to do so or not, as they pleased.\"..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"The aged were\nheld in the highest esteem, and it was remembered that they had worked\nfaithfully and lovingly as long as their strength had permitted. They were\ngiven... devoted care and protected from want to the end of their lives.\"..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">In his&nbsp; book From Enoch to the Dead Sea Scrolls,\nEdmond Bordeaux Szekely writes:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"The Essenes knew\nthere was no escape from this circle of oppression, hatreds and violence, wars\nand revolutions, except through changing the ignorance of the individuals in the\nworld....<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"The solution\nwhich the Essenes offered for economic and social harmony can be applied in\nevery age, the present as well as the past. It contained four factors:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Separating from the\nchaotic conditions of the mass of mankind which refuses to obey natural and\ncosmic law.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Demonstrating a\npractical social system based on natural and cosmic law.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Communicating these\nideas to the outside world through teaching, healing and helping others\naccording to their needs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Attracting to their\ncommunities other individuals who are sufficiently evolved to be willing to\ncooperate with the law.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Consider the praise of\ncontemporaries such as Pliny, Josephus and Philo; these men actually knew the\nEssenes and said of them:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"... a race by\nthemselves, more remarkable than any other in all the world.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">-- Pliny<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"... they show\nmore love for each other than do others, and live a more moral life. Rightly do\nthey deserve to be called an example for the life of other people.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">-- Josephus<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"They live each\nday in constant and unalterable holiness.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">-- Philo<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"The Essenes\nresolved to live by the laws of God in a world of men.... By simply permitting\nconsciousness to guide conscience, and conscience to govern conduct, the\nEssenes unfolded the basic plan for human society. The more devoutly they\npracticed these principles, the more obvious it became that the program was\nboth possible and practical.... By loving their fellow men and serving them,\nthe Essenes discovered in their own hearts the God of love and service.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">SINCE THE ADVENT OF THE\nSINGLE MESSIAH , SINGLE HOLY BOOK,&nbsp;\nBURIAL&nbsp; RELIGIONS , HAS THIS\nPLANET KNOWN ANY PEACE ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Nearly all the Essene\nNazarenes were killed and most of their books (which contained the true\nteachings of Jesus) were burned along with them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">ESSENES AND NAZARENES\nCAME RUNNING BACK HOME TO KERALA BY SHIP.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">TODAY THE DESCENDANTS\nOF THE&nbsp; SAME ESSENES IN KERALA HAVE\nCONVERTED TO CHRISTIANITY DURING THE WHITE INVADERS RULE&nbsp; , EAT BEEF AND CURSE THEIR ANCIENT MOTHER\nRELIGION.&nbsp;&nbsp; THEY RIDICULE INDIA ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">MARK MY WORDS--\nAPOLLONIUS AND ESSENE WAY OF LIFE WILL COME BACK AGAIN ON THIS PLANET , --&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">THEIR DEAD SEA SCROLLS\nWHERE THEY AWAIT THE KALKI AVATAR CANNOT BE HIJACKED BY JEWS AND CHRISTIANS ANY\nMORE. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">SUCH IS THE POWER OF\nHUMAN INTENTION.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The DEAD SEA SCROLLS s\nwere hidden in jars by the Essenes, to hide them from the approaching Roman\ntroops during the great revolt (68AD).&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\nLot of Hindu Essenes came running back to Muziris Kerala by ship in 69\nAD..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">There was a earthquake\nat Qumran in 31 BC, during the times of King Herod the Great, the settlement\nwas severely damaged and deserted. The Essenes returned to rebuild the site in\n4BC. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;When the Jew revolt was crushed by the Romans\nin 68 AD, the Essenes of Qumran prepared themselves to the worst, and hid their\nprecious treasures (the dead sea scrolls) in the caves.&nbsp; The Romans indeed conquered Qumran (68AD),\ndestroyed it and dispersed the sect.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">SORRY LYING JEWS&nbsp;&nbsp; -&nbsp;&nbsp; I\nHAVE CALLED YOUR BLUFF.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">THERE IS A LIMIT TO\nTELLING KOSHER LIES&nbsp; . . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">According to Josephus,\nthe Dead Sea (\"lake Asphaltitis\") was full of bodies from the Jordan\nvalley cities and villages, killed by the Roman troops which were commanded by\nPlacidus (Wars 4 7 6): <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"And now Placidus,\nafter this good success that he had, fell violently upon the neighboring\nsmaller cities and villages; when he took Abila, and Julias, and Bezemoth, and\nall those that lay as far as the lake Asphaltitis, and put such of the deserters\ninto each of them as he thought proper. He then put his soldiers on board the\nships, and slew such as had fled to the lake...\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Years later, during the Bar-Kokhba revolt\n(132-135 AD) a Roman Garrison was stationed here to control the regional\ntraffic. They left after 20 years, and Qumran was abandoned and left in ruins\nfor 1800 years.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/bar-kokhba-in-fight-to-finish-over.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/bar-kokhba-in-fight-to-finish-over.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">In 1947 Bedouins\nshepherds discovered ancient scrolls in a local cave 1.5KM to the north of\nQumran (\"cave #1\"). The area was excavated and additional scrolls and\nfragments were discovered in 11 caves around Qumran. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The scrolls were hidden\nin jars, and were preserved relatively well due to the dry climate of the\nJudean desert. From the distribution of the location of the scrolls the\narchaeologists determined that Qumran was the nucleus of Essenes activity in\nthe region, a sort of learning center for the sect. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The buildings in Qumran\nincluded mainly public structures that hosted large public events, workshops\nand a scriptorium where the scrolls were written.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp; \"For their doctrine is this: That bodies\nare corruptible, and that the matter they are made of is not permanent; but\nthat the souls are immortal, and continue for ever; and that they come out of\nthe most subtile air, and are united to their bodies as to prisons, into which\nthey are drawn by a certain natural enticement; but that when they are set free\nfrom the bonds of the flesh, they then, as released from a long bondage,\nrejoice and soul mounts upward on cremation \"....<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The oasis at Qumran was\nan old spice trade and medicinal herb&nbsp;\noutpost ( Muziris by ship ) on the caravan route&nbsp; . It was a watering place for camels and\nhorses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The king of Calicut ,\nwho owned Muziris port , had his customs outpost here like at Mecca.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The aqueduct works of\nQumran were done by Nabatean workers like at Petra and Madein saleh.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/lost-civilization-of-petra-capt-ajit.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/lost-civilization-of-petra-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/02/madain-saleh-destruction-of-ancient.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/02/madain-saleh-destruction-of-ancient.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE INDIAN CHRISTIANS\nHAVE USURPED ESSENE JOHN THE BAPTIST. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">THEY HAVE A FAKE ARM TO\nPROVE IT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">TEEE HEEE !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Armenian_Church_of_St._John_the_Baptist\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Armenian_Church_of_St._John_the_Baptist</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">John\u2019s father Zechariah\nwas a Essene prophet around 520 BC . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">But hey, Christians\nhave made Hindu John the Baptist baptize Jesus ( Jew who never existed ) to\ngrab him.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">And double hey, the\nJews have circumcised John to the Baptist to grab him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">And triple hey, they\nhave his bones and even head all over Europe too.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"https://xenophilius.wordpress.com/2010/08/04/remains-of-st-john-the-baptist-found/\">https://xenophilius.wordpress.com/2010/08/04/remains-of-st-john-the-baptist-found/</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">MERE PAAASS JOHN PAAJI\nKA HAATH KA TUKDA HAI !&nbsp;&nbsp; TUMHAARE PAASS\nKYA HA ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">MERE PAAASS JOHN PAAAJI\nKA AKKA MUNDI HAI !</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c8276494706897811464\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6VOqqm-hCbM/XCa06XjAUxI/AAAAAAABfL4/E3K2A6jHNG0XTf7_mZb9kjj9WxD3GwmzQCK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://draft.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. BUT JOB EXISTED..<br />\n<br />\nHIS GRAVE IS IN SALALAH ( OMAN ) , I HAVE SEEN IT.. THE CALICUT KING CHERAMAN PERUMAL WHO WENT TO MEET MOHAMMAD THE PROPHET AT MECCA IS ALSO BURIED HERE.. I HAVE SEEN HIS GRAVE TOO.<br />\n<br />\nEVEN AFTER THE BIRTH OF ISLAM , DHOFAR ( SOUTH OF OMAN /NORTH OF YEMEN ) KINGDOM WAS OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING.<br />\n<br />\nTHE SEAPORT OF SALALAH WAS THE TRANSHIPMENT CENTRE OF CALICUT SPICES FOR MILLINIUMS..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS PLACE IS REFERRED TO IN THE JEWISH AND CHRISTIAN LITERATURE AS SABA\u2026 PEOPLE FROM SABA ARE CALLED SABATEANS .<br />\n<br />\nTHE CALICUT KINGs SPICE SHIPS UNLOADED SPICES AT SALALAH ( KINGDOM OF DHOFAR ) WHICH WAS AN OVERSEAS PART OF THE KINGDOM OF MALABAR/ NORTH KERALA/ OPHIR/ PUNT/ SHEBA ..<br />\n<br />\nFROM SALALAH SPICES WENT OVERLAND VIA MECCA TO PALESTINE / SYRIA AND FROM THERE BY SHIPS TO EUROPE...<br />\n<br />\nFROM GWADAR ( SEA PORT OF DHOFAR \u2013TODAY IN PAKISTAN ) OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING WENT OVERLAND TO BATUMI ( GEORGIA ) TO CONSTANTINOPLE AND FROM THERE TO EUROPE..<br />\n<br />\nSHIPPERS WERE JEWS WHO MADE ENORMOUS MONEY AS MIDDLEMEN.<br />\n<br />\nSABA IS A OFFSHOOT OF SHEBA ..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html<br />\n<br />\nKING SOLOMONs MOTHER WAS BATH SHEBA AND HIS WIFE WAS QUEEN SHEBA \u2013BOT KERALA NAMBOODIRI WOMEN.<br />\n<br />\nSABBATAI ZEVIs ( JEWISH MESSIAH ) HINDU ANCESTORS WERE FROM DHOFAR.<br />\n<br />\nGETTING BACK\u2014<br />\nJOB IS CONSIDERED AS A DECENDANT OF NOAH..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nNoah is mentioned in the Book of Genesis, Old Testament in the First Book of Chronicles, and the books of Tobit, Wisdom, Sirach, Isaiah, Ezekiel, 2 Esdras, 4 Maccabees; in the New Testament, he is mentioned in the gospels of Matthew, and Luke, the Epistle to the Hebrews, 1st Peter and 2nd Peter. Noah was the subject of much elaboration in the literature of later Abrahamic religions, including the Quran (Surahs 71, 7, 1, and 21).<br />\n<br />\nTHE HINDU ESSENSE DEAD SEA SCROLLS REFER TO NOAH MORE THAN 20 TIMES.. JEWS HAVE HIJACKED THE DEAD SEA SCROLLS\u2014SORRY, JEWS HAVE ZILCH , NTHING TO DO WITH DEAD SEA SCROLLS WHICH IS A HINDU ( PAGAN ) DOCUMENT..<br />\n<br />\nISAAC NEWTON HAS WRITTEN ( ISRAEL HAS THIS IN THEIR MUSEUM ) THAT NAH WAS OF HINDU ( PAGAN ) ORIGIN.. THERE IS NOTHING SHOCKING ABOUT IT.. BEFORE JUDAISM WAS BORN 2950 YEARS AGO, THERE WAS ONLY ONE RELIGION ON THIS PLANET\u2014HINDUISM.<br />\n<br />\nJERUSALEM WAS A GREAT CENTRE OF LEARNING WITH ANCIENT TEMPLES EVEN BEFORE JUDAISM WAS BORN.. TODAY THE JEWS/ MUSLIMS / CHRISTIANS FIGHT FOR JERUSALEM.. THEY HAVE BLANKED OUT HINDUSIM..<br />\n<br />\nhttps://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/helena-mother-of-roman-emperor.html<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=huJIzvzmz4A<br />\n<br />\nJOB WAS A HINDU KERALA SAGE WHO LIVED IN THE TIME OF HINDU KERALA SAGE JETHRO ( FATHER OF WIFE OF MOSES HINDU ZIPPORAH )..<br />\n<br />\nACCORDING TO THE TALMUD SAGES JETHRO AND JOB WERE EXTENSIVELY CONSUTED BY THE HINDU PHAROAH \u2013ALL THREE HAD ORIGINS FROM THE LAND OF PUNT ( KERALA ).. JETHRO AND JOB HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH EVIL BALAAM ANOTHER CONSULTANT OF THE PHAROAH....<br />\n<br />\nTALMUD AND TORAH CONSIDER RIGHTEOUS SAGES JETHRO AND JOB AS HEROES.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c8276494706897811464-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c8276494706897811464-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c2550788848590079303\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://draft.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/happy-new-year-2019-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html?showComment=1546320912331#c2550788848590079303\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 1, 2019 at 11:05 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nWhen Pharaoh was deciding whether to kill the baby Hebrew boys he consults the three. Balaam tells him to kill the Jews, Jethro to spare them and Job, who does not agree with the plan, says nothing.<br />\n<br />\nIt is LIE that baby Moses was set afloat in a basket by his mother Jochebed, down the river Nile in a basket to be picked up the princess of Egypt and brought up like her own son.<br />\n<br />\nThis story is lifted from the Krishna story of Kamsa and baby Krishna in the basket floating down the river Yamuna.. It was prophesied that Devaki's eighth son will slay Kamsa ( cousin of Devaki ) . So he imprisoned Devaki and her husband Vasudeva and killed all their children; however the eighth son, Krishna, an avatar of the god Vishnu, was transported to Gokul, to his foster mother Yeshoda.<br />\n<br />\nAfter Krishna grew up and returned to the kingdom, Kamsa was eventually killed by Krishna, as was originally predicted by the divine prophecy, and Ugrasena reinstated as King of Mathura<br />\n<br />\nJethro is a \"rescuer\" and Balaam is a \"perpetrator\", Job is has the role of \"the bystander\". And for this reason Job was SUNK in literature.<br />\n<br />\nTHE TRUTH IS JOB DID NOT REMAIN SILENT.. JOB ADVISED THE PHAROAH TO DO WHAT WILL MAKE HIM A GOOD RULER IN THE EYES OF HIS PEOPLE. THIS MEANS HE DID NOT SUPPORT THE KILLING OF THE HEBREW BOYS..<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: The king then spoke to Job ( Ayoub ) , and said: \"What sayest thou, Job, and what is thy advice respecting the Hebrews?\" Job replied: \"Behold, all the inhabitants of the land are in thy power. Let the king do as seemeth good in his eyes.\" UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nJETHRO AND JOB EXISTED.. JESUS DID NOT EXIST..<br />\n<br />\nCHRIST IS LIFTED FROM KRISHNA..<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c2183465847026656507\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14835154716780749825\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">knox j</a></cite><span class=\"icon user \" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/god-code-by-timothy-paul-smith-damning.html?showComment=1546332391172#c2183465847026656507\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 1, 2019 at 2:16 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nOne doubt. SHE WAS THE DRIVING FORCE BEHIND COOKING UP JESUS CHRIST AND THE BIBLE IN 325 AD..<br />\n<br />\nTHE REASON FOR COOKING UP JESUS WAS TO DEPETE APOLLONIUS OF TYANA ( A KERALA SAGE ) FROM HISTORY-- AS HE WAS MORE POWERFUL THAN THE ROMAN EMPERORS.. THE PEOPLE OF ROME LOVED HIM.<br />\n<br />\nIT IS A LIE THAT HINDU EMPEROR BLAMED CHRISTIANS FOR THE FIRE IN ROME.. THERE WAS NO CHRISTIANITY AT THAT TIME..<br />\n<br />\nNERO WAS A GOOD EMPEROR--HE DID NOT FIDDLE WHEN HE SAW ROME BURNING.. HE WAS NOT EVEN IN ROME WHEN THE FIRE TOOK PLACE.<br />\n<br />\nIT IS A LIE THAT PETER AND PAUL WERE KILLED BY NERO.. JESUS DID NOT EXIST AND SO DID HIS 12 DISCIPLES..<br />\n<br />\nIT IS A LIE THAT CHRISTIANS WERE FORCED TO FIGHT IN GLADIATORIAL CONTESTS AND WERE FED TO LIONS BY HINDU ROMAN EMPERORS...<br />\n<br />\nROMAN COINS MINTED TILL 325 AD BORE ROMAN HINDU GODS--NEVER CHRIST..<br />\n<br />\nTHE ARCH OF CONSTANTINE SHOWS NO INDICATION OF A RELIGION NAMED CHRISTIANITY..<br />\n<br />\nHINDU ROMAN EMPEROR DIOCLETIAN NEVER PERSECUTED CHRISTIANS-- SIMPLE BECAUSE THERE WAS NO CHRISTIANITY AT THAT TIME.. JESUS AND BIBLE WERE COOKED UP IN 325 AD..<br />\n<br />\nTHE EDICT OF MILAN IN 313 AD IS A LIE-- IT NEVER EXISTED. AS THERE WAS NO CHRISTIANITY AT THAT TIME..<br />\n<br />\nIT IS A LIE THAT CONSTANTINE THE GREAT MADE HINDU TEMPLES PAY FOR HIS NEW CITY CONSTANTINOPLE.<br />\n<br />\nI CHALLENGE ANYBODY TO SHOW A GENUINE ARTIFACT OF JESUS OR CHRISTIANITY OR BIBLE BEFORE 325 AD..<br />\n<br />\nTHE CONSTANTINIAN SHIFT \" IS A LIE. TILL HINDU ROMAN EMPEROR CONSTANTINE THE GREAT DIED ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE NEMI SHIPS DID NOT HAVE NEROs STATUE.. THE STATUES WERE OF KERALA HINDU SAGE APOLLONIUS OF TYANA ON WHOM JESUS WHO NEVER EXISTED WAS MODELLED..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/the-rotating-statue-on-nemi-ship-on.html<br />\n<br />\nTHE SON OF CONSTANTINE THE GREAT, WHO POISONED HIM AND HAD HIM BAPTISED AFTER HIS DEATH WAS A RABID HINDU HATER..<br />\n<br />\nThe first anti-pagan laws by the Christian state started with Constantine II. All Roman Hindu temples were torn down..<br />\n<br />\nEMPEROR JULIAN DID NOT CONVERT TO CHRISTIANITY..<br />\n<br />\nTHE SENATORS OF ROME WERE ALL HINDU.. THEIR TEMPLE WITHIN THE SENATE \"ALTAR OF VICTORY\" WAS DESTROYED BY CONSTANTINE II --BUT WAS REBUILT BY JULIAN.<br />\n<br />\nMOST OF THE HINDU ( PAGAN ) TEMPLES WERE JUST CONVERTED TO CHURCHES IN ROME.<br />\n<br />\nTHE HINDU TEMPLE OF PANTHEON HAVING THIS PLANETs LARGEST UN REINFORCED CONCRETE DOME IS NOW A CHURCH CALLED SANTA MARIA DEGLI ANGELI E DEI MARTIRI.<br />\n<br />\nThe churches of San Bartolomeo all\u2019Isola, San Basilio, San Lorenzo in Miranda, Santa Maria dei Martiri, Santa Maria de Secundicerio, San Nicola in Carcere, San Nicola dei Cesarini, San Sebastiano al Palatino, Santo Stefano delle Carrozze, Sant\u2019Urbano alla Caffarella, and the oratory of Saints Peter and Paul (now Santa Francesca Romana) were all Hindu temples.. I have seen them.<br />\n<br />\nThere are three Roman sanctuaries to the HINDU god Mithras, called Mithraea, that Christian authorities built over with new churches. One of the most famous of these can still be visited today under the church of San Clemente, near the Roman Colosseum.<br />\n<br />\nLIES WONT WORK !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c6608256290237647204\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6VOqqm-hCbM/XCa06XjAUxI/AAAAAAABfL4/E3K2A6jHNG0XTf7_mZb9kjj9WxD3GwmzQCK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">EVERY SPEECH BY ATHEIST COMMIE PINARAYI VIJAYAN AND HIS GANG , WAS CHERRY PICKED FROM MY POST ABOVE ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">EVERY VESTIGE OF THEIR SPEECHES ABOUT \" BRAHMANICAL PATRIARCHY \" , VIVEKANANDA CALLING KERALA A MADHOUSE ( BRANTHALAYAM ) , AYYANKALI ETC WERE LIFTED FROM MY POST...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THEY WILL NOT GET ANY INFORMATION IN BOOKS OR INTERNET UNLESS IT IS LIFTED FROM MY BLOGSITE ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MY NAIR AND NAMBOODIRI FRIENDS FRETTED AND SULKED WHEN THEY MET ME AFTER PENNING THIS POST, FOR NEARLY A YEAR.. THEY FELT THAT I HAVE LET THEM DOWN..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CHERRY PICKING WITH THEIR BACKS TO THE TREES IS WHAT HAPPENED YESTERDAY EVENING TO SUSTAIN A FOUL FOREIGN SPONSORED POLITICAL AGENDA..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WANNA KNOW THE REAL TREE ?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE DANAVA CIVILIZATION ( OF THIYYA KING MAHABALI ) FLOURISHED SEVERAL MILLENNIUMS BEFORE THE VEDIC CIVILIZATION..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIYYAS WERE RULERS OF KERALA , WHO PROVIDED SAGES , KINGS , AYURVEDA PHYSICIANS , ARCHITECTS , ASTRONOMERS , KALARI FIGHTING , OCEAN NAVIGATION ETC FOR THE WHOLE PLANET..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE THIYYA BLOODLINE RAN IN DYNASTIES OF EGYPTIAN PHARAOHS, ROMAN EMPERORS , MAYAN/ AZTEC/ INCA KINGS , JEWISH KINGS AFTER SOLOMON ETC ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">DNA TESTS DON\u2019T LIE .. USE MY DNA..</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/eight-sided-pyramid-of-giza-egypt.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">KING MAHABALIs FATHER VIROCHANA RULED THE WHOLE WORLD.. MAHABALI WAS BANISHED BY VISHNU AVATAR VAMANA TO PATALA ( PERU ) WHICH WAS PART OF HIS OWN KINGDOM..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE SANSKRIT , ASTRONOMY AND MATH KNOWING CREAM OF THIYYAS WERE KERALA NAMBOODIRIS..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">KERALA NAMBOODIRIS PROPAGATED THE VEDAS ORALLY FOR 330 CENTURIES ( THE GREATEST FEAT OF MAN ) BEFORE THEY WERE PENNED DOWN 70 CENTURIES AGO AT THE BANKS OF THE SARASWATI RIVER..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">KERALA NAMBOODIRIS ( ELDEST BROTHERS ) ARE THE ARYANS WITH SWASTIKA SYMBOL&nbsp;</span></b>AND SPECIAL HAIRDO..&nbsp; CHANAKYA , ADI SHANKARACHARYA , ARYABHATTA , VARARUCHI , APOLLONIUS OF TYANA ( ON WHOM JESUS CHRIST WAS MODELED ), JETHRO ( ON WHOM MOSES WAS MODLLED ) ETC WERE KERALA NAMBOODIRIS..</div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE&nbsp;</span><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">YOUNGER BROTHERS OF KERALA NAMBOODIRIS WERE THE SEMITES&nbsp;WITH SIX POINTED STAR AS SYMBOL</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">.. MOHAMMAD THE PROPHET, WAS A SEMITE WHOSE FATHERs ELDER BROTHER WAS THE NAMBOODIRI PRIEST OF THE SHIVA TEMPLE AT MECCA OASIS. THE DISGRACES LEFT HANDED SEMITES CREATED JUDAISM AND RIGHT TO LEFT HEBREW..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AFTER GERMAN JEW ROTHSCHILD STARTED RULING INDIA, THIYYAS WERE DEMOTED AND CONVERTED TO TODDY TAPPING MONKEYS ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BE VERY VERY VERY CLEAR-- THIYYAS ( THIRAYYARS ) ARE NOT BLUNT FACED EZHAVAS (MALAYYAR TRIBALS ) WHICH WHOM THEY HAVE BEEN CLUBBED TODAY BY THE WHITE INVADER..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NO THIYYA WILL EVER GIVE HIS DAUGHTER / SON TO AN EZHAVA ( SOUTH OF THRISSUR ) FOR MARRIAGE, THOUGH MARRIAGE BUREAUS CLUB THEM IN THE SAME BASKET....&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE GLORY OF DANAVA CIVILIZATION WAS SUNK BY THE WHITE MAN AND WE WERE PAINTED AS SAVAGES..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">WHY DID VISHNU AVATAR PARASHURAMA GIVE KERALA NAMBOODIRIS SPECIAL POWERS ?..&nbsp;</span></b></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold;\">MAIN REASON WAS ORAL TRANSMISSION OF VEDAS MUST CONTINUE, THERE MUST BE NO SUBDIVISION AND FRAGMENTATION OF FERTILE LAND ( ONLY ELDEST BROTHER OF KERALA NAMBOODIRIS COULD OWN LAND ) TO PRODUCE GOLDEN MEAN HOLY TOPSOIL FOOD AND AYURVEDIC HERBS..</span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/07/king-cobra-and-snake-temples-of-kerala.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NAMBOODIRIS GOT DRUNK WITH POWER AND THEY STARTED ILL TREATING THIYYA KINGS ( WHO MUST KEEP 6 FEET AWAY ) ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ADI SHANKARACHARYA A KERALA NAMBOODIRI GOT EXASPERATED AND DISTRIBUTED THE 4 VEDAS TO THE 4 CORNERS OF INDIA, 4000 YEARS AGO, BUT WITH A FIAT THAT ALL THE 4 MUTTS MUST BE HEADED BY A KERALA NAMBOODIRI..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_26.html?showComment=1545881415836#c2361375325877234225\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">December 27, 2018 at 9:00 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nTHE ENTIRE MAIN STREAM MEDIA HAS BLACKED OUT ONE OF THE MOST IMPORTANT EVENT OF THIS PLANET.. ON 26TH DEC 2018---BETWEEN 1800 TO 1830 IST.....<br />\n<br />\nTHIS EVENT WAS AYYAPPA JYOYI IN KERALA --<br />\n<br />\nTHIS WAS A PROTEST AGAINST ATHEIST COMMIE CM PINARAYI VIJAYANs EFFORT TO KILL THE SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE BY BREAKING THE 5900 YEAR OLD TRADITION OF NO MENSTRUATING WOMEN IN THIS PLANETs LARGEST PILGRIMAGE SABARIMALA ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE DEEP STATE CONTROLLED ILLEGAL COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY RULED THAT MENSTRUATING WOMEN MUST BE ALLOWED INTO SABARIMALA.. . ROTHSCHILDs APCO BRANDED PM MODI CONTROLLED THE JUDICIARY FROM THE SHADOWS, AND ALSO KICKED BHARATMATA INTO THE KOSHER ADULTERY/ HOMOSEXUAL MANDI...<br />\n<br />\nEVEN SUPREME COURT JUDGE KURIAN JOSEPH TOLD TO MEDIA THAT THE SUPREME COURT BENCH WAS FIXED BY CJI DIPAK MISRA , A MOST USELESS FELLOW..<br />\n<br />\nONLY PARLIAMENT HAS SUCH POWERS TO MAKE OR BREAK LAWS.. NOT THE JUDICIARY WHO CAN ONLY INTERPRET LAWS , AND THAT TOO WHEN ASKED FOR BY AN AGGRIEVED PERSON..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/judiciary-in-contempt-of-we-people-capt.html<br /><br />https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/we-people-declare-that-all-laws-created.html<br /><br />https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/11/the-indian-constitution-does-not-allow.html<br /><br />https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/11/misuse-of-rti-by-trojan-horse-foreign.html</span><br />\nSABARIMALA IS NOT THE WEE SHANI SHIGNAPUR TEMPLE LOCATED IN SOME GOD FORASKEN VILLAGE-- SARARIMALA IS THIS PLANETs NO 1 PILGRIMAGE, TWICE THE SIZE OF MAHA KUMBH MELA..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/11/5900-year-old-sabarimala-this-planets.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE WESTERN WORLD IS JEALOUS --AS LONG A SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE EXISTS , TRIBALS AND POOR PEOPLE CANNOT BE CONVERTED INTO CHRISTIANITY..<br />\n<br />\nTHE WEST WANTS INDIA TO IMPLODE FROM WITHIN.. THEY KNOW THAT IN 14 YEARS INDIA WILL BE THIS PLANETs NO 1 SUPERPOWER.. THEY WANT CHRISTIAN CONVERT NAXALS RETAINING HINDU NAMES TO RUN OVER INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nSUCH CHRISTIAN CONVERTS CREATED THE RED CORRIDOR WITH FOUNTAIN HEAD OF INTELLECTUAL SUPPORT BEING KOSHER DEEP STATE CONTROLLED COMMIE JNU PROFESSORS LIKE ROMILA THAPAR....<br />\n<br />\nYESTERDAY AT DUSK, MORE THAN TEN LAKH PEOPLE IN KERALA ( MOSTLY WOMEN AND GIRLS WITH MEN ESCORTS ) STOOD IN LINE FOR THE 800 KILOMETER DISTANCE FROM NORTH TO SOUTH KERALA HOLDING LAMPS AND SOFTLY CHANTING AYYAPPA BHAJAN..<br />\n<br />\nTO COUNTER THIS EVENT ATHEIST COMMIE CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN WHO HAS THE SUPPORT OF THE ENTIRE BENAMI MEDIA ( ROTHSCHILD CREATED COMMUNISM USING HOS COUSIN GERMAN JEW KARL MARX ) WILL HAVE ANOTHER FEMALE HUMAN CHAIN ON 1ST JAN 2019.. THOUGH BASED ON FEAR IS THE KEY POLICY, IT WILL BE A DAMP SQUIB.. BE ASSURED...<br />\n<br />\nTHE KERALA DEVASWOM BOARD IS CURRENTLY CONTROLLED BY ANTI-HINDU FORCES , ATHEIST COMMIES AND CHRISTIANS WITH HINDU NAMES..<br />\n<br />\nTHE LAST DEVASWOM BOARD PRESIDENT PRAYAR GOPALAKRISHNAN WAS A DESH BHAKT HINDU..<br />\n<br />\nTHE CURRENT DEVASWOM BOARD PRESIDENT A PADMAKUMAR IS ANTI-HINDU.. YESTERDAY HE GAVE A SOUND BYTE WHICH WAS AIRED ON TV LIKE WILD FIRE BY THE ENTIRE DESH DROHI MAIN STREAM MEDIA..<br />\n<br />\nATHEIST A PADMAKUMAR , A FORMER COMMIE CPM MLA , LIED THAT ONLY 35 LAKH ( 0.35 MILLION ) PILGRIMS CAME TO SABARIMALA THIS YEAR..HE SAID THAT THE NUMBER OF PILGRIMS WAS EXAGGERATED BEFORE AND LAST YEAR IT WAS ONLY 68 LAKHS ( 0.68 MILLION )..<br />\n<br />\nSORRY , CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL HAS BEEN MONITORING THE NUMBERS.. IF WE AVERAGE THE LAST SIX YEARS MORE THAN 606 LAKHS ( 60.6 MILLION ) PILGRIMS ATTENDED SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE..<br />\n<br />\nWE WANT THE KERALA DEVASWOM BOARD CONTROLLED BY RABID ANTI-HINDU FORCES TO BE ABOLISHED ..THEY ARE MORE WORRIED ABOUT THEIR OWN SALARIES/ PENSIONS AND BONUSES..<br />\n<br />\nP GOPALAKRISHNAN TOLD LIVE ON TV THAT HE HANDED OVER 1200 CRORES TO A PADMAKUMAR, A PREVIOUS COMMIE TRADE UNION LEADER - WHERE IS THE MONEY GONE?... THERE ARE NO PROPER TOILET FACILITIES FOR PILGRIMS..WE NEED A CBI INQUIRY...<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.outlookindia.com/website/story/we-felt-someone-from-outside-was-controlling-ex-cji-dipak-misra-justice-kurian-joseph/321115</span><br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c2361375325877234225-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c2361375325877234225-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c718547525510839542\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt.
