Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_26.html?showComment=1545885876015#c7658593315981173589\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">December 27, 2018 at 10:14 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://www.ndtv.com/india-news/kerala-float-based-on-vaikom-satyagraha-may-not-make-it-to-republic-day-parade-1968549<br />\n<br />\nGANDHI ENTERED KERALA FOR MANY REASONS..<br />\n<br />\nONE WAS THE KHILAFAT MOVEMENT TO SUPPORT THE TURKISH SULTAN.. GANDHI CAME ALONG WITH THE ALI JAUHAR BROTHERS ..<br />\n<br />\nGANDHI WAS A KATHIAWARI JAIN JEW , THE TURKISH SULTAN WAS A CRYPTO JEW, MOHAMMAD ALI JAUHAR WAS A CRYPTO JEW ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHOLE IDEA WAS TO WEDGE APART HINDUS AND MUSLIMS WHO WERE LIVING IN HARMONY AFTER JEW TIPU SULTAN BLASTED KERALA TEMPLES TO STEAL GOLD..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/10/tipu-sultan-unmasked-capt-ajit.html<br />\n<br />\nTHE MOHAMMAD ALI JAUHAR ROAD IN MUMBAI IS NAMED AFTER THIS JEW.. I HAVE VISITED HIS KOSHER GRAVE IN JERUSALEM..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/fatawa-e-alamgiri-kosher-document-of.html<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILDs AGENT GANDHI USED THE WORD INDIGO FOR OPIUM.. GERMAN JEW ROTHSCHILD WHO RULED INDIA GREW OPIUM IN INDIA AND SOLD IT IN CHINA..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/04/fake-champaran-satyagraha-of-gandhi.html<br />\n<br />\n70 % OF THE LATTER PART OF THE TURKISH SULTANS WERE CRYPTO JEWS..<br />\n<br />\n80% OF THE LATTER PART OF THE MOGHUL EMPERORS , AFTER HHUMAYUN, WERE CRYPTO JEWS ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE BRITISH ROYALTY IS GERMAN JEW ..<br />\n<br />\nGANDHIs KATHIAWARI JAIN JEW CLAN ARE THE DIAMOND AGENTS OF JEW ROTHSCHILD IN ANTWERP.. THEY PRAY AT AKSHARDHAM TEMPLES WITTH GOD GHANSHYAM PANDE ( SWAMINARAYAN ) WHICH MODI SPONSORS..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_12.html<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nThis KHILAFAT MOVEMENT sponsored by Kathiwari Jain crypto JEW Gandhi was to ostensibly support a distant Muslim Turkey ruler .<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nPretty soon the Kerala half breed Muslims ( Mappilas ) turned against the North Kerala Hindus and drove away one lakh hindus ( official estimate ) .<br />\n<br />\nCountless Hindus were beheaded and every well, pond, river and water body was full of rotting corpses . All Hindu lands were usurped by the Muslims .<br />\n<br />\nThe Mappilas stocked their mosques with food , water , long spears and khilafat swords -and this was NO knee jerk attack, but a pre-meditated and long planned one .<br />\n<br />\nThe MALABAR SPECIAL POLICE was formed by the British --who were angry as some white women and children were murdered by the Mappilas . Mind you, before Islam was born Mappilas were Hindu Arab middlemen of the Calicut king , for the spice caravan route.<br />\n<br />\nThis unit of 800 police were DESH BHAKTS , all KALARI EXPERTS all more than 6 feet in height and well built .<br />\n<br />\nAlong with the nippy Gurkha regiment they ran after the poor mappilas with swords and kurkhris and captured all of the MOPLAH REVOLT mutineers .<br />\n<br />\nBoth the MOPLAH REVOLT ( created by Gandhi ) and the NAVY MUTINY which gave India her freedom , had been sunk by ROTHSCHILD STOOGE Gandhi -- we will NOT allow these two incidents to be DELETED from history .<br />\n<br />\nThe British took revenge for the murder of the white women and children --<br />\n<br />\nOn 20th Nov 1921, they packed up a train compartment full of the worst criminal mappilas and most of them died on the passage from Tanur Kerala to Podanur Tamil Nadu jail .<br />\n<br />\nWhen the compartment was opened the mappila prisoners had clawed and eaten each other-- due to a type of toxic wet paint inside the compartment -- they went berserk due to the fumes and lack of oxygen .<br />\n<br />\nRETRIBUTION OF THE MOST SEVERE KIND .<br />\n<br />\nTHE MALABAR SPECIAL REGIMENT GAVE INDIA INDEPENDENCE .. THEY MUST BE HONOURED..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/02/the-indian-navy-mutiny-of-1946-only-war.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n<br />\n..-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c7658593315981173589-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c7658593315981173589-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c7032252956144342775\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. USING \"FEAR IS THE KEY\" POLICY..&nbsp; HE HAS THE MEDIA , POLICE AND JUDGES WITH HIM..</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">ONLY JANAM TV HAS REPORTED THE TRUTH..</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/t_PocvJ5cOc/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/t_PocvJ5cOc?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">BELOW: AYYAPPA JYOTI-- HINDUS ARE UNITING IN KERALA FOR THE FIRST TIME..&nbsp;</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">ATHEIST COMMIE PINARAYI VIJAYAN IS TRYING TO DRIVE FISSURES BY HIS \"VAIKOM SATYAGRAHA\" FLOAT AT REPUBLIC DAY..&nbsp;</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">NO FLOAT MUST BE ALLOWED ON REPUBLIC DAY , IT GOES AGAINST \"<span style=\"color: red;\">PATRIOTISM TO THE WATAN \"</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Pfdax28j3qI/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/Pfdax28j3qI?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">BELOW: MY WIFE COULD NOT JOIN THE AYYAPPA JYOTI CHAIN..&nbsp; &nbsp;SO SHE LIT THE JYOTI AT HOME , AND STOOD VIGIL FOR 30 MINUTES .. SHE HAS NOT FORGOTTEN THE GLORIOUS KERALA CULTURE.</b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-71er3-OXA2U/XCWXiwvpG3I/AAAAAAABfLE/j8hQlfDkN8slbK43zSr4lsIz3PZ8BE64gCLcBGAs/s1600/unGGnamed.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"591\" data-original-width=\"613\" height=\"616\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-71er3-OXA2U/XCWXiwvpG3I/AAAAAAABfLE/j8hQlfDkN8slbK43zSr4lsIz3PZ8BE64gCLcBGAs/s640/unGGnamed.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c2905335867317377466\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. THE MAYAN CALENDAR WAS CREATED BY MAYA DANAVA.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/07/maya-inca-aztec-civilizations-decoded.html<br />\n<br />\nMAYA DANAVA ARM TWISTED TO CREATE THE HALL OF ILLUSIONS FOR THE PANDAVAS AT INDRAPRASTHA..<br />\n<br />\nBHIMAs MACE WAS MADE BY MAYA DANAVA.. THE FOREST OF KHANDAVAPRASTA BURNT DOWN BY KRISHNA IS CHUTTANAD.. CURRENTLY CALLED KUTTANAD IN KERALA..<br />\n<br />\nMAYA DANAVA WAS THE FORSTER FATHER OF MANDODARI, THE BEAUTIFUL WIFE OF RAVANA.. IN INDIAN PURANAS VALIs WIFE DANAVA QUEEN TARA IS THE MOST BEAUTIFUL, FOLLOWED BY DANAVA QUEEN MANDODARI..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/08/common-characters-of-ramayana-and.html<br />\n<br />\nKERALA DANAVA KING MAHABALI WAS BANISHED BY VISHNU AVATAR VAMANA TO PERU ( PATALA ) A PART OF HIS OWN KINGDOM.. MAHABALI AND HIS FATHER VIROCHANA RULED THE WHOLE PLANET..<br />\n<br />\nTHE DANAVA CIVILISATION PRECEDED THE VEDIC SARASWATI CIVILIZATION BY SEVERAL MILLENNIUMS.. ALL PROFESSORS OF SARASWATI CIVILISATION WERE KERALA NAMBOODIRIS ( ARYANS WITH SWASTIKA AS SYMBOL )..<br />\n<br />\nGETTING BACK--<br />\n<br />\nHOLLYWOOD HAS BEEN MONOPOLISED BY JEWS TO DO CULTURAL TERRORISM AND SUBVERT TRUE HISTORY..<br />\n<br />\nIN APOCALYPTO, THE MAYANS ARE SHOWN TO HAVE SMALL POX.. THEY ARE SHOWN AS SAVAGES WHO DO HUMAN SACRIFICES..<br />\n<br />\nSORRY MAYANS WERE VEGETARIANS AND PEACE LOVING.. THEY NEVER HAD SMALLPOX..<br />\n<br />\nTHE VATICAN SPREAD SMALL POX USING GIFT BLANKETS VIA CHRISTIAN MISSIONARIES.. JESUIT JEW FRANCIS XAVIER INTRODUCED SMALL POX IN INDIA AT GOA..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/portuguese-inquisition-is-goa-by-jesuit.html<br />\n<br />\nALMOST THE ENTIRE NATIVE POPULATION IS NORTH AND SOUTH AMERICA, AND AUSTRALIA WERE EXTERMINATED BY SMALL POX BIOLOGICAL WARFARE BY VATICAN..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/07/fransisco-pizarro-hernan-cortez.html<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/01/christopher-columbus-father-of-american.html<br />\n<br />\nWHEN I WENT TO VATICAN I FELT INTENSE NEGATIVE ENERGY...<br />\n<br />\nhttps://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/helena-mother-of-roman-emperor.html<br />\n<br />\nPOPE USED MOTHER TERESAs BILLIONS AS HUSH MONEY TO PROTECT PEDOPHILE PRIESTS ..YET HE WONT ALLOW CATHOLIC PRIESTS TO MARRY AND UPROOT HOMOSEXUALITY AMONG PRIESTS .<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/diabolical-ministering-angel-mother.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c2905335867317377466-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c2905335867317377466-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c7304938994727420584\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. THE DUNG IS COVERED BY A VENEER OF TRANSPARENT PLASTIC TYPE ENZYMES.. NO FLY WILL SIT ON IT..<br />\n<br />\nON THE CONTRARY \"HUMPLESS \" FOREIGN JERSEY COW DUNG SMELL WORSE THAN HUMAN SHIT--AND IT IS TOXIC..<br />\n<br />\nTHE FATHER OF WHITE REVOLUTION VERGHESE KURIAN FROM CALICUT WAS ASKED BY TE DEEP STATE TO SWITCH OUR PRICELESS HUMPED VEDIC COW WITH USELESS WORSE THAN PIG HUMPLESS JERSEY/ HOLSTEN COW..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/07/nutritious-a1-milk-of-vedic-cows-with.html<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/02/gomutra-drinking-cows-urine-as-elexir.html<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/12/shocking-legacy-of-mad-cow-disease-capt.html<br />\n<br />\nINDIA IS THE LARGEST EXPORTER OF BEEF ON THE PLANET BECAUSE THE MEAT OF INDIAN VEDIC COWS DO NOT GIVE BRAIN DISEASES..<br />\n<br />\nAYURVEDA USED HUMPED COW URINE TO MELT AWAY THE ARMOUR SHEATH OF BACTERIA/ VIRUSES AND VERMIN..<br />\n<br />\nVEDIC HUMPED COW FARTS ONLY 5% METHANE ( GLOBAL WARMING ) OF THE WESTERN GLUTTON HUMPLESS COW..<br />\n<br />\nTHE DUNG OF INDIAN VEDIC COW DOES NOT EMIT NITROUS OXIDE ( POTENT GREENHOUSE GAS ) UNLIKE WESTERN HUMPLESS COW..<br />\n<br />\nhttps://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/poland-katowice-cop-24-global-warming.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_26.html?showComment=1545991050899#c7040759456145132367\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">December 28, 2018 at 3:27 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE ASKED ME TO SAY SOMETHING MORE ABOUT MOSES, WHO REALLY EXISTED, UNLIKE JESUS WHO WAS COOK UP IN 325 AD.<br />\n<br />\nI WATCHED THE TV PROGRAM \" <span style=\"color: red;\">JESUS STRAND , SEARCH FOR DNA</span> \"<br />\nON THE KOSHER DEEP STATE <b><span style=\"color: red;\">HISTORY TV CHANNEL</span></b> ..<br />\n<br />\nTHEY HAVE ASSUMED THE BLOOD OF THE PROVEN FAKE \"SHROUD OF TURIN\" IS THAT OF JESUS..<br />\n<br />\nTHEY KEPT SAYING JESUS ( WHO NEVER EXISTED ) IS A JEW AND HIS COUSIN IS THE HINDU JOHN THE BAPTIST ( WHO EXISTED )..<br />\n<br />\nJOHN THE BAPTIST WAS A HINDU ESSENE SAGE WHO WAS UNCIRCUMCISED AND A VEGAN..<br />\n<br />\nJOHN THE BAPTIST IS A NABI ( PROPHET ) FOR ISLAM NAMED YAHYA IBN ZAKARIYA.<br />\n<br />\nTHEY KEPT INSISTING HOW JESUS CELEBRATED JEWISH PASSOVER AND HOW HE WAS CALLED RABBI BY HIS FOLLOWERS..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THEN THE DNA RESULTS DECLARED THAT JESUS ( who never existed ) IS DRUZE..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nToday there are more than 140,000 Druze living in Israel.. The tomb of Jethro near Tiberias is the most important religious site for the Druze community and they gather there every April..<br />\n<br />\nDruze were targeted by the ISIS and Al-Qaeda ( just like the Yazidid ) in order to cleanse Syria and Iraq.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/the-yazidis-of-iraq-ethnic-cleansing-by.html<br />\n<br />\nJethro, the father-in-law of Moses, is the greatest saint in the pantheon of Druze prophets. He was a Midianite, a tribe descending from the sons of Keturah who were sent by Abraham to the East.<br />\n<br />\nAnalysis of the relationship between Moses and Jethro reveals that Moses always accepted the role of Jethro's disciple.<br />\n<br />\nThe Druze believed in Karma and re-incarnation of the Hindus..<br />\n<br />\nAccording to the Kenite hypothesis, Yahweh was historically a Midian deity, and the association of Moses' father-in-law with Midian reflects the historical adoption of the Midianite cult by the Hebrews.<br />\n<br />\nAccording to the Hebrew Bible, the Hindu Kenites played an important role in the history of ancient Israel. The best recognized Kenites is Jethro, Moses' father-in-law, who was a priest in the land of Midian.<br />\n<br />\nAccording to the Kenite hypothesis, Yahweh was historically a Midian deity, and the association of Moses' father-in-law with Midian reflects the historical adoption of the Midianite cult by the Hebrews. Moses identified Jethro's concept of God, Yahweh, with the Israelites' God El Shaddai.<br />\n<br />\nMoses\u2019 father-in-law, Jethro, was a Kenite (Judges 1:16) resident in the land of Midian.<br />\n<br />\nThe Kenite hypothesis supposes that the Hebrews adopted the cult of Yahweh from the Midianites via the Kenites.<br />\n<br />\nJudaism was founded by ex-communicated Namboodiris from Kerala they wrote down as Kenites ( Kerites ) . The Kenite clan of Jethro spoke Sanskrit.<br />\n<br />\nHINDU DRUZE TOOK UP ARMS ( KALARI of KERALA ) WHEN WARRANTED --AND THEY WERE LEFT ALONE ( MOUNT HERMON ) .<br />\n<br />\nThe Ark of the Covenant is directly connected with Jethro and is of Midianite origin .<br />\n<br />\nIn Exodus, Jethro takes the initiative in offering sacrifices to YHVH (Exodus 18:12) because he was more familiar with the God of Moses than Moses himself.<br />\n<br />\nIsraelites received their religion from the Kenites, a tribe associated with Jethro (Judges 1:16, 4:11) and a part of the Midianites.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nThe Jewish Encyclopedia summarizes the theories of these scholars. \"Jethro initiates Moses and Aaron into the worship of YHVH. All scholars know that in consequence of this statement, that YHVH was a Kenite deity, and that from the Kenites through the agency of Moses his worship passed to the Israelites.<br />\n<br />\nThe Kenites, then, were a nomadic tribe, more advanced in the arts of life than Israel.\" (The Jewish Encyclopedia, 1916, p. 467)<br />\n<br />\nThe Hebrew nation acquired their religion from the Kenites. There is an amazing the similarity between Druze culture and philosophy Hindus.<br />\n<br />\nJewish commentators throughout the ages have described India ( Ophir ) as a land of potency and paradise.<br />\n<br />\nThe Legends of the Jews (1925, Vol. 5, p. 196) delineates stories of sages who went to India to obtain \"plants of paradise,\" and narrates how Solomon (Vol. 4, p. 149) secured water and herbs with special healing powers from India.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c7040759456145132367-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c7040759456145132367-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c4405316843128698565\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_26.html?showComment=1545991125230#c4405316843128698565\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">December 28, 2018 at 3:28 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nGenesis (2:8) places Eden in the East.<br />\n<br />\nSheikh Tarif Amin, was the former world spiritual leader of the Druze. He had said that Druze households place Hindu scriptures in their homes.<br />\n<br />\nSheikh Tarif Amin is regarded by Druze as the preeminent spiritual authority.<br />\n<br />\nIn 1990, Amin was awarded the Israel Prize for his special contribution to society and the State of Israel, being one of the few non-Jews receive this award.<br />\n<br />\nSheikh Amin died on October 2, 1993. The Israeli President, Ezer Weizman, the Prime Minister Yitzhak Rabin and the Chairman of the Knesset were among the dignitaries present at his funeral.<br />\n<br />\nSheikh Amin's grandson, Mowafak Tarif, succeeded his father as the spiritual leader of Israel's Druze.<br />\n<br />\nSalman Falach, Druze Minister of Education in Israel, had declared that Druze religion originates from Hinduism.<br />\n<br />\nI have spoken to several Druze ( using my agent ) in Israel\u2014ALL of them consider their roots to be Hindu Indian.<br />\n<br />\nDruze use the same analogy as Krishna uses in the Bhagavad-gita [2.22]: \"As a person puts on new garments, giving up old ones, the soul similarly accepts new material bodies, giving up the old and useless ones.\"<br />\n<br />\nThe largest annual celebration of the Druze is held at the tomb of Jethro, near Tiberias..<br />\n<br />\nJethro, known as Nabi Schweib by the Druze, was a Midianite (Exodus 18:1)<br />\n<br />\nIn Exodus (Chapter 18), Jethro brings Zipporah and her two sons to Moses, and Moses bows down and kisses Jethro. Then Jethro praises the God of the Jews and \"took a burnt-offering and sacrifices for God; and Aaron came, and all the elders of Israel, to eat bread with Moses' father-in-law before God.<br />\n<br />\nOn the next day Jethro instructs Moses on the formation of an administrative structure for the Israeli people. Jethro set up the system of worship..<br />\n<br />\nBefore giving instruction, Jethro admonishes Moses for placing himself (Moses) as direct arbitrator for all decisions, great and small. Also, he introduces his remarks by stating: \"Hearken now unto my voice, I will give thee counsel, and God be with thee.\" It is obvious that Jethro has quite a bit of authority, granted by God Himself.<br />\n<br />\nAccording to Exodus, \"Moses did all that Jethro had said.<br />\n<br />\nThe twelve tribes of Israel formed as a result of Jethro's reorganization of the people.Before returning to Egypt, Moses asks Jethro's permission to embark on the journey (Exodus 4:18).<br />\n<br />\nThe twelve tribes of Israel formed as a result of Jethro's reorganization of the people.Before returning to Egypt, Moses asks Jethro's permission to embark on the journey (Exodus 4:18).<br />\n<br />\nThe first sacrifice in Israel was offered up not by Moses but by the Midianite priest Jethro. Jethro was the one who fashion the ark of the covenant.<br />\n<br />\nThus, Jethro was the first priest of the Israeli nation, and it was Jethro a Hindu who instructed Moses and Aaron in the practices of priesthood.<br />\n<br />\nJethro, known as Nabi Schweib by the Druze, was a Midianite (Exodus 18:1), a tribe descending from Keturah, a wife of Abraham (Genesis 25:1-2). Genesis (25:6) describes that Abraham sent the sons of Keturah to the East.<br />\n<br />\nIn Exodus (Chapter 18), Jethro brings Zipporah and her two sons to Moses, and Moses bows down and kisses Jethro.<br />\n<br />\nThen Jethro praises the God of the Jews and \"took a burnt-offering and sacrifices for God; and Aaron came, and all the elders of Israel, to eat bread with Moses' father-in-law before God.\"<br />\n<br />\nJethro admonishes Moses for placing himself (Moses) as direct arbitrator for all decisions, great and small. Also, he introduces his remarks by stating: \"Hearken now unto my voice, I will give thee counsel, and God be with thee.\" It sounds like Jethro has quite a bit of authority, granted by God Himself. According to Exodus, \"Moses did all that he [Jethro] had said.\"<br />\n<br />\nBefore returning to Egypt, Moses asks Jethro's permission to embark on the journey (Exodus 4:18).<br />\n<br />\nThe first sacrifice in Israel was offered up not by Moses but by the Midianite priest Jethro<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c4405316843128698565-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c7525490582867727189\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_26.html?showComment=1545991198649#c7525490582867727189\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">December 28, 2018 at 3:29 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\nJethro was the first priest of the Israeli nation-- Hindu Jethro instructed Moses and Aaron in the practices of priesthood<br />\n<br />\nMoses asked Jethro to be his guide<br />\n<br />\nIn The Midrash Rabbah (1977, Vol. 3: Numbers, p. 90) it is stated: \"The east ( OPHIR ) is the source from which light goes forth into the world, and there camped the standard of Judah which bred kings, scholars, and men of pious deeds.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\nLegends of the Jews (1925, Vol. 5, p. 196) delineates stories of sages who went to India to obtain \"plants of paradise,\" and narrates how Solomon (Vol. 4, p. 149) secured water with special healing powers from India.<br />\n<br />\nAnd in Volume 1, page 11, of The Legends of the Jews, it is written: \"Beyond the inhabited parts to the east is Paradise with its seven divisions, each assigned to the pious of a certain degree.\"<br />\n<br />\nSit Shahwana, was the sister of Jethro. Her tomb Ein Qiniyye and Jethro's tomb is at Nabi Shu'ayb -- a place for pilgrimage.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">AGAIN--JETHRO A SAGE FROM KERALA WAS PROPHET FOR THE HINDU DRUZE.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nThere is a concrete and strong Midianite influence on Israel's cult and law.<br />\n<br />\nAccording to the Book of Genesis, the Midianites were the descendants of Midian, who was a son of Abraham and his wife Keturah: \"<br />\n<br />\nAbraham took a wife, and her name was Keturah. And she bare him Zimran, and Jokshan, and Medan, and Midian, and Ishbak, and Shuah\" (Genesis 25:1\u20132, King James Version)<br />\n<br />\nThe Midianites worshipped Hindu deities..<br />\n<br />\nIn the Bible :-<br />\nMoses married Zipporah the daughter of Jethro, the priest of Midian.. Jethro advised Moses on establishing a system of delegated legal decision-making. Moses asked Hobab, the son of Reuel the Midianite, to accompany the Israelites travelling towards the promised land because of his local knowledge, although Hobab preferred to return to his homeland..<br />\n<br />\nThe people of Midian are mentioned extensively in the Arabic Qur\u2019an. The word 'Madyan' appears 10 times in it. The people are also called \u02bea\u1e63\u1e25abu l-\u02beaykah..<br />\nThe origin of the Midianites is from the land of Sheba / Ophir. ( Kerala ).<br />\n<br />\nThe Hindu temple of Qasr Antar, dedicated to IMHOTEP ( Lord Ayyappa ) was the highest temple of the ancient world, sitting at 9,300 feet above sea level..<br />\n<br />\nAn inscription on the stele was translated by George Nickelsburg to read--<br />\n\u201cAccording to the command of the greatest and Holy God, those who take an oath (proceed) from here.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nHermon was said to have become known as \u201cthe mountain of oath\u201d by Charles Simon Clermont-Ganneau.<br />\n<br />\nWHITE JEW LIES WONT WORK ANYMORE<br />\n<br />\nThe Temples of Mount Hermon are around thirty Shrines and temples that are dispersed around the slopes of Mount Hermon in Lebanon , Syria and Palestine.<br />\n<br />\n27 temples ( 27 nakshatras ) are dispersed in the Beqaa Valley, all temples are mysteriously oriented to Qasr Antar<br />\n<br />\nThe Temples of Mount Hermon are around thirty Shrines and temples that are dispersed around the slopes of Mount Hermon in Lebanon , Syria and Palestine.<br />\n<br />\n27 temples ( 27 nakshatras ) are dispersed in the Beqaa Valley, all temples are mysteriously oriented to Qasr Antar, the highest temple of the ancient world.<br />\n<br />\nThe Hindu temple of Qasr Antar, dedicated to IMHOTEP ( Lord Ayyappa ) was the highest temple of the ancient world, sitting at 9,300 feet above sea level..<br />\n<br />\nAn inscription on the stele was translated by George Nickelsburg to read--<br />\n\u201cAccording to the command of the greatest and Holy God, those who take an oath (proceed) from here.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nHermon was said to have become known as \u201cthe mountain of oath\u201d by Charles Simon Clermont-Ganneau.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/11/5900-year-old-sabarimala-this-planets.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/imhotep-patron-saint-of-freemasons-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c3313478082260004824\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_26.html?showComment=1546004450021#c3313478082260004824\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">December 28, 2018 at 7:10 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE ASKED ME-<br />\n<br />\nHOW DO YOU KNOW THAT ASHER THE MASORETE WAS FROM YOUR HOMETOWN CALICUT.<br />\n<br />\nWELL THIS FAMILY WAS IN THE SPICE EXPORT BUSINESS OF THE CALICUT KING AND WERE FABULOUSLY WEALTHY AND INFLUENTIAL.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS FAMILY WAS KNOWN AS KARIATE \"JEWS\" FROM KERALA.<br />\n<br />\nAaron ben Moses ben Asher lived in Tiberias in northern Israel ( western shore of the sea of Galilee ) and refined the Tiberian system of writing vowel sounds in Hebrew, which is still in use today, and serves as the basis for grammatical analysis..<br />\n<br />\nAshdod, south of Tel Aviv, where I have been more than a 14 times, is the home of some 1,550 Karaite families.<br />\n<br />\nWhen entering a Karaite synagogue, the first thing one notices is a long line of shoehorns hanging on the wall. They are there because visitors must remove their shoes before entering the house of prayer\u2014like in Hindu temples ..<br />\n<br />\nAaron ben Moses ben Asher revered as a sage who knew Sanskrit is the most authoritative of the masoretes..<br />\n<br />\nHe was the first systematic Hebrew grammarian. His Sefer Dikdukei ha-Te'amim (Grammar of the Vocalizations) was an original collection of grammatical rules and masoretic information.<br />\n<br />\nThe value of this work is that the grammatical rules presented by Ben-Asher reveal the linguistic background of vocalization for the first time. He had a tremendous influence on the world of Biblical grammar and scholarship.<br />\n<br />\nAlmost all masoretes were Karaite Jews ( not rabbanic Jews )..<br />\n<br />\nAaron ben Moshe ben Asher followed the Karaite rather than the Rabbinic tradition of Judaism. Karaite Jews do not accept as binding the written collections of the oral tradition in the Midrash or Talmud.<br />\n<br />\nAaron\u2019s father, Moses ben Asher, is credited with writing the Cairo Codex of the Prophets (895 AD). It is among the oldest manuscripts containing a large proportion of the Hebrew Bible. Aaron ben Asher himself added vowelization and cantillation notes, and mesorah to the Aleppo Codex, correcting its letter-text according to the masorah.<br />\n<br />\nMaimonides accepted the views of ben Asher admired his work and helped to establish and spread his authority..<br />\n<br />\nThe word YHWH never entered the Bible until nearly 1,000 AD when the Masoretic Text (MT) in Hebrew was completed and presented to the Roman Catholic church as the authentic original language and text of the Old Testament.<br />\n<br />\nThe eastern half of Christendom at that time rejected the text as fraudulent ( knowing the Hindu commections ) and retained the Greek Septuagint of 285 BC, which they still use today.<br />\n<br />\nThe Masoretic Text has not perfectly preserved the original Hebrew text of Scripture.<br />\n<br />\nThe Masoretes received corrupted texts to begin with, they used an alphabet which was radically different from the original Hebrew, they added countless vowel points which did not exist in the original, they excluded several books from the Old Testament scriptures, and they included a number of significant changes to prophecy and doctrine.<br />\n<br />\nMasoretes developed the system of vowel marks (called points\") for the consonants of the Torah..<br />\n<br />\nDiacritic is a glyph added to a letter,which is an elemental symbol within an agreed set of symbols, intended to represent a readable character for the purposes of writing.<br />\n<br />\nThe oldest copies of the Masoretic Text only date back to the 10th century\u2026 five significant ways in which the Masoretic Text is different from the original Old Testament:---<br />\nThe Masoretes admitted that they received corrupted texts to begin with.<br />\nThe Masoretic Text is written with a radically different alphabet than the original.<br />\nThe Masoretes added vowel points which did not exist in the original.<br />\nThe Masoretic Text excluded several books from the Old Testament scriptures.<br />\nThe Masoretic Text includes changes to prophecy and doctrine. Masorites themselves felt they had received a partly corrupted text.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--&nbsp;</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c3313478082260004824-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c3313478082260004824-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c8764191331233642697\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_26.html?showComment=1546004485690#c8764191331233642697\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">December 28, 2018 at 7:11 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nNo stream cannot rise higher than its source- commonsense! . If the texts they started with were corrupted, then even a perfect transmission of those texts would only serve to preserve the mistakes. Even if the Masoretes demonstrated great care when copying the texts, their diligence would not bring about the correction of even one error.<br />\n<br />\nIf halfwit Moses were to see a copy of the Masoretic Text, he wouldn\u2019t be able to read it..<br />\n<br />\nIn Hebrew, just like modern languages, vowels can make a big difference. The change of a single vowel can radically change the meaning of a word. An example in English is the difference between \u201cSLAP\u201d and \u201cSLIP\u201d. These words have very different definitions.<br />\n<br />\nYet if our language was written without vowels, both of these words would be written \u201cSLP\u201d. Thus the vowels are very important. The most extensive change the Masoretes brought to the Hebrew text was the addition ofvowel points.<br />\n<br />\nIn an attempt to solidfy for all-time the \u201ccorrect\u201d readings of all the Hebrew Scriptures, the Masoretes added a series of dots to the text, identifying which vowel to use in any given location.<br />\n<br />\nCodices such as the Leningrad Codex and the Aleppo Codex contain vowel markings (nekkudot) in the form of subscripts and superscripts.<br />\n<br />\nIn the year 920, a scribe by the name of Shlomo ben Buya'a wrote a manuscript/codex of the Bible copying diligently from a manuscript of ben Asher. Ben Asher himself then finished the manuscript, adding vocalizations and notes in the margins, and signed off on the whole thing.<br />\n<br />\nThis codex survives until this day (see below) and is known as the Aleppo Codex (as it was eventually moved to and intensely guarded in Aleppo, Syria) ..<br />\n<br />\nMaimonides himself used the actual Aleppo Codex document when writing Mishneh Torah, and so since then, considering that Rambam viewed that as the most correct text of the Torah, it has become essentially absolutely authoritative.<br />\n<br />\nDuring the riots against the Jews in Aleppo during December of 1947, the shul in which the Aleppo Codex was kept was set on fire, and much of the manuscript was destroyed. In the year 1008, a scribe by the name of Samuel ben Jacob wrote a manuscript of the Bible as well.<br />\n<br />\nIt claims in its colophon that it was copied based on the ben Asher text, but there is no evidence that ben Asher himself ever saw this particular manuscript to sign off on it (like with the Aleppo Codex).<br />\n<br />\nThis manuscript/codex is known as the Leningrad Codex (due to the fact that it has been kept at the National Library of Russia in Leningrad since 1863).<br />\n<br />\nThe Leningrad Codex is widely agreed to not be quite as precise or accurate as the Aleppo Codex (which is close to a hundred years older and closer to the source). Considering its lesser precision, and thus authority, the Leningrad Codex never really had much of a say in terms of the text that we use today for the Bible.<br />\n<br />\nIn fact, the Leningrad Codex was actually corrected against the Aleppo Codex. However, considering the fact that most of the Aleppo Codex was destroyed in a fire ( no more than 294 of the original 487 pages survived ), the Leningrad Codex is the oldest full manuscript of the Bible currently in existence..<br />\n<br />\nTHE KNOWLEDGE OF TIMOTHY PAUL SMITH ( OF GOD CODE FAME ) IS PURELY PEDESTRIAN..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. I feel free from many traps at many level. Cannot thank you enough.<br />\nThe only bad thing left is some imaginary fears, especially about my little kids. It is also applied to life circumstances like professional concerns and personal relationships...<br />\n<br />\nQuantum entrainment is a process that instantly gives the body, mind and spirit deep rest and fast healing. It works in seconds. Yes, pure awareness is the deepest rest you can get...<br />\n<br />\nAs per the Vedas perception occurs in the gap of alert attention. This is the inner space. You can create a gap in the mind stream simply by directing the focus of your attention into the NOW. Consciousness enables us to think and at the same time observe our thinking process...<br />\n<br />\nThe quantum entrained pilgrim does \u201cnothing,\u201d yet everything gets done for him. His traumas and phobias are surgically removed -- mental surgery at its mysterious best..<br />\n<br />\nSABARIMALA IS THE LARGEST PILGRIMAGE ON THE PANET.. , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHEN I WAS PENNING THE POST ABOVE 8 YEARS AGO, MY WIFE WARNED ME..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">DESH DROHI ATHEIST COMMIES AND FOREIGN PAYROLL DALIT ACTIVISTS OF BR AMBEKAR / EVR PERIYAR WILL CHERRY PICK AND TAKE UNDUE ADVANTAGE. ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS IS WHAT EXACTLY HAPPENED A FEW HOURS AGO , ON 1ST JAN 2018 EVENING ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">EVERY SPEECH BY ATHEIST COMMIE PINARAYI VIJAYAN AND HIS GANG , WAS CHERRY PICKED FROM MY POST ABOVE ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">EVERY VESTIGE OF THEIR SPEECHES ABOUT \" BRAHMANICAL PATRIARCHY \" , VIVEKANANDA CALLING KERALA A MADHOUSE ( BRANTHALAYAM ) , AYYANKALI ETC WERE LIFTED FROM MY POST...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THEY WILL NOT GET ANY INFORMATION IN BOOKS OR INTERNET UNLESS IT IS LIFTED FROM MY BLOGSITE ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MY NAIR AND NAMBOODIRI FRIENDS FRETTED AND SULKED WHEN THEY MET ME AFTER PENNING THIS POST, FOR NEARLY A YEAR.. THEY FELT THAT I HAVE LET THEM DOWN..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CHERRY PICKING WITH THEIR BACKS TO THE TREES IS WHAT HAPPENED YESTERDAY EVENING TO SUSTAIN A FOUL FOREIGN SPONSORED POLITICAL AGENDA..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WANNA KNOW THE REAL TREE ?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE DANAVA CIVILIZATION ( OF THIYYA KING MAHABALI ) FLOURISHED SEVERAL MILLENNIUMS BEFORE THE VEDIC CIVILIZATION..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIYYAS WERE RULERS OF KERALA , WHO PROVIDED SAGES , KINGS , AYURVEDA PHYSICIANS , ARCHITECTS , ASTRONOMERS , KALARI FIGHTING , OCEAN NAVIGATION ETC FOR THE WHOLE PLANET..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE THIYYA BLOODLINE RAN IN DYNASTIES OF EGYPTIAN PHARAOHS, ROMAN EMPERORS , MAYAN/ AZTEC/ INCA KINGS , JEWISH KINGS AFTER SOLOMON ETC ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">DNA TESTS DON\u2019T LIE .. USE MY DNA..</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/eight-sided-pyramid-of-giza-egypt.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">KING MAHABALIs FATHER VIROCHANA RULED THE WHOLE WORLD.. MAHABALI WAS BANISHED BY VISHNU AVATAR VAMANA TO PATALA ( PERU ) WHICH WAS PART OF HIS OWN KINGDOM..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE SANSKRIT , ASTRONOMY AND MATH KNOWING CREAM OF THIYYAS WERE KERALA NAMBOODIRIS..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">KERALA NAMBOODIRIS PROPAGATED THE VEDAS ORALLY FOR 330 CENTURIES ( THE GREATEST FEAT OF MAN ) BEFORE THEY WERE PENNED DOWN 70 CENTURIES AGO AT THE BANKS OF THE SARASWATI RIVER..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">KERALA NAMBOODIRIS ( ELDEST BROTHERS ) ARE THE ARYANS WITH SWASTIKA SYMBOL&nbsp;</span></b>AND SPECIAL HAIRDO..&nbsp; CHANAKYA , ADI SHANKARACHARYA , ARYABHATTA , VARARUCHI , APOLLONIUS OF TYANA ( ON WHOM JESUS CHRIST WAS MODELED ), JETHRO ( ON WHOM MOSES WAS MODLLED ) ETC WERE KERALA NAMBOODIRIS..</div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE&nbsp;</span><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">YOUNGER BROTHERS OF KERALA NAMBOODIRIS WERE THE SEMITES&nbsp;WITH SIX POINTED STAR AS SYMBOL</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">.. MOHAMMAD THE PROPHET, WAS A SEMITE WHOSE FATHERs ELDER BROTHER WAS THE NAMBOODIRI PRIEST OF THE SHIVA TEMPLE AT MECCA OASIS. THE DISGRACES LEFT HANDED SEMITES CREATED JUDAISM AND RIGHT TO LEFT HEBREW..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AFTER GERMAN JEW ROTHSCHILD STARTED RULING INDIA, THIYYAS WERE DEMOTED AND CONVERTED TO TODDY TAPPING MONKEYS ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BE VERY VERY VERY CLEAR-- THIYYAS ( THIRAYYARS ) ARE NOT BLUNT FACED EZHAVAS (MALAYYAR TRIBALS ) WHICH WHOM THEY HAVE BEEN CLUBBED TODAY BY THE WHITE INVADER..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NO THIYYA WILL EVER GIVE HIS DAUGHTER / SON TO AN EZHAVA ( SOUTH OF THRISSUR ) FOR MARRIAGE, THOUGH MARRIAGE BUREAUS CLUB THEM IN THE SAME BASKET....&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE GLORY OF DANAVA CIVILIZATION WAS SUNK BY THE WHITE MAN AND WE WERE PAINTED AS SAVAGES..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">WHY DID VISHNU AVATAR PARASHURAMA GIVE KERALA NAMBOODIRIS SPECIAL POWERS ?..&nbsp;</span></b></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold;\">MAIN REASON WAS ORAL TRANSMISSION OF VEDAS MUST CONTINUE, THERE MUST BE NO SUBDIVISION AND FRAGMENTATION OF FERTILE LAND ( ONLY ELDEST BROTHER OF KERALA NAMBOODIRIS COULD OWN LAND ) TO PRODUCE GOLDEN MEAN HOLY TOPSOIL FOOD AND AYURVEDIC HERBS..</span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/07/king-cobra-and-snake-temples-of-kerala.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NAMBOODIRIS GOT DRUNK WITH POWER AND THEY STARTED ILL TREATING THIYYA KINGS ( WHO MUST KEEP 6 FEET AWAY ) ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ADI SHANKARACHARYA A KERALA NAMBOODIRI GOT EXASPERATED AND DISTRIBUTED THE 4 VEDAS TO THE 4 CORNERS OF INDIA, 4000 YEARS AGO, BUT WITH A FIAT THAT ALL THE 4 MUTTS MUST BE HEADED BY A KERALA NAMBOODIRI..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2--</span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; Having said this , God does not store JUNK inside his creations..<br />\n<br />\nAncient Maharishis had 12 strand DNA\u2014NIL junk. He has immediate access to all information.<br />\n<br />\nVishnu avatars has 13 strand DNA and more, with NIL junk DNA. Vishnu mortals are not reborn.. If they had children they died without procreation.. It is stupidity to say \u201cI am a descendant of Lord Krishna like many CHOOT bhaiyya Yadavs do \u201d..<br />\n<br />\nSay, Jew Rothschild of last century, due to his sins was born again in Somalia as a crippled beggar. His JUNK DNA contains information about his previous birth when he was ZE cats whiskers \u2013rich and powerful.. It will contain information when he was an animal or an insect ..<br />\n<br />\nON MOKSHA-- SOUL TRANSMITS ALL INFORMATION TO THE MOTHER FIELD OF BRAHMAN AT THE SEVENT ASTRAL LAYER.<br />\n<br />\nThis way you can call junk DNA as a SOUL RECORD.<br />\n<br />\nDeoxyribonucleic acid (DNA) is a nucleic acid that contains all the genetic instructions used in the development and functioning of all known living things. The most important role of the DNA is to store information \u2013 a long term storage. DNA is like a computer program but far, far more advanced than any software ever created or will be created..<br />\n<br />\nJunk DNA contains information on the trajectory of your soul, which describes how you have come to be who you are..<br />\n<br />\nThe soul has its own genome ( SAMSKARAS ) ; that is, it carries a complete template of traits that it has developed through the incarnational process, and it also carries, within that same template, the original slate upon which was written its unique identity. Phobias are the result of SOUL SAMSKARAS.<br />\n<br />\nSoul samskaras have an effect on your subconscious mind and it affects your choices.<br />\n<br />\nPilgrims go to Sabarimala to surgically remove traumas and debilitating phobias..<br />\n<br />\nhttps://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/11/5900-year-old-sabarimala-this-planets.html<br />\n<br />\nThe soul genome, whose template is constantly expanding over the course of its incarnations, contains, in the form of quanta of energy, innumerable bytes of physical information as well as its experiences and interpretations of them.<br />\n<br />\nPhysical DNA imprints itself into the soul genome, expanding its template through energetic form\u2014they are energy wave forms and holographs.<br />\n<br />\nThe cumulative history of your soul is dynamic, and continually expanding.<br />\n<br />\nThe human soul evolves and its frequency rises due to lesser negative karmic baggage . When the soul frequency rises that it is parked at the sixth astral layer\u2014ready for moksha , the JUNK DNA reduces..<br />\n<br />\nA jivanmukt with highest soul frequency , has merged his spiritual DNA into his biological DNA \u2014his soul has evolved to its fullest and is now part of the mother field of Brahman, the morphogenetic field of consciousness. After death this deserving soul is liberated from the endless cycle of births..<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c7887209310595895295\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6VOqqm-hCbM/XCa06XjAUxI/AAAAAAABfL4/E3K2A6jHNG0XTf7_mZb9kjj9WxD3GwmzQCK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. WHERE IS THE HONOUR IN CHEATING A MUSLIM INTO EATING PIG ?..<br />\n<br />\nWE HAVE ALIEN JUDGES LIKE PARSI ROHINGTON NARIMAN RULING INDIA LIKE A GOD.. HE WAS USED IN THE BENCH , TO PUSH BHARATATA INTO ADULTERY/ HOMOSEXUALITY/ AND KICKING HINDU CULTURE .. ALL KNEW HIS PERSONAL LEANINGS ..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD WHO RULED INDIA KNIGHTED 65 PARSIS BEFORE 1947 -- FOR WHAT ?<br />\n<br />\nSERVING BHARATMATA OR FOR BEING TRAITORS ?..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN PARSIS CAME FROM PERSIA TO GUJARAT FOR REFUGE , THE LEADER PUT SOME SUGAR IN A GLASS OF MILK TO INDICATE THEY THE WANNA BE PERSIAN IMMIGRANTS WILL INTEGRATE INTO INDIAN SOCIETY AND WILL SWEETEN THE INDIAN NATION ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE GUJARAT KING DID NOT BELIEVE THIS ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE PARSIS VOUCHED THAT THEY ARE HINDUS AND THEY KNOW THE 16 SAMSKARAS OF SANATANA DHARMA..<br />\n<br />\nPERSIA WORSHIPED SHUKRACHARYA--THE POLITICAL ADVISOR OF KING MAHABALI OF KERALA.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/06/shukracharya-is-ahura-mazda-god-of.html<br />\n<br />\nBEFORE THE PARSIS CAME TO INDIA , THEY CREMATED THEIR DEAD..<br />\n<br />\nPARSIS FLED FROM IRAN TO INDIA DUE TO PERSECUTION FROM ISLAM... ISLAM DID BURIAL<br />\n<br />\nTHE LEADER OF THE PARSIS SAID \" WE ARE ORIGINALLY FROM INDIA , WE FOLLOW INDIAN SAMSKARAS\"..<br />\n<br />\nTHE KING VIJAYADITYA ASKED THEM TO SPELL OUT THE 16 SHODASHA SAMSKARAS ..RITES OF PASSAGE FOR A HINDU..<br />\n<br />\nTHE PARSI LEADER NARRATED THE FIRST 15 CORRECTLY -- BY RECITING SANSKRIT VERSES FROM THE UPANISADS..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN THE FINAL AND 16TH VERSE WAS TO BE RECITED-- THE GUJARATI KING SAID --\"I WILL RECITE IT FOR YOU \"..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nHE LAID OUT THE FINAL ANTHEYESTHI ( LAST FUNERAL RITE ) -- THAT PARSIS MUST NOT CREMATE AS PER HINDU RITES --THEY MUST FOLLOW ANOTHER CUSTOM WHICH WAS PREVALENT IN ANCIENT IRAN AMONG NON-HINDUS..THAT OF OFFERING THEIR DEAD BODIES TO VULTURES..<br />\n<br />\nThere are sixteen rituals (Shodasa samskaras) prescribed by scriptures and adhered across the land of Bharath for 30 millenniums.<br />\n1/Garba Aadhana - Pre consummation rites which purify the parents<br />\n2/Pumsavana - Rites for the carrying mother<br />\n3/Simantonnayana - Prenatal rite for the protection of carrying mother and her womb<br />\n4/Jatakarma - Natal rite purifying the new born<br />\n5/Namakarana - Naming Ceremony<br />\n6/Nishkramana - Exposing the infant to outside world<br />\n7/Annaprashana - First Feeding of solid food<br />\n8/Chaulam - Tonsure<br />\n9/Karnavedhana - Piercing the ears<br />\n10/Aksharaabhyasa or Vidyaramba - Beginning of Education<br />\n11/Upanayana - Opening the eye of wisdom. Lit. bringing near the Guru, scripture and God. Investiture of Sacred Thread.<br />\n12/Vedaarambha - Initiation into the Vedic Education<br />\n13/Keshanta or Ritusuddhi - Whole body Shave for boys or Nuptial rites for girls<br />\n14/Samaavartana - Convocation or Completion of Education<br />\n15/ Vivaha - Marriage<br />\n16/ Anthyeshti - Funeral Rites<br />\n<br />\nAS PER THE KING, PARSIS WERE NOT ENTITLED TO MOKSHA IN THE HOLY LAND OF BHARAT.. THESE FUTURE TRAITORS COULD GO BACK TO PERSIA , RAHER THAN HAVING THEIR SOULS TRAPPED ON EARTH FOREVER, LONELY AND MISERABLE..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/11/rip-impossible-with-burial-world-is.html<br />\n<br />\nTHE KING IN ALL HIS WISDOM KNEW THAT PARSIS WOULD NEVER EVER INTEGRATE INTO INDIAN SOCIETY-- HOW RIGHT HE WAS.. PARSIS WOULD RATHER INTERMARRY AND PRODUCE SUBSTANDARD OFF SPRINGS..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c7887209310595895295-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c7887209310595895295-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c1830063026673957857\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6VOqqm-hCbM/XCa06XjAUxI/AAAAAAABfL4/E3K2A6jHNG0XTf7_mZb9kjj9WxD3GwmzQCK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. WAY</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c8286410734374761015\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6VOqqm-hCbM/XCa06XjAUxI/AAAAAAABfL4/E3K2A6jHNG0XTf7_mZb9kjj9WxD3GwmzQCK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/god-code-by-timothy-paul-smith-damning.html?showComment=1546673357722#c8286410734374761015\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 5, 2019 at 12:59 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nTHIS MESSAGE IS TOP URGENT AND DIRECTED TO PADMA VIBHUSHAN HOLDERS SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR AND SADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV AND BABA RAMDEV / MATA AMRITANANDAMAYI..<br /><br />TIME HAS COME TO PROVE THAT YOU ARE WORTHY OF THE AWARD... OR YOU BETRAY THE HINDUS..DONT SIT ON THE FENCE ....<br /><br />THERE IS A CASE AGAINST THE SABARIMALA TANTRI IN SUPREME COURT BY RABIDLY ANTI-HINDU FORCES THAT HE CLOSED THE NADA ( INNER SANCTUM DOOR ) BECAUSE FEMALES ENTERED THE SANNIDHANAM..<br /><br />THE CASE IS THAT HE INSULTED WOMEN AND ALSO DISOBEYED THE SUPREME COURT ORDER... ALL DESH DROHI FORCES ARE CRYING \" BRAHMANICAL PATRIARCHY \"..<br /><br />COME ON TV RIGHT NOW ...ALL 4 OF YOU....<br /><br />EXPLAIN TO THE PEOPLE OF INDIA..<br /><br />NO YAGNA IN SANATANA DHARMA IS A BLOOD SACRIFICE..<br /><br />ALL YAGAMS ARE BLOODLESS..<br /><br />ONLY DESI GHEE AND COCONUT WATER ( ELECTROLYTIC PLASMA ) IS SACRIFICED INTO THE FIRE..<br /><br />ONE DROP OF BLOOD CANNOT FALL IN THE TEMPLE INNER SANCTUM.. ESPECIALLY IN TANTRIC TEMPLES..<br /><br />THE WHITE INVADER DID PROPAGANDA EXACTLY THE OPPOSITE AND HE FORCIBLY INTRODUCED BLOOD SACRIFICES USING HIS FAKE MUTTS..<br /><br />WHEN THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA, THERE WERE ONLY 4 ORIGINAL MUTTS EACH UNDER A KERALA NAMBOODIRI...<br /><br />WHEN THE WHITE INVADER ;EFT INDIA THERE WERE MORE THAN 1000 FAKE MUTTS, ALL WORKING AGAINST HINDUISM, HARASSING POOR HINDUS TO MAKE THEM SELF LOATHING AND CONVERT TO CHRISTIANITY..<br /><br />NO BRAHMIN EVER TROUBLED HINDUS.. EVERY PANCHATANTRA STORY STARTED WITH \" THERE WAS A POOR BRAHMIN \"..<br /><br />THE EXCEPTION WAS KERALA WHERE 6000 YEARS AGO , WHEN THE RIVER SARASWATI DRIED UP , THE VEDAS ORAL ROUTE PROFICIENT BRAHMINS WERE KERALA NAMBOODIRIS ALONE..<br /><br />NAMBOODIRIS WERE PART OF THE DANAVA CIVILIZATION WHICH PRECEDED THE VEDIC CIVILIZAION BY SEVERAL MILLENNIUMS .. ADI SHANKARACHARYA, ARYABHATTA ( ARYAN BHATTATHIRIPAD ) AND CHANAKYA WERE KERALA NAMBOODIRIS -- ALL ARYANS..<br /><br />6000 YEARS AGO , PARASHURAMA BROUGHT THE NAMBOODIRI PROFESSORS FROM THE DRIED UP SARASWATI RIVER BANKS TO KERALA WITH 4 VEDAS AND 108 UPANISHADS..<br /><br />PARASHURAMA CREATED A SYSTEM WHERE KERALA NAMBOODIRIS ( ELDEST BROTHER ) HELD ALL LAND, THEY COULD MARRY 4 TIMES AND EVEN THE THIYYA KING COULD NOT COME WITHIN 6 FEET OF THEM ..<br /><br />NABOODIRIS THEMSELVES WERE THIYYAS -- BUT SANSKRIT AND VEDA ORAL ROUTE EXPERTS..<br /><br />THE REASONS WERE BONAFIDE..<br /><br />1) TO PREVENT SUBDIVISION AND FRAGMENTATION OF LAND..<br />2) ONLY A MARRIED MAN CAN DO YAGNA IN SANATANA DHARMA ..<br />3) THE LOWEST STRATA COULD NOT COME WITHIN 72 FEET ( 12 MAN LENGTHS ) OF A KERALA NAMBOODIRI WHO WERE RECITING THE VEDAS ( DAILY ) ..THIS WAS TO PREVENT CORRUPTION OF THE ORAL ROUTE..<br /><br />VEDAS WENT ON ORAL ROUTE FOR 330 CENTURIES WITHOUT LOSING A SYLLABLE OR TONE BEFORE THEY WERE PENNED DOWN 70 CENTURIES AGO..THIS IS THE GREATEST FEAT OF MAN..<br /><br />GETTING BACK--<br /><br />BLOOD MUST REMAIN WITHIN THE LEATHER BAG OF THE HUMAN BODY INSIDE A SANCTUM OF THE TEMPLE..<br /><br />THIS IS WHY MENSTRUATING AGE WOMEN ARE NOT ALLOWED ..<br /><br />THE GENDER OF A HUMAN HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH THIS...<br /><br />ONE DROP OF BLOOD FROM THE INJURED BODY OF A TANTRI DISQUALIFIES HIM FROM DOING THE PUJA.. THIS BLOOD DOES NOT HAVE TO FALL ON THE GROUND..SAME PURIFICATION RITUALS APPLY..<br /><br />THE PURIFICATION RITUAL IS EITHER GANGA WATER OR DESI HUMPED COW DUNG PASTE SPRINKLED ACCOMPANIED BY MANTRAS.<br /><br />THE WHITE INVADER FOOLED THE HINDUS.. HE CAUSED ANIMAL AND HUMAN SACRIFICES TO HAPPEN INSIDE TANTRIC TEMPLES USING HIS FAKE MUTTS..<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/11/all-animal-sacrifices-in-hindu-temples.html<br /><br />THIS BLOGSITE STOPPED THE ANNUAL COW MASSACRE AT GADHIMAI NEPAL.. BECAUSE OF THE COW SLAUGHTER , THE SELF LOATHING HINDU TURNED TO COMMUNIST ATHEISM..<br /><br />IT WAS THE WHITE INVADER WHO CREATED THAT LIE THAT BLOOD IS SACRIFICE COMPULSORY IN TANTRIC TEMPLES..<br /><br />EVERY SACRIFICE IN A HINDU TEMPLE IS A BLOODLESS SACRIFICE.. THE SACRIFICE IS GHEE AND ELECTROLYTIC PLASMA OF COCONUT WATER..<br /><br />THIS IS WHY IN THE IDUMUKETTU THERE IS ONE COCONUT FILLED WITH DESI GHEE AND ANOTHER COCONUT UNBROKEN WHICH HAS THE LIQUID INSIDE.<br /><br />https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/11/5900-year-old-sabarimala-this-planets.html<br /><br />capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c8286410734374761015-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c8286410734374761015-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c6666572926307895851\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/happy-new-year-2019-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html?showComment=1546346693784#c4454404200775574179\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 1, 2019 at 6:14 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY CALLED ME AND SAID--<br />\n<br />\nTHE GOD CODE OF TIMOTHY PAUL SMITH IS ABOUT A WILD GOOSE CHASE FOR THE MISSING ARK OF THE COVENANT..<br />\n<br />\nHE ASKED ME IF I KNOW WHERE IT IS..<br />\n<br />\nOF COURSE I KNOW..<br />\n<br />\nI WILL GIVE A HINT TO THESE STUPID CHRISTIAN AND JEWISH HISTORIANS ..</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">THIS WILL BE THE GREATEST REVELATION OF THIS MILLENNIUM ..</span></span></div>\n<br />\nTHE MOTHER OF KING SOLOMON BATH SHEBA WAS A NAMBOODIRI WOMAN FROM THE LAND OF SHEBA , WHICH IS NORTH KERALA ( MALABAR/ PUNT/ OPHIR )..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE WIFE OF KING SOLOMON WAS ALSO A WOMAN FROM SHEBA --CALLED QUEEN OF SHEBA , NAMED MAKEDA..<br />\n<br />\nSOLOMONs SHIPS WERE MADE IN BEYPORE , CALICUT ( MY HOMETOWN ) OF TEAK..<br />\n<br />\nSOLOMONs SEAL WAS IN MALAYALAM , MY LANGUAGE..<br />\n<br />\nSOLOMON AND QUEEN OF SHEBA ( MAKEDA ) HAD A SON MENELIK , WHOM MAKEDA DELIVERED IN CALICUT AS WAS THE HINDU CUSTOM..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN MENELIK GREW UP AND BECAME A MAN HE WENT TO VISIT SOLOMON AT JERUSALEM..<br />\n<br />\nSOLOMON GAVE HIM THE ARK OF THE COVENANT TO KEEP IN THE SAFETY OF THE KINGDOM OF SHEBA ( MALABAR )..<br />\n<br />\nNOW HERE IS THE TWIST..<br />\n<br />\nTO BRING THE ARK OF THE COVENANT IT HAS TO BE TRANSPORTED BY OVERLAND ROUTE TO THE KINGDOM OF DHOFAR WHICH WAS OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING..<br />\n<br />\nTODAY DHOFAR IS SOUTH OF OMAN/ NORTH OF YEMEN , WITH A NATURAL HARBOUR AT SALALAH..<br />\n<br />\nDHOFAR IS ALSO CALLED SABA OR SHEBA -- AFTER ALL IT WAS PART OF THE KINGDOM OF SHEBA ( PUNT/ OPHIR/ MALABAR ) IN MAINLAND INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nMIND YOU --JEW ROTHSCHILD CEMENTED A KOSHER LIE THAT SHEBA IS ETHIOPIA.. NONSENSE !<br />\n<br />\nThe Queen of Sheba is the only female character who appears in all three holy books of the Abrahamic faiths \u2013 the Torah of the JEWS , the Koran of the MUSLIMS and the Bible (Kings 1:10 and Chronicles 2:9) of the CHRISTIANS.<br />\n<br />\nThe Jew histrians of Talmud have an inkling that Solomon hid the Ark of the Covenant at Aksum north of the Himyarite Kingdom..<br />\n<br />\nWell , Aksum is nothing but the Kingdom of Dhofar, owned and ruled by the Calicut king .. the Oasis of Mecca was owned by the Calicut king..<br />\n<br />\nToday Jewish and Christian historians agree that the Kingdom of Saba is nothing but the Kingdom of Sheba.. They are right-- Saba / overseas part of Sheba / Dhofar is the same.<br />\n<br />\nThe younger brothers of Kerala Namboodiris ( semites with six pointed star of Shiva / Shakti merge as their symbol ) were spice overland route overseers of the Calicut king.<br />\n<br />\nMohammad the prophet was one such SEMITE . His father\u2019s elder brother Namboodiri ( ARYAN ) was a priest at the Shiva Temple at Mecca Oasis.<br />\n<br />\nARYANS ADOPTED SWASTIKA , SEMITES ADOPTED SIX POINTED STAR..<br />\n<br />\nDhofar grew no spices. Dhofar had a spice depot at Salalah where the King of Calicut ( my hometown ) stocked his spices..<br />\n<br />\nMecca Oasis was a spice customs outpost .. Spices grew wild in mainland Sheba ( North Kerala// Malabar / Punt / Sheba/ Ophir )<br />\n<br />\nMY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO 59.33 %<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<div , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE LAST 70% OF THE\nTURKISH OTTOMAN SULTANS WERE CRYPTO JEW MUSLIMS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
