, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">JEWS INFILTRATED THE ENGLISH ROYALTY - THIS BLOOD LINE IS NOW KOSHER GERMAN.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">MY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP\nTO <b><span style=\"color: red;\">59.32%..</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">JEWESS HELENA WAS A\nSTABLE MAID..&nbsp; &nbsp;SHE WAS PLANTED TO SEDUCE CONSTANTIUS CHLORUS, A OFFICER IN THE\nROMAN ARMY WHO WOULD LATER BE PUSHED BY HIDDEN FORCES TO BECOME EMPEROR. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">YES A KOSHER DEEP STATE\nEXISTED EVEN THEN..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">HELENA WAS A MERE\nCONCUBINE WAS BEAUTIFUL AND SHE ACCOMPANIED CONSTANTIUS CHLORUS AT ALL STAGES\nOF HIS MILITARY CAREER TO GERMANY AND ENGLAND..&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">JEWESS HELENA WAS THE\nDRIVING FORCE IN CREATING THE NEW RELIGION NAMED CHRISTIANITY USING JEW JESUS\nAS THE HERO.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THIS IS THE MOST\nSHOCKING REVELATION OF THIS PLANET..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">CONSTANTINE THE GREAT\nWAS <b><span style=\"color: red;\">BAPTIZED</span></b> AND CONVERTED TO CHRISTIANITY WITHIN AN HOUR OF HIS DEATH BY HIS SON CONSTANINE\nII WHO <span style=\"color: red;\">POISONED HIM</span> AND USURPED HIS THRONE ..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7gc8HOQhSUs/XB9LpkQSANI/AAAAAAABfFw/PWi1ALb9GncBfetBSHA8zjQGgh1-XDpyQCLcBGAs/s1600/BapDtism-of-Constantine-by-Raphael.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"1067\" data-original-width=\"1600\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7gc8HOQhSUs/XB9LpkQSANI/AAAAAAABfFw/PWi1ALb9GncBfetBSHA8zjQGgh1-XDpyQCLcBGAs/s640/BapDtism-of-Constantine-by-Raphael.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">CONSTANTINE II WAS THUS\nTHE FIRST TRUE CHRISTIAN ROMAN EMPEROR..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-IHIwl_Ivyng/XB9IvyZwvgI/AAAAAAABfE4/CTn4v3cZNBgfDVt766_UFtAtpt4Tg62jQCLcBGAs/s1600/CTTTonstantius-I-Bust-Berlin.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"367\" data-original-width=\"209\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-IHIwl_Ivyng/XB9IvyZwvgI/AAAAAAABfE4/CTn4v3cZNBgfDVt766_UFtAtpt4Tg62jQCLcBGAs/s640/CTTTonstantius-I-Bust-Berlin.jpg\" width=\"362\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">IN 289 AD , <b><span style=\"color: red;\">CONSTANTIUS\nCHLORUS </span></b>KICKED OUT JEWESS HELENA , HIS MISTRESS AND MARRIED THE DAUGHTER OF\nROMAN EMPEROR MAXIMIAN , THEODORA.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THEODORA SIRED SIX OF HIS CHILDREN ..THEIR SON JULIUS CONSTANTIUS WAS THE FATHER OF THE\nFAMOUS ROMAN EMPEROR JULIAN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">IN 317 AD , ROMAN\nEMPEROR CONSTANTINE THE GREAT APPOINTED JEWESS HELENA AS \"AUGUSTA\u201d &nbsp;( FLAVIA JUIA HELENA AUGUSTA IMPERATRIX ) &nbsp;THE MOTHER EMPRESS AND GAVE HER UNLIMITED\nACCESS TO ROMEs TREASURY-- A CONSPIRACY BY THE KOSHER DEEP STATE .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">HELENA IS THE GREATEST\nFRAUD IN THE HISTORY OF THIS PLANET.. IN ADDITION TO CREATING CHRISTIANITY,\nJESUS AND THE BIBLE-- SHE PLANTED FAKE RELICS ALL OVER JERUSALEM AND THEN\nEXHUMED IT WITH GREAT FANFARE..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ALMOST ALL THE GREAT\nHISTORICAL PLACES OF WORSHIP IN JERUSALEM ARE HER FAKE COOKED UP EDIFICES.. I\nHAVE SEEN ALL OF THEM..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">JEWESS HELENA VISITED\nJERUSAEM ONE YEAR AFTER JESUS CHRIST WAS COOKED UP IN 325 AD, AND SHE STAYED\nTHERE FOR THREE YEARS \u2026 HER SON CONSTANTINE THE GREAT HAD NO IDEA WAS ALL SHE\nWAS DOING WITH THE SUPPORT OF THE KOSHER DEEP STATE .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Today the &nbsp;Eastern Orthodox Church, Oriental Orthodox\nChurch, Roman Catholic Church, and the Anglican Communion revere Helena baby as\na saint..&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">HELENA BABY TOOK WITH\nHER FAKE CHRISTIAN RELICS WHICH HAD TO BE PLANTED ALL OVER PALESTINE TO PROVE\nTHAT JEW JESUS CHRIST REALLY EXISTED .. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">SHE TOOK WITH HER A KOSHER TEAM TO ASSIST\nHER, AS SHE COULD HARLY WALK.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Helena baby erected the\nFAKE Church of the Resurrection in Jerusalem, and the FAKE Basilica of the\nNativity in Bethlehem.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Below:&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">There was a Hindu\ntemple at the spot of the Church of the Nativity , </span><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px;\">Bethlehem</span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">. This was converted\nto the FAKE spot where Jesus was born..&nbsp;</span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-nXK5Qj7BMw4/XCB3G4vhuwI/AAAAAAABfIk/pViM-teBVy0ROwlwiZlS7enndXadAlL1ACLcBGAs/s1600/4w0.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"677\" data-original-width=\"1000\" height=\"432\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-nXK5Qj7BMw4/XCB3G4vhuwI/AAAAAAABfIk/pViM-teBVy0ROwlwiZlS7enndXadAlL1ACLcBGAs/s640/4w0.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">The silver star marking the exact spot where\nChrist was born was stolen in 1847.</span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Helena baby kick started\nthe construction of the Church of Eleona on the Mount of Olives, the site of Christ's ascension.. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Below: <span style=\"color: red;\">Chapel of the\nAscension, Jerusalem on the Mount of Olives</span> is the exact spot ( FAKE ) where Jesus who never existed , ascended into Heaven after his resurrection. It houses a slab of stone believed\nto contain one of his footprints. The Hindu temple before it was razed down ,\nhad Vishnu\u2019s foot print.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Helene baby identified\ntwo spots on the Mount of Olives as being associated with Jesus' life - the\nplace of his Ascension, and a grotto associated with his teaching of the Lord's\nPrayer ( church of Eleona of disciples )..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">During the Crusades in\nthe twelfth century, a chapel called \"Pater Noster\" (Our Father in\nLatin) was built by the crusaders on the site of the Eleona Church</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; King Solomon was real\u2014 his mother\nwas a Namboodiri woman from Kerala name Bath Sheba.&nbsp;</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Helena baby laid the\nfirst stones of the basilicas : the Church of Calvary and the Holy Sepulchre\nand the &nbsp;the Church of the Grotto of\nBethlehem.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"Calvary\" or\n\"Golgotha\", is where Jesus ( who never existed ) had been buried and\nresurrected. &nbsp;A Hindu temple Jupiter\nCapitolinus was razed down for this deceit ..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/05/thor-zeus-marduk-brihaspati-and-jupiter.html\"><span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/05/thor-zeus-marduk-brihaspati-and-jupiter.html</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Helena baby had Macarius of Egypt vouching for\nthe authencity of the spot.&nbsp; This Jew was\na rogue, a rapist and a saltpeter smuggler. While hiding in the desert for\ncharges of rape, Macarius baby decided to go spiritual and become a monk.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; nails of the\ncrucifixion.&nbsp; She also found two thorns from\nthe crown of thorns placed on Christ's head.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-BPcdSs9-Hgo/XB9MA2uF9NI/AAAAAAABfF4/PmGGBRdmKOwiTcfkCKcgbxmAqOaJEPTAACLcBGAs/s1600/a5875b4b739WWb56f2e7e32bd44078bbd9.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The burning bush is the location ( again the\nspot of an ancient Hindu Shiva temple ) at which Moses was appointed by Yahweh\n(God) to lead the Israelites out of Egypt and into Canaan.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the narrative, an\nangel of the Lord is described as appearing in the bush, and God is\nsubsequently described as calling out from it to Moses, who had been grazing\nJethro's flocks there&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; The Church of the Holy Cross in Jerusalem \u2013 is also known in Italian as\nSanta Croce in Gerusalemme..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7CrxyDsJAzc/XB9J7gCak4I/AAAAAAABfFQ/QPCKjHo2zKEWIZGGomqbwVGNjLjFbKupgCLcBGAs/s1600/98ed9de5e0a44WW5f81e67a0601c5f86a0.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"1076\" data-original-width=\"724\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7CrxyDsJAzc/XB9J7gCak4I/AAAAAAABfFQ/QPCKjHo2zKEWIZGGomqbwVGNjLjFbKupgCLcBGAs/s640/98ed9de5e0a44WW5f81e67a0601c5f86a0.jpg\" width=\"430\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This &nbsp;holy bone\nfrom the index finger of St Thomas, had poked into Jesus's wounds. Thomas\ndoubted the resurrection of Jesus and insisted on putting his finger into a\nwound .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">He saw blood and was HAJAAAAR convinced.&nbsp; If Jesus did not exist Thomas baby also never\nexisted. . Imagine they have a church in Tamil Nadu <span style=\"color: red;\"><b>St. Thomas Cathedral\nBasilica </b></span>&nbsp;where Thomas was buried . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7O9wg707AYw/XB9JEjqAJkI/AAAAAAABfFA/zTIBa5M7TrYrQYEX3uLIm_ztx7GadjBVACLcBGAs/s1600/SanThomeBasilica-cTThennai.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"403\" data-original-width=\"940\" height=\"272\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7O9wg707AYw/XB9JEjqAJkI/AAAAAAABfFA/zTIBa5M7TrYrQYEX3uLIm_ztx7GadjBVACLcBGAs/s640/SanThomeBasilica-cTThennai.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This church is one of\nthe only three known churches in the world built over the tomb of an apostle of\nJesus, the other two being St. Peter's Basilica in Vatican City and Santiago de\nCompostela Cathedral in Galicia, Spain.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;In 1956, Pope Pius XII raised this church at\nChennai , Tamil Nadu, India to the status of a Basilica Minor, and on 11\nFebruary 2006, it was declared a national shrine by the Catholic Bishops'\nConference of India. The San Thome Basilica is a pilgrimage centre for\nChristians in India.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; THE WHOLE IDEA\nWAS TO DELETE HINDUISM ( PAGANISM ) AND TEMPLES OF APOLLONIUS OF TYANA ON WHOM\nJESUS CHRIST WAS MODELED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">POPE SACRIFICED AN\nENTIRE \"PEOPLEs ARMY \" of 43,000 , LED BY HIS AGENT PETER THE HERMIT\nOF THE FIRST CRUSADES , TO DRAW THE EUROPEAN NOBILITY INTO HIS ATTEMPT TO\nCAPTURE JERUSALEM.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT WAS ALL ABOUT\nDECIMATING THE GREEK ORTHODOX CHURCH AT PALESTINE WHO REFUSED TO ACCEPT THE\nAUTHORITY OF THE CATHOLIC POPE AND HIS BULLSHIT LANGUAGE LATIN.... <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Byzantine\n(Orthodox) church and Catholic church formally split in 1054 when the Pope\nexcommunicated the Byzantine patriarch and the Byzantine patriarch as a reaction\nexcommunicated the Pope. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Byzantine\n(Orthodox) church and Catholic church formally split in 1054 when the Pope\nexcommunicated the Byzantine patriarch and the Byzantine patriarch\nexcommunicated the Pope. The churches broke over the claim that the Pope was\nuniversal authority for all Christians and also fought over which day Easter\nshould be celebrated on, whether purgatory was a valid concept, whether\nleavened bread or unleavened bread should be offered as communion and eaten on\nholy days and the status of the Holy Ghost. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Catholics added\n\"and the son\" to the end of the Byzantine creed \"the Holy Spirit\nproceeded from Father.\" The Byzantines believed that the Holy Ghost came\nfrom God alone, while the Catholics believed the Holy Ghost came from God and\nChrist.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jesus Christ never\nexisted.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>THE ORIGINAL JEWS OF\nPALESTINE ARE ALL DEAD.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>THE CURRENT WHITE JEWS OF\nISRAEL WHO DON\u2019T LOOK LIKE THE DENIZENS IN NEIGHBORING NATIONS ARE ALL\nPRETENDERS FROM KHAZARIA ( GEORGIA AREA ).. <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; BUT IT HAS NO FUTURE IN THIS INTERNET POWERED WORLD, &nbsp;&nbsp;EVEN IF GOOGLE, FACEBOOK AND TWITTER HOLDS\nHANDS WITH MAIN STREAM MEDIA.. <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>I WILL BE WRITING SOON\nABOUT HOW THE POPE URBAN II SACRIFICES THE PEOPLEs ARMY, TO DRAW THE FIGHTING\nTRAINED NOBILITY KNIGHTS INTO THE FIRST CRUSADE TOO CAPTURE PALESTINE .</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-6UFMy91I-mU/XCAxSXEhavI/AAAAAAABfHs/cNXtAmPDjOwmLsZJr5ZnRl__z4sbp3O1QCLcBGAs/s1600/dFLownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"258\" data-original-width=\"195\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-6UFMy91I-mU/XCAxSXEhavI/AAAAAAABfHs/cNXtAmPDjOwmLsZJr5ZnRl__z4sbp3O1QCLcBGAs/s400/dFLownload.jpg\" width=\"302\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Julius Constantius\n(died September 337) was a politician of the Roman Empire . He was the son of\nEmperor Constantius Chlorus ( Helena was his mistress ) and his wife Flavia\nMaximiana Theodora. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Julius Constantius was\na younger half-brother of Emperor Constantine I and the father of Emperor\nJulian.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">As I said , Helena &nbsp;was canonized as a saint in both the Orthodox\nand Roman Catholic Churches, and is still venerated today. Her sarcophagus is\non display in the Pio-Clementino Vatican Museum.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Her feast day as a saint of\nthe Orthodox Christian Church is celebrated with her son on May 21, the\n\"Feast of the Holy Great Sovereigns Constantine and Helen, Equal to the\nApostles.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Helena baby &nbsp;found the nails of the crucifixion ( she\nplanted them first ) . To use their miraculous power to aid her son, Helena &nbsp;had one placed in Constantine's helmet, and\nanother in the bridle of his horse. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This\nevil woman LIED to her own son Emperor Constantine the Great. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">No historian writes\nthat Helena had seduced young step-grandson Julius Constantius and that they had an illicit sexual relationship. . He was totally in her control. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Julius Constantius did not live at the court\nof his half brother,Constantine the Great though both were good friends .. &nbsp;Instead he lived with with Dalmatius and\nHannibalianus in Tolosa, in Etruria, the birthplace of his son Gallus. &nbsp;&nbsp;Constantine the Great still appointed him\npatricius and Consul .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In 337 AD, &nbsp;Constantine the Great and Julius Constantius were\npoisoned to death by the son of Constantine the great &nbsp;, Constantine II.&nbsp; The&nbsp;\ntwo younger sons of Julius Constantius were spared as they were small&nbsp; children. They would later be elevated to the\nrank of Caesar and Augustus, respectively.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Constantine II would be\nthe first Christian Roman Emperor. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Catholic Emperor Constantine\nII committed a blood bath ( using his army ) after killing his father and\nstep-brother ,which is NOT recorded in history by Vatican. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Constantine II initially became emperor\njointly with his brothers Constantius II and Constans with the Empire divided\nbetween them and their cousins, the Caesars Dalmatius and Hannibalianus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">Emperor Constantine II\nkilled all the Hindu male descendants on his father and mother in cahoots with\nthe Pope. </span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Finally greedy Constantine\nII was killed by his own &nbsp;Christian younger\nbrother Constans ( a homosexual ) , who took over his empire. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Constans was the third\nand youngest son of Constantine the Great and Fausta, his father's second wife..\nAs soon as he was born there was a prophecy by the oracle that Constans would\ndie in Helena and nobody could figure this out.. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">He did not die in his grandmother Helena\u2019s arms\nbut he died at Helena\u2019s &nbsp;place of death (\nnamed &nbsp;Helena ) thus realizing the\nprophecy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Emperor Constantine II (\nwho was killed at the age of 24 ) was the &nbsp;eldest son of Constantine the Great and\nFausta. &nbsp;&nbsp;Fausta has an illicit sexual\nrelationship with her stepson Crispus &nbsp;(\na &nbsp;Caesar of the Roman Empire ) the\nfirst-born son of Constantine the Great and Minervina.. Minervina was the first\nwife of Constantine the Great\u2014Helena was just a concubine.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In 326, Crispus' life came to a sudden end:\non his father's orders, he was tried by a local court at Pola, Istria,\ncondemned to death and executed. Soon afterwards, Constantine had his own wife,\nFausta, killed; she was pregnant when was drowned in an over-heated bath..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Crispus,\nhis wife and their son &nbsp;( who were also\nkilled ) suffered damnatio memoriae, meaning their names were never mentioned\nagain and deleted from all official documents and monuments. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Constantine the Great never found out the\nillicit sexual relationships of his own JEWESS mother Helena .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-27RwgxMOG7s/XCBXXRQxIlI/AAAAAAABfIM/Meo1LV4MY1wCGbxEVOnVsPm8Jh8fJ_0LACLcBGAs/s1600/imaswges.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">After baptizing the\ndead body of his Hindu father Constantine the Great an hour after his death , his\nmurderer son Constantine II transported his fathers \u201cbaptized\u201d &nbsp;body in a golden casket to Constantinople.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It lay\nin state for a considerable time, enough for the citizens of Rome to petition\nfor its interment in their city. &nbsp;The citizens\nheard that the body had turned blue..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A fearful 21 year old Constantius II, chose to entomb\nit in Constantinople in Constantine\u2019s new Mausoleum of Holy Apostles after an\nelaborate Christian funeral on the advise of his Christian grandmother Helena.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">There it received its\nplace amidst the FAKE remains of Andrew and Luke and among cenotaphs for the\nremaining apostles, thus making Constantine into something of a thirteenth\napostle of Jesus who never existed.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Catholic Church\ncalls Saint Constantine (306-337) \u201cthe Equal of the Apostles,\u201d and historians\ncall him \u201cthe Great.\u201d . Constantine the Great was a Hindu throughout his life..&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Coins were struck for\nthe deified FRESH Christian convert Constantine the Great, described by Eusebius as \u201cportraying\nthe Blessed One on the obverse on the form of one with head veiled, on the\nreverse like a charioteer on a quadriga, being taken up by a right hand\nstretched out to him from above\u201d.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Much of this ceremonial\nwas new and distinctly Christian. Much, however, only slightly modified the Hindu\n( pagan ) traditions of imperial consecration from previous centuries. Even on\nthe coins, the emperor\u2019s symbolism was polyvalent, for strikingly similar\nconsecration issues had been common for deified emperors before.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The first Basilica also\nknown as the Old St. Peter's Basilica in Vatican was a church created on top of\na razed Shiva temple.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Helena was the main\ndriving force behind this basilica.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;It was of typical basilical form, a wide nave\nand two aisles on each side and an apsidal end, with the addition of a transept\nor bema, giving the building the shape of a tau cross.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This church had been\nbuilt over the small shrine , &nbsp;to mark\nthe burial place of St. Peter, who never existed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Fragments of the Holy\nWood of Christ's Cross ( planted by Helena baby ) were preserved in St. Peter's\nup to the fifth century, in an oratory that was specially built by Pope\nSymmachus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Pope Symmachus was Pope\nfrom &nbsp;498 to his death in 514. He&nbsp; was a crypto JEW and a screw master\u2014he was NOT\ncelebate.&nbsp;&nbsp; He kicked aside the\narchpriest of Santa Prassede, Laurentius, who was elected Pope a few days\nbefore.. Massive bribes were paid by the ANCIENT KOSHER DEEP STATE and\nLaurentius was threatened with death.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Symmachus was buried in\nSt. Peter's Basilica after a tenure of nearly 16 years. &nbsp;This CRYPTO JEW &nbsp;forged the entire history of Christianity.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Below: That is I at St Peter's Cathedral Vatican nearly 4 decades ago</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-82EkcPZtZJM/XCB1glMhSbI/AAAAAAABfIc/H0z8YM4qglAuthDHHK64PVq2UTQjlEanACLcBGAs/s1600/w73.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"254\" data-original-width=\"400\" height=\"406\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-82EkcPZtZJM/XCB1glMhSbI/AAAAAAABfIc/H0z8YM4qglAuthDHHK64PVq2UTQjlEanACLcBGAs/s640/w73.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It was Helena who asked\nConstantine the Great to shift his capital from Rome to Byzantium &nbsp;in 325 AD.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Constantinople was thus\nthe capital city of the Roman/Byzantine Empire from 330 AD to 1204 AD..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It was reinaugurated in\n325 AD from ancient Byzantium as the new capital of the Roman Empire by Emperor\nConstantine the Great, after whom it was named, and dedicated on 11 May 330.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The King of Calicut had\nbeen trading spices with Byzantium for millenniums.&nbsp; The Calicut king landed his spices by ship at\nGwadar ( this port once part of the DHOFAR kingdom of Calicut King , the other\nport being Salalah ) , and from there the spices went by overland route to\nGeorgia and then to Byzantium .. Jews were the middle men .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Until the fall of the\nByzantine empire in 1453 AD, the spices came from Calicut \u2014 my hometown, via\nGwadar ( today in Pakistan ) .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red; font-size: large;\">INDEED THE POPE HAS\nCONVERTED MANY EVIL CHEATS INTO SAINTS..</span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/diabolical-ministering-angel-mother.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/diabolical-ministering-angel-mother.html</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">August 6, 2018 at 12:28\nAM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://indianexpress.com/article/india/kerala-church-sexual-abuse-confessions-by-women-should-go-says-ncw-5278514/\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://indianexpress.com/article/india/kerala-church-sexual-abuse-confessions-by-women-should-go-says-ncw-5278514/</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TIME TO EXHUME NAKED\nTRUTHS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PROTESTANTS DO NOT\nCONFESS IN CHURCH.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PROTESTANTS DO NOT\nBELIEVE THAT GOD IS IGNORANT OF YOUR SINS.. AND HENCE REQUIRES A MIDDLEMAN\nBETWEEN THE DEVOTEE AND HIS GOD..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PROTESTANT BELIEVE THAT\nONLY GOD CAN FORGIVE--NOT A BROKER POPE OF PADRE..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/03/protestant-christianity-created-by-jews.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/03/protestant-christianity-created-by-jews.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THERE IS ABSOLUTELY NO\nREFERENCE IN THE BIBLE OLD OR NEW ABOUT CONFESSING TO A MIDDLEMAN PRIEST WITHIN\nTHE CONFINED OF A CONFESSION BOX INSIDE THE CHURCH..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BIBLE WANTS SINNERS TO\nCONFESS TO GOD DIRECT IN REPENTANCE.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE: If we confess\nour sins, he is faithful and just and will forgive us our sins and purify us\nfrom all unrighteousness. 1 john 1.9\u2014UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE RULE OF CONFESSING\nTO THE PRIEST FROM INSIDE A CONFESSION BOX WHILE HOLDING A CROSS ( AS A\nSACRAMENT ) WAS LAID DOWN AT THE FOURTH LATERAN COUNCIL IN 1215 AD..The Fourth\nCouncil of the Lateran was convoked by Pope Innocent III, and the Council\ngathered at Rome's Lateran Palace beginning 11 November 1215. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CANON 21, \"Omnis\nutriusque sexus\", commands every HERMAPHRODITE Christian who has reached\nthe years of discretion to confess all ITS sins at least once a year to ITS\npriest. This was more of a political ploy..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">UTRIUSQUE SEXUS MEANS\nHERMAPHRODITE.. A PERSON WITH PENIS ( WITHOUT BALLS ) AND VAGINA ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THESE UNFORTUNATE\nPEOPLE WERE THEN BLACKMAILED FOR SEX BY CATHOLIC ELITES WHO ENGAGED IN SUCH\nDEVIANT PLEASURES .. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONFESSIONS WERE 100%\nSEXUAL IN NATURE AND WEALTHY GAY CLIENTSS USED TO WAIT OUTSIDE THE CHURCH.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE SEXUAL ORIENTATION\nOF THIS HERMAPHRODITE WAS WHAT WAS CONFESSED AS SOMETIME IT COULD SATISFY AN\nANAL SEX HUMPING GAY-- OR EVEN A PERVERTED STRAIGHT AS IT HAD A VAGINA.. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">LATER THIS CONFESSION\nWAS EXTENDED TO BOTH MALE AND FEMALE GENDERS.. WHY SHOULD A WOMAN CONFESS TO A\nSTRANGER MALE PRIEST ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE WIFE OF ANAL SEX\nRECEIVING GAY KING EDWARD VIII WAS A HERMAPHRODITE..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JESUS WAS FIRST\nDEPICTED ON A CROSS ONLY 1148 YEARS AGO..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JESUS CHRIST WAS COOKED\nUP AT THE FIRST COUNCIL OF NICEA BY ROMAN EMPEROR CONSTANTIN THE GREAT IN 325\nAD..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
