, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/04/apollonius-or-jesus-christ-who-is-real.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/04/apollonius-or-jesus-christ-who-is-real.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">capt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Feast of the\nExaltation of the Holy Cross, is celebrated every year on September 14, to\ncelebrate &nbsp;the finding of the True Cross\nby Saint Helena ( sic ). It reality it is finding of the FAKE cross planted and\nexhumed by Helena baby<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Orthodox Church\ncommemorates the Uncovering of the Precious Cross and the Precious Nails by the\nHoly Empress Helen on March 6.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jewess Helena ensured\nthat the day Constantine the Great died ( he was baptized an hour after his\ndeath ) be the DAY OF THE PENTACOST.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is a kosher\nsignature.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Bible says that on\nthe&nbsp; Day of Pentecost, the Holy Spirit\ncame down to permanently indwell the disciples, and the church age began.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The New Testament gives\nthe description of the events: --<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now when the Day of\nPentecost had fully come, they were all with one accord in one place. And\nsuddenly there came a sound from heaven, as of a rushing mighty wind, and it\nfilled the whole house where they were sitting. Then there appeared to them\ndivided tongues, as of fire, and one sat upon each of them. And they were all filled\nwith the Holy Spirit and began to speak with other tongues, as the Spirit gave\nthem utterance (Acts 2:1-4).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BAAAP RE !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I indeed baptize you\nwith water unto repentance, but He who is coming after Me is mightier than I .\n. . He will baptize you with the Holy Spirit and fire (Matthew 3:11).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But you shall receive\npower when the Holy Spirit has come upon you; and you shall be witnesses to Me\nin Jerusalem, and in all Judea and Samaria, and to the end of the earth (Acts\n1:8).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The only biblical\nreference to the actual events of Pentecost is Acts 2:1\u20133. Pentecost is\nreminiscent of the Last Supper; in both instances the disciples are together in\na house for what proves to be an important event.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the Last Supper the\ndisciples ( WHO NEVER EXISTED ) &nbsp;witness\nthe end of the Messiah\u2019s earthly ministry as He asks them to remember Him after\nHis death until He returns.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pentecost was one of\nthe Jewish feast days. Only they didn't call it Pentecost. That's the Greek\nname. The Jews called it the Feast of Harvest. Pentecost was the celebration of\nthe beginning of the early wheat harvest, which meant that Pentecost always\nfell sometime during the middle of the month of May.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Roman Catholic\nChurch counts the day of Pentecost as 50 days after the pagan Easter.. Sunday\nPentecost of the Catholic Church is derived from the sacred festival of the\nancient pagan goddess Flora ( Laxmi )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To conciliate the\nPagans ( Hindus ) &nbsp;to nominal\nChristianity, Rome, pursuing its usual policy&nbsp;&nbsp;took measures to\nget the Christian and Pagan festivals (&nbsp;\nholidays ) amalgamated&nbsp;and, by a complicated but skillful adjustment of the calendar..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PAGAN ALTARS &nbsp;were dedicated to Christian heroes; incense,\nlights, flowers, processions , vestments&nbsp;&nbsp; hymns, which had pleased the people in older cults, were\ndomesticated and cleansed in the ritual of the Church<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Roman Catholic\nChurch thus \"baptized\" the pagan Floralia, called it\n\"Pentecost,\" a Biblical-sounding name, and observed it seven weeks\nafter Easter Sunday!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whereas in Leviticus\n23:15-16, the word \"sabbath\" is used in regard to counting\n\"seven sabbaths\" to the \"seventh sabbath,\" Deuteronomy 16:9\nplainly says, \"Seven WEEKS shalt thou number unto thee:&nbsp; begin to number the SEVEN WEEKS . . . And thou\nshalt keep the FEAST OF WEEKS.\"&nbsp;\nHere the word is shabua&nbsp; and means\n\"seven,\" \"week.\"&nbsp;\nThus the Bible itself interprets the meaning of \"sabbaths\" as\nused in Leviticus 23 as \"weeks\"!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Jews since time\nimmemorial have celebrated Pentecost, by counting seven weeks from the first\nHigh Holy Day of Passover.&nbsp; But the pagan\nSamaritans, and the hellenizing Sadducees, a quasi-religi-political sect among\nthe Jews, counted their \"Pentecost\" differently.&nbsp; According to them, the wave sheaf offering\nwas to be done on the day following -- not the High Day Sabbath of Passover --\nbut the WEEKLY sabbath day that occurs DURING the feast of unleavened bread.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By so reckoning, they\nautomatically place the day of the wave sheaf offering on none other than\nEASTER SUNDAY -- because that is the Sunday which occurs the day after the\nweekly Sabbath during unleavened bread!&nbsp;\nBy so reckoning, therefore, they have adopted EASTER SUNDAY AS THE DAY\nOF THE WAVE SHEAF OFFERING!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The official Jewish\npractice has always been to count the fifty days beginning with the day after\nthe FIRST HIGH HOLY DAY of Unleavened Bread.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The substitution of\npagan holidays for God's holy days was codified and enforced by the Roman\nEmperor Constantine, at the Council of Nicea in 325 A.D. on the advise of\nHelena baby&nbsp; . In Constantine's immortal\nwords:---</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"It appeared an\nunworthy thing that in the celebration of this most holy feast we should follow\nthe practice of the Jews, who have impiously defiled their hands with enormous\nsin, and are, therefore deservedly afflicted with blindness of soul . . . Let\nus then have NOTHING IN COMMON WITH THE DETESTABLE JEWISH\nCROWD . . . Strive and pray continually that the purity of your souls may not\nseem in anything to be sullied by fellowship with the customs of these most\nwicked &nbsp;men . . . All should unite in\ndesiring that which sound reason appear to demand, and in AVOIDING ALL\nPARTICIPATION IN THE PERJURED CONDUCT OF THE JEWS\" (Eusebius, Life of\nConstantine, &nbsp;3:18-19, NPNF, 2nd, I,\npp.524-525).</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thus the Roman Catholic\nChurch and all western professing Christendom departed from the true festivals\nof God as set forth in the Scriptures, and embraced pagan days and\ncelebrations, now calling them \"Christian.\"&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The pagan Easter\nSunday-pagan Pentecost Sunday tradition is tied together, and goes together<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is not just Easter\nitself which is pagan to the core, but the whole pagan complex of holidays --\nthe Pagan Easter AND the Pagan Pentecost!&nbsp;\nThey are tied together.&nbsp; If you\nobserve either one, you are following a PAGAN custom which Almighty God\ncondemns!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Easter Sunday\ncelebrates the Christian belief of Jesus Christ's resurrection. According to\nthe Bible, Jesus Christ's death and resurrection occurred around the time of\nthe Jewish Passover, which was celebrated on the first Full Moon following the\nvernal equinox.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This soon led to\nChristians celebrating Easter on different dates.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 325 AD the Council\nof Nicaea established that Easter would be held on the first Sunday after the\nfirst Full Moon occurring on or after the vernal equinox. &nbsp;From that point forward, the Easter date\ndepended on the ecclesiastical approximation of March 21 for the vernal\nequinox.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Gregorian calendar\nwas created because the Julian calendar was slightly too long. With the Julian\ncalendar, the equinox date moved towards the earlier dates of March and further\naway from the Easter.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Gregorian\ncalendar, Easter falls on a Sunday between March 22 and April 25 from 1753 to\n2400. In the Julian calendar, used by some eastern or Orthodox churches, Easter\nalso falls on a Sunday from March 22 to April 25, which in the Gregorian\ncalendar are from April 3 to May 10 from 1753 to 2400.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2007 Easter fell on\nthe same date (April 8) in both calendars when the Julian date was converted to\nthe Gregorian date. This also happened in other years, such as 2004, 2010 and\n2011.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1997 the World\nCouncil of Churches proposed a reform of the Easter calculation to replace an\nequation-based method of calculating Easter with direct astronomical\nobservation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Easter or Resurrection\nSunday, is a festival and holiday celebrating the resurrection of Jesus from\nthe dead, described in the New Testament as having occurred on the third day of\nhis burial after his crucifixion by the Romans at Calvary c. 30 AD.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This would have solved\nthe Easter date difference between churches that observe the Gregorian calendar\nand those that observe the Julian calendar. The reform was proposed to be\nimplemented in 2001, but it is not yet adopted.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 18.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">It was JEWESS Helena\u2019s\nidea that the resurrection of Jesus, must be timed to the observance in\nrelation to Passover.</span></b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 18.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">The First Council of\nNicaea (325) established two rules, independence of the Jewish calendar and\nworldwide uniformity, which were the only rules for Easter explicitly laid down\nby the Council.</span></b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TOO MUCH CONFUSION ,\nRIGHT?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SO LET US COLLECT\nEASTER EGGS WITH PAGALIKA GHOSE WHO WANTED TO COLLECT THEM EGGS ON GOOD FRIDAY<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-F5mpY-e1fo8/XCCDohtdyfI/AAAAAAABfIs/Jh2SlnWf6kgnlAm8Lvs-1ZjvyGkUmTUEgCLcBGAs/s1600/downloSSad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"133\" data-original-width=\"378\" height=\"140\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-F5mpY-e1fo8/XCCDohtdyfI/AAAAAAABfIs/Jh2SlnWf6kgnlAm8Lvs-1ZjvyGkUmTUEgCLcBGAs/s400/downloSSad.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b><br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"></b><br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/helena-mother-of-roman-emperor.html?showComment=1545635283654#c1912419191218296165\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">December 24, 2018 at 12:38 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/helena-mother-of-roman-emperor.html<br />\n<br />\nHEY SAGARIKA GHOSE<br />\n<br />\nSHALL WE COLLECT SOME EASTER EGGS ON GOOD FRIDAY AND DANCE WITH HELENA BABY ?<br />\n<br />\nMAJJA AAYENGA !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\nSAGARIKA GHOSE<br />\nRAJDEEP SARDESAI<br />\nSUHEL SETH<br />\nARUNDHATI SUZANNE ROY<br />\nANNA MM VETTICAD</div>\n</div>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\">LET US DANCE WITH PAGALIKA GHOSE&nbsp;</b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/AX8Ik8QHk1E/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/AX8Ik8QHk1E?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Luke the Evangelist never\nexisted.&nbsp; He is the author of both the\nGospel of Luke and the Acts of the Apostles, which would mean Luke contributed\nover a quarter of the text of the New Testament, more than any other author.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">But HEY, Luke was a\npainter too.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Here is something Luke\nbaby painted. It was lost and found by Helene baby ( so what else is new ? ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-7LNAO9NU84Q/XCCJXTo8TfI/AAAAAAABfI0/SyW4QBiy2U4vBGoX60BeWm3DpoOXtce4wCLcBGAs/s1600/SalusPopuliromssanicrowned.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"909\" data-original-width=\"612\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-7LNAO9NU84Q/XCCJXTo8TfI/AAAAAAABfI0/SyW4QBiy2U4vBGoX60BeWm3DpoOXtce4wCLcBGAs/s640/SalusPopuliromssanicrowned.jpg\" width=\"430\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The painting Salus\nPopuli Romani, is enshrined in the Basilica of St. Mary Major in Rome.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">According to the legend: \"after the Crucifixion, when Our Lady moved to\nthe home of St.John, she took with her a few personal belongings--among which\nwas a table built by the Redeemer in the workshop of St. Joseph. When pious\nvirgins of Jerusalem prevailed upon St. Luke to paint a portrait of the Mother\nof God, it was the top of this table that was used to memorialize her image.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">While applying his brush and paints, St. Luke listened carefully as the Mother\nof Jesus spoke of the life of her son, facts which the Evangelist later\nrecorded in his Gospel. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">After Helene baby found\nthe painting she &nbsp;transported it to Constantinople\nand got a church erected a church for its enthronement.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">BAAP RE !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The painting&nbsp; Salus Populi Romani was later used by the CRYPO\nJEW Jesuit Order in particular to foster devotion to the Mother of God through\nthe Sodality of Our Lady movement. &nbsp;&nbsp;Wherever\nthe Society of Jesus went to establish colleges or missions, a sodality of the\nBlessed Virgin was soon erected in that place.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CRYPTO JEW Jesuits used\nthe model of the first Sodality at the Roman College to establish a number of\nsimilar Sodalities in India .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Time for me to digress --all this is getting a bit too tedious..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">More than 4 decades\nago, I was appearing for my Second mate\u2019s exam.&nbsp;&nbsp; Almost all my batchmates were staying at\nSeaman\u2019s club Ballard Estate Mumbia\u2014 except for a few hardcore one who wanted\nto see a Chutney Mary \u2018s ( attractive Catholic divorcee ) bushy twat every day.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She had kept a peep\nhole between her shower and the ones which the young sailors used . And when\nthey asked her for water she would bend down whole opening the fridge door (\nalways wears micro mini ) and give a generous display of her hairy twat.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When I visited my\nfriend to prove the twat display lore\u2014he asked her for water, and I too saw her\nhairy twat and nice ass. Most of these \u201ctwat party\u201d failed and they came\nrushing to the club for the second attempt.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Digression: One of my\nsardarjee batchmates had a huge dong.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nSince 250 cadets bathed nude in two halls we all knew the sizes of each\nothers dongs.&nbsp; There were two who hid\n\u2013they were gays.&nbsp; One day this sardarjee\nwas taking a shower, with beard and hair reaching his waist, he felt an eye\nwatching him though the peephole. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He quickly&nbsp; put on a towel and yanked the adjacent shower\ndoor open \u2013 and there was Chutney Mary\u2019s 12 year old niece in school uniform on\nher knees looking through the peephole\u2014with her panties down at her ankles .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of my Catholic\nfriends stayed in SODALITY HOUSE , Byculla, Mumbai.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I asked him why he is\nstaying alone there \u2013he said it is cheap and clean . And he has plenty of young\nfriends from Xaviers college who were given a good concession ( almost free )\nat Sodality house. .&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I told him \u2013better come\nto seaman\u2019s club and study as a group. He did not\u2014he failed first attempt.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I asked him\u2014do you know\nwhat the Sodality logo on the building where you stay means ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He did not.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I told him \u201cX and the P\nin the middle-- this combination stands for Jesus.&nbsp; &nbsp;XP\nincludes the Greek letters CH (Chi) and R (Rho) which means Jesus (\u03a7\u03a1\u0399\u03a3\u03a4\u039f\u03a3).\nAnd there is an M which stands for Mary\u201d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The name SODALITY stuck\nin my head and I did research.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sodality is a Jesuit\nJew thingy.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Francis Xavier and\nIgnatius of Loyola were both Jews attached to Sodality Jesuit house.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MOTHER TERESA, THE\nALBANIAN SAINT WAS FROM SODALITY HOUSE WHEN SHE WAS A YOUNG GIRL NAMED GANXHE\nAGNES BOJAXHIU<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This Jesuit Jew girl\nwas born in Skopje (now the capital of the Republic of Macedonia), then part of\nthe Kosovo Vilayet of the Ottoman Empire..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/diabolical-ministering-angel-mother.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/diabolical-ministering-angel-mother.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In her teens 9 age 17\n)&nbsp; she moved to Ireland ( Sisters of\nLoretto) , became a Catholic nun and then to India. Her sainthood was planned\nby Jews as soon as she came to Calcutta.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;When she took her vows as a Sister of Loretto,\nshe chose the name Teresa after Th\u00e9r\u00e8se of Lisieux. &nbsp;&nbsp;The Zionist Jews did propaganda that she\nquoted Prophet Isaiah of the Dead Sea scrolls . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Six weeks before her\ndeath at the age of 23 , she remarked to Pauline, \"The words in Isaiah:\n'No stateliness here, no majesty, no beauty, as we gaze upon him, to win our\nhearts. Nay, here is one despised, left out of all human reckoning; how should\nwe recognize that face? \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BALLS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ISHANI&nbsp; ( FOLLOWERS&nbsp;\nOF SHIVA ) BECAME ESSENE .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JESUS NEVER EXISTED\n.&nbsp;&nbsp; JESUS WAS MODELLED AFTER KERALA SAGE\nESSENE --&nbsp; APOLLONIUS OF TYANA ( ALSO\nCALLED ISAIAH ) . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THERE IS NOTHING ABOUT\nJUDAISM OR CHRISTIANITY IN DEAD SEA SCROLLS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1950 Teresa founded\nthe Missionaries of Charity, a Roman Catholic religious congregation which had\nover 4,500 sisters and was active in almost all nations on this planet<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Women and girls were\nfinally admitted to the Sodality Society by Rothschild\u2019s agent crypto Jew\nJesuit Pope Benedict XIV in 1751<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mass and Communion were\nstressed.&nbsp; Sodality membership is\nworldwide, including the Holy Father, Cardinals, Bishops, Priests, and lay\npersons of all ages. The sodality was organized to increase the personal\nholiness of its members and to train them in charitable work for others\u2014a way\nto grab power<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A goal of Sodality has\nalways been to further personal piety among its members by urging devotion to\nChrist in the Blessed Sacrament, devoted imitation of Mary, use of prayer, etc.\nengaged in the lay apostolate.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the parish, lay apostolate is the organized\nhelp given by parishioners to their parish priest in his apostolic work by\nparticipating in charitable and apostolic work. Sodality is a spiritual\norganization where Catholics act together for the Savior, the Blessed Mother,\nand the Church.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sodality house is Seva\nNiketan, a Christian Life Community (CLC) centre in Mumbai.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The CLC is what is\ncalled a Sodality; a group of lay Christian people who get together for their\nown spiritual upliftment and to do pious acts and charity. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; WHILE EATING HUMAN FLESH HE USED TO JOKE THAT IT TASTES LIKE PORK.<br />\n<br />\nOnce Richard and the others reach the Holy Land and join the siege of Acre, Richard falls ill. He asks for pork, but there is none. He is revived after being fed a young saracen. When this cannibalism is revealed to a recovered Richard he laughs and celebrates that his troops won\u2019t starve as long as there are saracens. Revived, Richard leads a victorious assault on Acre. When the saracens arrive to talk terms, they are served the boiled heads of the saracen prisoners of war. The saracens return to their sultan Saladin to report that Richard intends to stay in the Holy Land until the Christians have eaten every saracen.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Coer_de_Lyon</span><br />\n<br />\nI WILL WRITE ABOUT IT SOON..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"https://news.abs-cbn.com/overseas/12/24/18/pilgrims-gather-at-jesus-traditional-birthplace-for-christmas\"><span style=\"background-color: lime; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BBB )&nbsp; &nbsp;Apollonius of Tyana was more powerful that the\nRoman Emperor . The Roman emperor created the POPE and between both of them\nthey sacked their own bastion Rome several times-- just to get rid of every\nhistorical trace of Apollonius of Tyana --and this included burning the great\nlibrary of Alexandra<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">COLOSSEUM WAS BUILT ON\nA DRIED UP LAKE-- LIKE IN BANGALORE THE BUS STAND IS BUILT ON A DRIED UP LAKE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/apollonius-or-jesus-christ-who-is-real.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/apollonius-or-jesus-christ-who-is-real.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CCC ) TWO THINGS HAVE\nBEEN INTEGRATED INTO BIBLE FROM THE LIFE OF DAMISA. &nbsp;&nbsp;DAMISAs WIFE , A KERALA NAMBOODIRI WOMAN\nNAMED MARY MAGDALENE AND THE CRUCIFICATION SCENE. &nbsp;&nbsp;THOUGH PARTS OF HIS LIFE IS SHOVED INTO THE\nLIFE OF JESUS, DAMISA 'S LIFE WAS ALSO SHOVED INTO THE LIFE OF DISCIPLE PAUL.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I HAVE BEEN ALL OVER\nVATICAN AND JESRUSALEM. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHAT I COULD\nNOT SEE 4 DECADES AGO , I TOLD MY ELDER SON WHEN ON VACATION-- TO TAKE A\nEXPENSIVE GYRO STABILISED VIDEO CAMERA WITH HIGH ZOOM AND FLASH--TO SEE\nPICTURES UNSEEN BEFORE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\">The whole catholic\nworld knows that the earliest instance of any artwork that illustrates Jesus on\nthe cross was only after the eighth century. &nbsp;&nbsp;This was lifted from Damisa's accounts of\ncrucification of Barabbas -- crucification in Rome was a common practice. </span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FROM WHERE DID THE NAME\nJESUS COME?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">DAMISA CALLS BARABBAS\nJESUS IN HIS ACCOUNTS</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Jesus Barabbas\nliterally means \"Jeshua son of Abba\". Christ is taken from Krishna.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The custom of releasing\nprisoners in Jerusalem at Passover is known as the Paschal Pardon, but this\ncustom (whether at Passover or any other time) is not recorded in any\nhistorical document other than the COOKED UP gospels.. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The POPE has neglected\nto delete this JESUS BARABBAS truth in New Revised Standard Version.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Not only was Barabbas's\nfirst name Jesus, but his last name, Barabbas, means son (bar) of the father\n(abba). &nbsp;&nbsp;Cooked up Jesus Christ Jesus\nhad always referred to himself as the Son of the Father<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\">John 8:44 Ye are of\nyour father the devil, and the lusts of your father ye will do. (The Wailing Wall in Jerusalem is the western\nwall of the Second Temple, built on the site of the first in the sixth century\nBC).&nbsp;</span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Scholars thought that the thumbnail-sized fruit, which has a hole in the\nbottom, was used as the top of a temple priest's sceptre.</span></span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; The tomb of Jethro near Tiberias is the most important religious site for the Druze community and they gather there every April..<br />\n<br />\nDruze were targeted by the ISIS and Al-Qaeda ( just like the Yazidid ) in order to cleanse Syria and Iraq.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/the-yazidis-of-iraq-ethnic-cleansing-by.html<br />\n<br />\nJethro, the father-in-law of Moses, is the greatest saint in the pantheon of Druze prophets. He was a Midianite, a tribe descending from the sons of Keturah who were sent by Abraham to the East.<br />\n<br />\nAnalysis of the relationship between Moses and Jethro reveals that Moses always accepted the role of Jethro's disciple.<br />\n<br />\nThe Druze believed in Karma and re-incarnation of the Hindus..<br />\n<br />\nAccording to the Kenite hypothesis, Yahweh was historically a Midian deity, and the association of Moses' father-in-law with Midian reflects the historical adoption of the Midianite cult by the Hebrews.<br />\n<br />\nAccording to the Hebrew Bible, the Hindu Kenites played an important role in the history of ancient Israel. The best recognized Kenites is Jethro, Moses' father-in-law, who was a priest in the land of Midian.<br />\n<br />\nAccording to the Kenite hypothesis, Yahweh was historically a Midian deity, and the association of Moses' father-in-law with Midian reflects the historical adoption of the Midianite cult by the Hebrews. Moses identified Jethro's concept of God, Yahweh, with the Israelites' God El Shaddai.<br />\n<br />\nMoses\u2019 father-in-law, Jethro, was a Kenite (Judges 1:16) resident in the land of Midian.<br />\n<br />\nThe Kenite hypothesis supposes that the Hebrews adopted the cult of Yahweh from the Midianites via the Kenites.<br />\n<br />\nJudaism was founded by ex-communicated Namboodiris from Kerala they wrote down as Kenites ( Kerites ) . The Kenite clan of Jethro spoke Sanskrit.<br />\n<br />\nHINDU DRUZE TOOK UP ARMS ( KALARI of KERALA ) WHEN WARRANTED --AND THEY WERE LEFT ALONE ( MOUNT HERMON ) .<br />\n<br />\nThe Ark of the Covenant is directly connected with Jethro and is of Midianite origin .<br />\n<br />\nIn Exodus, Jethro takes the initiative in offering sacrifices to YHVH (Exodus 18:12) because he was more familiar with the God of Moses than Moses himself.<br />\n<br />\nIsraelites received their religion from the Kenites, a tribe associated with Jethro (Judges 1:16, 4:11) and a part of the Midianites.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nThe Jewish Encyclopedia summarizes the theories of these scholars. \"Jethro initiates Moses and Aaron into the worship of YHVH. All scholars know that in consequence of this statement, that YHVH was a Kenite deity, and that from the Kenites through the agency of Moses his worship passed to the Israelites.<br />\n<br />\nThe Kenites, then, were a nomadic tribe, more advanced in the arts of life than Israel.\" (The Jewish Encyclopedia, 1916, p. 467)<br />\n<br />\nThe Hebrew nation acquired their religion from the Kenites. There is an amazing the similarity between Druze culture and philosophy Hindus.<br />\n<br />\nJewish commentators throughout the ages have described India ( Ophir ) as a land of potency and paradise.<br />\n<br />\nThe Legends of the Jews (1925, Vol. 5, p. 196) delineates stories of sages who went to India to obtain \"plants of paradise,\" and narrates how Solomon (Vol. 4, p. 149) secured water and herbs with special healing powers from India.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c7040759456145132367-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c7040759456145132367-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c4405316843128698565\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. He had said that Druze households place Hindu scriptures in their homes.<br />\n<br />\nSheikh Tarif Amin is regarded by Druze as the preeminent spiritual authority.<br />\n<br />\nIn 1990, Amin was awarded the Israel Prize for his special contribution to society and the State of Israel, being one of the few non-Jews receive this award.<br />\n<br />\nSheikh Amin died on October 2, 1993. The Israeli President, Ezer Weizman, the Prime Minister Yitzhak Rabin and the Chairman of the Knesset were among the dignitaries present at his funeral.<br />\n<br />\nSheikh Amin's grandson, Mowafak Tarif, succeeded his father as the spiritual leader of Israel's Druze.<br />\n<br />\nSalman Falach, Druze Minister of Education in Israel, had declared that Druze religion originates from Hinduism.<br />\n<br />\nI have spoken to several Druze ( using my agent ) in Israel\u2014ALL of them consider their roots to be Hindu Indian.<br />\n<br />\nDruze use the same analogy as Krishna uses in the Bhagavad-gita [2.22]: \"As a person puts on new garments, giving up old ones, the soul similarly accepts new material bodies, giving up the old and useless ones.\"<br />\n<br />\nThe largest annual celebration of the Druze is held at the tomb of Jethro, near Tiberias..<br />\n<br />\nJethro, known as Nabi Schweib by the Druze, was a Midianite (Exodus 18:1)<br />\n<br />\nIn Exodus (Chapter 18), Jethro brings Zipporah and her two sons to Moses, and Moses bows down and kisses Jethro. Then Jethro praises the God of the Jews and \"took a burnt-offering and sacrifices for God; and Aaron came, and all the elders of Israel, to eat bread with Moses' father-in-law before God.<br />\n<br />\nOn the next day Jethro instructs Moses on the formation of an administrative structure for the Israeli people. Jethro set up the system of worship..<br />\n<br />\nBefore giving instruction, Jethro admonishes Moses for placing himself (Moses) as direct arbitrator for all decisions, great and small. Also, he introduces his remarks by stating: \"Hearken now unto my voice, I will give thee counsel, and God be with thee.\" It is obvious that Jethro has quite a bit of authority, granted by God Himself.<br />\n<br />\nAccording to Exodus, \"Moses did all that Jethro had said.<br />\n<br />\nThe twelve tribes of Israel formed as a result of Jethro's reorganization of the people.Before returning to Egypt, Moses asks Jethro's permission to embark on the journey (Exodus 4:18).<br />\n<br />\nThe twelve tribes of Israel formed as a result of Jethro's reorganization of the people.Before returning to Egypt, Moses asks Jethro's permission to embark on the journey (Exodus 4:18).<br />\n<br />\nThe first sacrifice in Israel was offered up not by Moses but by the Midianite priest Jethro. Jethro was the one who fashion the ark of the covenant.<br />\n<br />\nThus, Jethro was the first priest of the Israeli nation, and it was Jethro a Hindu who instructed Moses and Aaron in the practices of priesthood.<br />\n<br />\nJethro, known as Nabi Schweib by the Druze, was a Midianite (Exodus 18:1), a tribe descending from Keturah, a wife of Abraham (Genesis 25:1-2). Genesis (25:6) describes that Abraham sent the sons of Keturah to the East.<br />\n<br />\nIn Exodus (Chapter 18), Jethro brings Zipporah and her two sons to Moses, and Moses bows down and kisses Jethro.<br />\n<br />\nThen Jethro praises the God of the Jews and \"took a burnt-offering and sacrifices for God; and Aaron came, and all the elders of Israel, to eat bread with Moses' father-in-law before God.\"<br />\n<br />\nJethro admonishes Moses for placing himself (Moses) as direct arbitrator for all decisions, great and small. Also, he introduces his remarks by stating: \"Hearken now unto my voice, I will give thee counsel, and God be with thee.\" It sounds like Jethro has quite a bit of authority, granted by God Himself. Her tomb Ein Qiniyye and Jethro's tomb is at Nabi Shu'ayb -- a place for pilgrimage.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">AGAIN--JETHRO A SAGE FROM KERALA WAS PROPHET FOR THE HINDU DRUZE.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nThere is a concrete and strong Midianite influence on Israel's cult and law.<br />\n<br />\nAccording to the Book of Genesis, the Midianites were the descendants of Midian, who was a son of Abraham and his wife Keturah: \"<br />\n<br />\nAbraham took a wife, and her name was Keturah. And she bare him Zimran, and Jokshan, and Medan, and Midian, and Ishbak, and Shuah\" (Genesis 25:1\u20132, King James Version)<br />\n<br />\nThe Midianites worshipped Hindu deities..<br />\n<br />\nIn the Bible :-<br />\nMoses married Zipporah the daughter of Jethro, the priest of Midian.. Jethro advised Moses on establishing a system of delegated legal decision-making. Moses asked Hobab, the son of Reuel the Midianite, to accompany the Israelites travelling towards the promised land because of his local knowledge, although Hobab preferred to return to his homeland..<br />\n<br />\nThe people of Midian are mentioned extensively in the Arabic Qur\u2019an. The word 'Madyan' appears 10 times in it. The people are also called \u02bea\u1e63\u1e25abu l-\u02beaykah..<br />\nThe origin of the Midianites is from the land of Sheba / Ophir. Orthodox Syrian Church \u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">This fellow is is a\nSyriac Orthodox bishop, and the Secretary to the Holy Episcopal Synod in\nMalankara Kerala..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The word Malankara is\nderived from the island of Maliankara, where SAINT THOMAS WHO NEVER EXISTED\nfirst landed in India..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Mar Thoma, as Thomas\ncame to be known here, was ordained the first head or metropolitan of the\nMalankara Church. The patriarch of Antioch was the spiritual head of the\nMalankara Church, but he had no control over the parish churches and\nproperties..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">In 1912, the Malankara\nChurch split into the Malankara Orthodox Church and the Jacobite Syrian Church\non the question of the supreme head..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Malankara Orthodox\nChurch considers the Malankara metropolitan its head while the Jacobite Syrian\nChurch recognises the patriarch of Antioch as its spiritual head. Both factions\ntrace their origin to Saint Thomas..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Amid growing rift\nwithin the Jacobite Syrian Church, Joseph Mor Gregorios on Friday resigned from\nthe post of secretary, Synod. He will, however, continue as Metropolitan of the\nKochi Diocese..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">In July 2018, the\nSupreme Court had held that the Orthodox faction has the right to conduct\nprayers and run the affairs at the Jacobite churches, as per the 1934\nconstitution of the Malankara church. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Supreme Court\u2019s two\nearlier verdicts in 1958 and 1995, had also gone against the Jacobite faction,\nwhich has among its ranks nearly 1.3 million followers. The Orthodox faction\ncounts around 2.6 million members. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">According to the Book\nof Genesis, Jacob was the third Hebrew progenitor with whom God made a\ncovenant. He is the son of Isaac and Rebecca, the grandson of Abraham, Sarah\nand Bethuel, the nephew of Ishmael, and the younger twin brother of Esau. Jacob\nhad twelve sons and at least one daughter, by his two wives, Leah and Rachel,\nand by their handmaidens Bilhah and Zilpah\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Jacob's twelve sons,\nnamed in Genesis, were Reuben, Simeon, Levi, Judah, Dan, Naphtali, Gad, Asher,\nIssachar, Zebulun, Joseph, and Benjamin. His only daughter mentioned in Genesis\nis Dinah. The twelve sons became the progenitors of the \"Tribes of\nIsrael\"..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">KNANAYA KERALA\nCHRISTIANS HAVE BEEN MISLED BY WIKIPEDIA AND JEW ROTHSCHILD TO THINK THAT YOU\nARE CHRISTIANS / JEWS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">JUST LIKE THE NASRANIS\nYOU TOO CAME RUNNING TO KERALA BECAUSE YOUR ANCESTORS WERE BEING BURNT ALIVE (\nAFTER CHRISTIANITY RELIGION WAS BORN IN 325 AD )..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">YOUR ANCESTORS CAME\nRUNNING TO MIZIRIS BY SHIP , ALONG WITH THOMAS OF CANA IN 345 AD..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">THOSE DAYS ESSENES OF\nCANAAN WERE BEING BURNT ALIVE FOR WORSHIPING KALI ( ASHERAH/ ASHTORETH /\nASTHARTE )-&nbsp; ASHTA MEANS EIGHT ARMED KALI\n, THE GODDESS OF WAR..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">AZTECS OF MEXICO\nWORSHIPED THE SAME GODDESS.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; IN KERALA\nSHE IS KNOWS AS BHAGAWATI \u2013OF THE KODUNGALLUR TEMPLE..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">CHRISTINITY CAME TO\nCANAAN AREA IN PALESTINE VERY LATE..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">You shall tear down\ntheir altars and smash their sacred pillars and burn their Ashterim with fire,\nand you shall cut down the engraved images of their gods and obliterate their\nname from that place. (Deuteronomy 12:3)..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Israelites also\nworshiped Asherah from as early as the time immediately following the death of\nJoshua (Judges 2:13)..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Like how they got rid\nof Apollonius of Tyana , the Kerala sage after whom Jesus Christ ( who never\nexisted ) was modeled , the Christians and the Jews combined forces ( later\njoined by Muslims ) and destroyed every MULTI ARMED GOD IDOL in that entire\narea..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Let me quote Wikipedia\n\u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">QUOTE :&nbsp; Herodotus wrote that the religious community\nof Aphrodite originated in Phoenicia and came to Greeks from there. He also\nwrote about the world's largest temple of Aphrodite, in one of the Phoenician\ncities. Her name is the second name in an energy chant sometimes used in Wicca:\n\"Isis, Astarte, Diana, Hecate, Demeter, Kali, Inanna.\"[14]&nbsp;&nbsp; UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The term Knanaya\nderives from the name of Thomas of Cana ( Knai Thoma). He was NOT a Christian\nbishop norwas he a Jew . He was a Hindu merchant. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Canaan was ruled by the\nEgyptian Pharoah.&nbsp; Dimwit MOSES is\nfake.&nbsp;&nbsp; It was Kerala sage Jethro (\nfather in law of Moses ) who was the real Moses..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;
