But we will only green the world when we change the very nature of the electricity grid -- moving it away from dirty coal or oil to clean coal and renewables. And that is a huge industrial project -- much bigger than anyone has told you. Finally, like the New Deal, if we undertake the green version, it has the potential to create a whole new clean power industry to spur our economy into the 21st centur: UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nOn October 22, 2008 UNEP's Executive Director Achim Steiner unveiled the Global Green New Deal initiative that aims to create jobs in \"green\" industries, thus boosting the world economy and curbing climate change at the same time. ( FOR JEWS TO MAKE MONEY OUT OF THIN AIR )..<br />\n<br />\nGND relates to reforms to measurement of fundamental ecosystem risk and financial liabilities.<br />\n<br />\nJEWS HAVE INVENTED \"<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">REINSURANCE</span></b>\" TO MAKE MONEY OUT OF THIN AIR..<br />\n<br />\nReinsurance, also known as insurance for KOSHER insurers , is the practice of JEW insurers transferring portions of risk portfolios to other parties by some form of agreement to reduce the likelihood of paying a large obligation resulting from an insurance claim..<br />\n<br />\nREACT stands for Reinsurance Event-Attributed Carbon Tax, a system designed to put a fair price on the financial loss and damage arising from carbon emissions.<br />\n<br />\nBAFFLE WITH BULLSHIT IS THE AGENDA..</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">REACT is a method has been developed by JEWS to determine the extent to which events can be attributed to anthropogenic (human) emissions of CO2, with coal being the target..</span></div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">Jew Rothschild's tools , World Bank/IMF/UN should be the agencies for levying the carbon price and collecting the resultant revenue.</span></div>\n<br />\nThis would then be \"distributed\" with four kosher AIMS, whereby allocations are directed to Adaptation (e.g. flood protection), Insurance (ensuring viability), Mitigation (e.g. kosher solar panels, kosher wind turbines and kosher carbon capture), and to Social dividend (tax impact offsets).<br />\n<br />\nREACT measures the expected losses that will occur for each tonne of carbon dioxide emitted. It determines the allocation of the costs of those losses to each energy supplier based upon the proportion of carbon emitted and the carbon intensity of the fuel type used ( COAL IS BAAAAAD ) . The total revenue paid by all suppliers equals the total loss and damage caused by their emissions.<br />\n<br />\nJEW Thomas Friedman is an agent of Jew Rothschild --and he is terribly anti-Trump.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2<br />\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c2640052150166061700-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c2640052150166061700-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c9091036365021643432\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_20.html?showComment=1545316022029#c1693681356882740387\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">December 20, 2018 at 7:57 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/nri/other-news/three-indian-origin-students-among-times-25-most-influential-teens-of-2018/articleshow/67179127.cms</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Glioblastoma is a cancer which starts with the brain-- it is usually very aggressive, which means it can grow fast and spread quickly.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">There is no cure..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">It is a cancer that forms from star-shaped cells in the brain called astrocytes. In adults, this cancer usually starts in the cerebrum, the largest part of your brain.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Glioblastoma tumors make their own blood supply, which helps them grow. It's easy for them to invade normal brain tissue.</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">THE KOSHER DEEP STATE CONTROLLED EVIL PHARMA HIDES THE IMPACT OF BLOOD BRAIN BARRIER INVASION BY NANO PARTICLES..</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The BBB presents a \u2018physical barrier,\u2019 which forces most molecular traffic to take a transcellular route across the BBB, rather than moving paracellularly through the junctions.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The high density of the tight junctions that compose the BBB restricts the passage of substances from the bloodstream much more than endothelial cells in capillaries elsewhere in the body.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The blood\u2013brain barrier (BBB) maintains brain homoeostasis and is a physical and enzymatic barrier</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ANY DOCTOR WHO WRITE WHAT I HAVE WRITTEN BELOW ABOUT NANO PARTICLES INVADING THE BLOOD BRAIN BARRIER WILL BE DEBARRED AND THEN DEFROCKED..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; CHINESE DEBT TO GDP RATIO IS MORE THAN 380% ( OFFICIALLY IT IS 47.6 % WITH THE CONNIVANCE OF THE KOSHER DEEP STATE )..&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Chinese government is both the lender and the borrower. One branch of the government lends money to another branch of government. Government-owned banks, for instance, lend money to State Owned Enterprises (SOEs) and Town Village Enterprises (TVEs).</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE IIF PLACES THE CHINESE DEBT AS MORE THAN 300%\"..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Institute of International Finance, Inc. (IIF) is a global association or trade group of financial institutions.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">China's unregulated and growing SHADOW BANKING sector is the main driver of the Chinese credit boom..These ignorant commies are hell bent of showcasing GDP growth\u2014which is NOT real economics..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">China is busy building salt water swimming pools in the middle of the ocean or millions of fishing boats on desert sands which will never catch a fish..</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CHINA BACKED OUT OF DOKLAM WAR WITH INDIA ONLY BECAUSE LIFE TIME PRESIDENT XI AND HIS MAD COMMIES KNEW THAT THEY WOULD HANG BY THEIR NECKS ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/08/can-china-afford-war-with-india-come-on.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The government simultaneously owns banks, pension funds, and common corporations.Government-owned banks lend money directly to government owned corporations. They usually function as welfare agencies.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Banks also lend funds to land developers. They are behind the country\u2019s \u201cinvestment\u201d bubble, one of the engines of the Chinese economy.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">TO SHOW FALSE GROWTH CHINA HAS BUILT GHOST CITIES.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YPaGmv3SMUM</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Built for a population that never came, about 54 of these surreal sites lie desolate across the country. But still the construction continues. There are now 71 million empty apartments ,this naked truth is shrouded in secrecy..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Many people buy the property for investment with no intention of ever moving in, so supply significantly outweighed demand. Dead bodies are regularly found in stuck lifts .. it's actually a bubble propping up prices..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">So much debt has been accumulated in the interest of building an incredible amount of waste, where the local authorities can never repay it \u2026 that sort of model of MAD economic growth cannot continue..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; The current carries the equivalent heat energy of more than a million nuclear power plants.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">ARCTIC IS DEVOID OF ICE DUE TO THE WARMER GULF STREAM..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nPARIS COP 21 AND KATOWICE COP 24 KICKED THIS TRUTH UNDER THE KOSHER KARPET..<br />\n<br />\nI WONDER IF \"CHAMPION OF EARTH\" MODI EVEN KNOWS WHAT THE BLESSED GULF STREAM IS.. YET HE HAS WRITTEN A BOOK ABOUT CLIMATE CHANGE AND GLOBAL WARMING..<br />\n<br />\nMODI MUST HAVE GOT SPONTANEOUS KNOWLEDGE FROM AAKASHA..LIKE OUR ANCIENT MAHARISHIS..<br />\n<br />\nTHESE ARE THE IGNORANT AGENTS OF THE DEEP STATE CALLING THE SHOTS TODAY ..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">GULF STREAM IS AT ITS WEAKEST SINCE THE PAST 2 MILLENNIUMS..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nThe Atlantic Meridional Overturning Circulation (Amoc), carries warm water northwards towards the north pole. There it cools, becomes denser and sinks, and then flows back southwards.<br />\n<br />\nMelting ice in the Arctic, particularly from Greenland, floods the area with less dense freshwater, weakening the Amoc current.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/poland-katowice-cop-24-global-warming.html<br /><br />https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/global-warming-climate-change-fear.html</span><br />\n<br />\nAMOC plays a major role in regulating the world\u2019s climate.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\nHARSHVARDHAN<br />\nENVIRMNMENT MINISTRY<br />\nRAVISHANKAR PRASAD<br />\nDORK AMBUJ SHARMA<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nNGT<br />\nALL MPs OF LOK AND RAJYA SABHA<br />\nALL 3 ARMED FORCE CHIEFS<br />\nNITI AYOG<br />\nAMITABH KANT<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nVP OF INDIA<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nCJI GOGOI<br />\nALL SUPREME COURT JUDGES<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nALL DGPs OF INDIA<br />\nALL CM OF INDIA<br />\nALL GOVERNORs OF INDIA<br />\nEVERY CENTRAL MINISTER / MINISTRY<br />\nALL BJP SPOKESMEN<br />\nALL CONGRESS SPOKESMEN<br />\nNCERT<br />\nWEBSITES OF DESH BHAKT LEADERS<br />\nSPREAD ON SOCIAL MEDIA</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; The churches broke over the claim that the Pope was universal authority for all Christians and also fought over which day Easter should be celebrated on, whether purgatory was a valid concept, whether leavened bread or unleavened bread should be offered as communion and eaten on holy days and the status of the Holy Ghost.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Catholics added \"and the son\" to the end of the Byzantine creed \"the Holy Spirit proceeded from Father.\" The Byzantines believed that the Holy Ghost came from God alone, while the Catholics believed the Holy Ghost came from God and Christ.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Jesus Christ never existed.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/08/secret-excavations-at-jerusalem-by.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; Israel captured East Jerusalem, whose holy sites include the Church of the Holy Sepulcher, Al-Aqsa Mosque and Western Wall, in 1967. But the Palestinians demand that part of the city as the capital of a future independent state.<br />\n<br />\nThe land dispute saga began a decade ago at Jaffa Gate, the most prominent entrance to the Old City of Jerusalem, where throngs of pilgrims pass on their way to the city's most revered religious sites. Just inside the gate are two hotels run by Palestinian families but owned by the Greek Orthodox Church.<br />\n<br />\nThe Greek Orthodox Patriarchate \u2014 the church leadership \u2014 was bribed to sell the hotels to Ateret Cohanim, a Jewish settler group that aims to buy up Palestinian-owned properties in strategic locations in Jerusalem to increase Jewish control in the contested city.<br />\n<br />\nAteret Cohanim Is an Israeli Jewish organization with a yeshiva located in the Muslim Quarter of the Old City of Jerusalem. It works for the creation of a Jewish majority in the Old City and Arab neighborhoods in East Jerusalem by grabbing non-Jewish ands and regularizing it by blockchain, destroying original land documents ..<br />\n<br />\nThe net effect of the Israeli seizure of land in East Jerusalem, which includes recent approval for an additional 9,000 housing units, and the West Bank is to promulgate a form of administrative ethnic cleansing. Palestinian families are being pushed off land they have owned for generations and evicted from their homes by Israeli authorities.<br />\n<br />\nEVIL Ateret Cohanim, collects funds from KOSHER DEEP STATE abroad, purchases Palestinian properties and pursues legal strategies to evict families that have long resided in East Jerusalem. Israel's judicial system and police, in violation of international law, facilitate and enforce these evictions and land seizures.<br />\n<br />\nHeavily armed JEWISH settlers carry out frequent unprovoked attacks and ad hoc raids and house evictions to supplement the terror imposed by the police and military. They are the civilian arm of the occupation.<br />\n<br />\nOn 6 February,2017 the Israeli Knesset passed a law that retroactively legalises the seizure of private Palestinian land on which settlements have already been established. The law prevents Palestinian land owners from laying claim to their land if Israeli settlers are living on it, despite the fact that the settlers\u2019 presence in occupied territory is illegal under international law..<br />\n<br />\nThis provided a foul basis for further retroactive legalization of land grabs and then regularizing it by blockchain.<br />\n<br />\nFifty years of indifference from the international community ( in the vice grip of kosher DEEP STATE ) has only served to spur the Israeli government on in its expropriation of Palestinian land and expansion of illegal settlements..<br />\n<br />\nAteret Cohanim and another organization, the Ir David Foundation, began to acquire land in Arab neighborhoods of East Jerusalem outside the Old City. Most of the properties belonged to the Greek Orthodox Church, in the Christian Quarter..<br />\n<br />\nAmerican Friends of Ateret Cohanim, also known as Jerusalem Chai, was founded in New York City in 1987 to sponsor the illegal land grab.. Jerusalem Chai is a US NGO, with the purpose of fundraising for Ateret Cohanim's illegal land acquisitions in Israel..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c98106994362551386-ce\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c6926814096944994113\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. THIS IS ILLEGAL , AS USA IS A DEMOCRACY..<br />\n<br />\nIN INDIA WE HAVE PERCEPTION MOLDERS REGULARLY COMING ON TV AND ASKING JUDICIARY TO MAKE AND BREAK LAWS..<br />\n<br />\nINDIAN JUDICIARY HAS POWERS ONLY TO INTERPRET LAWS AND THAT TOO WHEN INVITED BY AN AGGRIEVED PERSON..<br />\n<br />\nINDIAN CONSTITUTION AND BRITISH CONSTITUTION IS SIMILAR.. font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: medium;\">Average power per capita was calculated according to the formula:--<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: medium;\">Electric energy per capita [ in watt-hour ] = Total population electricity consumption [ in kW\u00b7h/yr ] * 1,000 /population.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: medium;\">Electric power per capita [ in watt ] = Total population electricity consumption [ in kW\u00b7h/yr ] * 0.114077116 /population.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: medium;\">1 kW\u00b7h/yr = 1,000 Wh/(365.25 x 24)h = 0.11408 Watt<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 44px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 44px;\">JEW DARLING NARENDRA DAMODARDAS MODI\u2026&nbsp; LISTEN UP..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 44px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 44px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; IT MUST INDICATE IF THOSE NERBY DAM SHUTTERS ARE OPEN OR MAY BE OPENED IN AN\nIMMINENT MANNER .. THE RESERVOIR WATER LEVELS OF OTHER DAMS MUST BE WRITTEN\nDOWN IN THIS RISK ASSESSMENT FORM..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE RISK ASSESSMENT\nFORM ( AND ATTACHED CHECK LIST ) MUST CONTAIN INFORMATION ABOUT HIGH WATER\nSPRING TIDES AND RISE OF SEA WATER LEVEL DUE TO LONG PERIODS OF SEA TO SHORE\nWINDS ( LONG FETCH ) WHICH RAISE THE SEA WATER LEVEL.&nbsp;&nbsp; PROBABILITY OF LONG PERIODS OF HEAVY RAIN DUE\nTO EL NINO..AS WHAT HAPPENED IN 1997 IN 2018 .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE WANT A TRANSPARENT\nWEBSITE WHICH TELL US HOW MUCH MAJOR DAMS IN INDIA HAVE BEEN SILTED .. WHY RE\nWE HIDING THIS.. THERE MUST BE A NEW MINISTRY FORMED FOR THE SUBJECT OF \u201cDAM\nSILTATION\u201d ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CURRENTLY ALMOST ALL DAM\nRESERVOIRS IN INDIA ARE SILTED TO MORE THAN 60% CAUSING LOSS OF WATER HOLDING\nVOLUME ..SUBSEQUENTLY THESE WATER LEVEL OF THESE RESERVOIRS HAVE BEEN RAISED\nINUNDATING MORE LAND, INCREASING WATER SURFACE AREA , INCREASING EVAPORATION\nLOSSES IN A CRIMINAL MANNER ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">UNCONTROLLED DAM WATER\nRELEASE IS DISASTROUS AS WHAT HAPPENED IN KERALA.. RISK WAS NOT ASSESSED..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">UNCONTROLLED EXPLOSION\nCAUSES LOSS OF LIVES ( BOMB ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTROLLED EXPLOSION\nHELPS MAN ( DIESEL ENGINE INTERNAL COMBUSTION ) ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE DO NOT WANT ANY MORE\nDAMS IN ECOLOGICALLY SENSITIVE AREAS.. PATH OF NATURAL WATERWAYS MUST NOT BE\nBLOCKED ... ANCIENT FLOOD WATER DRAIN BASIS MUST NOT BE CONSTRUCTED OVER..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">KERALA IS LUCKY THAT WE\nTHE PEOPLE STOPPED ARANMULA AIRPORT CONSTRUCTION AGAINST THE WISHES OF VESTED\nFOREIGN CONTROLLED CHRISTIAN FORCES, TRYING TO STOP SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE BY\nKILLING THE PAMPA RIVER..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MANY SHIP CAPTAINS HAVE\nRUN THEIR SHIP AGROUND AS THEY WERE IGNORANT ABOUT TIDES AND UKC..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2009/07/amazon-navigation-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2009/07/amazon-navigation-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN DAM WATERS ARE\nRELEASED , THE WATER MUST FLOW INTO THE SEA VIA A RIVER OR A WATERWAY..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FOR THIS TO HAPPEN THE LEVEL\nOF THE SEA CANNOT BE HIGHER THAN THE WATER LEVEL ON THE LAND.. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECOND\nSTANDARD FAIL MM MANI WONT UNDERSTAND ALL THIS. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IS WHY IT IS\nIMPORTANT TO UNDERSTAND THE MEANING OF \u201cHIGH WATER SPRINGS\u201d &nbsp;WHEN SEAWATER LEVEL IS HIGHER THAN USUAL DUE\nTO THE TIDAL EFFECT OF THE MOON.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IF AT ALL YOU ARE\nFORCED TO RELEASE DAM WATER CLOSE TO THE SHORE ( TAKES LESS TIME FOR WATER TO\nREACH THE SEA ) THEN TIME IT SO THAT WATER WILL FLOW OUT TO SEA DUING THE LOW\nWATER TIMINGS ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Usually there are two\nhigh tides and two low tides a 24 hour period . The difference in height\nbetween high and low tides varies, as the moon waxes and wanes from new to full\nand back to new again.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At new moon or full\nmoon, the tide\u2019s range is at its maximum. This is the spring tide: the highest\n(and lowest) tide. Spring tides are not named for the season. This is spring in\nthe sense of jump, burst forth, rise.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">THE HIGH WATER SPRING\nDOES NOT HAPPEN EXACTLY AT FULL OR NEW MOON.. &nbsp;THE HIGHEST / LOWEST WATER &nbsp;HAPPENS TWO TO THREE DAYS LATER DUE TO A LAG.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">THE WHITE INVADER MADE\nA MONKEY OUT OF HINDUS BY FUDGING THE DAYS HINDUS FAST ..</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/amavasya-poornima-ekadashi-fasting.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/amavasya-poornima-ekadashi-fasting.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE HINDUS FAST WHEN THE\nTIDES ARE HIGHEST&nbsp; LOWEST TO REDUCE THE\nACIDIC CONTENT IN OUR SYSTEM AND SLOW DOWN THE METABOLIC RATE.&nbsp; HINDUS WHO FAST THE RIGHT WAY DO NOT GET\nCANCER..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fasting is done by\nHindus 3 days after full moon ( purnima ) or new moon ( amavasya )..&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If&nbsp; a Hindu fasts for 3 days continiously , he\ndoes it starting from full/ new moon for 3 days ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FASTING IN SANATANA\nDHARMA HAS TO DO WITH THE PULL OF THE MOON ON WATER .. AND WE HUMANS ARE FULL\nOF WATER......<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THREE DAYS AFTER FULL/\nNEW MOON PRODUCES&nbsp; HIGH WATER SPRINGS (\nTIDES ) WHERE WATERS IN HARBORS ARE HIGHEST .....<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE WHITE INVADER\nFOOLED HINDUS INTO FASTING ON WRONG DATES --SPOILING HIS HEALTH <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Autophagy of the body\nmeans it cleanses itself of damaged, dead and unrepaired cells. <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>It\u2019s a natural process\nwhere good cells create membranes that hunt out scraps of dead, diseased,\ninfectious cells and gobble them up. .<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>When the process of\nautophagy occurs in the body there is actually a feeling of reinvigoration as\nfresh energy flows in... <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The&nbsp; process of autophagy is unique to fasting \u2013\nsomething not found in simple caloric restriction or dieting.. &nbsp;Fasting is ineffective if you do NOT ground\nyour body.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>AUTOPHAGY by 3 day\nfasting -- is mentioned in Charaka Samhita 4200 BC.. The time window is FROM\nfull/ new moon for 3 days . <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>However if you can fast\nonly for one day then do it \"three days after full/new moon \"</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>By stimulating\nautophagy, we are clearing out all our old, junky proteins and cellular\nparts.&nbsp;&nbsp; At the same time, fasting also\nstimulates growth hormone, which tells our body to start producing some new\nsnazzy parts for the body. We are really giving our bodies the complete\nrenovation..<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The&nbsp; cells can become senescent (ceasing to divide\nand grow) and lay around secreting inflammatory compounds that can damage\nnearby cells, or die. If these dysfunctional cells are not effectively cleared\nup from the body, this can lead to disease.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>That\u2019s where autophagy\ncomes into play. It marks these cells and removes them<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>THE SHALLOW MINDED\nWHITE MAN CALLED HINDUS SUPERSTITIOUS SAVAGES FOR FASTING<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Fasting has benefits in\ntype 2 diabetes, obesity and metabolic syndrome<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>During fasting, when we\ndon\u2019t eat, our insulin levels go down and glucagon goes up. This enables the\nbody to identify damaged cells and break them down preferentially.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Yoshinori Ohsumi won\nthe Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine ( 2016 ) for his discovery ( sic )\nabout autophagy\u2014though Hindus have been doing it for milliniums. Autophagy and\nApoptosis&nbsp; was written 6200 years ago in\nCharaka Samhita<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Apoptosis is PROGRAMMED\ncell death.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Cells, after a certain\nnumber of division, are programmed to die.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nWhile this may sound kind of macabre at first, realize that this process\nis essential in maintaining good health.. <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Cells become old and\njunky. It is better that they be programmed to die when their useful life is\ndone. It sounds really cruel, but that\u2019s life<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>APOPTOSIS IS LIKE\nJUNKING YOUR OLD CAR AND GETTING A NEW ONE \u2014&nbsp;\nWHILE AUTOPHAGY IS REPAIRING IT IN A PREDICTIVE MANNER&nbsp; AND KEEPING IT GOING<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Instead of killing off\nthe entire cell (apoptosis), you only want to replace some cell parts. That is\nthe process of autophagy, where sub-cellular organelles are destroyed and new\nones are rebuilt to replace it. <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Old cell membranes,\norganelles and other cellular debris can be removed. <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Autophagy is\nessentially a form a cellular cleaning, and it is important because\naccumulation of junky cells is THE hallmark of ageing.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Hindus who fasted for 3\ndays\u2014never got cancer or dementia<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Autophagy has the\nability to prevent the development of neurodegenerative diseases, like\nAlzheimer\u2019s disease, by clearing away abnormal or harmful protein aggregates\nsuch as amyloid beta.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Autophagy is often\nfollowed by a massive boost in stem cells that can replenish or replace beta\ncells destroyed by autoimmune processes with healthy cells<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>If insulin goes up,\nglucagon goes down. If insulin goes down, glucagon goes up. As we eat insulin\ngoes up and glucagon goes down. When we don\u2019t eat (fast) insulin goes down and\nglucagon goes up. <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>This increase in\nglucagon stimulates the process of autophagy. In fact, fasting (raises\nglucagon) provides the greatest known boost to autophagy.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>This is in essence a\nform of cellular cleansing. The body identifies old and substandard cellular\nequipment and marks it for destruction. It is the accumulation of all this junk\nthat may be responsible for many of the effects of aging.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Fasting is actually far\nmore beneficial than just stimulating autophagy. It does two good things. By\nstimulating autophagy, we are clearing out all our old, junky proteins and\ncellular parts. <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>At the same time,\nfasting also stimulates growth hormone, which tells our body to start producing\nsome new snazzy parts for the body. We are really giving our bodies the\ncomplete renovation.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The consequences of\naccumulating old junky proteins all over the place can be seen in two main\nconditions \u2013 Alzheimer\u2019s Disease (AD) and cancer. <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Alzheimer\u2019s Disease\ninvolves the accumulation of abnormal protein \u2013 either amyloid beta or Tau\nprotein which gums up the brain system. It would make sense that a process like\nautophagy that has the ability to clear out old protein could prevent the\ndevelopment of AD.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>What turns off\nautophagy?&nbsp;&nbsp; Eating ! <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Glucose, insulin (or\ndecreased glucagon) and proteins all turn off this self-cleaning process. And\nit doesn\u2019t take much. Even a small amount of amino acid (leucine) could stop\nautophagy cold. So this process of autophagy is unique to fasting \u2013 something\nnot found in simple caloric restriction or dieting.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eating prevents\nautophagy.&nbsp;&nbsp; Protein switches on an\nenzyme called mTOR, which is a powerful inhibitor of autophagy, while\ncarbohydrates cause a rise in insulin and a corresponding fall in glucagon.\nFat, on the other hand, has less of an impact on autophagy, and some people\nfind it helpful to consume small amounts of coconut oil or butter during a\nfast.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A greenhouse gas is a\ngas that absorbs and emits radiant energy within the thermal infrared range.\nGreenhouse gases cause the greenhouse effect. The primary greenhouse gas in\nEarth's atmosphere are is water vapor.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">95 % of greenhouse\ngases are water vapour. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even a school child\nknows that if you get a spring evening and the sky is clear the heat will\nescape and the temperature will drop and you get frost. If there is a cloud\ncover, the heat is trapped by water vapour as a greenhouse gas and the\ntemperature stays quite warm. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At Salah in southern\nAlgeria, they recorded a noon high of 52 degrees Celsius \u2013 by midnight that\nnight it was -3.6 degree Celsius. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/dna-nasa-arsenic-and-phosphorous-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/dna-nasa-arsenic-and-phosphorous-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The flux of incoming\ncosmic rays at the upper atmosphere is dependent on the solar wind, the Earth's\nmagnetic field, and the energy of the cosmic rays.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cosmic rays are capable\nof seeding clouds with their radiation bursts, affecting weather conditions and\neven climate change in the long term.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During periods of\nincreased cosmic rays there are more clouds on earth, and during periods of\nincreased solar wind there are fewer clouds on earth.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The clouds in our skies\ndevelop from cloud condensation nuclei: that is, water vapour condensing on\nwhat are called aerosols - such as small bits of dust, ice, and salt in the\natmosphere. This happens when the amount of water vapour and temperature\nconditions are just right.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then we have the cosmic\nrays, high energy radiation made from protons and the nuclei of elements\nincluding hydrogen and helium. These rays barrel through our entire Universe,\nejected by the Sun and other stellar objects.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When cosmic rays hit\nEarth's atmosphere, they produce a shower of electrically charged\n\"secondary\" particles or ions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These ions add extra\nmaterial to the aerosols, ultimately forming bigger clouds, and impacting cloud\ncover and the temperature at ground level. I have spent 4 decades at sea\nobserving clouds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Big shifts in cosmic\nray activity, like exploding supernovae, &nbsp;cause enough of a difference to shift the\ntemperature on our planet..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As cosmic rays rain\ndown from space, they increase the number of ions in Earth's atmosphere, encourages\nthe formation and growth of cloud condensation nuclei.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cosmic rays encourage\nthe formation of low clouds, which are most effective at blocking the suns\nenergy and cooling the planet.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Earth is under constant\nbombardment by particles from space called galactic cosmic rays.&nbsp; Violent eruptions at the Sun's surface can\nblow these cosmic rays away from Earth for about a week..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/global-warming-climate-change-fear.html?showComment=1545185791315#c5543280879221379024\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">December 19, 2018 at 7:46 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/new-cars-may-face-rs-12k-levy-in-govt-bid-to-push-e-vehicles/articleshow/67153845.cms</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">E-VEHICLES IS THE DIRTY AGENDA OF THE KOSHER DEEP STATE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NITROUS OXIDE MAKES A HOLE IN THE OZONE LAYER.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NITROUS OXIDE AN UNREGULATED GAS, IS THE BIGGEST DEPLETOR OF OZONE LAYER . . . PARIS COP 21 WAS SILENT ABOUT NITROUS OXIDE AND METHANE . ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE NITROUS OXIDE KOSHER LOBBY-- THE BEEF LOBBY, THE GM FERTILISER LOBBY , THE NITRO EXPLOSIVE LOBBY MADE SURE THAT NITROUS OXIDE WAS NOT DISCUSSED AT PARIS COP21 OR KATOWICE COP 24.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NITROUS OXIDE DOES NOT HAVE CARBON IN ITS FORMULA , AND HENCE IS EXEMPTED FROM CARBON TAXES..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">UN ENDORSED THE MEGA KOSHER SCAM OF CARBON CREDIT / OFFSET\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">To keep global warming below 1.5 degrees, 100 million electric vehicles should be added to our roads globally by 2030, stated the 2015 Paris Agreement... Jews will corner all this money...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Batteries powering electric vehicles are forecast to make up 90% of the lithium-ion battery market by 2025...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Electric vehicles can generate more carbon emissions over their lifecycle \u2013 from procurement of raw materials to manufacturing, use and recycling \u2013 than petrol or diesel cars...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Producing an electric vehicle contributes, on average, twice as much to global warming potential and uses double the amount of energy than producing a combustion engine car. This is mainly because of its battery. Battery production uses a lot of energy, from the extraction of raw materials to the electricity consumed in manufacture. The bigger the electric car and its range, the more battery cells are needed to power it, and consequently the more carbon produced...</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Once in use, an electric vehicle is only as green as the electricity that feeds its battery. So the KOSHER DEEP STATE will push for solar panels and wind turbines to be imported from Jewish companies..</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">https://in.reuters.com/article/us-usa-india-wto/u-s-takes-india-back-to-wto-in-solar-power-dispute-idINKBN1EE1BK</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">While an electric vehicle has a higher carbon footprint at the beginning of its lifecycle, it is typically cleaner once in use. ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">But hey--where is the mileage before the battery is scrapped ?.. A mid-sized electric car must be driven for 160,000 km, on average, to break even with a diesel car..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">It takes TWELVE years for an electric car to be greener than a diesel car, assuming an annual average mileage of 14,000 km...</span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">E vehicle battery production causes more environmental damage than carbon emissions alone. .. When the capacity of electric car batteries drops below 80% after about eight years of use, they are no longer strong enough to power the car...</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Re-purposing of spent batteries is costly...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">An estimated 12 million tons of spent lithium-ion batteries will flood our markets by 2025, without systems in place to handle them... Recycling lithium costs six times as much as extracting virgin material. .</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">JEWS HAVE CORNERED ALL COBALT MINING .. AFRICAN COBALT MINING NATIONS HAVE JEWISH PUPPETS.. IF THEY DONT PLAY KOSHER BALL THEY WILL BE KILLED AND REGIME CHANGE MADE..</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JEW DAN GERTLER WAS A BIG CAT IN THE PANAMA PAPERS AND PARADISE PAPERS SHELL COMPANIES SCAM. THIS JEW CONTROLS THE CONGO COBALT MINES..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HIS GRANDFATHER MOSHE SCHNITZER HAD CONTROLLED THE INTERNATIONAL DIAMOND MAFIA WHICH INCLUDED KATHIWARI CRYPTO JEW JAINS OF ANTWERP AND SURAT ( GANDHIs CLAN )WHO PRAY AT AKSHARDHAM TEMPLES....</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.theguardian.com/global-development/2018/oct/12/phone-misery-children-congo-cobalt-mines-drc<br /><br />https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/global-warming-climate-change-fear.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; PMO RIDICULE \" CAPTAIN CHURNS OUT FICTION \"--<br />\n<br />\nI WAS THE ONLY PERSON TO PREDICT THIS --AND I WAS RIGHT !<br />\n<br />\nTWO YEARS AGO IN PREDICTED -- USA AND EUROPE WILL BE COLDER THAN NORTH POLE IN EARLY 2019 ..<br />\n<br />\nAGAIN PMO RIDICULED--I AM BORNE RIGHT AGAIN..<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.msn.com/en-us/weather/topstories/yes-chicago-will-be-colder-than-antarctica-alaska-and-the-north-pole-on-wednesday/ar-BBSVfxx<br />\n<br />\nI AM NOT LIKE THAT STUPID CONMAN DOCTOR GAURAV PRADHAN HALWAI --NAY TOAD WHO PREDICTS ON TWITTER HOW MANY WICKETS WILL FALL BY 10 OVERS.. SEVERAL TWEETS AND THEN HE DELETES THE ONES WHICH WENT PHUTTTT!<br />\n<br />\nIT TAKES GUTS TO PREDICT FUTURE CLIMATE ( NOT WEATHER ) --IF I AM WRONG PEOPLE LOSE TRUST IN WHAT I WRITE ABOUT PAST HISTORY.. AND I WAS THE ONLY ONE ON THE INTERNET TO PREDICT THIS..<br />\n<br />\nTHE KOSHER DEEP STATE IS BLAMING CO2 AS USUAL-- AND \"CHAMPION OF EARTH\" MODI HAS TO AGREE --AFTER ALL HE IS IN LINE FOR THE NOBEL PRIZE..<br />\n<br />\nI HAD POINTED OUT TO THE ROOT CAUSE OF EL NINO AND NEW CLIMATE PATTERNS -- \" GULF STREAM WARMEST SINCE MAN CAME ON EARTH , BECAUSE OF FRACKING METHANE LEAKS UNDERWATER\"..<br />\n<br />\nI HAD PREDICTED --EL NINO WILL CAUSE FOREST FIRES IN CALIFORNIA AND AUSTRALIA..<br />\n<br />\nTRUMP AND PUTIN PAID HEED TO THE POST BELOW-- NOT MODI..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/poland-katowice-cop-24-global-warming.html<br />\n<br />\nA polar vortex is an upper level low-pressure area lying near the Earth's poles. A polar vortex is a persistent, large-scale, low pressure zone that rotates counter-clockwise at the North Pole (called a cyclone), and clockwise at the South Pole, i.e. both polar vortices rotate eastward around the poles.<br />\n<br />\nJet streams are fast flowing, narrow, meandering air currents in the atmospheres of Earth..The strongest jet streams are the polar jets, at 11 km above sea level..<br />\n<br />\nThese winds tend to keep the bitter cold air locked in the Arctic regions of the Northern Hemisphere..<br />\n<br />\nThe upper-level winds that make up the polar vortex change in intensity from time to time. When those winds decrease significantly, it can allow the vortex to become distorted, and the result is a jet stream that plunges deep into southern latitudes, bringing the cold, dense Arctic air spilling down with it.<br />\n<br />\nGLOBAL WARMING AND CLIMATE CHANGE HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH MAN MADE CO2.. GULF STREAM IS THE SLOWEST AND WARMEST SINCE MAN CAME ON EARTH THANKS TO US FRACKING METHANE UNDERWATER LEAKS. THIS HAS CAUSED AMOC TO WEAKEN AND SLOW DOWN.<br />\n<br />\nThe Atlantic meridional overturning circulation (AMOC) is the zonally-integrated component of surface and deep currents in the Atlantic Ocean. It is characterized by a northward flow of warm, salty water in the upper layers of the Atlantic, and a southward flow of colder, deep waters that are part of the thermohaline circulation.<br />\n<br />\nAMOC carries up to 26% of the northward global atmosphere-ocean heat transport in the northern hemisphere.. AMOC is the largest carbon sink in the Northern Hemisphere..<br />\n<br />\nPhytoplanktons in oceans have reduced..-- they absorb a huge amount of carbon dioxide each year. Phytoplankton are responsible for most of the transfer of carbon dioxide from the atmosphere to the ocean.<br />\n<br />\nThe oceans influence the climate by absorbing and storing carbon dioxide. The ocean is the Earth's largest carbon sink..<br />\n<br />\nPlankton at the ocean surface use photosynthesis to convert carbon dioxide into sugars in the same way trees and land plants do on land.<br />\n<br />\nPREDICTIONS MADE BY THIS BLOGSITE AFFECT THE PLANET..
