Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/global-warming-climate-change-fear.html?showComment=1545202337750#c1950772862657540691\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">December 19, 2018 at 12:22 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/cold-delhi-morning-with-very-poor-air/articleshow/67156576.cms<br />\n<br />\nILLEGAL COLLEGIUM MELORDS AND DEEP STATE TRAITORS STILL BLAMING 6 HOURS OF DIWALI AND CROP STUBBLE BURNING ?<br />\n<br />\nIF THERE IS SMOG IN DELHI-- SHIFT THE CAPITAL..<br />\n<br />\nDELHI HAS A TEMPERATURE INVERSION PROBLEM.. AND THIS CREATES SMOG ..<br />\n<br />\nOUR LOSER LAWYER TURNED COLLEGIUM JUDGES ( BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL AND BOTTOM DREGS OF THE LOSER LAWYER POOL ) BANNED BURNING OF CROP STUBBLE ..<br />\n<br />\nIndians were to first on the planet to do agriculture. ..We taught the rest of the planet about the magic of BIOCHAR \u2026<br />\n<br />\nBiochar has the ability to sequester carbon out of the atmosphere and back into the ground ...<br />\n<br />\nTall grasses burn quick and hot, however, close to the ground where the roots start, air is excluded so the base of the grasses will pyrolyze and not burn\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCarbon is the most essential element of soil fertility. When organic matter is added to agricultural soils to increase carbon levels, most of it rapidly decomposes to carbon dioxide and escapes to the atmosphere...<br />\n<br />\nOnly a very small percentage eventually becomes stable humic matter... Humification takes decades to centuries..The process creates a fine-grained, highly porous charcoal that helps soils retain nutrients and water\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nBiochar serves as an electron buffer for redox reactions and helps bacteria swap electrons among themselves, improving their metabolic efficiency as a microbial community.. ..<br />\n<br />\nWith its pores and its electrical charges, biochar is capable of both aBsorption and aDsorption.. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe surfaces of biochar, both internal and external, aDsorb materials by electro-chemical bonds, working like an electric sponge...<br />\n<br />\nBiochar surfaces adsorb carbon and retain it in compounds with minerals, supporting at the same time a large microbial community that potentially makes more efficient use of organic debris containing carbon and other nutrients...<br />\n<br />\nUnlike biochar, compost is quickly broken down by microbial action in soil over months to at most, decades, depending primarily on climate...<br />\n<br />\nBiochar lasts at least ten times longer in most soils.... Biochar is effective at retaining nitrogen in soils and there is NO need for CHEMICAL UREA...<br />\n<br />\nThe desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has left us with a rapidly deteriorating climate, and soils that are dying and eroding....<br />\n<br />\nBiochar, as a form of recalcitrant carbon, is the medicine that DELIBERATELY degraded and unproductive Indian top soils need....<br />\n<br />\nIndia was blessed with HUMUS laden topsoil with healthy microbes and earthworms for millions of years....<br />\n<br />\nJust 55 years of desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has decimated our holy topsoil...THIS IS THE ONLY INTELLIGENT WAY TO PREVENT FARMER SUICIDES...<br />\n<br />\nThe desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has caused our holy topsoil to lose 80% of their original soil organic carbon (SOC) pool...<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMarch 16, 2018 at 9:00 PM<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nDUE TO METHANE LEAKS FROM US FRACKING THE GULF STREAM IS NOW\nMETHANE LADEN MAKING IT WARMER AND CAUSED IT TO SHIFT ITS ORIGINAL COURSE WHICH\nEXISTED FROM THE BEGINNING OF TIME..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe Gulf Stream influences the climate of the east coast of\nNorth America from Florida to Newfoundland, and the west coast of Europe<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nA warmer Arctic could halt the Gulf Stream, which brings\nwarmer water and weather to north-western Europe. There\u2019s no land at the North\nPole \u2014 it\u2019s a frozen ocean.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIn winter in the Arctic it is complete darkness yet\ntemperatures spiked 7.2 deg C The sun set in October 2017 and won\u2019t be seen\nuntil March 2018 , yet the thermometer reads like summer. Temperatures should\nbe sub zero but are instead above the freezing point.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe extent of frozen seawater floating in the Arctic Ocean\nreached new lows in January / February in 4 decades of satellite monitoring.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe arctic was 6.1 degrees Celsius warmer than usual on\nFebruary 2018<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nFebruary 2018 also saw the greatest loss of Arctic sea ice\nsince man came on earth.. Record-low levels of sea ice in the Bering Sea and\nthe Arctic are shattering all known records.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWarming Arctic decreases the strength of the jet stream.\nThis air current acts like a tourniquet keeping Arctic air from bleeding out\nover North America.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe extreme weather that has brought snow and bitter cold to\nmuch of Europe in recent days is part of a remarkable temperature inversion\nthat has also enveloped the Arctic with unprecedented warmth.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThinner, receding ice allows the ocean\u2019s heat to escape more\nreadily into the atmosphere, which the Arctic\u2019s highly stable lower atmosphere\ntraps near the surface during the polar night. As a result, winter surface air\ntemperatures have warmed more in the Arctic compared with the global average.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThinner sea ice is more mobile and deforms more easily from\nwinds and currents. In February, southerly surface winds blew sea ice away from\nthe northern shore of Greenland, causing the largest expanse of open ocean in\nwinter ever recorded by satellites. S imilarly, the Bering Sea experienced\nextreme sea ice retreat this winter.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWith more open ocean, major wind storms generate large waves\nthat cause damaging coastal erosion, endangering oceanside towns.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIn January 2018, the eastern US and Canada suffered a\nrecord-breaking \u201cpolar vortex\u201d that brought plunging temperatures and led\nNiagara Falls to freeze.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nA polar vortex is a mass of cold air that sits above the\nEarth\u2019s north and south poles. This cold air is controlled by a large pocket of\nlow pressure, which rotates in an anti-clockwise direction at the North Pole\nand clockwise at the South Pole.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nA polar vortex is an upper level low-pressure area lying\nnear the Earth's poles. There are two polar vortices in the Earth's atmosphere,\noverlying the North and South Poles. It ALWAYS exists near the poles, but\nweakens in summer and strengthens in winter. The term \"vortex\" refers\nto the counter-clockwise flow of air that helps keep the colder air near the\nPoles.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe jet stream is strongest in winter, when it has the\ngreatest effect on weather in more densely populated parts of North America and\nEurasia.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWhen it rolls along in relatively steady waves, normal\nweather ensues, with spells of cold, snow and intermittent warm-ups.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBut when it coils far to the south, bitter cold Arctic air\nspills southward along with it. Wriggling like a garden hose, each southward\nkink in the wind tends to be balanced out by a northward bend somewhere\nelse.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; That can lead to the western\nstates, even Alaska, being unusually warm and dry while the middle of the US\ncountry and the eastern states freeze.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMarch 16, 2018 at 9:01 PM<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nNorthern jet stream would start shifting southward, which would\nbring cold polar air with it, causing colder and snowier North American\nwinters.&nbsp;&nbsp; Loss of Arctic sea ice shifts\nthe jet stream further south than normal resulting in increased rain during the\nsummer in northwest Europe.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nNormally, when the vortex is strong and healthy, it helps\nkeep a current of air known as the jet stream traveling around the globe in a\npretty circular path. This current keeps the cold air up north and the warm air\ndown south.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBut without that strong low-pressure system, the jet stream\ndoesn\u2019t have much to keep it in line. It becomes wavy and rambling. Put a\ncouple of areas of high-pressure systems in its way, and all of a sudden you\nhave a river of cold air being pushed down south along with the rest of the\npolar vortex system.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWhen polar ice melts, more warmth escapes from the ocean\ninto the air \u2014 which can affect the atmosphere up to 30km high, weakening the\npolar vortex.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThis allows frigid air to break out of the Arctic and\nthreaten Russia and Europe with cold extremes<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nLarge quantities of methane are stored in the Arctic in\nnatural gas deposits, permafrost, and as undersea clathrates. Permafrost and\nclathrates degrade on warming, thus large releases of methane from these\nsources<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe release of methane from the Arctic is in itself a major\ncontributor to global warming as a result of polar amplification.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSea ice, and the cold conditions it sustains, serves to\nstabilise methane deposits on and near the shoreline, preventing the clathrate\nbreaking down and outgassing methane into the atmosphere, causing further\nwarming.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAugust 6, 2018 at 2:01 PM<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttps://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-europe-45070498<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nI HAD WARNED SEVERAL TIMES --<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nDO NOT FUCK AROUND WITH THE FLOW OF THE GULF STREAM<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nUSA IS THE CULPRIT FOR THE MASSIVE HEAT WAVE IN EUROPE<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMETHANE LADEN GULF STREAM HAS SLOWED DOWN AND IS NOW 20%\nWEAKER THAT THE PRE-OIL FRACKING ERA ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nGULF STREAM IS A CRITICAL COMPONENT OF THE AMOC ( Atlantic\nmeridional overturning circulation )..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe AMOC is an important component of the Earth\u2019s climate\nsystem-- and it is dangerous if it slows down further..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nthe Atlantic Meridional Overturning Circulation (Amoc),\ncarries warm water northwards towards the north pole. There it cools, becomes\ndenser and sinks, and then flows back southwards.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE DEEP STATE ENSURED THAT CARBON DI OXIDE IS THE CULPRIT\nAT PARIS COP21 --SO THAT THEY CAN MAKE MONEY FROM CARBON TAXES.. THE GANG OF\nBIG BROTHER KICKED METHANE AND NITROUS OXIDE UNDER THE KOSHER CARPET..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/04/most-potent-greenhouse-gases-nitrous.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nARCTIC AND GREENLAND ICE MELTING HAS CAUSED WEAKENING OF\nAMOC..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe Atlantic Meridional Overturning Circulation (AMOC) is\none part of the larger global thermohaline circulation. The circulation is\npowered by regional differences in the temperature and salinity of the ocean,\nwith water flowing to try to balance out these difference.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nA large addition of cold fresh water from melting Greenland\nice sheets to the warm salty surface water typically found in the North\nAtlantic would cancel out some of these differences, weakening the strength of\nthe circulation.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe effect of Greenland ice melt has not been widely\nincluded in previous studies of the AMOC because ice melt predictions are\ngenerally not included in climate models.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nScientists don\u2019t fully understand the AMOC itself and how it\nmight respond to not only an influx of fresh water, but also to shifting winds,\nrising sea levels, and changes in atmospheric and ocean temperatures.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nA catastrophic collapse of the AMOC can cause a\nstratification of the ocean with cold water on top and warm water on the\nbottom. a PARADOX..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/12/arctic-ice-melt-and-methane-time-bomb.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/06/methane-time-bomb-arctic-ice-meltdown.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE NORTHWARD FLOWING GULF STREAM ( EAST COAST USA )\nCONTAINS METHANE DUE TO FRACKING LEAKS..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE WARM GULF STREAM HAS SLOWED DOWN..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE THERMOHALINE OCEAN CIRCULATION HAS NOW GONE HAYWIRE\u2026<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nJET STREAM IS JUMPING LIKE A MONKEY AND HAS COME CLOSER TO\nTHE EQUATOR FOR THE FIRST TIME SINCE MAN CAME ON EARTH..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nARCTIC WILL LOSE ALMOST ALL SEA ICE SOON, WHILE THE\nANTARCTIC ICE IS BUILDING UP\u2026<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONDITIONS ARE RIPE FOR A PLANET AXIS TILT WOBBLE\u2026<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThis will trigger massive earthquakes that will destabilize\nmethane hydrates and result in huge amounts of methane abruptly entering the\natmosphere-- this was how dinosaurs disappeared..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAGAIN, THE GULF STREAM CURRENT HAS BECOME WARMER DUE TO\nMETHANE IN THE WATER... WE ALL KNOW OF FRACKING IN USA AND DEEPWATER HORIZON\nOIL SPILL ...<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAGAIN--THE BLAME IS ON INDIA-- INDIA MUST MOTH BALL COAL--\nAND WE HAVE ROTHSCHILDs APCO BRANDED NARENDRA DAMODARDAS MODI PLAYING BALL..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAugust 6, 2018 at 2:02 PM<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nINDIA DID NOT HAVE A VOICE IN PARIS COP 21 -- WE WERE SILENT\nABOUT METHANE AND NITROUS OXIDE EMISSIONS BY THE WEST . . CHITPAVAN PRAKASH\nJAVEDEKAR WAS GRINNING LIKE A CHESHIRE CAT WHENEVER HE SAW A WHITE JEW..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBetween Norway and Greenland in the western Eurasian basin,\nAtlantic currents flow into the Arctic at a depth of 200 to 250 meters, about\n4\u00b0C warmer than the surface water. In winter, cold air cools surface waters\nuntil they fall and mix with the warm waters below. ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThat creates an overall warmer, well-mixed ocean over the\ntop 250 meters, and one with little sea ice\u2026<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nOn the eastern side of the basin, however, the warm Atlantic\nwaters were kept at bay\u2014until recently. ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe currents lurked at a depth of about 150 meters, but they\ndidn\u2019t mix much with surface layers, because of a barrier called the cold\nhalocline layer (CHL)\u2014a boundary between salty deep waters and fresher water on\ntop. Summer ice, as it forms, rejects salt, leading to the creation of dense,\nsalty waters just below the ice. ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThose waters are heavier, and as they fall they create a\nhighly stratified ocean\u2026<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\ncapt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMarch 16, 2018 at 9:51 AM<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttps://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/home/environment/flora-fauna/the-sorry-state-of-earths-species-in-numbers/articleshow/63325704.cms<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHIS PLANET CANNOT SUSTAIN THE GREED OF FRACKING LOBBY ,\nBEEF LOBBY, GM NITRO FERTILISER LOBBY AND THE NITRO BOMB MAKING LOBBY . . .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE NORTHWARD FLOWING GULF STREAM ( EAST COAST USA )\nCONTAINS METHANE DUE TO FRACKING LEAKS..THE THERMOHALINE OCEAN CIRCULATION HAS\nNOW GONE HAYWIRE....<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nJET STREAM IS JUMPING LIKE A MONKEY AND HAS COME CLOSER TO\nTHE EQUATOR FOR THE FIRST TIME SINCE MAN CAME ON EARTH..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nARCTIC WILL LOSE ALMOST ALL SEA ICE SOON, WHILE THE\nANTARCTIC ICE IS BUILDING UP\u2026<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONDITIONS ARE RIPE FOR A PLANET AXIS TILT WOBBLE\u2026<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nINDIA MUST NOW CALL THE SHOTS WHEN IT COMES TO ARCTIC ICE\nMELTING --AS IT AFFECTS INDIAs MONSOONS. .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nINDIA MUST ASK WHY ONLY HARMLESS AND USEFUL GAS CARBON\nDIOXIDE WAS BEING PROJECTED AT PARIS COP21 , WHILE DESTRUCTIVE AND POTENT\nMETHANE AND NITROUS OXIDE WAS NOT DISCUSSED AT ALL . . .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWE INDIANS DO NOT NEED ANY ADVISE OR JAANKKAARI FROM KOSHER\nSOURCES ABOUT GREENHOUSE GASES . . ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWE CAN SEND A ROCKET TO MARS WITHOUT ZIONIST JEW HELP-- . .\n.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWE THE PEOPLE WILL NOT ALLOW JEW DARLING PM MODI TO MOTHBALL\nCOAL\u2026.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div .<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMETHANE AND NITROUS OXIDE ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR CLIMATE\nCHANGE... CARBON DI OXIDE IS A LIFE SAVING GAS .....<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIf the GLOBAL WARMING POTENTIAL ( GWP ) is 1 for Carbon\nDioxide, it is 302 for Nitrous oxide and 104 for Methane over a 20 year\nperiod...<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/most-potent-greenhouse-gases-nitrous.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/arctic-ice-melt-and-methane-time-bomb.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/06/methane-time-bomb-arctic-ice-meltdown.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\ncapt ajit vadakayil ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHY DOES A BLOGGER HAVE TO TELL ALL THIS ?<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nDONT WE HAVE INTELLIGENT MEN ON THIS PLANET ?<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 17.6px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_20.html?showComment=1545313220549#c2640052150166061700\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">December 20, 2018 at 7:10 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/12/global-warming-climate-change-fear.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE KOSHER DEEP STATE IS USING THE DEMOCRATS ( SECRETLY LED BY JEW OBAMA ) TO PUSH IN THE \"<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">GREEN NEW DEAL</span></b>&nbsp;\"..<br />\n<br />\nIT IS TIME FOR A MASSIVE YELLOW VEST PROTEST IN USA..<br />\n<br />\nTHE GREEN NEW DEAL IS ABOUT ENFORCING THE PARIS COP21 AGENDA OF CARBON TAXES ON BRANDING CARBON DIOXIDE AS A BAD GAS , WHILE KICKING METHANE AND NITROUS OXIDE UNDER THE KOSHER CARPET.<br />\n<br />\nJEW THOMAS L FRIEDMAN WAS USED BY KOSHER BIG BROTHER TO FIRST PUSH THE GND..<br />\n<br />\nFRIEDMAN SPAKE --<br />\nQUOTE: If you have put a windmill in your yard or some solar panels on your roof, bless your heart. But we will only green the world when we change the very nature of the electricity grid -- moving it away from dirty coal or oil to clean coal and renewables. And that is a huge industrial project -- much bigger than anyone has told you. Finally, like the New Deal, if we undertake the green version, it has the potential to create a whole new clean power industry to spur our economy into the 21st centur: UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nOn October 22, 2008 UNEP's Executive Director Achim Steiner unveiled the Global Green New Deal initiative that aims to create jobs in \"green\" industries, thus boosting the world economy and curbing climate change at the same time. ( FOR JEWS TO MAKE MONEY OUT OF THIN AIR )..<br />\n<br />\nGND relates to reforms to measurement of fundamental ecosystem risk and financial liabilities.<br />\n<br />\nJEWS HAVE INVENTED \"<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">REINSURANCE</span></b>\" TO MAKE MONEY OUT OF THIN AIR..<br />\n<br />\nReinsurance, also known as insurance for KOSHER insurers , is the practice of JEW insurers transferring portions of risk portfolios to other parties by some form of agreement to reduce the likelihood of paying a large obligation resulting from an insurance claim..<br />\n<br />\nREACT stands for Reinsurance Event-Attributed Carbon Tax, a system designed to put a fair price on the financial loss and damage arising from carbon emissions.<br />\n<br />\nBAFFLE WITH BULLSHIT IS THE AGENDA..</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">REACT is a method has been developed by JEWS to determine the extent to which events can be attributed to anthropogenic (human) emissions of CO2, with coal being the target..</span></div>\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">Jew Rothschild's tools , World Bank/IMF/UN should be the agencies for levying the carbon price and collecting the resultant revenue.</span></div>\n<br />\nThis would then be \"distributed\" with four kosher AIMS, whereby allocations are directed to Adaptation (e.g. flood protection), Insurance (ensuring viability), Mitigation (e.g. kosher solar panels, kosher wind turbines and kosher carbon capture), and to Social dividend (tax impact offsets).<br />\n<br />\nREACT measures the expected losses that will occur for each tonne of carbon dioxide emitted. It determines the allocation of the costs of those losses to each energy supplier based upon the proportion of carbon emitted and the carbon intensity of the fuel type used ( COAL IS BAAAAAD ) . The total revenue paid by all suppliers equals the total loss and damage caused by their emissions.<br />\n<br />\nJEW Thomas Friedman is an agent of Jew Rothschild --and he is terribly anti-Trump.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"c2640052150166061700-rt\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"c2640052150166061700-ra\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c9091036365021643432\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt.
